Igat ripot long ol bisnis grup bilong Australia nau iwok long go bek long Fiji bihainim ku bilong painim ol sans bilong statim ol bisnis ken.
Fiji nau i wok long bungim ol heve long ekonomi bilong en.
Preident bilong Fiji-Australia Bussiness Council, Ross Porter i tok, wanpela grup bilong ol bisnisman bilong Australia i kamap pinis long Fiji bilong painimaut wanem kain ol bisnis sans i stap, na bilong lukim wanem ol bisnis ol bai igo insait long ol.
Dispela grup ibin wok wantaim bisnis han bilong Australia Gavman, Austrade, bilong apim na kamapim investmen insait long Fiji ekonomi.
Em i tok, dispela tim bilong faifpela pipal bilong Australia i gat laik bilong igo het long treid bilong Biochemistry, Cables bilong ol kompiutas na ol Import Export bisnis.
OL NESANAL SPOT FEDERESIN INAP BUNGIM HEVE LONG AUSTRSLIA SAPOS.
Rebecca Barrett i ripot olsem, dispela tingting i bihainim wanpela toksave blong Australia drug testing agency, olsem sampela athletes i save abrusim ol taim we oli laik testim bodi blong ol long drug.
Australian Sports Drug Agency i tok sampela athletes i bin nap long abrusim ol dispels test.
Oli no save givim rait telepon namba oa oli save go long ol hap longwe long ol taun bai ol ofisal i nonap painim ol.
Dispela Agency i tok em i save bihainim tasol toksave blong ol sporting federations taim oli laik save long we ol athlete i wok long mekim treining blong ol.
Minista blong Sports, Jackie Kelly, i tok em i wok blong ol sporting federations long givim Agency stretpela toksave bai em i ken stopim ol athlete long abrusim ol drug test.
AIDS i wok long gohet long kamap long olketa hap blong kantri, na olketa hap blong komuniti i mas wuas gut long en.
Niusman Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem, namba blong pipal i kisim pinis nupela H-I-V, i go antap long 20-pesen stat long yiar igo pinis.
2800 pipal blong Papua New Guinea nau i kisim pinis HIV, na 1031 pipal i gat pinis AIDS.
232 pipal long kantri i dai pinis long sik AIDS.
Tasol Mr Mond i tok, ating namba blong pipal i gat dispela HIV imas moa long 15-tausen, insait long kantri, em i gat tasol fo-million pipal long en.
Em i tok, i gat bikpela namba blong pipal i givim bulut i gat dispela HIV na ol nupela babi ol i karim ol long Port Moresby.
Bikpela namba tu blong sik HIV i wok long kamap long Western Highlands, Simbu na Western Province.
Ol ripot i kam i tok olsem polis long South Sulawesi, province blong Indonesia i bin holim-kalabusim tupela-ten-tu pipal, em oli bilif i bin stap insaet long ol pait namel long ol laen pipal, we planti tausan pipal i bin lusim ol haus blong ol.
Layar Putih na Calo Jambu, em ol vilis blong ol asples na ol i planti moa winim ol narapela laen.
Long sampela taim bifo, oli bin kamapim ol pait tu long ol despela vailis.
Ol pait namel long ol migrant na asples planti taim i save kamap on na of, stat long 1985.
Repot itok- French Polynesia inolaikim usim moni em frans ibin givim ol bilong halavim despela territory insait long narapela 10-pela yar- bihain long ol ibin pasim ol ples bilong traim aut ol nuclia samting longen.
Aninit long wanpela tokorait ol ibin sainim long 1996- Franch ibin tokorait long givim 137- million dolla long kain moni bilong America long wanwan yar igo long Franch Polynesia inap long narapela tenpela yar.
Tasol long result long pinis bilong 1999 financial yar i soim olsem- despela frebch territory ino bin usim sampela long ol despela moni franch ibin rerem.
Tasol ol saveman bilong ol wokmoni long hap itok- ol bai stat usim despela moni sampela taim long namel bilong yar bihain- taim oli rerem ol plen bilong ol bigpela project- olsem long ol bigpela hausing development scheme.
Ku insait long Fiji long Mun May- bai stat tete.
Bihainim ripot bilong Ofa Kaukimoce- Siaman bilong despela wok painim- Chief Justice Sir Timoci Tuivagi bai kamap tingting long sapos em iken askim nambaut planti pipol na painim aut moa long despela.
Despela tingting bai rerem ol wok na stret rot bilong oli mekim ol wokpainim igo insait longen.
Fiji Court of Appeal bai harim despela kes.
Ol narapela komiti memba insait long despela inquiry em long wanpela mafistrate yet bilong hap- Amani Rokoti Naviti na president bilong pensioner association- Fred Archari.
Wanpela solicitor bilong gavman- Sarvada Nand Sharma- iwok long halavim commitee- we emi askim ol wanwan pipol long igo givim toktok or raitim tingting na wanem samting oli save longen na givim igo long despela komiti.
Ol ibin rrausim pastaim polis commissioner- Savua bilong opim rot bilong ol mekim wanpela wok painim igo insait longen.
Praim Minista blong Solomon islands, Manasseh Sogavare i mekim tingting pinis long em bai i noken go nau long United Nations Milleniusm Summit long New York.
Sogavare na delegesin blongem, oli bin ting bai oli lusim Honiara tumora.
Tasol em i tokim pinis Solomon Islands Broadcasting Corporation em i stopim wokobaut blongem igo long New York, long wanem ol peace talks i bikpela samting moa long stap longen na tu kost blon despela trip i bikpela tumas.
Sogavare i tok em bai i kostim nau Gavman fifti-tausan Australia dola blongem wanpela long givim wanpela gfaiv-minute toktok.
Despela trip igo long new York, bai i namba-wan tri blong Praim Minista long go overseas, sapos em i bin go, stat long taim em i bin kisim pawa oa kamap Praim minista long 30de blong mun Jun.
Oli sukurim taim ken bilong despela tingting bilong kamapim ol peace toktok bilong traim pinisim ol pait kros namel long tupela lain wanpisin insiat long Solomon ailen- igo inap long Fonde.
Despela toktok ibin ina long stat tete antap long Nevy Ship bilong New Zealand- Te Kaha.
Tasol oli surukim taim ken bilong despela peace toktok- bihainim ol ripot itok olsem - ol lain rebel bilong Isatabu Freedom Movement i askim long ol niupela kompensesen long oli lusim graun, ol haus na ool narapela samting.

Solomon Islands polis i mekim strongpela tok lukaut igo long ol bisnis long apim sikiuriti bilong ol, bihainim sampela bikpela stil pasim insait long kapital, Honiara.
Sampela man wantaim ol gan ibin ronowe wantaim moa long 35-tausen Australian dola long Honiara Casino.
Insait long narapela stil pasin, Commodiies Export Marketing Authority, ibin givim samting olsem 10-tausen dola bihain long ol memba bilong Malaita Eagle Force ibin askim strong long moni.
Deputy polis komisina bilong oporesan, Wilfred Akau itok, ol igivimol toksave igo pinis long bisnis komiuniti.
Wanpela kot oa Tribunal i wok long mekim ol investigesan wok igo long Fiji Polis Komisina, ISIKIA SAVUA, i tok bai INO ken larim ol memba bilong pablik i stap harim ol toktok.

Siaman bilong Tribunal na Chief Justice, Sir Timoci Tuivaga i tokaut tude long investigesan wok igo long SAVUA.
Em ibin tokaut olsem, ol pipal soim laik bilong ol long givim ol toktok oa raitim ol toktok bilong i mas mekim namel long tude na namba-12 de bilong mun Septemba.
Kot bilong harim toktok bilong ol pipal igo long dispela wok painimaut bai stat long Mande namba 4 de bilong Septemba.
Taim bilong pinisim dispela investigesan wok bai bihainim namba bilong pipal i laik toktok tasol igo long kot na namba bilong pipal i laik raitim long pepa na salim igo.
Tribunal bai salim ripot bilong wanem samting em i kisim igo long President.
Ol loia i makim Savua i tokaut strong olsem, em INO ibin stap insait long ol toktok olsem, em i bin halivim ku.
Palamen bilong Vanuatu i pasim ol nupela loa, bilong kamapim gutpela nem bilong em bihainim ol tok olsem, em i wanpela heven bilong ol pipal i bringim hait ol doti moni.
Financial Intelligence Unit bilong was na glasim gut na sapos em i nap long mekim ol investigesan wok long moni igo insait em ol INO klia tumas long en.
Aninit long dispela ANTI-MONEY LAUNDERING LAW ol i mas ripot igo long dispela nupela UNIT sapos oli INO klia gut long as bilong bringim moni igo insait.
Fainens Minista bilong Vanuatu, Mokin Steven i tok, dispela Financial Transaction Reporting Bill bai tokaut klia igo long ol pipal bilong narapela kantri olsem, Vanuatu bai igo het long lukim em i stap klin long ol kain doti wok olsem.

Na long ol narapela nius long East Timor, Australia Foren Minista, Alexander Downer, i toksave olsem Australia gavman bai halvim long wokim nupela palimen haus blong East Timor.
Mr Downer i bin tok olsem insait long Dili, bik taun blong East Timor.
Em i tok dispela halvim i soim bikpela laik blong Australia long gohet long halvim East Timor na tu long sapotim demokrasi long hap.
Mr Downer i tok dispela nupela palimen haus bai kamap wanpela samting em bai sanap makim ol wokbung na wok-pren namel long Australia na pipal blong East Timor, na i makim tu wok blong Australia long halvim East Timor i kamap wanpela strongpela demokratik kantri long dispela rijen.
Em i tok dispela wokbung i makim kain bihain-taim em ol lida na pipal blong East Timor i save laikim tumas.

Not na Saut Korea i bin statim ken ol miting blong tupela insaitlong Pyongyang, bik taun blong Not Korea, tede.
Long stat blong dispela miting, tupela Korea i bin promis long traim na daunim moa ol bel-kros namel long tupela.
Ol bel-kros namel long tupela Korea i bin wok long gohet insait long dispela 50 yar igo pinis.
Deligesin blong Saut Korea, em i gat 5-pela memba long en, wantaim 25 asistan na tenpela niusman, i bin kisim balus igo long Not Korea aste.

TELSTRA BLONG AUSTRALIA I KISIM BIKPELA WIN-MONI!
Bikpela telecommunications kampani tru blong Australia, Telstra, i toksave olsem, em i bin kisim bikpela profit oa win-moni tru.
Mak blong win-moni blong en i sanap makim nambawan taim tru em wanpela kampani blong kantri i kisim kain win-moni olsem long histri blong ol kampani.
Niusmeri Rena Sarumpaet i ripot olsem, moni Telstra i bin winim i go antap long 5-pesen, igo kisim 3-point-7 Bilian dola.
Bikpela bos blong Telstra, Ziggy Switkowski, i tok dispela win blong Telstra i soim hau ol kampani blong tede i ken kisim bikpela win-moni yet, maski em i bungim strongpela resis i kam long planti arapela kampani.
Siaman blong Telstra, Bob Mansfield, i tok kampani i hamamas karangi stret long dispela profit i kisim long wanem em i bekim bikpela invesmen moni em oli putim igo long kampani.
TIMOR I HAMAMAS!
Ol selebresin oa hamamas i gohet yet long East Timor blong makim nambawan aniveseri -- oa nambawan krisams bihain long taim dispela teritori i bin vot long bruk lusim Indonesia.
Niusman Geoff Thompson i ripot olsem, ol ples lain i bilas long ol bilas blong tumbuna, i bin go samsam klostu long United Nations haus long Dili nambis.
United Nation Transitional Administratoar, Sergio Vierra de Mello, i bin yusim dispela taim blong tokaut long ol nambawan salens oa bikpela wok East Timor bai mas bungim.
Em i tok wanpela long ol dispela salens em long pasim wok blong ol militia long kamapim trabal long boda.
Australia Foren Minista Alexander Downer i bin tokim pipal olsem, Australia bai halvim East Timor long wokim nambawan palimen blong en.
Mr Downer i bin tok Australia bai noke tanim baksait long East Timor.
Elektoral Ofis ibin tok, i tru olsem ol bai apim namba bilong ol sia insait long provinsal eleksin, tasol em ino bin laik toktok tumas long dispela samting.
Vanuatu Gavman na Asian Developmen Bank long ol loa Barak Sope Gavman i gat plen bilong mekim insait long palamen.
Praim Minista Sope i tok, A-D-B i tokaut long oposisan bilong em long tupela lo oa Bill em bai oli dibet oa toktok long ol insait long Palamen.
Tupela Bill i askim long moa politikal kontrol long pablik sevis.
Ripot i tok, Bank i tok lukaut long katim ol louns igo long Vanuatu sapos ol i mekim ol bill i kamap lo.
Emi tok, dispela i no makim ol tingting na luksave bilong rifom progrem, em A-D-B i givim halivim moni long en.
Sope i tok, gavman bilong em i redi long stop long kisim dinau moni ikam long Bank.

Gavman i makim tu sampela bikpela wok bilong larim ol investas bihainim sais bilong investmen bilong ol.
Ol Unions i tokaut strong ino laikim dispela na i tok lukaut olsem, em bai ino givim ol sitisen bilong Fiji wankain ol sans bilong bisnis.
HOWARD I SUTIM TOK LONG UNITED NATIONS!
Gavman blong Australia i tok em i belhat long harim toktok blong wanpela United Nations human rait lain olsem, human rait rekot blong Australia i NOGUT moa winim blong China na pakistan.

New Caledonia i tokaut long rekod bikpela namba bilong ekspotos samting em i bin salim igo aut insai tlong namba-wan sikis mun bilong dispela yar.
Ol ekspot bilong dispela taim ibin kamap long 275 miliain U-S dola.
Nikal na ol narapela samting ikam long maining bisnis i makim 90 pesent.
Ol Shrimp, si kukamba na trokos sels ibin namel long ol narapela samting em i bin salim igo aut.
Gavman i tok, kamap gut bilong ekspot i kamapim gut tred akaunt bilong teritori.
Ratu Josefa Iloilo, president bilong nau.
Dispela kot pepa i makim ol samting i kamap bihainim ku long mun May.

Tu ol ibin toktok tu long tingting bilong givim marimari igolong ku lida George Speight na ol sapotas bilong em.

Mr Igara i tok, gavman i mekim gutpela wok pinis insait long dispela tupela eria na IMF i hamamas long ol dispela wok Papua Niugini i wok long mekim.
Nesenal Palamen bilong Papua New Guinea i givim bikpela sapot long wanpela loa bilong pinisim pasin bilong ol memba bilong palamen kalap long wanpela politikal pati igo long narapela.
Dispela pasin ibin kamap pinis long planti yar pinis.
Dispela Bill, em Praim Minista Sir Mekere Morauta ibin putim igo long Palamen, i mekim senis long namba-wan mama lo bilong kantri bilong 1975, na strongim kontrol bilong ol memba bilong palamen ino ken lusim wanpela pati igo long narapela, bihain long oli winim eleksan.
Aninit long dispela lo, husat memba bilong palamen i lusim wanpela pati igo long narapla bai pinis olsem memba bilong palamen.
Dispela i bilong mekim tu ol indipendent memba bilong palamen long join wanpela rejisted politikal pati.
Manaseh Sogavare itok, gavman bilong em i laik mekim ol wok bilong abrisim ol trabel, bihain long wanem samting ol ibin luksave long ol dispela trabel i wok long kamap long kantri nau.
Em itok dispela heve i skulim ol lida olsem ol lain bilong wokim ol loa na kamapim ol tingting bilong lukim olsem ol sevis gavman i makim long en, i mas wankain long olgeta provins.
Ol i ting olsem, Suharto, lida bilong Indonesia bipo bai kamap long kot tude long ol sas bilong paulim moni oa korapsen.

Samantha Hawley i ripot olsem, kaunsel nau i holim konfrens bilong em long dispela yar insait long Canberra long dispela wiken.
Council for Overseas Aid i tokaut long bikpela wari bilong em long nupela tingting bilong Federal Gavman long ol International Treaties na i askim long Gavman i tokaut klia long ol tingting na laik em i gat bilong mekim ol senis.
Bihain long ol ripot i mekim strongpela toktok INO laikim pasim bilong ol Human Right heve, wanpela long ol Mandatory Sentencing, Howard Gavman ibin tokaut long tingting bilong em long daunim ol trip bilong ol United Nations Committees ikam long Australia, na ino laik sainim wanpela agrimen INO laikim ol paisn nogut igo long ol meri.

Thousands of East Timorese have illuminated the territories capital with Candles, marking the anniversary of the start of last years campaign of destruction by pro-Jakarta militia.
Di Martin reports from Dili.
The scandal surrounding the American company, Firestone and a faulty batch of tyres has assumed new proportions.
The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration has required Firestone to recall another 1.
The organisation has been urging drivers to replace their Firestone tyres, if necessary at their own cost.
In parts of the US particularly in the South, where the majority of fatal accidents occurred, tyres are now in very short supply.
The number of deaths attributed to the faulty products in the US has risen from 62 to 88, with 250 people injured.
In Venezuela authorities have registered 47 Firestone-related deaths after tyres burst and caused a series of major accidents.
International Olympic Committee President Juan Antonio Samaranch has arrived in Sydney for a series of meetings with officials ahead of the start of the Games next week.
As Kevin Wilde reports, the Sydney games will be the last for Mr Samaranch as leader of the Committee.
United Nations peacekeepers in East Timor have called for the rules of engagement to be relaxed to help them deal more effectively with armed militia groups.
The U-N, which has already lost two peacekeepers to the militia since July, has submitted the request to U-N headquarters in New York.
It wants the U-N to give peacekeepers permission to open fire on armed militia if they appear hostile and ignore warnings to surrender.
The move comes amid criticism from the East Timorese leadership that the U-N is not doing enough to curb the infiltration of militia into East Timor.
Plans to reduce the number of U-N peacekeepers in the eastern part of the territory have now been shelved.

Chaudhey i bin tok em tru gavman blongem ino bin laik harim planti toktok kros na complain i kam long ol asples Fiji pipal na em i sutim tok long Home Affairs Minista, olsem em rong blongem long ino bin laik harim ol wari blong ol asples Fiji pipal.

Wanpela Kot insait long Jakarta ibin putim olpela Presiden Suharto bilong Indonesia aninit long siti arest inap long narapela tupela mun.
Dispela oda bilong Kot bai stat long Fonde na stap inap long namba 5 de bilong mun Novemba.
Dispela Kot i tok, em i mekim dispela samting long redi long kot kes bilong Suharto long ol sas bilong korapsen.
Em tu ibin kamapim tingting olsem ol bai harim kot kes bilong Suharto insait long haus bilong em yet, long abirisim toktok ino-laik bilong ol dokta bilong em, husat ibin fosim ol long pasim-pastaim kot kes bilong Suharto inap long tupela wik.
Ol ibin sutim tok long Suharto, krismas bilong em 79 yar, long em ibin stilim moa long 500-Million Amerikan Dola long kantri, taim em ibin holim paua inap long 32 yar.
Nambatu hap bilong kot kes bilong em, em bai stat long Fonde, bai harim ol toktok ikam long ol praivet dokta bilong Suharto na tuwanpela medikal tim em gavman ibin makim.
Wanpela international media freedom group i askim pinis Kiribati long larim wanpela man blong raitim kamap nius blong AFP long stap long forum leaders summit long Tarawa long mun bihaen.
Laen oli kolim Reporters Sans Frontiers i raitim pas pinis igo long President blong protest agensim tingting blongem Kiribati gavman long noken givim Media Accreditation card igo long Michael Field.
Em i tok I gutpela long Kiribati long sainim despela international Covenant long Civil na Political Rights, em i wuas na lukautim gut freedom of expression.
Long december, 1999, oli bin putim tambu long Michael Field na oli bin stopim em na tokim em long lusim despela ailan kantri, bihaen long em i bin raitim kamap wanpela stori long kains sindaon em ino gutpela long laif blong pipal long Tarawa.

Polis long Nauru i holim-kalabus i stap wanpela fishing bot husat i brukim long long kisim fis.
Despela bot, oli bin rejista longen long America, i bin wok long kisim fis long ol net taim Nauru polis i bin kalap igo antap longen.
Oli bin pulim captain na ensinia na kisim ol igo long rumgat.
Oli makim olsem prais blong despela fishing bot em long 22-million dola.
Nau despela bot i stap long bris wantaem ol boskru blongen.

Indonesia ibin senis taim ol ibin stat wantaim ol bot nating - tasol nau iluk olsem ol isave ronim olsem ol bisnis bilong pulim moni longen- usim family nem bilong ol.
Nau nau iluk olsem ol iwok long hait gut na ronim despela bisnis- wantaim ol bigpela paul bisnis lain na ol sinia paul ofisa istap insait longen.

OL wokbung namel long North na South Korea i bin op bikpela tru taim tupela lida bilong tupela sait i bin holim wanpela bikpela miting long mun June.
North Korea lain em bai raon long Sotuh Korea, bai bungim South President Kim Dae-Jung taim em i lukluk raon long South.
Ol ripot i tok planti tausen pipal long Aceh provins blong Indonesia, i ronawe pinis lusim ol ples blong ol.
Wanpela niuspepa long hap i tok samting olsem wan tausen pipal blong Bandar sab distrik long Central Aceh, oli ronawe pinis lusim Takengon, bikpela taon blong distrik, na oli go pulap long paliment haus.
Wanpela mausman blong distrik gavman i tok ol refuji i wok long ronawe lusim ol ples blong ol long wanem ol sekuriti wok long hap i wok long kamap strong moa.
Ol refuji i tok ol man i karim ol gan samting blong pait, i bin go kukim 28 haus long FONde na Fraide.
Insait long West Aceh, samting olsem 3-tausen pipal blong sikispela vilis i wokim pinis ol kem.
Polis i tok ol kainkain man i bin tokim ol dispela pipal long lusim ol vilis blong ol, taim sampela ripot i tok ol dispela pipal i ronawe long wanem ol sekuriti fos i wok long patrolim dispela hap.

Haiwara na landslide long bikpela ren em i wok long pundaon long Japan, em bikpela tru long kamap long wan-handret yiar, i kilim dai pinis foapela pipal na em i mekim ol otoroti long askim strong klostu foa-handret-tausan pipal long kirap lusim ol haus blong ol.
Polis i tok foapela pipal i wok long lus yet bihaen long ren, em typhoon Saomai i bin kamapim i bin hamamarim tripela bikpela taon long Central Japan.
Ol local otoriti i bin askim tu-handret-tausan pipal long lusim ol ples blong ol na stap long ol publik ples, bihaen long bikpela ren, i bin mekim ol said blong mauden i bruk na mekim ol river system ibrukim said oa bank blong ol na ron igo na pulumapim ol haus blong pipal, na katim-of NAGOYA city, we moa long tupela million pipal i save stap longen i kamap olsem ailan.

Oli tingting despela meeting bilong Commonwealth bai bihainim ol toktok bilong ol minista bilong South Pacific- em ol ibin askim long oli hariap long stertim gut mama lo bilong Fiji na holim kuik wanpela election.

Shihab i tok gavman blong em ino laikim tingting blong UN Security Council long salim wanpela lain igo long Atambua, West Timor, blong mekim ol wok-painim.

Phill Goff i tok em i gat heve long ol kantri ino stap gut long south-west Pacfici, we em i gat ol pait i wok long kamap long region i stat i kam long Indonesia, na ron i kam daon long Papua New Guinea, Solomon islands, Vanuatu na Fiji.
Em i tok ol despela pait oa trabal i kamap bihaenim heve oa kros olsem namel long ol ethnic na laen wanpisin, kros long graon, corrupsen, polis ino mekim gutpela wok long lukautim law na order na tu oli no save gut long wok blong army bihaenim mamaloa.

Ol polis i wokim dispela pasin blong kliarim rot na larim bas blong ol deliget blong World Economic Forum i go-kam long miting.
Ol activists, oa pipal husat i wokim protes, i sutim tok long polis na tok, oli bin yusim strongpela paua tumas agensim pipal i protes.
Ol sinia polis i tok, nogat na nogat tru -- oli no wokim wanpela rong, na oli tok ol bin toksave gut pinis long ol protesta long lukaut.
Na polis i kisim gutpela sapot ikam long Premia blong Victoria, Steve Bracks.

Papua New Guinea i statim pinis ol selebreson blong makim 25-yiar anniversary long independence i kam long Australia.
Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem pipal i bin wok long bung na kamap long ol festival oa singsing na cultural show long olgeta hap long kantri.
Long Port Moresby, Richard Dinnen i tok, planti pipal i bin bung long Ela Beach tu long Sir Hubert Murray Stadium blong lukim ol singsing group blong ples i danis, ol parades, pilai resis long kanu, na tu blong lukim ol chinese gymnast.
Long ol narapela taon na vilis long Papua New Guinea, i gat ol kain singsing na show olsem i wok long kamap.
Bikpela seremoni tru bai ikamap tumora moning, em de stret blong anniversary.

Sadako Ogata, i stap nau long Pakistan long mekim wanpela-wik lukluk-raun long dispela rijon na em bai go tu long Afghanistan na Iran.
Ms Ogata ibin toktok long heve bilong 2-million-600-tausen refugi bilong Afghanistan i stap nau long Pakistan na Iran.
Dispela bikmeri bilong UNHCR ibin tok-hamamas long Pakistan long gutpela na bikpela wok em i mekim long kisim na lukautim ol dispela refugi bilong Afghanistan, taim Soviet Union ibin go kisim na bosim Afghanistan, namel long 1979 na 1989.
Insait long Iran, Ms Ogata bai lukluk-raun long sampela refugi kemp, we samting olsem wan-million refugi bilong Afghanistan i stap long en long kantri.

Difens secretary biloong America, Willian Cohen ibin igo lukluk raun long Indonesia aste na em ibin tokim ol lida long ol imas daunim ol despela lain trabelman isave sapotim Indonesia- bihain long ol ibin kilim idai tripela ol United Nations Aid Wokman insait long West Timor.
Spika bilong Consultative Asembly bilong Indonesia- Amien Rais itok, sapos Indonesia i guria long despela tok lukaut-ol bai lukim despela kantri olsem emi samting nating.
Oli bihainim toktok bilongen long tok olsem- Indonesia imas sanap strong long ol sutim tok ikam long ol strongpela kantri olsem America- usait iwok long traim long bosim na pusim nambaut ol kantri.
Cohen iwok long askim Indonesia long rausim or pinisim olgeta ol militia grup- usait ol iwok long sutim tok long ol tu long kilim idai tupela peacekeepa bilong United Nation insiat long East Timor.
Emi tok lukaut olsem- despela pasin iken bagarapim ol wokpren bilong Indonesia wantaim ol narapela international community na despela iken kamapim heve long ol halavim moni em Indonesia i needim tru longen.
Wanpela Fijian civil servant na diplomat husat i pinistem long wok, i bin sakim ol toktok blong Britain, husat i bin tok, oli noken putim heve long Britain long ol sindaon nongut namel long ol asples Fijian na Indo-Fijian.

Interim Gavman bilong Fiji iwok long igo hed wantaim tingting bilong olpela gavman bilong Mahendra Chaudhry long opim wanpela embassy ofis bilong China insait long Fiji.
Interim Foren Affairs minista bilong Fiji-Kaliopate Tavola itok- oli tingting long opim despela embassy long pinis bilong mun November or long stat bilong mun December.
Tavola itok, oli toksave pinis long China olsem Fiji ilaikim interim praim minista bilongen- Laisenia Qarase long igo istap opening bilong embassy ofis bilong Fiji insait long China.
Interim Foren Affairs minista itok- China ibin wanbel kuik long despela tingting na emi askim long rerem taim bilong despela tingting.
Oli tokim pinis wanpela international economic konferens ol laen i save lukautim loa blong ol moni-bisnis, i wok long painim i hat tumas long stopim kain pasin long kisim moni long ol criminal-pasin long internet sapos ol kantri ino wok bung wantaem na oli no hariap longen.
Wanpela ripot oli bin givim igo long konferens long Cambridge long England, i givim toktok blong Interpol Secretary-General, Raymond Kendall long tok olsem ol laen i save wokim loa i wok long bungim bikpela heve raon long wol na tu oli no kisim halvim i kam long ol kantri raon long wol.
Em i tok moni em i kam long kain wok samting olsem long drug, wok long salim hait ol samting blong pait, pasin pamuk na ol narapela crime olsem i save paulim planti billion dola long wanwan yiar long ol bisnis long wol na salim igo long despela laundering system ol criminal i save wokim nambaut long woldOl pasifik kantri em nem blong ol i stap insait long despela kain bisnis long bringim hait moni oa laundering, em long Cook Islands, Marshall Islands, Nauru na Niue.
Kendall i tok long wanem ol gavman blong ol kantri i no wok bung tumas na tu long usim internet we oli no nap tru long kontrolim em i min olsem ol Gavman ino nap stopim kain crime olsem we oli usim ol haitek long salim nambaut na stilim moni.

Wanpela judge long Fiji bai autim tingting long mun bihain sapos dispela mari mari oa immunity oli bin givim long ku lida, George Speight na ol sapota blong em, i oraet aninit long lo.
State i bin mekim agensim dispela tingting long rausim sas blong wanpela long ol sapota blong Speight, long mun July.
Oli bin sasim dispela man long sas long traim kilim narapela man.
Taim em i bin rausim dispela ol sas long tupela mun igo pinis, Chief Magistrate blong Fiji, i bin tok olsem, dispela trabel i bin kamap insait long taim blong immunity.
State i givim pinis affidavits ikam long militari igo long High Kot, blong sapotim ol toktok blong en olsem, dispela immunity ino bin oraet long lo, longwanem, wanpela long ol samting oli bin tok long oli mas bihainim, em long givim bek olketa gan blong armi.
Tasol oli no bin bihainim dispela.
Judge nau i askim George Speight long wanpela affadavit na i bin pasim pastaim kot kes igo inap long namba-tu blong mun Oktoba.
Dispela ruling bai mekim tingting sapos Speight na ol sapota blong em, inap long bungim ol sas blong treason.
Mr Speight na ol sapota blong em nau i wok long stap kalabus long wanpela liklik ailan.
Ol Gavman loia long Fiji i wok long tingting long salansim wanpela kot oda i larim ku lida George Speight na ol bikpela sapotas bilong em i gat spesol femali visit.

Wanpela militia komanda insait long Solomon Islands, i wok long holim kalabusim yet pilot.
Oli bin hait na pulim kalabusim dispela pilot na balus blong em, long faivpela dei igo pinis.
Sean Dorney i ripot olsem, wanpela lotu grup blong Solomon Islands husat i wok long traim long holim toktok wantaim rebel lida blong lusim fri dispela pilot, ino bin nap long kamapim wanpela samting.
Lida blong Guadalcanal militia, Harold Keke i wok long askim ransom moni long moa long haf-million Australian dola, olsem bai oli ken lusim igo dispela pilot.
Meri blong pilot, ERic Rove Florence, i bin toktok wantaim em long redio, planti taim stat yet long Sarere.

Attorney General blong Indonesia, Marzuki Darusman i tok, ol soldia blong Indonesia i bin stap namel long lain i bin kilim dai tripela aid woka blong United Nations, long West Timor.
Mr Darusman i bin tokim ol ripota long Jakarta olsem, polis long taun blong Atambu long boda blong West Timor i holim kalabusim na i wok long askim sikpela pipal wantaim ol memba blong Indonesia militari, long dai blong ol pipal long namba sikis dei blong mun September.
Em i tok, em ino kilia gut long husat ol soldia tru istap insait long dispela heve, tasol em i bin tok, em i ting igat sampela bik-het lain soldia istap insait long armi na ino save bihainim oda blong komanda.
Planti kantri long wold i wok long mekim strongpela toktok long Indonesia long rausim ol samting long ol militias, bihainim dai blong tripela aid woka na tripela pipal blong Indonesia, em ol milias ino laikim independen, i bin kilim ol.
U-N Edministresan na Australia bai statim ol toktok long mun bihain bilong ol tingting na laik bilong bihain taim bilong painim oil na Gas aninit long Timor Sea.
Ol U-N ofisal i tok, bai oli holim namba-wan raun bilong ol toktok long Dili, kapital bilong East Timor.
Australia i gat agrimen wantaim U-N Transitional Administration long East Timor, we i givim em i go het long ol wok bihainim ol tingting na laik istap long Timor Gap Treaty.
Ol ibin sainim dispela Treaty long 1989 wantaim Indonesia, husat ibin igo insait kisim em long 1975, na lukautim em long 24 yar.
Tasol dispela agrimen bai pinis taim East Timor i kisim ful indipendens, em ol i ting long dispela yar.
Narapela agrimen oa Treaty bilong kisim ples bilong dispela bai abruim ol heve bilong lo, na givim gutpela binsis rot bilong oil na Gas insait long Timor Sea.
East Timor bai kisim planti milian dola ikam long Oil na Gas long taim ikam bihain.
New Zealand bai kamap ol sitisen, na ol bai inap long muv fri ikam long Australia.
Wanpela kot long Guam i tok, em ino tru olsem em i bin tok orait long Chinese lotu lida Zhang Hongbao blong go stap long Guam.
Tasol, ol bai noken rausim em igo bek long China na bai oli lusim em long rumgat.
Zhang em i lida blong wanpela kain lotu muvmen oli kolim - Zhong Gong insait long China, em ol ripot i tok i gat 30 milian memba blong en.
Ol ripot i tok, em i bin wok long hait inap long faifpela yar, pastaim long em i go kamap long Guam long mun January.
Dispela tingting blong Guam kot i min olsem, Zhang bai no nap kisim tok orait blong kisim American sitijensip.
Ol loia blong en i tok, ol bai apil agensim dispela tingting blong kot.
Deputi Praim Minista bilong Solomon Islands i tok, moni gavman ibin peim igo long wanpela long ol malisa grup i katim namba bilong ol rebel insait long kapital igo daun long klostu tausen.
Gavman i bin peim wan-tausen eit handret membas bilong Malaita Eagle Force long igo bek long ples bilong ol, na Sean Dorney i ripot olsem, Gavman i wok long tokaut olsem, namba bilong kraim long Honiara i go daun.
Malaita Eagle Force, em ol i salim igo bek long ples bilong ol, wantan-tausen dola.
Dispela i makim wan milian eit handret tausen dola Solomon Isalnds dola.
Em i samting olsem sikis-handret tausen Australian dola.
Insait long narapela tokaut, komiunikesan divisan bilong Solomon Islands Gavman i tok, INO ibin gat kraim insait long Honiara long stat bilong dispela wik.
Sampela pipal insait long taun INO wanbel long dispela tokaut.
Long wankain taim, meri bilong pailot em ol i holim em stap olsem Hostage long Weather Coast bilong Guadalcanal stat long Sarere, Florence Rove, i mekim strongpela askim igo long Roviana pipal bilong man bilong em long Western Province long INO mekim samting igo hat moa.
Dispela i bihainim tok lukaut bilong ol long bekim bek wantaim pait.
Wanpela sinia generel bilong Indonesia ibin tok-lukaut olsem, atingol strongpela ovasis kantri, wantaim Amerika, i wok long plen long tekova long West Papua Provins.
Tasol, gavman ofis bilong Amerika insait long Jakarta i tok, nevi bilong Amerika ino bin stap insait long ol trening kolostu long West Papua inap long sampela mun nau.
Long wik igo pinis, foapela woa-sip bilong nevi bilong Amerika ibin go raun long olpela provins bilong Indonesia, East Timor, long givim ol kaikai na samting bilong wokim ol haus long dispela territori em ibin kisim bikpela bagarap tru long ol pait na trabel.
Generel Syahnakrie ibin bosim sekuriti long East Timor long yar igo pinis taim ol milisa i sapotim Indonesia, wantaim halivim bilong Indonesia Ami, ibin kamapim ol bikpela pait na trabel na kilim pipol.
Em nau i bosim sekuriti tu insait long West Timor.
Ripot i tok, ol soldia bilong Indonesia i stat pinis long rausim samting bilong pait long ol milisa paitman i sapotim Indonesia, em ol ibin sutim tok long ol long kilim tripela aid woka bilong United Nations long West Timor.
AFP Niusagensi bilong Frans i tok, wanpela militeri ofisa long Belu distrik bilong West Timor em i stap long boda wantaim East Timor, ibin mekim dispela toktok.
Em i tok, ol i wok long rausim samting bilong pait long ol milisa grup na ol milisa memba tu ibin givim ol dispela samting bilong pait long laik bilong ol yet.
AFP i tok, dispela ofisa ibin tok olsem, dispela wok i stat nau tasol, na ikam inap nau, ol sekuriti atoreti ino kisim planti samting bilong pait yet ikam long ol milisa grup.
Bali, bai go kamap tete long dispela hap long lukim ol i rausim samting bilong pait long ol milisa grup.
Long stat bilong dispela wok, militeri komand ibin tokaut olsem nambawan hap-wok bilong rausim samting bilong pait long ol milisa bai stat long Fraide na go het inap long foapela dei.

Sir Mekere Morauta, ino laikim wanpela tingting bilong ol Hela wanpisin bilong Southern Highlands i kirapim wanpela provins bilong ol yet.

Ol pis toktok bilong pinisim tupela yar bilong kros na pait namel long ol pipal iet bilong Solomon Islands bai kamap long Cairns northern Australia long namba 10 de bilong Oktoba.
Deputi Praim Minista na Minista bilong National Unity, Reconciliation na Peace, Allan Kemakeza i tok ol i mekim ol las disisan long husat ol pipal bai stap long ol toktok.

Ol i bin peim moni igo long tupela militen grup, tasol Mr.

Emi tok, gavman i bin salim igo bek long ol ples bilong ol, ol memba bilong Malaita Eagle Force na Isatabu Freedom Movement bihainim Cease-Fire Agreement ol ibin sainim long mun August.
Indonesia i tok, em i kisim stretpela tokaut pinis olsem, gavman bilong Papua New Guinea INO ken halivim ol Indipendence Movements insait long West Papua.
Vice President bilong Indnesia, Megawati Sukarnoputri ibin igo long Port Moresby long wik igo pinis bilong ol selebresan bilong makim 25 yar indipendens bilong PNG.
Praim Minista Sir Mekere Moruata na Governor General, Silas Atopare ibin tok, Gavman bilong tupela bai INO ken sapotim laik bilong brukim dispela Indonesian provins.
Megawati i tok, sapot bilong PNG em i bikpela samting tru bilong Indonesia long taim emi traim long pasim laik na tingting bilong sampela West Papua pipal long bruk na lukautim ol iet.
Nauru na Vanuatu i tokaut long sapot bilong tupela long Indipendens bilong West Papua.
Port Moresby Bank bihain long ol i bin luk olsem givim ol iet igo long polis.
Dispela inkuest i wok long harim ol toktok long ol wei, ol i bin kilim ol stilman, bihain long wok traim bilong ol long stilim moni ibin feil long mun Disemba long yar igo pinis.
Faifpela man ibin satarim wanpela helikopta na fosim pailot igo pudan long ruf bilong PNG Banking Corporation het ofis, we wok taim bilong ol long stil ibin feil.
Ol ibin ronowe wantaim helikopta, tasol polis ibin sutim em daun.
Faifpela man INO ibin kisim birua long taim helikopta ibin pudaun, tasol ol ibin sutim ol dai bihain.
Wanpela witnes ibin tokim koronas inkuest olsem, em i bin lukim tripela man ibin traim long ronwe insait wanpela kar.
Em i tok, wanpela man em i bilip i wanpela plen klos polisman ibin stopim ol, na bihain sutim ol, maski ol ibin luk oslem i laik givim ol iet igo long han bilong em.
Dispela koronas inkuest i wok long go het iet.
Prais blong bensin, diesel na avgas i go antap pinis long Papua New Guinea - long wanem prais blong oil long wol i go antap.
PNG i bin apim prais blong ol dispela samting aste na prais kontrola i toksave pinis olsem, prais blong baim balus na sip igo-kam raun long kantri bai go antap.
Dan Kakaraya i tok em i save olsem dispela bai kamapim sampela heve, tasol prais blong crude oil long wol, em i go antap bikpela tru long nambawan taim insait long tenpela yar, i fosim em long apim prais blong bensin na ol narapela samting long PNG.

Ol hetman bilong Fiji Leba Pati, wanpela bikpela pati insait long koalisen gavman i tok, em i pasim tingting long i noken stap insait long wok bilong glasim gut ken 1997 Constitution.
Oli bin askim Fiji Leba Pati na Nesanal Federesin Pati long makim Indian Fiji pipal igo insait long Komisan, tasol tupela INO i bin laik makim kendidet.

Australia sempion swima, Grant Hackett i bin winim wantok blong em Kieren Perkins long 1500 metres freestyle swim resis tede na em i kisim gol medal.
Niusman Bruce Atkinson i ripot olsem driman blong Perkins long winim nambatri Olympic Gold Medal long dispela dispela resis, i bin popaia.
Tasol em i bin givim olgeta strong blong em long dispela resis na maski em i kam seken, em i bin daunim taim blong em yet, samting em ino bin nap long wokim insait long dispela sikispela yar igo pinis.
Wantok blong em Grant Hackett i bin winim resis insait long 14 minit, 48-poin-3-3 sekens blong winim Perkins long moa long 5 sekens.
Chris Thompson blong America i bin kamap ted.
Australia i bin winim ol silva medal long 100 medley relay resis blong ol man na blong ol meri.
America i bin winim dispela tupela resis wantaim na long wankain taim oli bin wokim ol nupela wol rekod long tupela.

India i tok em bai apim bikpela tru ol sekuriti wok blong en blong lukautim ol pipal husat i save stap insait long Kashmir eria blong en.
Neeraj Bali i ripot olsem ol India autoriti em oli lukautim Kashmir i wok long mekim 2-tausen-400 bunkers oa hul na baret insait long ol vilis long dispela boda eria em oli save pait long en oltaim wantaim Pakistan.
Dispela toksave blong India long apim sekuriti i bihainim nupela trabal we ol gan i bin wok long sut ikam.
Ol gan i pairap olsem ino nupela samting, India na Pakistan i save sutim wanpela narapela yet long wanpela eria em i ron namel long Kashmir.
International Olympic Committee oa O-I-C i tokaut pinis long bikpela tenkyu blong en igo long ol pipal blong Australia husat i stap lukluk long Sydney 2000 Olympic games.
Darekta Jeneral blong I-O-C, FRANCOIS CARRARD, i tok pipal long Olympic Park insait long Sydney i wok long soim trupela spirit tru blong Games.
Tasol long wankain taim oli respekt na luksave long ol narapela athletes blong ol narapela kantri.
Carrard i tok, dispela pasin blong Australia pipal i mekim em i pilim gut, na yu ken pilim spirit blong Games long olgeta hap blong Olympic Park.
Em i tok Australia pipal i wokabaut raun, oli marimari na nais long pipal, oli smile long ol na oli hamamas tru.
Em i tok dispela i mekim IOC i hamamas karangi stret.
Wanpela bikpel pait em Philippines ami i wokim agensim ol Muslim paitman long sauten Phillipines nau i kisim namba-tu wik, tasol nogat wanpela samting i soim olsem dispela kempein i karim gutpela kaikai.
Planti tausen sivilian i lusim haus bilong na ronawe.

Mr Suharto, President bipo bilong Indonesia, igo pinis long wanpela haus sik long Jakarta, bihainim kot oda long em i mas go lukim ol dokta.
Kot i bin givim oda bai ol dokta arasait long lain dokta blong Mr Suharto i mas glasim helt bilong em.
Oda bilong kot i kamap bihain long taim Suharto ino bin kamap long kot namba-tu taim.
Ol dokta bilong em i bin tok em i bin sik na ino fit oa strong inap long kamap long kot.
Ol i sasim Mr Suharto, krismas bilong em 79, long korapsan na yusim hait moni bilong halvim em yet.
Ol eid wokman-meri bilong Indonesia, em oli stat go bek long West Timor i ripot olsem, oli wok long givim aut liklik kaikai tasol long sampela refuji, tasol ol narapela refuji i nogat.
Wanpela Christian Relief Agency i tok, em i poret nogut ol refiuji i stap hangare long wanpela kem klostu long boda taun, Atambua, ples we ol i bin kilim tripela United Nations eid wokman long stat bilong dispela mun.

Long Papua New Guinea, polis i banisim wanpela hap bilong Port Moresby, bihainim ol kros namel ol polis na ol soldia.
Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem, polis i bin sutim dai wanpela soldia tete moning.
Ol memba bilong Papua New Guinea Difens Fos i bin go lukim polis taim ol toktok long dai bilong dispela solida i bin go raun long taun.
Wanpela long ol stori i olsem, ol i bin sutim dai dispela soldia taim em i bin stap insait long pasin stil, na narapela stori i tok, polis is sutim em taim em i wok long kam aut lusim wanpela naitklab.
Ol soldia i bin go lukim polis long Boroko, na gat i bin paira, na bihain polis i bin pasim dispela eria na givim oda long pasim ol stua.
Planti solida i bin kros na igo bung long Murray Barracks na tok lukaut long narapela pait wantaim polis, tasol i luk olsem dispela grup i bruk nambaut pinis nau.
Ol kar em oli pulap long polis wantaim ol gan nau i wok long patrol long dispela hap, na ol i putim ol rot-blok pinis raun long Boroka Polis Stesin.
Ol trak draiva blong Australia bai holim miting dispela wiken blong rereim ol tingting blong wanpela kempein agensim prais blong bensin em i wok long go antap moa yet.
Ron Fuller i ripot olsem wanpela long ol tingting bai oli stretim tok long en em long wokim wanpela blockade.
Ol draiva i wok long bung wantaim long Queensland, Victoria, New South Wales, Western Australia na A-C-T oa Canberra.

Em i save go na go antap tasol, em i tok.
Em i tok ol draiva i belhat tu Australia Gavman long wanem em ino laik go isi long ol takis blong bensin.

Dispela fee i kalap igo antap pinis lusim 106 American dola, i go antap long 3-tausen-400 dola.
President blong Vanuaaku Pati, Edward Natapei, i tok tingting blong apim eleksan fee i givim bikpela heve tru long planti politikal pati husat i laikim wanwan kendidet blong ol long baim fee blong ol yet wanwan.
Em i tok planti long ol kendidet husat bai resis long ol provinsal eleksan, oli nogat wok.

America bai toktok strong long North Korea i mas mekim samting stret na noken wokim toktok nating tasol insait long ol miting long New York long dispela wik.
North Korea na ol toktok olsem em i wok long salim ol militari teknologi na givim sapot long ol terroris.
Wanpela nupela ripot blong Pentagon ibin kam aut long Fraide i bin tok, North Korea i stap yet wanpela kantri husat i ken kamapim bikpela heve long gutpela sidaun na sekuriti long North East Asia.
Em i wanpela kantri iken nap pulim America long stap insait long wanpela bikpela war.
Nau yet, President blong South Korea, Kim Dae-Jung i mekim strongpela askim long Japan long givim halivim long kaikai na moni igo long North Korea.
Mr Kim i bin tok, ekonomi blong North Korea i wok long bungim heve.

Papua New Guinea Leadership Tribunal tede bai tokaut long tingting blong en long wanem kain mekim-save bai oli givim long Jim Kas, husat i memba blong Madang.
Oli bin painim Mr Kas i guilty oa i rong aninit long PNG Leadership Code, bihainim pasin em i bin mekim long Madang ples balus long 1998.
Mr Kas i bin go long ples balus dispela taim blong kalap long balus, tasol taim em i kamap em i lukim dispela balus i redi long kirap.

Mr Kas inap lusim seat blong insait long Paliment long dispela.

Ol komuniti antap long ol atoll -- oa ol liklik ailan blong Bougainville em solwara i wok long karamapim ol, oli wok long askim provinsal gavman long halvim ol igo sindaun long narapela hap.
Ol komuniti husat i wok long askim long dispela em long Mortlock, Nuguria, Tasman, Nissan na Carterets grup.
Stat long 1960s, Carterets grup i bin wok long bungim ol heve na trabal long samting oli kolim - global warming, samting em oli save kolim tu long greenhouse effect.
Solwara i wok long kaikaim ol nambis blong ol ailan long dispela grup, hariap tru, na ol pipal i poret nogut sampela long ol ailan bai noken stap moa insait long dispela tenpela yar bihain.
Solwara bai karamapim olgeta sampela long ol dispela ailan.
Bougainville provinsal gavman i bin igat wanpela resettlement programme bipo we ol pipal blong Carteret Islands em oli bungim heve, oli ken go sidaun long sentral Bougainville.
Tasol, oli bin go bek long ailan blong ol taim ol trabal na pait i bin go bikpela long 1990.
Ol pait i wok long gohet insait long Prague, kapital blong Czeckoslovakia, we ol polis i pait wantaim ol pipal husat i laik bagarapim miting blong I-M-F na World Bank.
Samting olsem 15 polis ofisa na fopela long ol protesta i bin kisim bagarap.

Mausman blong Amnesty International blong South Pacific, Heinz Schurmann-Zeggel i tok, nogat bagarap bai kamap long em.
Gavman blong Australia bai noken usim moa moni long bajet blong em, blong daunim takis long bensin, olsem bai prais blong bensin inap igo daun.

Taim ol i bin tokaut long budget oli no bin save bai oli nap kisim dispela moa moni.

China bai givim tru otonomi oa self-gavman long Tibet.
Tibet ino senis na i stap wankain yet.
Em ibin tokim ol palamen memba bilong France olsem, em ino askim long Tibet i kisim independens, tasol em i laik toktok wantaim ol lida bilong China long otonomi bilong dispela rijon.
China ino bin laik toktok wantaim Dalai Lama bipo, long wanem em i lukim Dalai Lama olsem wanpela pos em ol independens lain insait na arasait long Tibet i sanap long en na usim bilong autim tingting bilong ol.
Long 1989, Dalai Lama ibin winim Nobel Peace Prize.

East New Britain Workers Union long Papua New Guinea i askim ol leba ofisal na helt atoriti long mekim wanpela wok painimaut long Rabaul taun, bilong galasim helt bilong pipal.
Askim bilong union i bihainim bikpela pudaun bilong sit-paia ikam long volkeno insait long ol wik igo pinis.
Dispela tingting i kamap bihainim ol bikpela wari bilong ol helt atoriti, ol pipal bilong taun na ol wokman-meri, long ol kain heve sit-paia i kamapim long helt bilong pipol.

Emi tok, Union i gat wok bilong lukim olsem, ol wokman-meri bilong em i gat gutpela helt na gutpela ples bilong wok.

Cameroon, wanpela kantri long Africa, nau i winim nambawan gol medal insait long Olympic Games.
Soka tim blong en i bin win taim oli wokim penalty shoot-off agensim Spain.
Bihain long dispela penalty shoot-off, Cameroon i bin winim Spain 5-3.
Tupela sait i bin dro long ful taim, na bihain oli givim ol narapela 30 minit bilong larim wanpela sait i win.
Tasol dispela 30 minit igo lus nating na tupela i dro yet, olsem na oli wokim penalty shoot-off nau we Cameroon i bin inap long putim narapela poin na i kisim gol medal.
Brons medal i bin go long Chile.
Ol papa bilong ol bisnis i save wokim ol bilas na klos oa Garment Manufacturers i tok, Fiji i mas redim em yet long pudaun bilong Garment na Textile bisnis long stat bilong mun bihain.
Dispela i bihainim tingting bilong Australia long i noken gohet long halivim Fiji long Trade Concessions.
Trade Concessions oa halivim i save larim ol papa bilong ol Garment fektori long Fiji salim ol kolos Duty Free insait long Australia.

Australia i save baim planti long ol bilas na klos Fiji i save wokim.

Tasol em ino tokaut yet long olgeta tingting insait long dispela plen.
Japan i makim nambawan krismas bihain long bikpela nuklia birua em i bin kamap long Tokaimura.
Dispela birua i bin wanpela nogut birua tru long kamap, bihain long taim wankain birua olsem i bin kamap long Chernobyl long Russia.
Bilong makim nambawan anivesari bilong dispela birua long Tokaimura siti, 120 kilomita longwe long Tokyo, pipal i bin mekim wanpela Emergency Drill.
Insait long Tokyo, 110 pipal i bin bung long fran bilong Science na Technology Agency na tokaut long bikpela laik olsem, em i taim nau bilong pinisim olgeta wok bilong nuklia eneji.
Oli bin gat wan minit maus-pas oa silence pastaim long ol ibin traim long givim wanpela protes pas igo long Agency em i save lukautim Nucler Industry bilong Japan.
Tede i makim wanpela yar bihain long taim tripela wokman long J-C-O Uranium Processing Plant i bin kamapim wanpela pairap.
Dispela pairap i bin mekim na 400 pipal long taun i bin kisim posin RADIATION long bodi bilong ol.
Tupela long ol wokman i bin dai bihainim ol dispela bagarap long bodi.
Bihain long en, long mun Mas Gavman i bin kisim bek laisens bilong J-C-O, han bilong wanpela kampani oli kolim Sumitomo Metal Mininig Company.
LUKLUK LONG OLYMPIC!
Na yumi go nau long Olympics.

Cuba i bin winim fopela long sikispela gol medal blong boxing long Games.
Felix Savon i bin winim narapela gol medal ken long dispela Olympic Games.
Em i bin winim tupela gol medal tu long tupela narapela Olympics bipo.
Em i bin win insait long 91 kilogram heavyweight fainel blong ol man.
Em i nambatri boxer nau long winim tripela Olympic gol medal.

Em i bin winim spain 5-3.
Nupela President bilong Mexico, Vicente Fox, i tok em i laikim strongpela wok bung wantaim ol memba kantri bilong Asia-Pacific Economic Forum - APEC.
James Blears i ripot olsem, Mr.
Fox tok em bai wok na suvim dispela aidia igo insait, taim em i holim wok bilong president insait long dispela sikispela yar bihain.
Mexico i gat pinis wanpela Free Trade Agreement wantaim America na Canada, na long mun June em i bin sainim wankain agrimen wantaim European Union.
Vicente Fox i tok em taim nau oli lukluk igo long APEC.
Fox i tok tu olsem, em bai namba-wan tingting tu bilong em long kamapim mo tred wantaim ol APEC kantri.
North na South Korea i pasim tok pinis long kirapim wanpela komiti bilong go het moa wantaim ol wok bilong ekonomi na tred.
Oli bin kamapim tok orait insait long ol toktok namel long Unification Minister bilong South Korea, Park Jae-Kyu, na wan-namba bilong em long North Korea, Jon Kum-Jin.
Namel long ol bikpela projek namel long tupela kantri em long wokim wanpela relwe lain, wanpela bikpela rot namel long boda bilong tupela, na wok bung long ol wok bilong pasim ol hai-wara long IMJIN RIVER klostu long boda bilong tupela.
Wanpela bung toktok i tok, tupela sait i tingting long wok wantaim bilong painimaut ol wei bilong kirapim wok moni namel long tupela kantri.

Ol Atoriti long French Polynesia i statim wanpela awenes kempen bilong ol pikinini i save pat tumas.
10) i save pat tumas -- long tok Inglis oli save kolim long OBISITY.
Dispela nupela kempen bai skulim pipal long dispela trabal na painim ol wei bilong skulim gutpela pasin bilong kaikai.
Ol lokal gavman ofisal i tok, ol i laik abrusim dispela Obesity oa pat tumas namel long ol pikinini, nogut em igo bikpela.
Oli tok oli mas noken larim obesity igo bikpela tumas longwanem dispela i ken kamapim ol narapela heve ken long helt na laif bilong ol, na em i ken givim bikpela heve tru tu long ekonomik divelopmen.
Ol i tok, laik bilong ol pikinini long kaikaim tumas ol kain kaikai i gat planti suka, i wanpela bikpela wari bilong ol longwanem dispela i save mekim ol pikinini i pat tumas.
Tupela guria i bin kamap long Taiwan tude, tasol ino gat ripot long pipal oa ol samting i bagarap.
Dispela tupela guria, strongpela bilong tupela i bin nap long fo-poin-fo na fo-poin-faif long Richter Scalle, i bin kamap long saut bilong kantri.
Wanpela guria strong bilong em sikis-poin-tu i bin kamap long ailan long stat bilong dispela mun.
400 pipal na rausim ol haus na ples bilong narapela 100-tausen long Taiwan yet.
Polis long Indonesia i tok, ol i pasim pinis wok hait bilong karim ol raifol, katres na ol liklik bom, igo insait long ol Maluku ailan.
Ol Port sikiuriti ofisa ibin kisim ol samting bilong pait long wanpela liklik pasindia sip, em i save mekim ron bilong em namel long ol ailan.
Ol ibin kisim ol dispela samting long HALMAHERA ailan, bihainim sampela toksave ol ibin kisim olsem dispela sip i kamap.

Ol heve Telstra i bungim long tingting blong en long wokbung wantaim Pacific Century Cyberworks blong Hong Kong, wokbung em i kos long 5-Bilian dola, i wok long bagarapim ol share-price blong en.
Stock prais blong Pacific Century Cyberworks i go daun pinis, olsem tasol prais blong ol narapela kain bisnis oli kolim high-tech, na dispela i mekim Telstra na Hong Kong grup long bung ken blong na stretim toktok.

Tasol ol meri long Australia i nonap yet kisim dispela marasin.

SYDNEY OLYMPIC GAMES 2000 NAU I PINIS!
Sydney Olympics nau i pinis.
President blong International Olympic Committee, Juan Antonio Samaranch i bin kolim Sydney Olympics 2000, the best games ever -- oa em i bin gutpela na nambawan games tru.
Oli bin makim laspela de blong Sydney Olympics wantaim wanpela taraipela seremoni na ol fireworks oa paura sou, i bin bikpela na i narakain olgeta, em planti handret tausen pipal i bin bung wantaim blong lukim.
Ol dispela handret tausen pipal i bin stat bung long olgeta kona blong Sydney siti haba aste long moning yet, redi long lukim ol fireworks long nait.
Niusman Kevin Wilde i ripot ikam long Sydney olsem, Yothu Yindi ben blong Australia i bin wanpela long ol ben husat i bin pilai long seremoni blong pasim Games, em pipal i bin laikim tumas.
Dispela closing ceremony i bin hamamasim gutpela wok tru blong Sydney long lukautim wanpela nambawan Olympic Games tru long dispela graun, na i bin soim planti gutpela na naispela samting Australia i gat em ol narapela kantri long wol i nogat.
Ino olgeta musik long closing seremoni i bin soim ol kalsa blong Australia, nogat.
Australia meri blong singsing Kylie Minogue i bin singim Dancing Queen ino blong soim kalsa, tasol blong litimapim spirit blong pipal na mekim ol i hamamas.
Wanpela nambawan televisen lain blong Australia em ol pikinini i save laikim tumas, oli kolim Bananas in Pjamas, em planti pipal raun long wol i save gut long en, i bin kamap tu, na bikpela golf pleia blong Australia, Greg Norman, i bin stap tu.
Planti tok tankyu tumas i bin go aut long planti pipal.
Michael Knight, i bin tok tenkyu long planti handret pipal husat i bin mekim Games i nambawan.
Pairap blong Volcano long New Britain island long Papua New Guinea i mekim na bai oli movim foa-tausan pipal long ol area klostu long volnaco igo long ol narapela hap longwe, bai nogat heve i kamap long ol.
Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem Mauden Paia ULAWUN long Central New Britain i wok long pairap na nau oli wok long movim aut pipal i kam long ol area klostu raon longen igo long ol narapela area.
Despela volcano i bin pairap long sotpela taim tasol.
Ol pipal em oli movim ol aut nau i wok long stap long ol Care centre long tripela hap, na ol local bisnis i bin givim pinis ol kaikai samting blong halivim ol, tasol sampela taim tede bai oli nediim planti moa yet.
Pairap long Mount Ulawun, i bihaenim wanpela mun long bikpela meknois oa activity, em Tavuvur volcano, long Rabaul, i bin mekim we em i bin salim simuk na dast igo antap long olgeta de.

Mr Smith i bin embeseda bilong Australia long China bipo, na em bai kisim nupela wok bilong en long Jakarta long mun Jenuari.
Mr Smith i bin wok tu olsem deputi sekretri bilong Australia Foren Afes na Difens Dipatment.

CHINA NA PASIFIK FORUM I WANBEL LONG TRED OFIS!
Republic ov China i bin wanbel long wanpela tokorait bilong girapim wanpela tred ofis insait bilong long Beijing.
Ol ibin girapim despela ofis bilong apim nem bilong tred na investment namel long China na ol forum ailen kantri.
Stat tru bilong sainim despela tokorait bai kamap long pinis bilong despela mun insait long Kiribatti, bihain tasol long annual meeting bilong 16-memba kantri bilong South Pacific Forum.
Ol toktok ibin kamap bihain long meeting bilong Forum insait long Palau long yar igo pinis, China ibin tokaut long girapim wanpela China-South Pacific Forum Cooperation Fund, em bai gat 3-milian dola long en, bilong usim insiat long 5-pela yar.
Sean Dorney i ripot olsem, loia i makim wanpela Sepight sapota, husat ol i sutim tok long em i traim kilim narapela man, ibin askim long seven de marimari olsem em i ken kisim dispela keis bilong em igo long Fiji Court of Appeal.
George Speight INO stap insait long dispela keis, tasol em bai givim bikpela toksave, sapos em bai kamap long kot long ansa long Treason Charge bilong em.
Long aste, Jastis Peter Surnam ibin rausim oda bilong Chief Magistrate bilong Fiji husat ibin rausim ol sas bilong Isoa Karawa.
Em ibin fesim tripela sas bilong traim kilim narapela, wanpela bilog em i gat ol gat wantaim no gat laisens.
Karawa ibin brukim wanpela long ol kodisan oa laik, em long givim bek ol militeri wepon, na em ino mekim dispela.
Loia bilong Karawa i kisim dispela heve igo long Fiji Court of Appeal na Jas ibin givim em sevenpela dai bilong larim em i mekim dispela.
Ripot ikam long Fiji i tok, igat ol samting i soim olsem interim gavman bilong kantri ibin harim strongpela toktok bilong Australia gavman long daunim tu-yar eleksin taimtebol bilong en.
Wanpela sinia minista insait long kebinet bilong Praim Minista Laisenia Qarase ibin tok olsem, ating interim gavman bai katim namel long sikspela mun na 18-pela mun long tu-yar taimtebol em ibin putim pastaim bilong bringim Fiji igo bek long demokrasi.
Australia aninit long sampela spesol tok-orait, sapos ol i holim eleksin bilong makim nupela gavman insait long Fiji insait long dispela wan na haf yar bihain.
Sapos nogat, ol dispela spesol agrimen bai pinis.
Ratu Inoke Kubuabola, ibin tok, ating ol inap long holim ol dispela eleksin long mun Mas long yar 2000.
Ratu Kubuabola i tok, nupela Constitutional Commission ol ibin makim, iken kamapim na rekomendim ol senis long olpela mama-loa bilong 1997.
Wanpela sinia Minista insait long interim gavman bilong Fiji i tok, ol ken nap holim nupela eleksan long mun March 2002.

Human rait grup, Amnesty International i sutim tok long ol kain pasin oli mekim agensim dispela niusman, nem bilong en Duran Angiki, na femili bilong em.
Sean Dorney i ripot olsem, sampela lain i bin mekim sampela samting agensim Mr Angiki bihain long em i bin ripot olsem, Gavman i bin peim Mr Nori bilong kamap loia bilong Eagle Force.
Mr Nori i bin holim wanpela nius kivung long Honiara bilong sakimol tokwin olsem, em i bin ringim Duran Angiki na tok poretim em.

Em i tok em i bin toksave long Mr Angiki olsem, em i mas lukaut long ol kain ripot em inap kirapim bel-kros, na tu ol giaman ripot long trabal nau i kamap long kantri.
Mr Nori i tok gavman i save peim em tambolo long one third bilong kani pei em Angiki i tokaut long en, na i tok moni em i bin askim long en -- samting olsem wan handret tausen Australian dola -- samting em cease-fire agreement i tok orait long en.

OL KURI I HAMAMAS LONG TINGTING BILONG KOT!
Ol memba bilong Wik pipal, wanpela lain Aboriginal bilong Australia, i bin go samsam arasait long kot haus bilong Cairns tede.
Dispela i bihainim tingting bilong Federal Court long oraitim askim bilong ol long stap papa yet bilong graun.
Kot i bin oraitim nambawan hap long wanpela askim bilong Wik na Wik-Way pipal, long stap papa yet long wanpela hap graun na wara wantaim, em bikpela bilong en inap moa long 6-tausen skue-kilomita raun long Cape York Peninsula.
Ol bai gohet yet long nambatu hap long ol askim bilong ol.
Long nambatu hap, ol bai gohet long toktok wantaim ol maining kampani na ol wait fama em oli lisim ol graun.
Oli bin putim ol dispela askim bilong ol igo long Kot long mun June 1993 yet.

Darekta bilong lain oli kolim - Pacific Concerns Resource Centre, Hilda Lini, husat i bin halvim long rereim dispela miting, i tok i nogat moa gutpela astingting i stap bilong holim yet ol dispela ami insait long Pasifik.
Em i tok, ol kain bilip olsem ol dispela ami i save givim wok long ol man na oli save stap bilong lukautim peace na order, INO tru.
Ms Lini i tok dispela miting i bin wanbel long tingting olsem, planti long ol samting i save bagarapim gutpela sidaun long rijen, oli hasua bilong ol lida husat ino save wari long gutpela gavanens -- oa gutpela pasin bilong ronim gut gavman bilong givim gutpela sevis long pipal.
Na Ms Lini i tok, dispela long wanem oli nogat stretpela visions oa ol gutpela tingting bilong divelopmen.

Jaswant Singh, ibin bungim em long peles-balus.

Yangpela boi bilong Mr Suharto, president bipo bilong Indonesia, i askim pinis president long marimari long em.
Em i askim long marimari bihain long em i tokaut klia olsem, em i tru em guilty oa i rong long mekim ol korap pasin oli bin sasim em long en.
Mandala Putra i tok, em i askim pinis bai oli noken salim em igo long kalabus inap long 18-mun, long wanem em i bin paulim ten-milian dola bilong kantri insait long wanpela paul bisnis wok bilong baim graun.

AUSTRALIA DOLA I STAP ISI!
Strong bilong Australian dola nau i stap isi long wanpela mak tasol.
Em i bin wok long pundaun bikpela tru, long wanem i NOGAT senis i kamap long samting oli kolim - official interest rates.
Tasol niusmeri Rena Sarumpaet i ripot olsem, pipal i ting Reserve Bank bilong Australia bai litimapim yet interest rates pastaim long pinis bilong dispela yar.
Strong bilong Australian dola i bin pundaun ikam daun inap long 53-point-3-7 American sens tede apinun.
Dispela pundaun i kamap long wanem Reserve Bank ino mekim wanpela toksave sapos em bai litimapim interest rates oa nogat.
Tasol bihain ken Australin dola i bin kisim strong, na nau em i nap long 53-point-6-5 American sens.

President blong Bougainville Peoples Congress, Jospeh Kabui i sutim tok long ol top wokman blong gavman long slek tumas long wok blong bringim peace long ailan.

Em i tok ol ripot blong miting em i bin lukim i soim olsem bai oli mas mekim bikpela wok moa yet, pastaem long oli ken kamap wantaem wanpela agreement blong pinisim olgeta heve gutpela sindaon i ken stap oltaim nau.
Em i tok long said blong politiks long trabal long Bougainville, olgeta samting i wok long gohet gut tasol ol top wokman tasol blong gavman taim oli mekim wok blong ol, oli wok long pulim isi isi tru lek blong ol long mekim wok blong ol.
Kabui i tok narapela raon long ol toktok, em oli bin makim long kamap long Arawa, long Tunde long wik bihaen, bai i mekim decision nau long sapos bai oli ken sainim nau wanpela agreement.
Sydney long Olympic Games.
Tok-ples Fiji em i save kamap long FM-2000 long olgeta Sarere moning.
Ol ovasis risos kampani i wok insait long Papua Niugini, ibin sapotim ol disisen bilong ol bilong baim wanpela polis kar, givim halivim bilong kirapim wanpela polis bareks na wokim gut ken wanpela polis stesin.
Oil Search, Placer Niugini na Chevron Niugini i tok, dispela sapot ol i givim long polis bai kamapim-gut sekuriti insait long ol kommuniti we pasin bilong brukim loa i kamap bikpela tumas insait long Southern Highlands.
Dick Knox bilong Oil Search i tok, polis ino nidim ol praivet kampani long halivim ol long mekim wok bilong ol, tasol dispela halivim sapot ol i givim, i mekim i isi moa long ol i lukautim loa na oda.
Indonesia polis i tok planti tausan East Timor Refuji em ol pro-Jakarta militia igo pas long ol, i wok long protest long kalabus blong Militia lida Eurico Guterres.
Samting olsem tri-tausan refuiji i wok long sindaon long ol kar i wok long ron igo long Atambua, taon i stap long West Timor na capital blong province, Kupang, em strongpela base blong ol.
Provincial polis chief, Brigadier General John Lalu, i tok i tok polis i blokim pinis rot blong despela laen kar na bai oli holim kalabusim husat ol pipal i protest na kamapim trabal.
Em i tok nau oli makim despela province aninit long bikpela security alert.
Indonesia authority long mun i pinis, i bin stat long rausim ol gan long ol paitman, bihaenim strongpela toktok blong United nations Security council bihaen long oli bin kilim indai tripela wokman blong U-N long Atambua.
PNG OPPOSISEN I LUSIM NARAPELA MEMBA KEN BLONG EN.
Narapela memba blong lain Opposisen long Papua Niugini ibin kalap na igo joinim pinis gavman, na dispela i mekim Opposisen nau igat faivpela memba tasol long PNG Palamen em igat 109 sia.
Gavman ibin wok long grisim ol opposisen memba olsem ol bai igat sans long kisim ministri-wok taim gavaman i kamapim senis long ol memba blong kebinet.
Wanpela kot long Australia i salim pinis wanpela man bilong Indonesia, krismas blong em 25 yar, igo kalabus inap tupela yar, bihain long kot ibin painim em i rong long bringim-hait pipal blong narapela kantri i kam long Australia.
Ashmore Reef, klostu long north-western Australia coast long mun December, 1999.
Despela bot i bin wok long karim sikispela pipal i kam long India, husat i bin laik kam insaet long Australia na oli no bin kisim tokoraet oa visa long kam.
Wanpela Jury, i bin painim Hungan i rong long bringim in hait ol illegal immigrant i kam long Australia na oli bin salim em igo kalabus i nap tupela yiar, na rausim oa suspendim bihaen long wanpela yiar.
Namba blong pipal i dai long ol pait namel long polis na ol sapota blong Indedpendence long Indonesian province blong West Papua, i go antap tru.
Oli tok, 26 pipal i bin dai bihainim pait i bin kamap long Friday, long mauden siti blong Wamena.
Ol wokman-meri blong hospital long siti itok, oli bin katim het blong sampela long ol dispela pipal i bin dai, tasol ol narapela i bin dai long gan oa bunara.
Ol pait ibin stat taim polis i bin pulim daun flags blong West Papua em i bin wok long flai insait long sevenpela hap raun long siti stat yet long mun July.

Oli bin tokim wanpela forum long Northern Territory blong Australia olsem, oli mas putim wok blong skulim ol asples pipal blong Australia olsem namba-wan samting long wokim.
Oli bin kirapim Aboriginal development Consultative Forum blong mekim ol lida blong ol asples, ol bisnis na gavman long wok bung wantaem na toktok long ol economic development blong ol Aborginal pipal.

Em itok ol toktok wantaem ol asples community i strongim toktok long makim education olsem namba-wan bikpela wok long mekim.

Wanpela maus-man blong armi blong Israel itok, tingting blong Prime Minister Barak long kisim aut ol dispela soldia long dispela hap, olsem bai daun trabel i wok long kamap long eria.
Em i namba-wan taim tru long Gavman blong Israel i givim kontrol blong dispela holy site igo long Authoriti blong Palestine.

Secretary blong Teachers Association, Maika Namudu i tok, planti long ol dispela tisa husat i risain pinis, oli wok long lusim kantri blong igo stap long Australia oa New Zealand.
Dispela bikpela namba blong ol tisa i wok long lusim Fiji, bai mekim na oli sot tru long ol tisa long kantri.

Ol i bin tokaut long despela plan blong Mr.

Ol peace toktok blong Solomon islands, em oli bin tok long noken kamap bai oli holim ken long wik bihaen long townville city long North Queensland.
Asde, Solomon Islands Gavman i bin askim Australia long sapos oli lusim pastaem ol despela peace toktok igo long narapela taim, long wanem em i bin gat ol narkain tingting long husat ol man oa deleget na hamas long ol bai i go stap long ol despela peace tok.

30 PIPAL I DAI LONG WEST PAPUA!
Samting olsem 30 pipal i dai pinis na planti moa i kisim bagarap, bihain long taim ol trabal na pait i kamap long West Papua provins bilong Indonesia.
Niusman Mark Bowling i ripot olsem, ol pipal i save sapotim tingting bilong kisim indipendens i bin pait wantaim Indonesia polis, na bihain oli tanim na paitim ool nupela settlers -- pipal bilong Indonesia husat i kamap nupela na i laik sindaun long graun bilong ol Papua.
Ol trabal i kamap bihain long taim ol polis i pulim daun West papua pilak bilong indipendens.
Ol pait i bin kamap long Wamena taun antap long hailen bilong provins, tupela de igo pinis.
Papua long bruk lusim Indonesia.
Bihain long dispela bikpela pait i kamap.
Indonesia husat i go bilong stap olgeta long Papua.
Ol Papua igo kilim sampela settlers, kukim ol haus bilong ol na reipim ol meri.
Indonesia nesanal pilak, ino em tasol.
President Abdurrahman Wahid i tok pinis tu olsem, Papua bai NOKEN kisim indipendens.
Na nau yet, Yasser Arafat i givim oda pinis bai oli mas wokim gut ken wanpela bikpela mak bilong ol Jews klostu long Nablus, we ples matmat bilong Joseph i stap long en.
Ol pipal bilong Palestine i bin bagarapim dispela ples matmat long mait.
Tasol, ol Jews husat i save silip long dispela hap, long north bilong Tiberias taun, i bin go putim paia long wanpela mosque o haus lotu bilong ol Palestinian, bilong pei bek.
Niusmann Ben Wilson i ripot ikam long Jerusalem olsem, bikpela lain pipal bilong Palestine i bin yusim ol pik na crow bars bilong burukim ples matmat bilong Joseph -- wanpela biknem long Old Testament baibel -- na brukim ol ston oli wokim long en, na bihain kukim long paia.
Insait long ol dispela wik i pinis, sikispela pipal i bin idai insait long ol pait namel long ol Palestinian na ol soldia bilong Israel husat i save lukautim dispela ples matmat.
Tingting bilong Israel Praim Minista long pulim bek ol soldia bilong en lusim dispela hap, em i wanpela wei bilong pasim ol pait nau i wok long gohet.
Tasol, gavman nau bai bungim bikpela bel-kros ikam long ol Jewish pipal, husat bai kros olketa long wanem gavman ino lukautim gut wanpela ples tambu bilong ol Jews.
Opoisan lida bilong Australia i tok em i nogat tingting long salim ol narapela hap bilong Telstra, bikpela communication kampani bilong kantri.
Despela tok promis i bin kamap bihainim ol toktok pastaim ikam long Australian Democrats em i bin tok, moa beta oli brukim despela kampani igo long ol liklik hap.
Tasol Democrats i tok em bai noken sapotim tu tingting bilong salim olgeta hap bilong Telstra.
Lida bilong Leba Pati, Kim Beazley i tok em bikpela samting sapos kampani i stap yet aninit long lukaut bilong gavman.
Australia Gavman i tok, long save bilong en, ating Indonesia President Wahid i wok long redi yet bilong kam lukluk raun long Australia.

Mr Downer i tok Austraia bai welkam tumas long President Wahid long kam raun long Australia.
Wanpela guria, em i bin kamap tambolo long solwara, i bin sekim Sumba ailan long Indonesia.
Antara nius ajensi i tok strong bilong dispela guria i bin nap long 6.
Richter scale na namel bilong en i bin stap 33 kilomita tambolo long Indian Ocean.
Sumba ailan i stap samting olsem 84 kilomita longwe long Indian Ocean.
Indonesia i tok em i mekim ol wok pinis bilong rausim ol samting bilong pait bilong ol militia geng long West Timor, na brukim ol dispela grup bai oli noken wok wantaim ken.
Long toktok bilong em long Singapore, Ekonomik Minista Rizal Ramli i bin tok oli pulim pinis planti kain kain samting bilong pait, na oli askim ol pipal bilong ol narapela kantri long go lukim dispela long pinis bilong dispela mun.
Mr Ramli, husat nau i go lukluk raun long Singapore inap long tupela de, i bin tok Indonesia i apim pinis ol wok bilong en bilong pasim wok bilong ol militia.
Em i tok oli mekim dispela pastaim long miting long Tokyo insait long tupela wik, bilong ol hetman bilong ol kantri na lain husat i save givim halvim-moni.
Long mun i pinis, ol militia i bin kilim tripela aid woka bilong United Nations long Atambua taun, long boda namel long East na West Timor.
Dispela pasin i bin mekim na planti kantri i bin sutim strongpela toktok agensim Indonesia.
America na World Bank i bin tok lukaut olsem, ol bai nonap givim halvim-moni ken sapos Indonesia ino pasim pasin-nogut bilong ol militia, husat i save halvim Indonesia.
ISRAEL MILITARI I TOK LUKAUT LONG OL PALESTINE PIPAL!
Israel militari i bomim pinis tupela bikpela multistory bilding, we pipal i save silip long en long Palestine.
Dispela tupela bilding bilong silip i stap long Gaza, wanpela hap we planti pait i bin wok long kamap long en namel long ol palestine pipal na ol Jews.
Ol militari ensinia i bin pairpim bom long dispela tupela bikpela bilding em oli save kolim - Twin Towers.
Pastaim long dispela, Israel Praim Minista, Ehud Barak, i bin givim oda bai oli mas pasim ples balus long Gaza Strip.
Insait long eria oli kolim - West Bank, ol pipal bilong Israel i bin salim tupela wo helikopta i go insait long hap oli kolim - Hebron long nambawan taim, na oli sutim wanpela hap long mauden em ol Palestinian i save yusim bilong sutim ol Jews em oli stap tambolo long narapela sait bilong dispela mauden.
Israel militari i wokim dispela pasin bihainim toktok bilong Mr Barak olsem, sapos oli no stop long kamapim trabal, Israel bai mekim-save long ol.
Mr Barak i tok olsem, sapos Palestine lida Yasser Arafat ino stopim ol riot insait long 48 awa, Israel bai ting olsem em ino laik gohet nau long ol toktok bilong peace, olsem na em bai gohet na yusim olgeta strong bilong militari bilong en bilong pinisim ol pait.
Macedonia bai holim eleksan ken na despela bai nambatri raun bilong ol siti eleksan.
Long en, ol bai vot ken insait long 35 elektoret bihain long ol i bin paulim nambaut ol vot.
Ol pipol bai vot tu nambatri raun bilong makim ol memba bilong taun kansol insait long siti, bihain long ol ino bin hamamas long ol result - oa wanem samting i bin kamap bihainim eleksan.
Oli bin paulim nambaut ol vot long namba-10 de bilong mun Septemba.
Ol lain bilong Europe husat i bin was long despela elektion i tok, nambatu raun bilong ol vot long namba 24 de bilong mun Septemba i bin igat planti paul pasin i kamap long en.
NORTH KOREA I TOK LUKAUT LONG SYRONGIM SEKURITI WOK!
North Korea i tok lukaut long strongim ol sekuriti wok bilong en taim emi sutim tok long tingting bilong South Korea long lusim moa moni long difens bilong en, na em i tok despela i ken pasim ol wok na tingting bilong stretim ol wok bung namel long tupela Korea.
Insait long ol nius ripot, Gavman bilong North Korea i bin sutim tok long South Korea long em i bin hait baiksait long ol tingting bilong kamapim peace na hipim moa yet ol samting bilong pait.
Despela tok i kam long wanpela komiti bilong North Korea oli kolim - Committee of the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland, na i kamap bihain long taim South Korea i bin apim mak bilong moni em bai lusim long difens long yar bihain.
Despela komiti i tok lukaut olsem, sapos gavman bilong South Koreai gohet long tingting bilong pait, North Korea i nogat narapela rot bilong bihainim.
Em i tok wanpela tingting tasol em long sanap strong na apim tu ol samting bilong pait bilong em yet.
Tupela Korea i bin kamapim pinis ol toktok bilong daunim ol tingting nogut namel long tupela yet stat long taim tupela i bin sainim wanpela bung tingting insait long wanpela miting bilong ol lida long mun Jun.
Long Fiji, wanpela sinia memba bilong Chaudhry gavman, em oli bin rausim long taim bilong ku, i tok planti pipal i wok long soim bikpela laik nau long kirapim wnapela bung-wantaim gavman.
Man husat i bin holim wok olsem deputi praim minista bilong Fiji long Chaudhry gavman, Tupeni Baba, i tok kain gavmann olsem bai nap abrisim planti long ol kain heve em i bin kamap bihainim ku long mun May.
Em i tok sampela toktok i gohet pinis long dispela tingting, na ol toktok wantaim president long dispela bai kamap dispela wik.
Mr Baba i tok, wanpela wei tasol bilong stretim ol heve interim gavmann i bungim nau, we ekonomi ino gohet, loa na oda ino gohet nawok bilong bungim wantaim pipal ino gohet, em long kirapim wanpela bung-wantaim-gavman.
Fiji, em bai bungim wantaim pipal bilong Fiji, na em bai kamapim ol senis long Constitution em planti pipal i laikim.
Tasol em i tok, aninit long 1997 Constitution, tupela haus wantaim bilong paliment i mas wokbung.
SAMPELA BOT PIPAL KEN I LAI KAM INSAIT LONG AUSTRALIA!
90) pipol em oli bilip oli illegal immigrant oa ol pipol bilong narapela kantri husat i brukim loa bilong Australia na i laik hait ikam insait long kantri.

Despela bot i bilong Indonesia na oli ting ol pasindia antap long en oli bilong Middle East.
Oli stap nau rumgat bilong Imigresin.
Australia, stat long mun July i kam inap nau.
Wanpela woksop o bung bilong lukluk long ol paitkros insait long Indonesia na East Timor, na ol heve Australia i wok long bungim, bai kamap long Darwin siti long Australia long mun bihain.
Despela woksop bai lukluk long ol pait kros namel long tupela lain lotu em i wok long gohet insait long Ambon na Maluku provins, indipendens muvmen long West Papua, na bihain-taim bilong ol refuji bilong East Timor insiat long West Timor.

Ol nupela pait i kirap ken long Maluku ailan bilong Indonesia.

Ol haus lotu na ol narapela haus tu i bin paia.
Insait long dispela tupela yar igo pinis, ol ailan long Maluku i bin wok long go bagarap long ol pait namel long ol Muslim na ol Christian.
