Long Papua New Guinea foapela man i bin dai na sampela meri na pikinini ibin kisim bagarap long bodi blong ol, long pait em i bin kamap long wiken long Port Moresby.
Polis i tok wanpela man i bin dai na sampela meri na pikinini i bin kisim bagarap, taim oli bin tromoi wanpela hanbom oa granade igo long beksait blong wanpela haus long Port Moresby long wiken.
Liklik taim bihaen long despela, tripela man i bin dai, em polis i tok longen, peibek, we oli bin usim ol naf na bus naif.
Polis ino kisim yet wanpela oa samapela laen long ol despela pait na killing i bin kamap.
Ol meri em oli bin kisim bagarap wantaem ol pikinini i bin go long Port Moresby General Hospital we oli bin kisim marasin samting long ol bagarap blong ol.
Acting polis Commissioner blong PNG, Joseph Kupo, i bin autim bikpela wari blongem long dai blong ol despela pipal na tok longen olsem oli mas sutim strongpela tok moa yet longen.
Guided missile frigate blong Australia, HMAS Sydney, nau i wok long sel igo long Solomon islands, blong kisim ples blong HMAS NEWCASTLE, we ol peace toktok i bin kamap antap longen namel long ol birua lain.
Defence Minista, John Moore i tok despela sip bai i givim security wok na strongim wok long kamapim peace igo bek long ol ailan.
Newcastle bai i go bek long Sydney long Sunde.
Wok oli mekim blong traim savim peace process long Middle East i wok long kamap strong, wantaim lukluk raun blong Secretary blong United Nations igo long rijon.
Ben Wilson i ripot olsem, taim em Israel i bin makim long Palestine i mas stopim ol trabel long en, bai pinis insait long 12-pela hawa.
Wokabaut blong Secretary General blong United Nations igo long dispela hap, em blong mekim peace process long Middle East imas gohet.
Em i to long dispela hap long holim toktok wantaim ol lida blong Israel na Palestine.
Foreign Minister blong Russia i wok long go tu long dispela hap blong traim long winim tingting blong ol Arab kantri.
Insait long sampela hawa igo pinis, moa pait i bin kamap namel long ol Arabs na JewsBikpela pait tru ibin kamap long taun blong Nazareth, we ol Arab Israelis i wokim pait wantaim ol Jew pipal.
Ibin gat ripot tu long ol pait i bin kamap long Jerusalem na Gaza Strip.
Ol pipal oa settler i wok long stat long go bek long ol ples blong ol long Indonesia West Papua province, tripela de bihaen long ol pait i bin kamap we tripela-ten pipal i bin dai longen na foapela-ten-faiv i bin kisim bagarap long ol bodi blong ol longen.
Ol pait i bin bruk bihaen long ol in rausim ol flag blong ol separatist.
Ol pait i bin bruk namel long ol soldia na ol pro-independence Papua Taskforce memba long Fraide.
Ol local military ofisa i tok moa long wan-tausan settler husat i bin wok long hait long ol army na polis barracks, stat long Fraide, nau i wok long go bek long ol haus blong ol.
OL Separatist long West Papua i laikim Gavman blong Indonesia long luksave long independence blongen, na tok wanpela acte of free choice vot, em United nations i bin holim long 1969, em i bin mekim despela colony bifo blong Netherlands long kamap hap blong Indonbesia, ino bin gat ol representative blong UN i bin stap longen.
Liklik politikal pati blong Australia, the Democrats, i askim pinis Federal Gavman blong larim East Timor i kisim bikpela hap long moni ikam long Timor Gap oel na Gas royalties.
Ol ofisa nau i stap long Dili long holim ol toktok wantaim United Nations Transitional Authoriti long East Timor na ol man i makim pipal blong East Timor.
Insait long dispela tripela dei, bai ol toktok long ol wok bai oli mekim long bihainim taim long painim na developim petroleum insait long Timor Garp.
Timor Gap Treaty oli bin mekim wantaim Indonesia, bai pinis taim East Timor i makim wanpela Gavman blong em yet.
Maus-meri blong Democrats i save toktok long Foreign Affairs, Vicki Bourne, i sapotim pinis ol askim blong ol politikal lida blong East Timor long kisim 90 pesen long revenue oa moni igo long East Timor aninit long nupela agrimen.
ACTU I TOK LUKAUT KEN LONG FIJI INTERIM GAVMAN!
Top union grup bilong Australia, em long Australian Council of Trade Unions, i wok long tok lukaut long putim ol tambun ken long ol kain trenspot wok na kako igo-kam long Fiji.
Interim gavman bilong Fiji i tokaut long sampela tingting em ACTU i ting bai pasim wok bilong ol union na rait bilong pipal long wokim protes na bung wantaim.
Ol Union na ol narapela grup husat i save kempen agensim Fiji gavman, i tingting long bilas long ol blupela kolos tede, Tunde, olsem mak bilong sapotim demokrasi, tasol oli tok lukaut pinis long ol pablik sevan olsem, gavman bai lukim dispela olsem wanpela kros pasin agensim em.
President bilong ACTU, Sharan Burrow, i tok ol union long Australia i wari long lukim olsem, Fiji gavman i wok long tingting long kamapim ol loa em bai pasim ol industrial action oa ol kain protes na straik, na tu em bai tambu long pipal long bung wantaim.
Na nau yet, Australia i tok em bai ofa long sampela peace monitors -- pipal bilong lukautim ol wok bilong kamapim peace -- bilong halvim Solomon Islands.
Foren Minista Alexander Downer i tok ol dispela unarmed monitors -- minim olsem ol bai noken holim gan -- i ken bihainim wei oli bin yusim ol peace monitors bilong kamapim tok orait bilong gutpela sidaun long Bougainville.
Mr Downer i tok Solomon Islands nau i kamap klostu tru long taim we kantri i ken bagarap olgeta.
Em i tok Solomon Islands i stap klostu tru arere long taraipela hul we em i ken pundaun igo insait.
Ekonomi bilong en i bagarap pinis, em i tok.
Ol exports oa wok bilong en long salim samting igo long ol narapela kantri bilong kisim moni, klostu i lus olgeta.
Mr Downer i tok Australia i gat bikpela wari long dispela olsem na em i laikim tru bai dispela peace process i ken gohet na i ken gohet gut.
Na long dispela semina tu i bin harim olsem, reconciliation oa bel-isi wantaim i nonap kamap, sapos yumi no rausim ol militari.
Tonga man husat i save kempen bilong human rait, Lopeti Senituli, i bin tokim semina long Suva olsem, reconciliation oa wok bilong kirapim bel-isi na wokbung, i ken wanpela longpela wok tru em i save kamapim bikpela pen, na yumi mas gohet long toktok long en.
Em i tok bikpela salens tru bilong peace long Pacific tede, em long stretim tingting long hau bai yumi wok wantaim ol tingting olsem militari i gutpela samting, militari pasin, na militari tingting.
Mr Senituli i tok wok bilong rausim ol militari oa ami lusim sosaitiem i bikpela wok yumi mas mekim sapos yumi laikim reconciliation long kamap, wantaim wok bilong kamapim gut ken gutpela pasin long sosaiti na rule of law.
INDONESIA BAI TAITIM BUNG LONG WEST PAPUA!
Indonesia gavman bai raitim kamap ol klia polisi -- oa ol wei bilongstretim ol trabal insait long West Papua provins.
Wanpela sinia minista i bin tok Indonesia gavman bai glasim gut ken ol tingting na polisi bilong en bilong lukautim West Papua, na hau ol bai stretim ol tingting bilong indipendens long hap.
Coordinating Minista bilong Politics, Social na Security Affairs, Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, i bin tok i gat sampela heve i stap long West Papua em oli bin wok long givim trabal long Indonesia gavman.
Em i kolim Morning Star fleg bilong ol pipal i laik bruk lusim Indonesia, na wok bilong Papua Council.
Long mun June, kongres oa miting bilong Council i bin tokaut bikpela tru olsem, West Papua -- em oli save kolim Irian Jaya bipo na i ples bilong ol Melanesian Chrsitian -- i gat rait long stap wanpela kantri em yet.
President Abdurrahman Wahid i tok, West Papua bai noken kisim indipendens.
Na nau yet, moa long ten-tausen setla -- pipal bilong Indonesia husat igo sidaun long West papua -- insait long Wamena taun, i bin lusim narapela nait ken long wanpela militari kompaun na ol ples bilong lotu, long wanem oli poret long ol Papua.
Poret bilong ol i bin stat long Fraide igo pinis taim ol pait i bin kamap na oli kilim 30 pipal.
Ol man i makim tupela sait long ol pait antap long Solomon Islands, bai statim narapela miting bilong ol tede, insait long Townsville long Australia.
Deligesin oa grup bilong Isatabu Freedom Movement, i bin kisim Hercules balus bilong Royal Australian Airforce igo long Townsville aste, pastaim long grup bilong Malaita Eagle Force.
Andrew Nori, mausman bilong militia grup em i kontrolim Honiara, i tok em i lukluk i gohet long ol gutpela samting long dispela miting bilong kamapim peace, na em i ting miting bai kamap gut.
Long ripot bilong Sean Dorney, Andrew Nori i bin tok em i bilip tupela grup wantaim i gat laik long daunim ol strongpela tingting bilong ol yet, na oli laik bung namel bilong stretim koros.
Andrew Nori i bin kisim balus igo long Townsville aste long nait.
Em i go pas long bikpela deligesin tru long miting, em long Malaita Eagle Force.
Mr Nori i tok bel na tingting bilong pipal long Guadalcanal ailan i halvim tingting bilong peace.
Australia foren minista Alexander Downer i bin go pas long wanpela kaikai long nait, bilong ol deligesin.
QARASE I TOK, OL PACIFIC KANTRI I MAS LUKAUT LONG OL AIDIA!
Interim Praim Minista bilong Fiji, Laisenia Qarase, i tok olsem, pipal i mas lukaut long bringim ol aidia na tingting bilong ol narapela kantri igo insait long Pacific.
Em i tok ol dispela aidia bilong arasait i ken bagarapim samting em i kolim long -- social fabric -- oa pasin ples em i bungim wantaim ol asples komuniti bilong Pacific.
Mr Qarase i tok i tru yumi laikim sampela long ol dispela aidia long wanem ol Pacific kantri ino nap stap wanpis ol yet, tasol Fiji na ol narapela Pacific ailan kantri i mas wuas gut.
Mr Qarase i bin tok olsem taim em i givim wanpela toktok long wanpela rijenal semina, long University of the South Pacific longSuva.
Em i tok ol kantri olsem Fiji, Papua New Guinea na Solomon Islands, em ol heve i wok long kamap nau, i noken wari long trabal bai kam long narapela kantri, nogat.
Em i tok, bipo yumi save bungim trabal ikam long pipal bilong narapela kantri husat i bin kam na kisim graun na kirapim ol bisnis.
Nau nogat, em i tok.
Samting yumi mas poret long en bai noken kam long narapela kantri, em bai kam long yumi yet insait.
Em i tok ol samting yumi mas lukaut long en tede, em ol aidia, tingting, ol kain sistem na teknoloji.
Planti tingting wari i kamap olsem, ating ol wokbung namel long Solomon Islands i ken bungim bikpela heve, long wanem i nogat wanpela biknem ofisal bilong Solomon Islands bai makim kantri long ol selebresin bilong Taiwan National Day.
Foren Minista bilong Solomon Islands, Denny Philip, i surukim taim bilong wokabaut bilong em igo long Taiwan.
Ol ripot i tok, dispela ating long wanem Solomon Islands gavman ino klia tumas long sapos em i stret long wok wantaim Taiwan gavman.
Solomon Islands i wanpela long 29 kantri husat i luksave long Taiwan, em China i save lukim olsem wanpela provins bilong en, olsem wanpela kantri yet.
Sampela tokwin i kamap olsem, ating Solomon Islands i wok long skelim gut tingting sapos em i luksave yet long Taiwan, oa senis na luksave long wokbung wantaim China.
Ol saveman long politik i tok, ating Solomon Islands i wok long yusim sapot bilong en long Taiwan i kamap memba bilong United Nations, bilong kisim moa moni long Taiwan.
Australia ino bin hamamas long ol pait na trabel long Irian Jaya na ibin askim sekuriti Fos blong Indonesia long hap long isi liklik long wei oli mekim wok blong ol.

Senator Hill i tok, iluk olsem emi wok long painim wei blong stretim dispela ol tingting nogut.

Foreign minista, Alexander Downer i bin movim resolution we em i autim bikpela wari long toktok blong sampela Fijian pipal long oli mas gat wanpela constitution em i ken brukim ol kain kala skin pipal long politiks na sindaon blong ol long Fiji.
Greame Dobell i ripot olsem despela resolution blong House of Representatives, i bin kamap blong makim FIJI DAY.
Alexander Downer i tok em bai i noken isi long Fiji long go bek long international community sapos em i nogat balance oa gutpela mama-loa oa constitution blong olgeta kain kala pipal bihaenim democratic gavman.
Tokman blong laen Oppsition long Foreign Affairs, Laurie Brereton, i bin tokim Parliament, olsem Australia Gavman ino autim i nap strongpela toktok igo long Fiji Interim gavman na plan em ino oraet tumas, long noken glasim gut ken constitution oa mama-loa blongen.

Fiji pipol bai inonap tru long larim lidasip blong kantri igo long han blong wanpela arasait man em i mekim na planti pipol ibin lukim olsem oli no laikim ol arasait pipol long ronim kantri.

Ol polis bos insait long South Pacific i tok ol kain lain i wok long lukluk nau long dispela rijen olsem wanpela hap bilong money laundering -- oa pasin bilong haitim moni em ikam long ol kriminal pasin.
Wanpela miting bilong ol polis bos insait long Rotorua long New Zealand, i tok ol kain heve dispela kriminal pasin oli kolim money laundering i ken kamapim long Pacific, inap bagarapim ol dispela liklik ailan kantri long taim bihain.

Em i laikim tu bai oli mas glasim gut oltaim ol kampani i wokim bisnis long moni na ol invesmen skim, bilong lukim sapos oli bihainim gut loa long wok bilong ol.
Ol polis bos i tok ol crime oa trabal pasin, i wok long kamap bikpela na ol kriminal i wok long yusim ol nupela save, na oli tok tede nogat wanpela boda-mak inap pasim ol dispela lain.
Oli tok tede pipal i painim i isi tumas long muv raun long wol, isi long kisim moni, isi long nupela save na aidia na ol kain kain samting bilong wokim bisnis, olsem na ol nupela rot i kamap nau em ol kriminal i ken bihainim.
Oli tok, dispela i givim nupela salens long ol lain olsem polis husat i save lukautim loa na oda.

Oli bin rausim ol sas agensim 9-pela soldia husat i bin halvim ku long mun May, tasol oli ting militari polis bai arestim ol ken bihain na sasim ol long munity oa bikhet pasin insait long ami, ronawe long ami na stilim ol samting bilong pait.
Speight na wanpela lain sapota bilong en i bin kalabusim praim minista Mahendra Chaudhry na ol memba bilong gavman bilong em, insait long paliment inap long 56 de.

PNG PRAIM MINISTA I TOK, DIFENS FOS HEVE INAP PAIRAP BIKPELA!
Papua New Guinea Gavman i tok Difens Fos bilong kantri i pulap long ol kain kain heve na em ino nap lukautim nesanal sekuriti.
Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem Gavman i mekim sampela toktok pinis em i soim olsem, ating em bai daunim mak bilong ol soldia insait long ami.
Kebinet bilong Papua New Guinea i halvim wanpela ripot em i toktok long ol rot bilong stretim ol bikpela heve em oli bin wok long bagarapim Difens Fos inap long longpela taim pinis.
Praim Minista Sir Mekere Morauta i tok, wei Fos i wok nau na ol heve em i gat, ino nap halvim em i lukautim nesanal sekuriti bilong kantri.
Em i tok Gavman bai mekim olgeta samting em i ken bilong stretim ol heve insait long Fos.
Em i tok ol dispela heve i kamap long wanem inap long longpela taim nau, ol gavman ino save lukautim em gut, na tu em i gat ol heve long management.
Bagarap long discipline -- oa gutpela pasin bilong soldia long respekt na bihainim loa, i bin kamapim ol pait wantaim ol polis long Port Moresby, na trabal long bareks long Wewak we ol soldia i bin kukim ol haus.
Praim Minista i tok ol heve insait long Difens Fos em oli no save lukluk long en na stretim, i olsem wanpela time bomb em i wok long wet tasol long pairap.
Mark Bowling i ripot i kam long Jakrat olsem, wanpela long ol despela scandal oa stil pasin we sampela laen husat i bin tok oli bin wok na makim President Wahid, man i bin save wok olsem masser blonem wanpela long ol, i bin stilim klostu eit-million dola long national food agency, BULOG.
Namba-tu scandal i bin kamap taim lida blong Indonesia, i bin kisim foa-million dola donation i kam long Sultan blong Brunei blong Humanitarian Aid, igo long wanpela long ol province blong Indonesia we i bin bagarap long ol pait.
President wahid i tok blong bekim question blong Parliament memba, em bai i i raitim long pas igo long ol.
Ol mausman bilong Solomon Ailen peace tok insait long Townsville itok ol tingting kros ibin istap taim ol birua bilong tupela lain wanpisin ibin igo bung wantaim long mande nau ibin igo daun.
Sean Dorney ripot olsem- olgeta lain istap insait long despela bung toktok ibin tokorait long larim ol mausman bilong bilong tupela sait long bung ol yet long kamapim wanpela tingting igo pas bilong oli toktok longen long despela bung.

PNG PRAIM MINISTA I TOK, DIFENS FOS HEVE INAP PAIRAP BIKPELA!
Papua New Guinea Gavman i tok Difens Fos bilong kantri i pulap long ol kain kain heve na em ino nap lukautim nesanal sekuriti.
Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem Gavman i mekim sampela toktok pinis em i soim olsem, ating em bai daunim mak bilong ol soldia insait long ami.
Kebinet bilong Papua New Guinea i halvim wanpela ripot em i toktok long ol rot bilong stretim ol bikpela heve em oli bin wok long bagarapim Difens Fos inap long longpela taim pinis.
Praim Minista Sir Mekere Morauta i tok, wei Fos i wok nau na ol heve em i gat, ino nap halvim em i lukautim nesanal sekuriti bilong kantri.
Em i tok Gavman bai mekim olgeta samting em i ken bilong stretim ol heve insait long Fos.
Em i tok ol dispela heve i kamap long wanem inap long longpela taim nau, ol gavman ino save lukautim em gut, na tu em i gat ol heve long management.
Bagarap long discipline -- oa gutpela pasin bilong soldia long respekt na bihainim loa, i bin kamapim ol pait wantaim ol polis long Port Moresby, na trabal long bareks long Wewak we ol soldia i bin kukim ol haus.
Praim Minista i tok ol heve insait long Difens Fos em oli no save lukluk long en na stretim, i olsem wanpela time bomb em i wok long wet tasol long pairap.

Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem 20 pesen long ol nupela pipal i gat H-I-V i bin kamap klia tasol long namba-wan sikispela mun blong dispela yar.
Ol hausik long Papua New Guinea i nogat inap moni blong baem ol marasin oa drug blong pipal i gat HIV na Aids, olsem na wanpela rot tasol blong sevim laif blong pipal em long stopim virus long kalap nambaut long pipal.
Ol nupela namba i soim olsem planti pipal tru ino kisim yet ol toktok em i wok long kamap long ol progrem blong toksave na skulim pipal long despela sik nongut.
Namel long mun Jenuari na Jun oli bin painim 496 pipal moa i kisim HIV, antap long ol narapela oli bin save pinis long en.
68 pesen long ol nupela case oli blong Port Moresby, na 20-pesen long Highlands.

OLI KARIM AUT TEST LONG PAINIM AUT LONG WANPELA SIK LONG AFRICA.
World Health Organisation i wok long karim aut kuik ol test blong painim aut long wanpela sik, em i stat long kilim dai pipal long Afraica.
Oli no save gut long dispela sik.
Niusmeri long Africa, Sally Sara i ripot olsem, 40 pipal i dai pinis long dispela sik.
World Health Organisation i kisim pinis bulut ikam long pipal i kisim pinis dispela sik.
Insait long dispela mun igo pinis, samting olsem 40 pipal i bin dai bihain long kisim dispela sik.
Ol dispela pipal i bin kisim dispela sik, i tokaut long pen i kamap long boros blong ol, tarautim blut na kidney blong ol ino bin wok.
Ikam inap nau, oli painim tasol sik blong pipal istap long wanpela liklik district long Northern Uganda.
World Health Organisation i tok, oli no nap painim aut yet long dispela sik.
Wanpela long co-chairman blong Solomon Islands long ol pis toktok long Townsville, i tok, wanpela pis agrimen bai redi klostu blong sainim.
Dispela pis agrimen bai pinisim trabel na pait nau i wok long kamap namel long Malaita Eagle Force na Isatabu Freedom Movement blong Guadalcanal, long Solomon Islands.
Sir Peter Kenilorea i bin tok long Townsville tete long moning olsem, tupela militias grup i bin mekim agrimen long planti long ol heve oli bin toktok long en.
Em i bin tok, oli bin tok oraet long olketa long dispela sevenpela bikpela heve oli bin toktok long en long miting.
Sir Peter i bin tok, ol lawyer blong tupela militia grup, bai bungim wantaim ol dispela tingting igo insait long wanpela document blong sainim tete long nait oa tumora moning.
Lida blong Palestine Yasser Arafat i tok oraet pinis long stap long wanpela Middle East Peace Summit.
Wanpela maus-man blong United Nations i tok, Mr Arafat i bin tokaut long dispela taim em i bin toktok long telefon wantaim Secretary General blong United Nations, Kofi Annan.
Mr Annan nau i stap long Jerusalem na i bin bungim pinis Mr Arafat na Prime Minister blong Israel, Ehud Barack long Friday, we oli bin toktok long trabel nau i wok long kamap long Middle East.
As tingting blong holim dispela summit oa miting, em blong traim pinisim bikpela trabel na pait i wok long kamap long Middle East.
AUSTRALIA I HAMAMAS LONG SOLO AGRIMEN!
Foren Afes Minista bilong Australia, Alexander Downer, i tok Australia i hamamas long stap insait long ol wok na tingting bilong mekim tupela birua lain bilong Solomon Ailen i sainim ol tokorait bilong kamapim peace.
Oli bin kamapim ol toktok insait long Townsvill long Australia insait long sikispela de igo pinis, bilong kamapim ol tokorait bilong pinisim wanpela wo oa pait, emi kilim idai samting olsem 100 pipol long en.
Mr Downer i tok, emi wanpela bikpela samting tru bihain long ol paitkro em i bin kisim planti mun pinis.
HEZBOLLAH I TOK EM I KALABUSIM NARAPELA ISRAEL SOLDIA!
Islamic fundamental grup oli kolim Hezbollah muvmen, i tok em i bin pulim kalabusim narapela soldia bilong Israel.
Oli tok soldia ia em wanpela kenel.
Niusman Tim Palmer i ripot olsem, sapos dispela i tru, em bai bringim namba bilong ol Israel soldia oli pulim pinis igo antap long foapela.
Dispela toksave i bin kam long lida bilong Hezbollah muvmen long Lebanon, Sheik Hassan Nasrullah, husat i tok oli bin pulim dispela kenel insait long wanpela wok bilong ol agensim Israel.
Tasol em i tok ol bai tokaut moa long em i husat tru, bihain.
Televisen stesin bilong Hezebollah i bin tokasave bihain olsem, oli bin kidnep oa pulim dispela kenel tede.
Wanpela wik igo pinis, ol soldia bilong Hezbollah i bin kidnepim tripela Israel soldia klostu long Shiba Farms eria, wanpela hap em Israel na Palestine i save koros long en.
Oli bin kidnepim ol bihain long oli yusim ol taraipela gan na bom long sutim ol Israel soldia.
Oli no save sapos ol dispela soldia bilong Israel i stap orait tasol, tasol Israel i tok oli ting oli bin kisim sampela bagarap long han bilong Hezebeollah.
Hezebeollah i laikim Israel long lusim olgeta Arab kalabus oli holim i stap.
Ami bilong Israel i tok ikam inap nau em ino kisim sampela ripot bilong halvim dispela toktok bilong Hezbollah.
International Monetary Fund i bin givim gutpela nem long Papua New Guinea Gavman long wei emi lukautim moni bilong en.
Ol bikman bilong International Monetary Fund i bin lukluk ken long wok bilong Papua New Guinea Gavman insait long dispela 14 mun igo pinis, aninit long 150 milian dola sapot progrem bilong en.
IFM i bim mekim sampela senis long sampela samting em gavman bilong Papua New Guinea ino bihainim yet, tasol emi hamamas long we gavman i lukautim ol wok moni bilong en.
IFM i tok, Papua New Guinea i wok long bihainimim ol senis long ol wok moni bilong en wei emi i wok long grisim gut bel bilong ol investa na opim rot bilong ol praivet bisnis long kamap strong.
Australia Minista blong Agriculture, Warren Truss, i askim ol Apple na Pear bisnis long putim bilif blong ol long ol saveman.
Em i tok olsem bihaenim wok blong ol saveman long science em i strongim tingting long oli ken larim ol apol blong New Zealand i kam insaet long kantri.
Ol Apple Pear groa long Tasmania i bin belhat long despela ripot na planti toktok tu i bin kamap long Senate i mas mekim wanpela wok painim bilong glasim dispela tingting.
Oli bin wok long askim planti askim tu long sampela samting em Gavman na lain Oposisan bilong state i bin painim aut.
Tasol, Mr Truss i tok, rul oli putim blong kontrolim kamap bilong New Zealand apple long Australia, em i wanpela strongpela rul long wol.
MASSEUR BILONG WAHID I KISIM TAIM!
Ripot i tok oli bin pulim kalabusim wanpela man usait i bin save stretim baksait bilong Indonesia President Abdurrahman Wahid.
Oli bilip dispela man i bin stap insait long paulim planti milian dola bihain long em ibin wok long ronwe igo hait nambaut inap long planti mun.
Ol nius ripot itok polis ibin pulim kalapusim Alip Agung Sunwondo bihain long ol ibin igo banisim wanpela ples hait insait long wanpela resort or ples malolo antap long maunten eria long South bilong Jakarta.
Oli bilip Suwondo i bin usim nem bilong Mr Wahid long paulim klostu 4-milian dola i kam long Employee Fund bilong National Logistic Agency bilong kantri.
Ol haijeka husat i bin haijekim wanpela balus bilong Saudi Arabian Airlines, nau i givim ol yet pinis igo long han bilong ol Iraq autoriti.
Taim ol haijeka i wokim dispela pasin long Iraq, moa long 100 pasindia long balus, em oli no bin bagarap, i bin nap long kirap na go fri.
Ol pasindia na ol kru i bin lusim dispela balus, wanpela Boeing 777, klostu wan aua bihain long balus igo sidaun long Saddam International Airport long Baghdad.
Ol kar bilong Iraq gavman i bin kam karim ol haijeka na igo.
Arab setalait televisen Al-Jazeera i bin tok ol haijeka i bin askim Iraq long lukautim ol na nau, Iraq gavman i wok long skelim dispela askim bilong ol.
Niusman long Middle East, Tim Palmer i ripot olsem ol haijeka i bin hansapim ol pailot bilong balus ia taim em i ron antap long Mediterranean solwara, bihain long em i kirap lusim Jeddah long Saudi Arabia.
Saudi Arabian Airlines 777 jet balus i bin wok long mekim ron bilong en igo long London taim pailot i salim toksave long redio olsem, ol haijeka i hansapim ol pinis.
Cyprus Air Traffic Control i bin harim dispela redio toksave.
Bihain long taim oli kam daun long Baghdad, bikpela siti bilong Iraq, oli bin salim toksave long toktok wantaim Saudi Arabia gavman, ol haijeka ia i stat toktok tu wantaim ol ofisal bilong Iraq.
Liklik taim bihain, oli bin lusim olgeta pasindia na kru bilong balus.
100 pasindia na kru, 40 British na wanpelaAmerican - tupela kantri em tupela i save paitim Iraq sampela taim.
Iraq i gat belkros tu agensim Saudi Arabia.
Oli rereim rot nau bilong salim ol pasindia bilong balus i go long ples bilong ol.
OL SOLO DELIGET I SAINIM AGRIMEN LONG TOWNSVILLE!

000 pipol bilong Malaita em oli bin sidaun long Guadalcanal, i tok em i taim nau bilong wok bung wantaim.
Samting olsem tu-tausen sapota bilong Palestine long Australia, i bin wokim wapela protes mas igo long embesi opis bilong America long Sydney, bilong soim belheve bilong ol long trabal em i kamap long West Bank na Gaza long Middle East.
Dispela protes bilong ol, oli bin soim bikpela belhat tru na oli kukim fleg bilong Israel na ol Israel iunifom tu bilong pilai soka.

PETER REITH INO BIN YUSIM KARANGI TELEKAD BILONG GAVMAN!
Wampela ripot i kam aut pinis em i tokaut long husat tru i bin wok long yusim wanpela telekad bilong wanpela gavman minista na oli bin kamapim taraipela bil em i kos long 50-tausen dola.
Niusman John Thompson i ripot olsem, Solicitor General bilong Australia i painim aut olsem, Workplace Relations Minister Peter Reith ino hasua long ol telepon kol em telepon kampani i bin sasim igo long telekad bilong minista.
Em i tok, minista i hasua tasol long kos bilong telekad em pikinini boi bilong em i bin yusim.
1993 em i bin givim telekad long bikpela pikinini boi bilong em, nem bilong en Paul, taim em i laik go holide long Western Australia, nogut em i lus na i laik ringim papa bilong em.
Long dispela Paul Reith i bin lusim moa long 900-dola taim em i save ringim papa bilong em.
Tasol bihain oli painim aut olsem, sampela lain i bin wokim long yusim dispela telekad na bringim kos bilong ol telepon kol igo antap long 50-tausen-dola.
Peter Reith nau i tok, em i orait em yet bai peim dispela.
Tasol Solicitor General bilong Australia i givim pinis wanpela toksave long Gavmans tede, em i tok klia olsem, Mr Reith ino bin hasua na ino nap peim bek dispela moni.
Em i ken peim bek tasol moni em boi bilong em i bin lusim.
Dispela ripot i tok tu olsem, Paul Reith i mas peim tu moni bilong ol telepon kol em yet i bin mekim long dispela kad.
PRESIDENT BILONG AMERICA BAI GO STAP LONG MIDDLE EAST MITING!
Wanpela miting bilong ol wol lida bai kamap long Egypt tumora bilong toktok long ol pait na trabal namel long Israel na Palestine.
Lida bilong Palestine, Yassar Arafat, na Praim Minista bilong Israel, Ehud Barak, tupela wantaim bai stap long miting.
Tasol wanem samting Israel na Palestine autoriti bilong Yasser Arafat i tingting long kamapim long dispela miting em long - ceasefire tasol, ino bilong gohet ken long ol toktok bilong peace oli save wokim bipo.
Ol pait na trabal long dispela wik i pinis i kilim pinis klostu 100 pipal, planti long ol oli Palestine pipal.
President Bill Clinton bilong America i tok wanpela bikpela samting long dispela miting em long painim rot bek igo long ol toktok bilong peace oli bin wok long mekim bipo.
President bilong Serbia i tok em i tru ol bai holim eleksdan bilong paliment long 24 de bilong mun Disemba.
Dispela toksave i kamap bihainim pundaun bilong president Slobodan Milosevic.
Slobodan Milosovic i lusim wok bilong president bihainim ol bikpela protes bilong pipal bilong kantri long mun i pinis.
Na nau yet nupela President bilong Serbia, Vojislav Kostunica, i bin wokim nambawan wokabaut bilong em igo long narapela kantri.
Em i bin go long France wantaim ol narapela lida bilong European Union.
Dispela em i nambawan wokabaut bilong em lusim Belgrade stat long taim em i kisim wok olsem president long wiken igo pinis.
Oli kilim idai pinis tripela pipol insait long ol niupela pait ken long Aceh provins bilong Indonesia.

Mak bilong hai-wara i antap yet na i ken bagarapim pipal yet.

American amphibious assault ships carrying two-thousand troops have arrived off Yemen to provide a secure place for U-S investigators probing the terrorist bombing of the warship, Cole.
Defence Secretary, William Cohen, says a helicopter carrier and two other vessels have arrived to provide extra berthing for the small army of U-S investigators in Aden.
The estimated two-thousand American troops aboard the ships will also be on hand to provide additional security if needed.
Mr Cohen says the Yemeni government has provided everything the United States has asked for since the suicide bombing in Aden last week which killed 17 sailors and injured 38 others aboard the guided missile destroyer.
Cole, which was being moored for refueling during a brief stop in Aden.
Mr Cohen has not ruled out military action if the United States determines that another country was behind the attack.

MIDDLE EAST TOK-ORAIT INO YET PASIM PAIT!
Wanpela tok orait bilong pinisim ol pait i kamap pinis namel long Israel na Palestine, bihainim miting bilong ol wol lida long Sharm El-Sheikh insait long Egypt, tasol pipal husat i wok long pait ino bihainim yet dispela tok prait.
Maski toksave i bin kamap pinis long dispela tok orait, ol pait i wok long gohet yet insait long West Bank na Gaza Strip namel long ol soldia bilong Israel na Palestine pipal.
Tok orait nau i kamap, i wanpela kaikai bilong ol hatpela toktok bilong kamapim belisi namel long Israel na Palestine em America i bin halvim tupela sait long kamapim.
Insait long dispela tok orait, em oli no sainim yet, i gat ol tingting bilong pinisim ol pait insait long ol Palestine teritori, wok i mas kamap bilong painim aut wanem samting i bin statim pait, na tingting bilong statim ken ol toktok bilong belisi namel long Israel na Palestine.
America i tok Israel Praim Minista Ehud Barak na Palestine lida Yasser Arafat tupela i wanbel pinis long salim ol top manmeri bilong tupela igo long Washington bilong gohet moa long ol toktok.
Ripot itok-Fopela ol olpela lida bilong Militia ibin sanap sapotim Indonesia long yar igo pinis na kamapim ol pait na trabel insait long East Timor ibin tokorait long tokaut long wanem samting ibin kamap- sapos ol iken tokaut klia olsem bai inogat ol heve ikamap long ol.

Ol lida bilong faifpela kantri long Africa i wanbel pinis long pulim bek ol soldia bilong ol lusim Congo Democratic Republic.
Niusmeri bilong mipela long Africa Sally Sara i ripot olsem, dispela tingting i kamap bihain long wanpela miting bilong ol lida em South Africa President, Thabo Mbeki i bin go pas long en.
Faifpela kantri i promis pinis long pulim bek ol soldia bilong ol.
Ol lida bilong Rwanda, Zimbabwe, Namibia, Uganda na Democratic Republic ov Congo i tok ol soldia bilong ol bai lusim pait hariap.
Ol man bilong United Nations i go pinis bilong monitor oa stap sambai taim ol dispela kantri i pulim bek ol soldia bilong ol.
Ol dispela U-N man bai stap bilong lukim olsem ol soldia bilong ol dispela kantri, i surik bek 15 kilomita lusim wanpela eria bilong ceasefire.
Tok orait bilong nau i bihainim planti wok na tok orait bilong belisi insait long Democratic Republic ov Congo em oli save popaia.
Ol lida bilong faifpela kantri em oli stap insait long dispela wo, oli wanbel pinis long holim miting ken insait long tupela wik, tasol oli no askim ol rebel lida tu bilong go.
Bikpela wok i stat pinis bilong traim banisim wanpela virus oa sik nogut em i wok long bagarapim planti pipal bilong Uganda long Africa dispela taim.
Oli kolim dispela virus long Ebola.
Husat man, meri oa pikinini i kisim dispela virus, i save dai kwik.
37 pipal i dai pinis long dispela sik em oli kolim long tok Ingilis, contagious disease -- minim olsem, em i save kalap nambaut long ol manmeri kwik taim tumas.
Kain wok bilong Ebola virus i olsem, taim em i kisim pinis wanpela man, dispela man bai stat lusim bulut na bulut bai noken stop inap man i dai.
Ikam inap nau, oli painim 75 pipal i gat dispela virus nogut.
Ebola virus i bin kilim 245 pipal insait long Congo ripablik, wanpela kantri klostu tasol long Uganda, faifpela yar igo pinis, na oli ting virus i bin kirap long Congo.
Niusmeri Anna Borzello, husat i stap nau long Gulu, i tok ol ripot i wok long kam yet olsem, planti pipal i wok long kisim dispela virus.
Ol plant kuarantin autoriti long Papua New Guinea i tok lukaut olsem, pipal i mas lukaut long ol kain binatang na sik em oli kam long West Papua boda, i ken bagarapim ol diwai na gaden kaikai samting long PNG.
Oli poret nogut ol dispela sik bai bagarapim ol wok didiman bilong kantri.
Chief Plant Protection na Quarantine Officer bilong PNG, Elijah Philemon i tok ripot i kamap pinis long tripela sik long boda eria em oli bagarapim banana na ol muli samting.
Mr Philemon i tok oli no save gut yet long ol hap we ol dispela sik i stap long en tasol oli ting oli stap long Tamil na Meruk rijen.
Toksave igo long ol pipal i save go-kam long boda long NOKEN bringim ol frut na gaden kaikai samting ikam long West Papua, sapos oli no sekim gut pastaim.
Oli sutim strongpela toktok agensim Papua New Guinea Gavman insait long Paliment, bihain long em i rausim paua bilong Southern Highlands provinsal gavman.
Gavana bilong Manus, Stephen Pokawin i sutim tok long gavman na i tok em i wok long traim long kontrolim ol bikpela divelopmen insait long dispela provins we igat planti risoses.
Southern Highlands em i wanpela provins husat i gat bikpela oil na gas.
OK TEDI main.
Govana Pokawin i bin toktok long taim bilong ol debate long Paliment.
Na nau yet, Deputi Oposisan lida Peter Peipul, i tok gavman em i wanpela - destructive force - oa wanpela samting nogut em i wok long brukim ol samting, na i wok long raun raun bilong rausim ol provinsal gavman long laik bilong en.
Niusman Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem ol papa-graun i wok long tok tu olsem, ol bai blokim oa pasim ol divelopmen projek.
Dinnen i tok P-N-G Gavman i promis pinis long klinim aut provinsal gavman sistem em i tok oli NO wok gut, oli pulap long ol kain sik nogut na planti korapsen i pulap long ol.
Em i saspendim pinis tripela provinsal gavman, na ating em bai rausim narapela tupela moa.
Tasol ol gavana bilong ol 20 provinsal gavman long kantri i ting Nesanal Gavman i wok long yusim ol dispela saspensen bilong strongim em yet, pastaim long eleksan em bai kamap long 18 mun.
Ol provinsal Gavana oli memba tu bilong nesanal paliment, planti long ol i save sapotim gavman, tasol nau ating bai oli tubel long sapos oli ken sapotim em o nogat.
Ol papa graun long Southern Highlands i tok ol bai blokim oa pasim ol oil na gas divelopmen projek sapos Nesanal Gavman ino givim bek paua bilong provinsal gavman bilong ol.

Papua Niugini i mas wuas gut long bikpela heve bilong sik-H-I-V.

Em i tok, planti long ol pipol em krismas bilong ol i aninit long 30 yar, igat dispela sik, na dispela sik i wok long kilim planti meri na ol pikinini.

INDONESIA I TINGTING LONG GIVIM OTONOMI LONG ACEH NA WEST PAPUA!
Indonesia gavman i wok long lukluk long ol wei bilong givim spesal otonomi long tupela long ol provins bilong en.
Indonesia i tingim dispela aidia bilong traim pasim ol pait insait long ol dispela provins long bruk lusim kantri.
Niusman Mark Bowling i ripot olsem, pipal bilong West Papua Provins, em oli save kolim Irian Jaya bipo, na Aceh Provins bai holim sampela pawa bilong lukautim ol wok bilong tupela yet.
Indonesia Paliment i wok long debate oa paitim toktok nau long wanem kain pawa oli ken givim long Aceh long north Sumatra na Papua Provins long sandaun sait bilong bikples New Guinea.
Indonesia ko-odineting Minista bilong politikal na sekuriti afes, Bambung Yudiona, i tok bai oli statim dispela tingting long mun bihain.
Separatist Free Aceh Movement i bin wok long pait wantaim Indonesia gavman inap moa long 25 yar.
Maski oli bin sainim wanpela ceasefire wantaim gavman long stat bilong dispela yar, ol pait na trabal i wok long gohet yet long Aceh.
Long Papua, ol pipal i laik bruk lusim Indonesia oli save kolim separatists, i bin wok tu long paitim ol Indonesian, na ino long taim igo pinis, oli bin tok ol bai declare oa tokaut long indipendens bilong ol long nambawan de bilong min Disemba.
Wanpela kot bilong Indonesia i bin givim tok orait long lusim nau East Timor militia lida, Eurico Guterres.
Mr Gutteres i wanpela man oli ting i bin go pas long wanpela trabal long mun april we ol militia i bin go paitim na kilim pipal long haus bilong pro-independence lida, Manuel Carrascalao.
Oli bin kilim 12 pipal dispela taim.
Ol prosekuta long East Timor i tok tu olsem, Mr Guterres i bin halvim tu narapela trabal we ol militia i bin paitim na kilim pipal insait long wanpela haus lotu long Liquica we oli bin kilim na katim pipal husat i bin wok long hait long dispela haus lotu.
South Jakarta distrik kot i tok olsem, tingting bilong pulim kalabusim i bin rong aninit long loa, long wanem polis ino bin gat warent taim oli go pulim em.
Politikal na Sekuriti Afes Minista bilong Indonesia, Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, i tok olsem polis bai apil agensim dispela tingting bilong kot.
Wanpela kot blong Indonesia i makim pinis tripela jas blong traim lukluk ken long askim blong ol prosecutor long rausim corruption sas agensim olpela President Suharto.
Ol prosecutor blong Gavman i bin sasim Mr Suharto long paulim planti million dola.
Wanpela maus-man blong High Court long Jakarta i bin tok, em i tru, oli bin makim pinis ol jas long studi long dispela appeal, na oli ting long mekim wanpela tingting long en insait long wanpela mun.
Long mun igo pinis, South Jakarta District Court i bin rausim wan-Billion dola corruption sas agensim Mr Suharto bihain long ol dokta i bin tok olsem, em i sik nogut tru na em ino nap sanap long kot.
Mr Suharto, 79 krismas blong em, i bin wanpela army-general bipo, na em ibin ronim gavman blong Indonesia inap long 32 yiar olketa.
Em i bin lusim gavman long 1998, bihainim planti protes na bikpela bagarap i bin kamap long ekonomiEm ino bin stap insait long dispela tripela kot-kes blong em long corruption.
Nau yet, wanpela lawyer i makim Eurico Guterres, i sutim tok pinis long polis blong Indonesia, long oli no bihainim kot oda long lusim Mr Guterres long kalabus.
Dispela lawyer i tok, oli no save long wanem as-tingting na polis ino larim Guterres long igo fri, bihainim tingting blong kot aste.
Sekuriti Affairs Minister blong Indonesia, Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono i tok, polis bai kamap long kot blong lukluk ken long dispela tingting.
MCKINNON I HAMAMAS LONG TOWNSVILLE PEACE AGREEMENT!
Commonwealth Secretary-General Don McKinnon i joinim ol lida bilong Pacific na tok hamamas long tok-orait bilong peace bilong Solomon Islands.
Mr McKinnon i tok dispela Townsville Peace Agreement em i wanpela gutpela na nambawan wok tru we olgeta sait long trabal long Solomon Islands i sainim, bilong luksave olsem sapos oli gohet long pait moa pipal bai dai na ekonomi bilong kantri bai go bagarap moa moa yet.
Tunde) bilong skelim ol kain wok em wanpela International Peace Monitoring Team bai mekim.

OL BELKROS I GOHET YET LONG PALESTINE!
Belkros i go strong yet long Palestine, bihainim toksave bilong Israel olsem, em bai lusim ol toktok bilong kirapim bel-isi na kirapim wanpela emergency gavman wantaim right-wing.
Ol right-wing em ol lain husat ino laikim tru ol pipal bilong Palestine.
Dispela toksave i kamap taim tupela yangpela pipal bilong Palestine i bin idai long ol bagarap tupela i bin kisim long ol pait long wik i pinis, na tu taim samting olsem 30 pipa i bin kisim bagarap insait long ol pait wantaim ol soldia bilong Israel insait long Gaza Strip na West Bank.
Israel i bin pasim tu Gaza intanesanal ples balus nambatu taim na blokim ol rot raunim wanpela vilis bilong ol Arab klostu long Jerusalem.
Oli bin wok long bomim dispela vilis aste long nait.
Israel i tok tingting bilong en long pasim Gaza ples balus em i wanpela tingting bilong lukauti gut ol sekuriti wok -- tasol ol Palestine sival eviesin ofisal i tok dispela tingting bai pasim ol wok bilong karim ol Palestinian husat i kisim bagarap igo long ol narapela Arab kantri.
King Fadh blong Saudi Arabia i tok lukaut olsem, peace ino nap kamap long Middle East, inap Israel i bihainim ol tingting blong United Nations long givim sampela graun olsem bai peace i ken kamap.
King Fahd i tok olsem, gutpela sidaun inap kamap, sapos Israel i bihainim ol dispela tingting em United Nations i laik bai oli mas p putim kamap long Middle East.

Emi tok dispela miting i blong traim tokim ol komuniti imas tingting long halivim ol yet.

Papua New Guinea Gavman i givim sampela halivim igo long ol copra grower blong kantri.
Gavman i givim samting olsem tri-million dola blong holim prais blong copra antap, we long despela taim em i wok long stap daon.
Gavman i bin tokoraet long wanpela loan applicesin blong PNG Copra Marketing Board, long samting olsem tri-million dola.
Bai olu usim despela moni blong sapotim copra prais long despela sikispela mun bihaen.
Cabinet i bin stopim tu ol repayment blong wanpela Gavman loan igo inap prais i stap strong oa kamap gun ken.
Gavman blong Papua New Guinea i rausim pinis wanpela fan oli bin kirapim blong lukautim moni ikam long ol mineral risose projek.
Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem, oli bin kirapim dispela fan blong lukautim moni blong Gavman, tasol em i mekim kantri i lusim moni long en.
Oli bin kirapim dispela Mineral Resources Stabilisation Fund blong lukim olsem, oli usim gut takis moni gavman i kisim i kam long ol maining projek.
Oli bin kirapim tu blong lukautim ekonomi sapos moni oli kisim long takis igo daun long wan wan yiar.
Tasol em ino bin kamap stret, longwanem wan wan Gavman blong Papua New Guinea ino bin lukautim gut wok blong fan.
Papua New Guinea i save kisim bikpela moni ikam long oil, gol, kopa na ol narapela mineral risoses kantri i save salim long narapela kantri, tasol kantri ino luk olsem em i kisim gutpela kaikai long ol dispela samting.
The Cabinet has approved moves to repeal the Act which established the Stabilisation Fund, and will set up measures to more closely manage earnings as part of general revenue.
Kebinet i tok oraet pinis long ol tingting long rausim loa em i bin larim ol i kirapim dispela Stabilisation Fund, na bai kirapim ol wok bilong lukautim gut moni olsem hap tasol long general revenue.
Wanpela kempein i stat pinis long Papua New Guinea bilong mekim gavman i putim wanpela loa em bai larim pipal i fri long glasim ol kain kain pepa bilong gavman.
Niusman Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem ol pipal husat sanap halvim dispela loa i tok, em bai wanpela strongpela samting bilong paitim korapsen em i save bagarapim kantri na pipal.
Han bilong Transparency International long Papua New Guinea i go pas long dispela kempein, na em i raitim pinisol nambawan tingting em i ken go insait long dispela freedom of information loa.

Papua New Guinea Gavman i redi long mekim telekomunikesin kampani bilong en i lusim sampela pawa bilong en long kontrolim Internet sevis long kantri.
Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem, pipal blong Papua New Guinea husat i wok long bungim heve long Internet sevis, i hope dispela tingting bai kamapim gutpela ol sevis moa na daunim prais.
Igat planti praivet kampani i wok long ofa long Internet sevis long Papua New Guinea.
Long dispela taim pipal i wok long usim tasol telekom telepon sistem, na dispela i wok long fosim ol long usim Internet long telepon sistem em i lapun pinis.

Ol astronomer blong America i tok oli painim pinis fopela nupela mun i wok long raunim Saturn.
Dispela i min Saturn nau igat tupela-ten-tu mun olketa oli save raunim em.
Ol mun blong Saturn i winim ol mun blong Uranus, em i gat 21.
Earth oa dispela ples-daun blong yumi, i gat wanpela mun tasol.
Oli nogat gutpela save tumas long dispela foapela nupela mun blong Saturn, tasol lait ikam long ol i klia tru.
Pei pipal i save kisim long wanwan wik long Australia i kamap strong.
Adrian Thirsk i ripot olsem, ripot blong Bureau ov Statistics i soim olsem, pei oli kisim long wanpela wik i kamap long 796 dola.
Pei i bin go antap long wan-point-seven pesen insait long tripela mun ikam inap long mun Ogas, na insait long wanpela i bin go antap long faiv-poin-nain pesen.
Dispela i kamap strong moa winim stat blong 1991.
Em i tok em innocent oa ino mekim wanpela samting rong.
Taim em i toktok igo long ol sapota long Southern Philippines, Mr.
Estrada i tok husat laen i wok long askim long em i mas risain, oa long kisim em igo long kot, i wok long tok nating tasol taim oli no harim yet stori long sait blong em.
President i bin tok em bai bekim ol despela sas long rait-taim na sapos oli gat proof oa samting tru blong soim ol olsem em i bin kisim moni i kam long ol pilai laki bisnis, em bai risain.
Estrada i bin toktok, Peso, moni blong Philippines i bin lusim strong blong en na stap tambolo tru winim ol narapela taim, agensim American dola, maski Central Bank i bin traim long stopim em long lusim strong blongen.
Wanpela grup em Oposisan i go pas long en i statim pinis ol toktok long House of Representatives long kisim Mr.
Estrada igo long kot bai em i pinis long wok blongem.
Papua New Guinea Gavman i tok tingting bilong em long saspendim Southern Highlands gavman ino bagarapim ol mineral risos projek long provins.
Niusman Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem, ol papa-graun i bin tok lukaut long bagarapim ol projek -- tasol Gavman i tok ol projek i gohet yet bihain progrem bilong ol.
PNG Cabinet i bin rausim pawa bilong Southern Highlands gavman bihainim ol tokwin olsem, em i bin pulap long korapsen, ol kain paul pasin na mismenismen.
Edministreta oa man Cabinet i bin makim bilong lukautim pastaim provins, i givim pinis nem bilong wanpela provinsal ofisal long polis, bihainim ol tokwin olsem em i bin misappropriate - oa paulim wan milian dila bilong pipal.
Ol papa-graun long Southern Highlands i bin belhat long tingting bilong Nesanal gavman long rausim pawa bilong provinsal gavman, na oli tok ol bai pasim ol wok long oil na gas projek long provins.
Tasol Petroleum na Energy Minister Fabian Pok i tok, i kam inap nau, nogat trabal i kamap long ol dispela projek.
Gavman i tok Polis na Difens Fos bai lukautim ol projek nogut trabal i kamal long ol.
Oposisan lida blong Cambodia, Sam Rainsy, i laik gohet long hunger strike bilong em -- pasin we em ino laik kaikai blong soim belhat bilong em.
Em bai gohet long dispela hunger strike maski oli bin rausim em long Paliamen long Phnom Penh.
Em i wok long protes long ol korapsen pasin i wok long kamap long wok blong gavman long givim aut kaikai blong halvim pipal.
Sam Rainsy i wok long sutim tok long ol Cambodian ofisa long salim ol intanesanal aid long ol vilis pipal blong kisim moni, na oli no givim fri.
Em i tok tu olsem oli wok long usim ol halivim olsem wanpela wei bilong wokim politik.
Oli halvim sampela na sampela i nogat.
Blong autim tingting blong em agensim dispela pasin, Sam Rainsy ino laik kaikai na em i tok bai em i gohet long hunger strike blong em, maski polis i muvim em igo longwe long haus palimen.
Cambodia i wok long bungim bikpela heve tru long ol bikpela haiwara, ol nambawan haiwara olsem insait long tenpela yar.
Ol dispela haiwara i bagarapim tri milian pipal long Cambodia na Vietnam.
Hetman blong United Nations Transitional Adiministration long East Timor bai go long new Zealand, blong lukim famili blong wanpela New Zealand soldia, husat i bin dai long peace-keeping wok long teritori.
Sergio Vieira de Mello bai i mekim sotpela lukluk raon long Wellington siti, we em bai i givim tok tankiu blong East Timor pipal igo long famili blong Private Leonard Manning.
Ol militia i bin sutim idai Private Manning, krismas blong em 24 long mun July, taim patrol blong em i bin bungim na pait wantaem ol militia klostu long boda wantem West Timor.
Stat long taim Private Manning i dai, U-N i bin mekim sanis long ol rul blong pait, na nau taim oli bungim pait, oli ken paitbek tu.
Vieira De Mello i bungim tu New Zealand Foren Minista, Phil Goff na ol narapela gavman minista.
Goff i tok, sampela taim bihaen long dispela yar, New Zealand Gavman bai mekim wanpela tingting long sapos em i ken holim ol soldia blong en long East Timor i nap long narapela sikispela mun oa narapela 12pela mun.

Maladina i bin tokim em olsem, em bai i stopim pei blong projek sapos em INO kisim despela moni.

Alexander Downer, bai kamap nambawan Minista bilong Australia long go raun long North Korea.

FIJI I TRAIM WINIM BEK OL AUSTRALIAN INVESTA!
Fiji i wok long traim long winim bek ol investa bilong Australia taim ekonomi i gohet long bungim bikpela heve bihainim ku long mun May.
Ol bisnis bilong Fiji em oli bungim heve tru em long tourism na garment industries -- ol bisnis i save wokim ol kolos samting.
Bisnis na Investmen Minista, Tomasi Vuetilovoni, i tok em i wari long ol lukluk nogut Australia i gat long kantri bilong em long dispela taim.
Pasifik kantri blong Kiribati long South Pasifik Forum miting blong dispela yar.
Forum memba kantri olsem ol bai kamapim strongpela tingting agensim ol pasin blong rausim gavaman na ol arapela pasin ino stret long tingting blong demokrasi long rijon.
Na Fiji ibin tok em bai toktok strong long wanem tingting i kamap long Kiribati Forum miting long kamapim ol rot emi mas bihainim long dispela memba-sip blong en long Pasifik Ailans Forum.
Fiji gavamam ino wari long ol plan blong Forum long kamapim ol loa blong ol gavaman insait long Pasifik.
Fiji iken tok orait long kain tingting olsem long wanem em yet i kamapim pinis tingting blong em olsem em bai igo bek long demokrasi insait long 18-mun.
Tavola ibin tok dispela forum miting ino mas bihainim tingting blong Commonwealth na pasim Fiji long noken stap olsem memba blong Forum long wanem em ibin rausim gavaman blong Mr.
Ol deliget long Festival ov Pacific Arts long New Caledonia i tokim komiti i rereim dispela festival long wokim ol samting long professional wei -- minim, oli mas wokim ol samting gut moa.
Toktok bilong ol deliget ia i bin kam aut long miting bilong ol pipal husat i sanap makim ol wanwan memba kantri bilong festival.
Oli tok ol pipal i rereim festival i mas givim aut ol toksave long progrem bilong wanwan de, na givim planti moa ol kain kain kaikai bilong ol pipal i stap insait long festival.
Ol pipal i rereim festival i tok, ol bai mekim olgeta samting oli ken bilong stretim ol dispela heve.
Secretariat bilong Pacific Community - em i wok olsem Secretariat bilong Council ov Pacific Arts - i tok em ba redi gut bilong narapela festival long yar 2004.
Meri nau tasol oli makim bilong kamap edvaisa bilong Cultural Affairs, Rhonda Griffiths, i tok wok i stat pinis bilong daunim ol hkain heve i save kamap long festival nau, bai oli noken kamap long ol festival bihain, na tu bai oli kamapim gut ol rot bilong toktok namel long komiti na ol deliget.
Polis i kliarim pinis nem bilong Indonesia President, Abdurrahman Wahid, bihainim ol ripot olsem em i bin halvim ol paul wok we sampela lain i bin paulim planti milian dola.
Ripot i tok ol lain i bin paulim dispela moni insait long wanpela gavman ajensi em i save dilim aut kaikai.
Polis i bin pulim kalabusim wanpela masseur -- man bilong bingim baksait bilong Mr Wahid bipo, bihainim ol sas olsem em i bin giamanim deputi bos bilong Bulog, wanpela food agency, long givim em samting olsem 4-milian dola.
Oli tok em i bin yusim nem bilong President long dispela giaman bilong em.
Paliment bilong Indonesia i kirapim pinis komisin bilong en bilong galasim dispela trabal, na i samonim President Wahid wantaim sampela arapela pipal bai oli ken askim ol gut.
Komisin bai askim tu Mr Wahid long nambatu paul wok bilong paulim moni.

SOLOMON ISLANDS I WOK HAT LONG KIRAPIM BEK OL SEVIS!
Solomon Islands i statim pinis nambatu 100-de progrem bilong kamapim peace antap long Guadalcanal na kirapim bek ekonomi.
Olgeta gavman ministri i givim pinis ol ripot bilong ol bilong toksave long haus oli bin skelim nambawan hap long progrem.
Oli tok nambawan 100-de progrem i bin kamap gut.
Tupela bikpela sevis ministri tru long Solomons -- health na education - i tok oli gat bikpela wok yet bilong kamapim gut ken ol sevis bilong tupela long Guadalcanal.

Pacific Islands Forum, em bai i statim miting blong en tete nait.

OL KOSOVO REFUJI I KAM BEK LONG AUSTRALIA BILONG STAP OLGETA.
Nambawan lain Albanian refuni bilong Kosovo em Australia Gavman i bin tok orait long ol long kam istap olgeta long kantri, nau oli kisim pinis visa bilong ol na oli go bek pinis long Tasmania.
Tracey Grady i toksave olsem Sopjanis femili i bin kam daun long Hobart ples balus pastaim tasol long ten kilok tede.
OLi luk gut na hamamas bihainim tupela de wokabaut lusim ples bilong ol Prsitina ikam long Australia.
Premia Jim Bacon bilong Tasmania na samting olsem 30 pipal em oli bin pren wantaim taim oli kam istap long Brighton long yar igo pinis, oli bin bungim femili na welkamim ol.
Planti logn ol pren i bin wok long toktok planti long Australia Gavman long oraitim visa bilong ol stat long taim oli bin fosim femili long go bek long Kosovo long mun Epril ikam inap nau.
Sopjanis femili bai save kisim olgeta sosal welfe moni wantaim tu sponsosip moni bilong Stet Gavman bilong halvim ol long statim laif bilong ol long Australia.
Wanpela intanesanal human raits lain i bin tokim Australia Gavman long halvim gut moa ol asples bilong Australia na kamapim ol gutpela loa moa bilong lukautim ol.
Lain ia, Oxfam International, i tokaut long wanpela ripot em i tok olsem, rait bilong ol asples bilong Australia ino gutpela olsem long ol narapela diveloping kantri.
Ancona, i tok Australia i mas kirapim wanpela treaty oa tok orait wantaim ol asples pipal, olsem bai dispela treaty i halvim ol asples wantaim ol gutpela loa.
NEW YORK TIMES I HALVIM AL GORE!
New York Times niuspepa, em planti milian pipal i save harim tok bilong en long America, i givim halvim bilong en long Vice President Al Gore insait long eleksan bilong makim nupela president bilong kantri.
Dispela niuspepa i tok Al Gore i raitpela man bilong kisim wok olsem president bilong kantri long wanem em i gat gutpela save pinis long wei bilong ronim gavman, na tu em i gat experience oa save long wei bilong tingting na stretim tok wantaim ol narapela kantri.
Editorial bod bilong New York Times i tok Mr Gore i bin traim hat tru long abrusim ol bagarap President Clinton i bin kamapim.
Long wik i pinis, Washington Post niuspepa i bin givim sapot tu long Al Gore long resis bilong em agensim Republican Texas Governor George W.
Bush, na i tok Al Gore i gat gutpela kualifikesin moa bilong holim dispela wok.
Nevi bilong Russia i tok, ol daiva i painim na kisim sampela moa bodi insait long Kursk nuklia sabmarin, em ibin painim birua na igo daun long solwara.
Mausman bilong Russian Northern Fleet, Igor Babenko i tok, ol i bin kisim ol dispela bodi ikam aut klostu long namba-nain seksan bilong sabmarin, we oli save olsem 23 pipal ibin igo bung long en bihain long ol pairap em ibin mekim sabmarin igo daun long solwara long namba 12 de bilong mun August.
Em ino tokaut klia long hamas bodi ol ibin kisim ikam aut.
Ol i kisim pinis foapela bodi long dispela sabmarin.
Oli ting olsem mak bilong drag ol i bin painim long Fiji bai nap olsem mak bilong bikpela drag HEROIN ol ibin painim na kisim insait long Australia.
Ol ibin painim moa long 300 kilogrem HEROIN, na oli ting em inap kamapim samting olsem 75 milian dola taim ol i salim.
Wanpela wok bung bilong ol atoriti bilong Australia, Fiji na Intenesenal polis ibin painim drag insait long Suva.
Jastis Minista bilong Australia, Amanda Vastone i tok, Federal Polis bilong Australia ibin wok hat bilong pasim ol wok hait bilong ol intenesenal kriminal, husat i yusim rijen bilong bringim na salim hait ol drag.
Praim Minista bilong Israel, Ehud Barak i tok, em bai nap tok orait long askim bilong President Bill Clinton bilong America, bilong igo long Washington, sapos ol kros na pait insait long graunb ilong Palestine i pinis.
Long toktok bilong em long pablik redio, Mr.
Barak i tok, Israel i luksave na i laik bihainim tok orait ol bin pasim long SHARM EL-SHEIKH.
Ol ibin pasim dispela tok orait wantaim Palestine long stat bilong dispela mun.
Em i tok, em ilaik lukim sapos ol i ken nap statim ken ol wok na toktok bilong bel-isi.
Lida bilong Israel i tok, em i kamap klostu moa iet long kirapim wanpela National Emergency Government bilong lukautim ol kros na pait nau i wok long kamap namel long Israel na Palestine.
Ol i kilim pinis klostu 139 pipal, planti long ol bilong Palestine, stat long ol pait long namba 28 de bilongmun Septemba.
Toksave ikam aut olsem, wanpela ripot i stap pinis bilong tanim sampela hap bilong Australian Broadcasting Corporation -- mama bilong Radio Australia -- i kamap ol praivet bisnis.
Niusmeri Liz Foschia i ripot olsem ol tokwin long dispela i bin kam aut long Sande Progrem bilong Channel Nine televisen stesin.
Dispela toktok i tokaut tu long wanpela askim sapos dispela pasin i bagarapim independence bilong ABC.

WHO I TOK, WESTERN PACIFIC NAU I FRI LONG POLIO!
World Health Organisation i toksave olsem, ol 37 kantri na eria insait long western Pacific rijen nau i fri long sik polio.
Dispela eria, West Pacific - i karamapim planti long ol kantri long Asian na Pacifi - i nambatu hap long wol em WHO i tokaut long en olsem, em i fri nau long polio.
Long 1994 oli bin kliarim north na South America long polio.
Nambawan polio sikman long kamap ples klia long dispela rijen, we wan-ted long pipal bilong wol i stap long en, em long yar 1997, taim wanpela liklik gel krismas bilong en tu, i bin kisim dispela sik long Cambodia.
Polio i wanpela nogut virus tru em pipal i ken kisim kwiktaim tru sapos oli holim wanpela man husat i gat polio, oa sapos kus bilong polio sikman oa meri i kisim narapela man.
Sik polio i save bagarapim ol pikinini krismas bilong ol tambolo long 3 moa winim ol bikpela pikinini na manmeri.
Em i save bagarapim nervous system - samting long bodi em i halvim yumi long pilim samting.
Taim nervous system i bagarap pinis, em bai noken longtaim na polio sikman bai no nap pilim samting moa.
Oli save immunise oa givim sut long moa long 100 milian pikinini insait long western Pacific rijen bai oli noken kisim sik polio olgeta yar stat yet long 1994 i kam inap long 1998.

Gavman bilong nau ino go klostu yet long dispela mak long ol miting bilong en.

Despela bai mekim isi moa long gavman long pasim miting blong Paliament inap longpela taim, wanpela pasin ol save bihainim bilong aburisim vot nogat bilip.
Paliment tede, Tunde.
Integrity of Political Parties Bill -- em gavman i laik bai ol memba i oraitim long paliment, i toktok long pasim ol memba long noken kalap kalap nambaut long ol pati taim oli elektim ol pinis igo long paliment, na pinisim dispela kain pasin long wanem em i save mekim politik bilong PNG i nogut.
Praim Minista Sir Mekere Morauta bai mas kisim two-thirds majority long paliment long halvim dispela tingting bilong mekim em i kamap loa tru nau.
Praim Minista i tok em i gat pinis 82 long olgeta 106 memba bilong paliment.
Tasol em i salim strongpela askim igo long olgeta memba bilong kamap na vot.
PNG long wanem wanpela wei tasol mipela ino nap pass oa oraitim dispela senis long loa em sapos ol lida i tingting long ol yet.
Na mipela bai glasim gut tru husat bai vot na husat bai noken vot na husat bai noken kamap long paliment.

Mr Faleomavaega i bin tok olsem taim em i toktok insait long International Relations Committee bilong American House of Representatives, we em i wanpela memba.
Em i tok ol Papuan pipal i save pilim bikpela pen tru aninit long wanpela kain kolonial gavman em i save bagarapim na daunim pipal.
Em i tok ol Papuan i bilip olsem, 200-tausen oa 300-tausen long pipal bilong ol, i bin lus nating stat long taim Indonesia i statlukautim West Papua i kam inap nau.
Mr Faleomavaega i tokim American House of Representatives komiti olsem, taim America i bin halvim ol wok bilong pasim samting em i kolim long ethnic cleansing na genocide -- oa pasin bilong kilim narapela lain, olsem long Kosovo, oli larim yet Indonesia long gohet long bagarapim human rait insait long West Papua.
Gavman bilong Solomon Islands i wok long wetim yet sampela tingting bilong bekim wanpela survey oa wok painim bilong en, bilong glasim wok bilong ol skul long Guadalcanal.
Dispela survey i bin bilong painim aut wanem ol skul i wok, na wanem ol skul i laikim moa halvim bilong gavman.
Edukesin Ministri i tok em i hope ol wok bai gohet klostu, long wanem oli opim pinis ol rot lusim Honiara igo aut long ol eria long Guadalcanal.

Niusman Peter Martin i ripot olsem, ating dispela balus i bin bamim wanpela samting long graun taim em i redi long kirap lusim ples balus.
Singapore Airlines i tok pailot husat ino dai long dispela birua i tok, em i bin lukim na bamim wanpela kain samting long graun, pastaim tyasol long em i kirap.
Ol pipal i glasim dispela birua i tok, oli painim pinis wanpela wil long hap we balus i pundaun long en, na dispela wil ino bilong dispela balus.
Ol pasindia husat ino dai i tok dispela jet balus, wanpela boeing-747, i bin stat seksek nambaut bihain tasol long em i kirap, na bihain wanpela samting i pairap na brukim balus igo long tripela hap taim em i pundaun ikam daun, na bihain paia i kisim em.

Ol investigator, em oli bin kisim ol igo long Taipei blong painim aut wanem samting i bin kamapim despela crash long tunde, i tok pinis ol kain tokwin olsem pailot i bin raon wantaem despelabalus long runway, em oli bin klosim na i bin bamim ol masinblong wok, taim em i bin takeoff, long Chaing Kai Shek ples-balusINO tru.

Polis blong Papua New Guinea i wok long painim aut long kilim dai blong wanpela expatriate bisnis-meri long siti blong Lae.
Wanpela grup blong ol man i bin bungim dispela meri taim em i bin kamap long wok.
Ol dispela man i bin tokim em long givim key blong kar blong em na bihaim sutim long em long gan na kilim em.
Dispela kilim dai blong dispela meri i wanpela long ol bikpela crimes i wok long kamap insait n raun long Lae, na ol pipal long hap i poret long lo na oda i wok long igo daun.
Provincial Gavman blong Morobe, Luther Wenge i tok no-laikim stret dispela pasin blong kilim meri, na i tok, em i sori olsem ol crimnal nau i wok long makim stret ol bisnis em i save bikpela wok tru insait long Province.
Philippine President Jospeh Estrada ino laik resign oa pinis long wok blongem, tru em bai bungim kotcase blong rausim em long wok blongem long ol sas long em i bin kisim bribe oa sampela laen i bin peim em moni.
Em i wok long toktok strong bai em i stap holim wok blongem insaet long ol toktok wantaem man husat i wok long sutim ol strongpela tok igo longem, Fidel Ramos, olpela President.
Estrada i tok strong blong curreny nau i moa yet long wanem em bai i noken resign na pipal i sapotim despela tingting blongem.
Wanpela survey i soim olsem planti long ol Philipine pipal i laikim em long holim wok blongem tasol Mr.
Ramos i bin tokim President long lukautim gut kain pasin blongem oa nogat em o mas pinis pastaem long christmas.
Em i askim em tu long bekim ol tokwin olsem em i bin kisim planti-million dola olsem pei long ol laen i save brukim loa long pilai laki.
EStarda i tok em i no rong long wokim wanpela samting, na em bai i welkam long kotcase i kamap long Senate blong rausim em, em i luk olsem bai i stat long dispela mun.
Papua New Guinea Gavman i wok long traim bungim wantaim planti moa memba, bilong halvim Bajet bilong en dispela mun.
Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem Gavman i wari nogut sampela Gavman memba bai traim blokim rot bilong Bajet bil long paliment.
Samting olsem 25 gavman memba i bin sanap halvim Oposisan sait long wik i pinis, bilong blokim wanpela senis gavman i laik wokim long loa em i karamapim ol pati na ol memba, na nau sampela wari i kamap nogut sampela memba ken bilong gavman i traim long blokim rot bilong Bajet long wik bihain.
Wari i kamap olsem ating ol dispela gavman memba bai wokim dispela pasin bilong fosim paliment i surukim taim bilong Bajet, olsem bai rot i op long oli ken muvim wanpela vot-nogat-bilip agensim em.
Lida bilong wanpela bikpelapati insait long koalisen gavman, nau Lands Minista John Pundari, i askim olketa memba long sanap halvim Bajet.
Em i tok lukaut olsem, olketa pipal bilong Papua New Guinea bai bungim bikpela heve sapos ol memba i blokim Bajet.
Mr Pundari i promis pinis olsem, pati bilong em bai sapotim dispela bajet, na nau wok i gohet bilong traim winim leva na tingting bilong ol memba husat i wok long tubel sapos oli halvim gavman o nogat.
Mansave long ol insect oa kain binatang long Nothern territory blong Australia, i tok i gutpela long wokim gut Quarantine blong lukim olsem wok blong shipping ino karim ol mosquito em i save karim ol sik nongut i kam insaet.
Bihaen long second world war, oli bin stopim olgeta kain mosquito em i save karim dengue fever parasite long territory.
Territory Health service Senior entymologist, Peter Whelen i tok buk blong shipping em i gat toksave long wanem ol samting insaet long ol container long sip, ino save karim ol trupela toktok.
Emi tok sampela pipol em oli wok long soim olsem oli gat dispela sik iwok long kamap igo bikpela.
Oli wok long strongim tok ken long Indonesia President Abdurrachman Wahid long stopim wokobaut blong em i kam long Australia.
South East Asia niusmeri Ginny Stein i ripot olsem, ol nupela toktok igo long Presiden long noken kam long Australia, bihainim toktok Foran Minista Alexander Downer i bin mekim long wokbung namel long tupela kantri.
Foren Afes Palimentri Siaman bilong Indonesia, Yasril Baharuddin, i sutim tok long Mr Downer na tok, em i no soim kain tingting na laik blong kamapim gut wokbung namel long tupela kantri, taim em i mekim kain toktok ken olsem.
Insait long wanpela toktok long Sande, Mr Downer i bin sutim tok long wan oa tupela Indonesia politisen, long usim dispela heve long wokbung namel long Australia na Indonesia, bilong halivim politiks blong ol insait long kantri.
Baharuddin i tok kain tok olsem i soim kain stronghet tingting Australia i gat agensim indonesia.
Ripot i tok Praim Minista bilong Vanuatu i sapotim polisi bilong China long Taiwan, taim em i go lukluk raun long Beijing.
Chinese televisan i tok makim Vanuatu Praim Minista Barak Sope long tokim Chinese wanwok bilong em, Zhu Rongji, olsem gavman bilong em bai sanap strong long one-China polisi na lukim Taiwan olsem wanpela hap tasol bilong China.
Chinese televisan i tok makim tu Vanuatu lida long tok olsem, em i hope kantri bilong em bai wokbung wantaim China long kirapim ol wok bisnis na stretim ol heve pipal i save bungim long sindaun na laif bilong ol.
Dispela toktok i kam aut bihain long wanpela niuspepa bilong Taiwan i bin tok long mun i pinis olsem, Taiwan klostu bai kirapim gavman wokbung wantaim Vanuatu.
Vanuatu i save wokbung wantaim Taiwan stat yet long 1992, taim em i luksave yet long China.
Na nau yet, Wol Beng i tokaut pinis olsem, em i gat confidence oa bilip long we PNG Gavman i lukautim na ronim ekonomi na ol rifom progrem bilong en.
Wol Beng i gat nainpela projek long P-N-G em kos bilong ol i nap long 300 milian dola -- na sapos kantri i laikim em long gohet long givim moni bilong ol dispela projek, Gavman i mas gohet long ol ekonomik na politikal rifom.
Wol Beng vais-president husat i lukautim East Asia na Pacific rijen, Jemal-ud-din Kassum, i tok P-N-G i wok long mekim ol samting gut, maski Gavman ino bin nap long mekim paliment i oraitim politikal bil bilong en long wik i pinis.
Mr Kassum i tok Wol Beng i gat bilip long P-N-G Gavman na long Praim Minista Sir Mekere Morauta.
AMERICAN TELEVISAN I RONG, BUSH INO WIN YET!
Presidential eleksan long America i pinis tasol i luk olsem oli no save gut yet husat tru i win.
Ol televisan stesin i bin tok Republican kendidet George W.
Bush i win pinis tasol bihain oli bin senisim ken dispela na tok, mak bilong vot bilong tupela i klostu wankain stret olsem na oli no nap tok yet husat i win.
Olgeta i wok long lukluk nau long Florida state long saut bilong kantri, we i bin luk olsem Mr Bush i bin winim.
Ol bikpela televisan stesin long America i putim em pinis long White House -- oa i tok pinis olsem, em i kamap president pinis, tasol ol state ofisal long Florida i tok, oli mas kandim gut ken ol vot.
Ol vot long Florida bai tokaut long husat i winim eleksan.
200 vot na sampela tausen vot tasol nau i stap em oli no kandim yet, raun long kantri.
Haf pesen tasol i stap namel long tupela kendidet.
Niusmeri bilong mipela, Agnes Cusack, i ripot olsem Florida, we oli ting ol vot i bai halvim Mr Bush long win, ating bai mas halvim tu yet Mr Gore.
Olsem na Agnes i tok, nius i olsem, Florida i mas stap long sait yet bilong Republican pati, tasol ating dispela bai nogat taim pipal bilong America i kirap tumora long moning.
Nesanal vot i pas-pas wantaim tru namel long Mr Bush na Mr Gore -- 48 pesen bilong Al Gore na 48 pesen bilong George W.
Ol vota insait long Amerika i stat long putim vot bilong ol long eleksin bilong makim Presiden, taim Republican George W Bush na Democrat Al Gore i wet i stap long lukim wanem samting i kamap bihain long kempen bilong tupela.
Mr Gore i wok lid, na dispela i min olsem resis bilong kamap presiden i stap kolostu-kolostu.
Human raits grup itok, ol iwok long wari nogut ol ino lukautim gut ol despela soljia na ol iken paitim ol nambaut tu.
Amnesty itok, oli bilip ol iwok long holim kalapusim yet Sergant Villiame Lotawa na samting olsem eitpela ol narapela soljia insait long militari hetkota insait long Suva.
Ol toktok ikam aut itok, ol ino larim ol despela soljia long toktok na lukim family, ol loia, kisim marasin long ol sik bilong ol oa toktok wantaim Human Raits grup bilong Fiji.
Amesnty itok, bihainim ol toktok oli ino long taim igo pinis, olsem ol ibin paitim nambaut ol sojia na sampela bilong ol ibin idai taim ol ibin wok long holim kalapusim ol, i luk olsem rot i pas nau bilong ol autsait lain long go insait na toktok oa lukim despela 9-pela ol soljia.
Australia bai givim moa long 8 Million Dola long halivim long strongim jastis sistem bilong Solomon Islands insait long dispela tripela yar bihain.
Ol bai usim dispela moni long kamapim gut wok bilong ronim polis na kalabus sistem bilong Solomon Islands.
Wanpela ripot long poison cyanaide i kapsait long graon na wara long stat blong dispela yar long PNG, i tok maining kampani i mas peim kompensesin igo long ol vilis pipal husat i bin kisim taim nogut long ol despela poison.
Wan-tonne hevi cyanide-poison i bin pundaun long wanpela helikopta balus taim em i ron antap long Tolukuma Gold Mine long mun March.
Despela main i bilong Ausatralia kampani, Dome Resources.
P-N-G Ofis bilong Environment na Conservation i bin raitim kamap despela ripot, em i tok ol pipal blong tupela vilis husat i save stap tambolo long wara em posion i bin kapsait long en, i bin wari nogut tru bihaen long poison i kapsait na oli no bin laik kaikaim pis long riva na tu oli no bin laik waswas long en.
Despela ripot i tok i gutpela long maining kampani i peim kompensesin igo long ol vilis pipal bihainim dispela heve oli bin bungim long sindaon blong ol, na em i askim strong Gavman long hariap long kamapim loa blong environment em i stap long Parliament nau.
Fiji i bihainim loa oa nogat.

Chen Young, i pilim olsem dispela i strongim ken independens bilong ol kot insait long kantri.
Wanpela delegesin bilong ol memba kantri bilong Pacific Islands Forum, em igat twelvpela memba long en, bai lukluk-raun long Taiwan long dispela mun long promotim invesmen.

Ol gavman ofisa bilong Indonesia ibin pasim ken wanpela lukluk-raun bilong Presiden bilong ol long Australia.
Niusman Mark Bowling i ripot olsem, ol ibin pasim samting olsem tripela lukluk-raun Presiden Abdurrahman Wahid ibin plen long wokim long Australia long dispela yar, taim wok-pren namel long Indonesia na Australia i stap nogut yet.
Risen em Indonesia ibin givim bilong pasim wanpela lukluk-raun Presiden ibin laik mekim long pinis bilong mun Novemba, em long wanem em ino laikim mekim ol Muslim grup bilong Indonesia i belhat long taim bilong Ramadan mun bilong Islam.
Tasol, wok-pren namel long Indonesia na Australia ibin bagarap moa yet bihain long Australia ibin lidim wanpela intanesenel pis kiping fos igo insait long East Timor long yar igo pinis, bihain long dispela territori ibin vot long kisim independens.
Ol memba bilong Indonesia Palamen ibin mekim strongpela toktok long Presiden Wahid long inoken mekim wanpela lukluk-raun igo long Australia.

Maski America iwok long traim long daunim ol pait na tingting kros namel long Palestine na Israel, tasol ol pait na bigpela tingting kros iwok long igo hed yet insait long ol hap graun bilong Palestine.
Olsem hap bilong despela tingting, America ibin tokaut long nem bilong ol memba bilong wanpela lain bilong autsait kantri, bilong mekim ol wok painim igo insiat long despela ol pait kros ibin wok long igo hed namel long Palestine na Israel, taim ol lida bilong Israel na Palestine iwok long rere long igo long Washington bilong holim toktok wantaim President Bill Clinton.
Ol ibin girapim despela lain bilong mekim ol wok painim- bihainim yet ol tokorait insait Sharm el- Sheik summit long mun igo pinis, wantaim bigpela tingting bilong pinisim ol paitkors, we 184 pipol idai pinis longen.

Malaysia na Indonesia bai i strongim ol wok bung long ol militari sevis blong ol long ol boda patrol long Borneo na long ol nambis erea long hap solwara oli kolim Straits of Malacca.

Ol bikpela televisen stesin long America i ripot olsem, Gavana bilong Texas, George W.
Bush, i winim eleksan pinis na nau em i kamap namba-43 President bilong America.
Ol ripot i kamap tu olsem, long nambawan taim stat long 1954 ikam inap nau, Republican pati bilong America bai kontrolim Senate na House of Representatives wantaim.
Michael Carey i ripot ikam long Austin, Texas olsem, ol bikpela singaut i bin pairap ikam long pipal insait long Austin, kapital bilong Texas State, we oli bin wok long wet na seksek nambaut inap long planti awa pinis, taim toksave ikam long televisen olsem, Bush i winim pinis President eleksan.
State em i bin halvim Bush long win em long Florida - we oli bin save olsem, 25 elektorel vot long dispela state bai mekim eleksan i kamap dro namel long Governor Bush na vice President Al Gore.
Toksave long win bilong George W Bush i bin kamap long haf-pas-wan lokal taim, planti awa bihain long oli pasim pinis vot raun long kantri.
Governor Bush i bin win long wan pesen tasol.

Ol memba long dispela geng i bin karim ol gan na go hansapim pipal long bisnis we dispela meri i save wok long en long Lae.

Em i bin kamap long wok long Mande moning, na dispela geng i bin wetim em i stap na traim long stilim kar bilong em.
Oli sutim em long gan na katim em, na em i dai long stoa yet.
Poliis long Lae i tok oli bilip oli bai arestim ol memba bilong geng pastaim long pinis bilong wik.
Insait long wanpela belsori toktok long ol niuspepa bilong PNG, Brian Bell, bos bilong Mrs Nish, i tok em i save wok bilong kamapim justice oa gutpela loa na oda, na long peace long stoa we em i wok na tu long komuniti we i stap.
Polis long Jakarta i tok oli no nap yet long painim Tommy, yangpela pikinini man bilong olpela President Suharto, husat i wok long hait nambaut.
Em i ronawe na hait bihain long polis i givim oda long arestim em, long wanem em INO soim pes bilong em long ol otoriti, bilong go kalabus inap long 18 mun.
Kot i bin salim em igo long kalabus long wanem em i bin paulim planti moni.
Tommy i lus na ino soim pes bilong en stat yet long Fraide igo pinis, taim ol prosekuta i bin go painim em long haus bilong em bilong karim em igo long Cipanang haus kalabus.
Ol prosekuta i bin painim haus nating na Tommy ino bin stap.
Lokal nius i wok long tokaut olsem, kain wok bilong ol otoriti long arestim Tommy, husat i wanpela memba bilong wanpela strongpela femili tru long Indonesia, i bin wanpela rabis wok em ino tru tumas.
Suharto femili i stap strong yet na em i gat planti strongpela pren insait long gavman.
Oli ting dispela i save halvim dispela femili long pait agensim ol sas na tu bai Tommy i noken go kalabus.

AUSTRALIA BAI SUTIM TOK LONG OIL PRAIS LONG ASIA PACIFIC MITING.
Australia bai usim Asia-Pacific miting long wik bihain, bilong sutim toktok long prais bilong oil em i dia tumas long dispela taim.
Australia Foren Minista, Alexander Downer, i tok ol bikpela prais tumas bilong oel bai givim bikpela pen long ekonomi bilong ol Asian kantri.
Mr Downer i tokim Paliament olsem, miting bilong APEC long Brunei i mas lukluk na toktok long ol bikpela heve ol kantri i ken bungim long bikpela prais tumas bilong oel.
Em i tok ol kantri long East Asia nau tasol i kam aut long wanpela bikpela taim nogut long ekonomi bilong ol.

FIJI I SLEKIM CURFEW!
Fijian militari i slekim pinis wanpela curfew em oli bin putim stat long mutiny tupela wik igo pinis.
Oli daunim pinis hamas awa dispela curfew bai wok long wanwan de, long wanem oli tok, ol sekuriti wok nau i kamap gut ken.
Oli bin statim dispela curfew taim sampela soldia i bin kirapim pait bilong traim brukim ami long Queen Elizabeth Barracks long stat bilong dispela mun.
Tupela soldia na wanpela sivilian husat i bin memba bilong risev fos, i lus yet, bihainim dispela trabal long ami em eitpela pipal i bin dai long en.
Trinde) curfew bai stat long 10 kilok long nait na ino moa long 8 kilok olsem bipo.
Ol kros na pait namel long pipal bilong Solomon Islands i givim bikpela heve tru long wok bilong Development Bank bilong kantri.
Dispela heve i nogut tru insait long Guadalcanal Provins na Honiara, longwanem tupela i gat hap bilong ol dinau Benk ibin givim aut insait long Solomon Islands.
Menesing Darekta bilong Bank, Luke Eta i toksave olsem, long Guagalcanal, oli toktok long one hundred percent freeze long olgeta pei bilong bekim seven milian dola loun.
Long heve bilong Honiara, oli gat samting olsem 31-milian Solomons dola, na mak bilong bekim dispela dinau i stap aninit long 40-pesen.
Eta i tok, dispela i givim bikpela heve tru long olgeta wok bilong Development Bank.
Long Kiribati, ol bai planim bodi bilong Vais President bilong kantri tede, bihain long em i bin pundaun na dai long Paliment long Mande.

Ol ofisal ino tokaut yet long wanems amting tru i bin kilim em, tasol Radio Kiribati i tok Mr Tentoa i bin save gat heve yet long heart oa leva bilong em.
Dai bilong Mr Tentoa i mekim na oli bin adjourne oa muvim taim bilong paliment miting long Mande na aste ken miting ino bin gohet.
