COOKS PRAIM MINISTA I TOKIM OL BISNIS, HARIAP!
Praim Minista blong Cook Islands, Doctor Terepai Maoate i tok, bisnis komuniti long Rarotonga i mas hariap sapos em i laik kisim bek ol pipal blong kantri em nau oli stap long New Zealand.
Doctor Maoate i tok, Cook Islands i laikim tumas ol wokman-meri em oli stap long New Zealand long kam bek long ples.
Em i tok, wok ino gohet long ekonomik rifom na ol eria olsem healt, edukesin na divelopmen, longwanem, oli no nap painim pipal long wok long ol.
Planti pipal blong Cook Islands i wok long lusim kantri long stap wok long ol narapela kantri.
Ol komuniti lida blong Cook Islands i stap long Auckland i tok, oli laik painim aut pei, long ol dispela pipal oli grisim long go bek long ples na putim ol long ol dispela wok oa statim ol bisnis.
Praim Minista i tok, em i ofa long halivim ol long haus, takis na peim sip long karim ol samting blong ol igo bek long Cook Islands.
Wok painim em gavman blong New Zealand i bin wokim, i soim olsem, sidaun na pei namel long ol pipal blong Pacific long New Zealand, wantaim tu ol pipal blong Cook Islands, ino gutpela tumas.
Doctor Maoate i tok, oli nap long senisim dispela sapos oli go bek na kisim ol wok long ples blong ol.
Australia Foreign Minista, Alexander Downer i tok ol Gavman ofisa blong North Korea i redi long holim ol toktok long rausim ol rocket-bom, tasol oli laikim gutpela compensesin-moni longen.
Phililip Williams i ripot olsem Mr.
Downer bai i lusim Pyongyang tede, na em i holim stronpela bilif olsem ol toktok long security i wok long kamapim kaikai na em bai i kamap.
Wanpela long ol bikpela wari blong region em long wok North Korea i bin gat despela missile testing program na tu i bin stap insaet long wok blong salim ol rocket-bom igo long ol arapela kantri.
Downer i tok despela na ol narapela security issue, oli wok long holim toktok longen na em i bilif olsem belhat na kros em i ken kamapim kros na pait long Korean Peninsula i go daon nau.
Tasol, em i tok tu olsem ol North Korean Ofisal i tok aut stret pinis olsem sapos oli stop long salim ol rocket-bom blong ol, bai oli needim moni compensesin.
Downer i tok tru nau i gat sanis i kamap long pasin blong toktok na kamapim wok-pren tasol em i tok ating bai em i kisim longpela taim yet long oli ken lukim sanis long ol wok blong economy na politiks.
GURIA I SEKIM KOKOPO LONG EAST NEW BRITAIN!
Wanpela Tsunami i bin hamarim Kokopo taun long East New Britain provins bilong Papua New Guinea tede long apinun.
Niusman Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem strong bilong dispela guria i bin kisim 8 long Richter scale.
Guria i bin hamarim Papua New Guinea tede long apinun na pipal i bin pilim em long planti hap.
Insait long planti eria, pipal i tok guria i bin sekim ples inap long sampela minit, na ol liklik guria oli kolim aftershocks i wok long gohet yet.
Wanpela wave, wanpela mita igo antap, i bin hamarim Kokopo taun long East New Britain, liklik taim tasol bihain long guria, na dispela wave i bin bagarapim wanpela supamaket.
Tsunami warning oa tok lukaut long kamap bilong tsunami i go aut pinis long ol liklik ailan kantri long western Pacific rijen, tasol ol seismologists i tok kain guria olsem i noken kamapim bikpela Tsunami tumas.
Long North bilong Papua New Guinea wanpela haiwara i bin fosim samting olsem 400 pipol long lusim ples bilong ol.
Kumalu river long Morobe provins i bin tait na wara i bin kapsait ikam aut long stat bilong despela wik, bihainim bikpela ren, na wara i bin bagarapim tupela vilis.
Morobe Provinsal disasta ofis i bin rerem na givim aut ol kaikai na ol samting bilong slip igo long ol pipol i bungim heve, na ol wokman bilong Emergency i wok long painim aut wanem kain bagarap i kamap long ol rot na haus.
Oli tok bai gat moa ren i kamap long despela eria.
Indonesia difens fos i salim pinis tupela nambawan reserve batalian bilong en igo long West Papua we planti trabal i wok long kamap dispela taim.
300 soldia i bin lusim Jakarta eria antap long tupela wosip bilong go long West Papua.
Indonesia Observer niuspepa i tok makim bos bilong ol dispela batalian, Colonel Irwan Kusnadi, long tok olsem, ol dispela soldia bai go stap long hap bilong lukautim nesanal uniti.
Long nambawan de bilong mun Disemba, Free Papua muvmen long West Papua bai makim 39 anivesari bilong declaration oa toksave bilong ol olsem, West Papua i kamap indipendent pinis.
Indonesia Gavman i nogat laik tru long givim indipendens long West Papua, tasol em i tok promis long givim provins bikpela otonomi moa -- oa bikpela pawa moa bilong lukautim em yet, long nambawan de bilong mun May, 2001.
Ol lawya husat i bin paitim toktok na winim kotcase olsem Fiji 1997 mama-loa oa Constitution i stap gut na em bekbone blong kantri, i bin tok-welkam long ol toktok olsem Fiji military bai i appeal long ruling blong kot.
Judge Tony Gates i bin givim ruling long Fiji High Court long Lautoka, olsem army i bin rausim pinis mama-loa blong Fiji, olsem na bai gutpela long oli askim ol memba blong Parliament long holim miting na larim wanpela elected gavman long statim ken wok blong Gavman blong kantri.
Sean Dorney i ripot olsem judge Gates i bin wanbel long ol toktok blong constitution lawya blong Canberra George Williams olsem Gavman long kantri nau, em army i bin makim long pinis blong mun May, ino trupela gavman aninit long law, em illegal.
Fiji military commanda i bin putim ol loa oa decree em judge i tok long ol olsem em ino bin stret aninit long mama-loa.
Williams i bin tokim ABC Asia-Pacific program olsem bai gutpela samting long Fiji sapos army i kisim despela igo long court of appeal.
MAORI LIDA I SUTIM TOK LONG OL ENVAIROMEN GRUP!
Wanpela bignem Maori lida long New Zealand ibin tokim World Council of Whales olsem, Maori komuniti long kantri ino wanbel long weipipol i save traim long halavim na putim ol whales igo bek long solwara, taim oli ikam sua long nambis long dai.
Regan ibin tokim miting long Nelson siti long New Zealand olsem, ol environmental Organisation i save usim ol whales olsem wanpela wei bilong winim sapot bilong pablik, tasol oli nogat gutpela has bilong sapotim despela kain wok bilong ol.
Em itok ol pipol bilong en i ken inap long usim ol whales em oli kam sua long dai.
Foren Minista bilong New Zealand, Phil Geoff na Greenpeace bilong New Zealand ino laik salim sampela man igo long dispela miting.
New Zealand i tok Fiji High Court ruling nau i strongim tok long Fiji i mas go bek bihaenim pasin democracy long wok blong gavman.
Praim Minista blong new Zealand, Helen Clarke i tok gavman blongem i bin save na holim strongpela tingting blongen olsem despela interim Gavman em Military i bin makim long Fiji, ino bin bihaenim loa blong kantri.
Ms Clarke i tok finding blong high Court olsem Fiji 1997 constitution i stap gut na em bekbone blong kantri i min olsem despela interim Gavman i mas dropim plan blongen long wok isi isi long putim bek democracy gavman long Fiji.
Ol lida bilong Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation forum i wok long paitim toktok nau long wanpela nupela wok ken bilong mekim wol tred i fri.
Niusman Graeme Dobell i ripot ikam long Brunei olsem, Praim Minista bilong Australia John Howard bai tokaut long ol samting em oli narakain long tingting bilong Malaysia na America.
Olketa APEC lida i bin bilas long ol blupela siot oli wokim long silk, na oli bin sidaun long wanpela miting tede em Sultan bilong Brunei i bin siaman long en.
World Trade Organisation, inap mekim dispela organisation i lus tingting long wok em i mas mekim na em bai hat ken long gohet wantaim ol tingting oli wok long lukluk long en nau.
Oli sutim tok long wanpela lain bilong wokim film oa piksa bilong Holywood, em i wok long mekim wanpela piksa insiat long New Zealand, long wanem oli no larim Maori pipal i stap namel long despela piksa.
Oli tok dispela Holywood lain i bihainim kain pasin bilong brukim nambaut ol pipal i gat bilak skin.
200 pipol long stap insiat long despela piksa long Sande, taim oli wokim piksa em i stori long taim Queen Elizabeth the Secong i bin go lukluk raun long New Zealand long 1953-54.
Tasol oli bin bin askim ol Maori long noken stap long despela bung.
Ol produsa i tok, oli bihainim despela tingting bilong bihainim trupela stori bilong bipo, we ol wait pipol tasol i bin save hamamas long go bungim Queen bilong Britain.
Samting olsem 100 Maori pipol ino bin laik stap insait long despela piksa, long wanem oli tok kain pasin bilong en i racist - oa oli no save laikim ol bilak skin.
Oli bin sutim strongpela toktok long ol pablik sevan blong Solomon Islands, insait long konfrens blong ol premia long Buala.
Ol premia i tok olsem, aninit long sistem blong gavman nau oli wok long tingting long en, wan wan state bai mas gat pablik sevis komisin blong em yet em i ken nap long kisim oa rausim ol wokman-meri.
Ol tok, nesanal gavman ino gat kontrol moa long pablik sevis.
Ol premia i tok, pablik sevis i bikpela tumas na oli bin mekim strongpela toktok long kain pasin blong planti long ol wokman-meri blong en.
Ol premia i sutim tok long ol long oli no bihainim oda ikam long ol provinsal gavman.
Papua New Guinea Gavman i tok em bai NOKEN pasim progrem bilong en long privatise oa tanim ol bisnis han bilong en i kamap ol praivet bisnis -- maski wanpela kempein i stat pinis bilong pasim em.
Niusman Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem ol tred union i tok promis long wokim ol protes bilong pasim privatisation, tasol dispela progrem bilong gavman i pulim sampela sapot tu ikam long pablik yet.
Papua New Guinea Gavman i laik salim nau PNG Banking Corporation, Air Niugini, telepon na elektrisi dipatmen, na planti moa bisnis em kantri i papa long ol.
PNG Trade Union Congress i laik blokim dispela wok bilong Gavman, na i tok em bai statim kempein long holim ol protes na straik.
Tasol Praim Minista Sir Mekere Morauta i tok ol pipal husat i protes agensim dispela tingtingbilong gavman, bai oli westim nating taim bilong ol -- Gavman bai noken harim tok bilong ol.
Na long wanem planti pipal i ting ol dispela kampani bilong gavman ino save givim gutpela sevis, oli ting privatisation bai mekim ol i givim gutperla sevis moa.
Papua New Guinea Gavman bai nap long bringim bajet bilong en igo long Paliment.
Paliment tenpela de igo pinis -- tasol em ino gohet long en long wanem sampela Gavman memba i bin bruk na go sanap halvim oposisan.
Gavman nau i tok em i kontrolim pinis wanpela lain memba husat i bin bruk lusim em, na i tok, em igat gutpela majority oa bikpela grup ken insait long Paliment.
Tasol Gavman i wok long stretim gut yet bajet bilong en, moa yet, ol hap bilong bajet em oli lukluk long sampela senis long ol kain takis.
Hai Kot i bin tok aste olsem, em ino trupela gavman.
Aste Hai Kot i bin tokaut long tingting bilong en olsem, 1997 Constitution oa mama loa, i sanap yet na dispela i min olsem, paliment em oli bin elektim na bihain oli bin rausim long ku long mun May dispela yar, i raitpela gavman yet em i holim otoriti long kantri.
Niusmeri Ofa Kaukimoce i ripot olsem, toktok bilong Fiji Praim Minista i tok olsem, interim gavman bai gohet yet olsem nesanal gavman na legislative otority bilong Fiji.
Interim gavman i tokaut pinis long tripela bikpela wok em bai mekim.
Dispela tripela wok em long -- sekuriti na sefti bilong pipal bilong Fiji, kirapim bek ekonomi, na rereim rot bilong go bek long Constitutional rul.
Komanda bilong Fiji Militari Fos na ami, Ekting Komisina bilong Polis Fos na bilong polis, judiciary oa ol jas na kot, Pablik Sevis Komisan na ol pablik sevan.

Wanpela mausman blong ministry i tok sevnpela soldia i dai pinis na narapela 27 i bin kisim bikpela bagarap long ol despela pait.
Em i tok ol security forces i bin kisim ol bodi blong tenpela Tamil Tigers, em ol soldia i bin kilim.

Long New Caledonia, oli promasim pinis tripela trade union em oli bin protes long wik i pinis, olsem nupela mak bilong minimum wage bai stat long mun July long yar bihain.
Dispela nupela minimum wage mak em long 7-handret-na-20 American dola bilong wanwan mun.
Dispela mak bai go antap inap long 8-handret-na-65 dola bilong wanwan mun long yar 2003.
Long wik i pinis, moa long 3-handret union memba i bin protes long hetkuata bilong lokal gavman.
Protes bilong ol i bin sut long prais bilong fuel em i wok long go antap bikpela tumas, na tu long nupela takis oli kolim - goods and services tax, na tu long wanem wok bilong statim nupela minimum wage bilong wanwan mun i bin wok long go isi-isi tumas.
Workers na Union of Supervisory Staff, i bin singautim ol pipal long wokim dispela protes long wik igo pinis.
Liz Foschia i ripot olsem oli wok long usim ol helikopta long tromoi oa dropim ol kaikai-samting na saplai igo long pipal.
Long ol ples olsem Gunnedah, Narabri na Wee Waa distrik planti handret papa long ol farm na property ino nap kam aut lusim ol despela farm na property blong ol, na long wankain taim haiwara i wok long go antap.
Oli ting olsem ol bagarap long ol wheat crop long despela area bai i kostim planti handret-million dola na hap long ol crop em oli bin ting bai i kamap gut long winim moni, nau oli daonim mak long hamas oli nap salim oa sampela bai bagarap olgeta.
Wheat Board i wok long lukluk long sapos em bai i peim ol crop oli bin salim bifo, nau na ino long yiar bihaen olsem oli save wokim, bai oli ken halivim ol farma husat i sot long moni blong stretim sindaon blong ol.
Premier blong New south Wales i bin opim tu wanpela community Disaster Relief Fund blong halivim ol famili husat i bungim heve long flood oa hai-wara.
Pipal husat i laik halivim bai iken putim moni long ANZBANK oa Wespack Bank long waem area oa state blong Australia.
Palaman blong Solomon Islands bai statim ken miting long namba 30 dei blong mun November.
Em bai namba wan taim Palaman bai holim miting, stat long taim Prime Minister, Manasseh Sogavare, i kamapim Prime Minister long mun Julai long dispela yiar.
Solomon Islands Broadcasting Cooperation, i bin toktok makim Deputi clerk long Palaman, Selwyn Miduku, long tok olsem, palaman bai toktok long ol samting blong amnesty em i stap long dispela Pis agrimen oli bin sainim long Townsville.
Miduku i tok, miting blong toktok long Budget bai kamap insait long namba wan fopela mun blong yiar 2001.
Ol pipol bilong Western Provins bilong Solomon Islands usiat ibin wok long bungim heve na istap wantaim ol tingting poret, bihain long taim ol lain bilong Bougainville i bin wok long karim raun ol smating bilong pait, ibin askim long ol imas salim olgeta lain pipol bilong Bougainville igo bek long plea or kanyri bilong ol.

Wanpela ripot em United Nations Sekuriti Kaunsel ibin rereim, ibin askim blong wanem na ol wok blong stretim gut ken East Timor ibin isi tumas, 14 mun bihain long ol rebel i sapotim Indonesia ibin bagarapim dispela territori.
East Timor inap long tupela de las-wik, ibin bringim dispela ripot igo long Sekuriti Kaunsel bihain long oli oli givim toktok blong ol long wanem samting oli bin painim igo long United Nations Hed-Kota long New York.
Dispela lain ibin tok oli bin wari long liklik mak blong wok iwok long kamap long dispela taim na sapos oli makim olgeta hap blong kantri wantaim Dili, Dili tasol iwok long igo hed gut.
Australia bai givim halivim long kirapim wanpela Difens Fos bilong East Timor.
Difens Minista, John Moore, i tok Australia bai givim bikpela halivim, em i nap long 26-milian dola insait long faifpela yar ikam.
Moore i tok, longpela taim sikiuriti bilong East Timor i gutpela bilong Indonesia, na dispela agrimen INO nap kirapim tingting nogut na kros namel long gavman bilong Indonesia na Australia.
Defens Fos bilong Australia i autim tingting pinis long muvim sampel long ol Aivation Units bilong Army bilong en igo long ol ples long north bilong kantri.
Ol Blackhawk na Kiowa helikopta bilong Army nau i beis long Townsville, long north-Queensland.
Commodore Mark Bonser, long Northern Command, i tok ol i nau tingting long muvim sampela long ol Unit igo long Northern Territory.
Gavman blong Chauddhry Gavman, husat oli bin rausim long coup i tok Fiji budzet blong 2001 i NONGUT long wanem Elected Gavman em i bin kamap long constutition tru tru blong Fiji ino wokim oa tokaut longen, na despela 2001 budget ino stret aninit long loa.
Em i tok elected Gavman em pipal i bin putim bihaenim constitution, em tasol i holim pawa long kamapim revenue oa moni long ol kain takis na em i holim pawa tu long tokaut long ol wanem kain publik fun i ken go long hia, long hap na kain olsem blong ol kain wok blong Gavman.
Em i tok sapos, oli no bin autim em long long ofis, long coup long mun May, dispela Chaudhry Gavman bai i tokaut long wanpela budget long halivim pipal long sindaon blong ol long budget blong 2001.

Sean Dorney i ripot olsem Forum Fisheries Agency i bin lukluk na glasim ken despela communication na vessel monitoring system blongen long region bai em i usim gut despela electronic mail oa internet long despela wok.
Ripot blong Forum Fiusheries Agency blong yiar, long despela alstpela Pacific Islands Forum Miting, i bin tok electronic mail oa internet i wok long kamap system blong olgeta pipal long usim long kisim informesin na Agency na Forum memba kanatri i wok long usim despela long salim na kisim informesin namel long ol.
Em i to nau olgeta aialan kantri i gat internet na oli wok long usim long emailim ol informesin.
Olsem na oli bin glasim gut despela Vessel Monitoring systenms communication strategy na oli kisim internet blong kisim ples blong despela international paacket switching network.
Despela ripot i tok tenpela ailan kantri i gat internet connection blong ol vessel monitoring system oa VMS sites.

Praim minista bilong Solomon ailen- Mannaseh Sogavare- ibin makim ol lain woknius bilong ol narapela kantri - olsem ol lain bilong kamapim trabel.
Insait long ol toktok bilongen igo long ol woknius yet bilong kantri, Mr.
Sogavare ibin makim ol lain woknius olsem Fickle or ol lain bilong bringim trabel- taim ol isave raitim ol stori long ol trabel insait long Gudalcanal.
Em itok- ol woknius bilong ol narapela kantri isave lus tingting long Solomon ailen- taim ol narapela bigpela heve isave kamap long ol narapela hap bilong world.
Wanpela bilong ol ailen bilong Solomon ailen usait ibin autim tingting pastaim long ol ilaik bruk lusim ol narapela hap bilong Solomon ailen itok, em bai sanap strong yet long despela tingting bilongen kamap wanpela independent state.
Taim planti bilong ol bigpela ailen ilaikim wanpela federation bilong stat, deputy premier bilong Makira Provins, Peter Baewai itok- provins bilongen iwok long igo hed wantaim despela tingting bilongen long bruk lusim Solomon ailen.
Fiji Ku Lida, George Speight i kamap ken long narapela kot antap long Nukalau Island.
Ofa Kaukimoce i ripot olsem, i gat nau wari long wanem, ol ino mekim ol samting igo het long dispela keis oa kot bilong Speight, na ol i westim ol takis-peia moni nating.
Dispela em i namba-tu taim Speight i kamap long kot antap lnog ailan, longwanem ol wari bilong sikiuriti.
Loia bilong gavman, Robert Schuster i tok, ino rong long holim kot olsem, longwanem, olgeta man ol i sutim tok long ol wantaim tu het bilong Intelligence Service bilong Fiji bipo, Metuisela Mua ibin kamap long en.
Ol ibin larim Mua i lusim Nukalau Island aste igo aut bilong lukim oli planim bodi bilong mama bilong em long Tailevu provins.
Schuster i tok, Chief Magistrate Salesi Temo ibin harim dispela kot na Rabo Matebalavu ibin makim ol man oli sutim toktok long ol long brukim loa bilong kantri.
Ol loia ino ibin putim planti toktok igo long kot tete moning, na ol i putim bek taim bilong kot i sidaun ken igo long namba-sikis de bilong mun bihain.
Ol i ting, dispela kot bai kamap ken antap lnog ailan, na i gat nau ol wari long ol kost bilong kot.
Dispela longwanem, gavman ibin makim tupela nevi bot long bringim ol pipal igo ikam long dispela taim bilong kot.
Ol lain i laikim Indipendens bilong West Papua i tok, bai oli go het wantaim indipendens selebresan lnog mun bihain.
Dispela tokaut i kamap liklik taim bihain long Indonesia gavman i tok bai em i lukim wanem kain ol selebresan long namba-wan de bilong Disemba olsem, pasin bilong bikhet long gavman.
Presidium bilong Papua Council, em lain i go pas long ol askim bilong indipendens, i tok ol pipal bilong em bai makim dispela de long mun bihain.
Theys Eluay i tok, Gavman bilong Indonesia i traim long halivim tingting bilong em long salim ol soldia igo long rijen, bihainim toktok bilong em olsem, ol lain i laikim indipendens bai tokaut ken long indipendens bilong ol.
Em i tok, gavman bilong Indonesia i giaman tasol bilong soim olsem, em ino save long histori, taim em i ino luksave olsem West Papuans ibin lukautim ol iet long 1961.
Chief Justice blong Papua New Giunea, Sir Arnold Amet i tok, ol kot blong kantri i pulap tru wantaim ol kot kes na oli mas painim narapela ol rot blong stretim dispela heve.
Chief Justice Amet i mekim dispela toktok insait long wanpela seremoni blong makim 55 nupela lawyer, husat i bin pinisim skul blong ol.
Sir Arnold i tok, em i gutpela blong lukim namba blong ol meri i laik kamap lawyer, i wok long go antap.
15 long ol dispela i bin kamap lawyer, em ol meri.
Interim gavman blong Fiji ibin tingting long givim 20-Million FijiDola igo long ol provinsel kaunsel long yar bihain, blong halivim ol wok blong stretim gut sidaun blong ol as-ples Fiji pipol.
Interim Praim Minista, Laisenia Qarase, ibin tok Fiji gavman ibin traim long painimaut sapos dispela tingting blong ol i stret aninitlong loa oa nogat.
Qarase ibin tokaut strong olsem dispela 20 million dola i narapela long dispela 30 million dola em oli makim pinis blong stretim dispela tingting i stap pinis blong ol asples Fiji pipol na ol tu ol pipol blong Rotuma.

Wee Waa na Walgett.

Islamic grup oli kolim Hamas, em i save pait wantaim Israel, i tok olsem, em bai bekim dai bilong wanpela memba bilong en em i tok ol roket bilong Israel i bin kilim insait long Nablus, wanpela taun long West Bank.
Wanpela niusman bilong AFP na ol ofisal bilong Hamas i tok wanpela roket bom bilong Israel i bin bagarapim wanpela kar insait long Nablus.
Oli tok oli bin laikim dispela roket long kilim ol Hamas rebel insait long Nablus.
Gavana bilong Nablus i tok ol investigeta i painim aut olsem, wanpela bom em sampela lain i bin haitim aninit sia bilong kar i bin kamapim dispela birua, na i sutim tok long Israel long putim dispela bom i stap.
Tasol ami bilong Israel i tok, em ino tru, em ino mekim dispela pasin.

Polis long Indonesia i bin sut long tear-gas igo namel long sampela pipal em oli bin karim ol naip na wokim protes mas.
Protes i bin kamap namel long pipal i halvim President Abdurrahman Wahid na pipal husat ino laikim em.
Ol belkros i bin wok long kamap namel long ol grup husat i save go protes raun long paliment haus insait long ol dispela de igo pinis.
Bihain long protes, em i bin luk olsem pipal bai bruk na go long ples, tasol sampela pipal i stat tromoim ol ston.
Polis, husat i bin traim long putim banis namel long ol grup, oli kirap na sut long tear-gas.
Bos bilong Jakarta polis sekuriti kontrol i bin tokim AFP nius olsem, tupela sapota bilong Wahid i bin kisim bagarap.
Wanpela long tripela provins bilong Solomon Islands em oli tokaut pinis long laik bilong ol long bruk lusim kantri, i tok em ino tok pilai long kamap wanpela narapela kantri yet.
Planti long ol bikpela provins bilong Solomon Islands i laikim tingting bilong tanim kantri igo long federation of states, tasol Deputi Premia bilong Makira Provins, Peter Baewai i tok provins bilong em bai gohet long tingting bilong en long bruk lusim kantri.
Mr Baewai i tok oli gat strongpela tingting bilong wokim dispela, oli no tok pilai long bruk lusim kantri, na em i tok, sampela review oa sampela wok bilong glasim gavman sistem bilong kantri em nesanal gavman i bin wokim, i halvim tingting bilong ol.

Malaita Eagle Force.
Ol memba bilong Malaita Eagle Force ibin sut long gan long klia-im ol rot insait long Honiara, taim ol pipol ibin poret na ronawei lusim dispela eria long ol kar.

Narapela strongpela guria i sekim pinis northern hap blong Papua New Guinea.
Niusman, Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem, dispela guria em i wanpela long ol guria, em oli ting bai gohet inap long sampela wik yet.
Ol guria i wok long kamapim long olketa dei long New Britain na New Ireland, stat yet long tupela bikpela guria i bin hamarim eria long Fode blong wik igo pinis.
Dispela nupela guria i bin kamap long Moning na strong blong em oli bin makim long Richter Scale, ibin kamap long 6.
Ol tidal waves, em guria i bin kamapim ol, i mekim pinis ol authoriti long hariap wantaim ol tingting long kisim aut pipal blong Duke Of York Islands, na putim ol long narapela hap.
Mak blong solwara long Duke of York Islands, i wok long go antap.
Ol sugarcane groua long Fiji i tok oli no hamamas long moni gavman i skelim igo long ol fama, insait long nesanal bajet bilong yar 2001, em Fainens Minista i bin tokaut long en long Trinde.
Sugarcane Growers Council i tok dispela five-point-six milian American dola bajet i skelim long ol, ino nap.
Chief Executive bilong Council, Jaganath Sami, i tok Council ino hamamas long tingting bilong interim gavman long noken peim ol fama moni oli kolim - cash grants.
Dispela cash grants inap long 11-tausen American dola na oli ting bai oli peim igo long ol fama em lis bilong ol long graun i pinis.
Em i tok dispela bajet ino halvim olwok bilong stretim ol heve we lis bilong planti fama i pinis oa klostu i pinis, na moni bajet i skelim long ol bai no nap long givim gutprla samting long ol fama.

Ol lida blong tenpela memba kantri blong Association blong South East Asia, i statim tupela dei miting blong ol, long dispela yiar, long Singapore.

Gavman blong Papua New Guinea bai salim balus-kampani blong kantri, Air Niugini.
Gavman bai salim hap blong balus-kampani, long namba-wan fopela mun long yiar bihain.
Prime Minister sir Mekere Morauta i tok, Gavman bai holim yet 51 pesen long dispela kampani na planti ol balus-kampani long Pacific rijon i tokaut pinis long laik blong ol long baim dispela 49 pesen long dispela kampani.
Dispela salim blong Air Niugini, i namba wan hap blong tingting blong Papua New Guinea Gavman long salim ol bisnis han blong en na ol statutory bodi.
Minista blong edukesin long Papua New Guinea, i toksori long wanem Gavman ino bin slaim ol skul material blong ol skul long dispela yar.
Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem Gavman i bin makim sampela milian dola blong baim ol skul material, tasol oli no bin salim ol despela material igo long ol skul.
Em i tok nau oli wok long sutim planti toktok long Edukesin minista John Waiko long pinis long wok blong em.

Ol pablik sevan bilong Solomon Islands i holim wanpela straik tede, bilong halvim askim bilong ol long kisim 40 dola alauens long wanwan de.
Oli kolim dispela alauens long danger allowance - oa moni bilong halvim ol long taim birua oa bagarap i kamap.
Solomon Islands Public Employees Union i tok gavman i bin wanbel long peim ol dispela alauens bilong karamapim wok bilong ol stat long namba-5-de bilong mun June, taim Malaita Eagle Force i stat kontrolim Honiara, ikam inap long October 15 taim oli sainim Townsville peace agriment.
Tasol em i tok praim minista i pasim ken dispela alauens long wanem em i tok, em ino stret.
General Secretary bilong Union, Clement Waiwori, i tok ol pablik sevan long Honiara i bin putim laif bilong ol insait long ol kain trabal, taim oli gohet long givim ol kain sevis bilong gavman long pipal taim Honiara i bin kamap wanpela ples bilong woa.
Em i tok gavman i mas luksave long dispela na peim ol pablik sevan.
Honiara, ibin straik oa holim stop-wok tete.
Honiara, igo inap long taim ol ibin sainim Townsville Pis Agrimen long namba 15 de bilong mun Oktoba.
Bai ol i holim sampela moa toktok wantaim gavman long Mande, tasol Mr Waiwori i tok olsem, sapos ol ino hamamas long toktok bilong ol wantaim gavman, orait ol bai inap tokim ol wokmanmeri bilong gavman insait long ol narapela provins long joinim straik oa holim stop-wok tu.
Ol lain i laikim Indipendens bilong West Papua i tok, bai oli go het wantaim indipendens selebresan long mun bihain.
Dispela toksave i kamap liklik taim bihain long Indonesia gavman i tok em bai lukim wanem kain ol selebresan long namba-wan de bilong Disemba olsem pasin bilong bikhet agensim gavman.
Presidium bilong Papua Council, em lain i go pas long ol askim bilong indipendens i go pas long en, i tok ol pipal bilong em bai makim dispela de long mun bihain.
Lida bilong dispela lain, Theys Eluay i tok, Gavman bilong Indonesia i traim long halivim tingting bilong em long salim ol soldia igo long rijen, bihainim toktok bilong em olsem, ol lain i laikim indipendens bai tokaut ken long indipendens bilong ol.
Em i tok, gavman bilong Indonesia i giaman tasol bilong soim olsem, em ino save long histori, taim em i ino luksave olsem West Papuans ibin lukautim ol iet long 1961.
Australia Consumer Association, i tok ol pipal i save baem ol kaikai samting long ol stoa i laik lukim niupela loa blong ol karamap blong ol kaikai samting.
Australia na New Zealand Health Minista i vot pinis long statim wanpela loa blong ol kaikai.
Ol label oa karamap blong kaikai bai karim toktok long wanem kain ingredients oa wanem ol kain samting i stap long dispela karamap kaikai, em i nap long kamapim heve long helt blong sampela pipal olsem long staturated fats oa bikpela gris na suga tumas.

Deputi Praim Minista bilong Iraq Tariq Aziz i go kamap pinis long kapital bilong China, Beijing.
Bikpela Xinhua niusagensi i tok, Mr Aziz em i wanpela ofisal gest bilong China gavman, tasol em ino bin givimaut moa toktok long dispela wokabaut bilong em.
Ol saveman i tok, ating em i wok long traim long kisim sampela sapot ikam long ol ovasis kantri na grup long pinisim ol wok-tambu bilong United Nations em ol ibin putim long Iraq bihain long em pait igo insait long Kuwait long 1990.
Mr Aziz bai go bek long Russia long toktok long ol wok Russia i mekim bilong pinisim ol dispela tambu, pastaim long em i go bek long Iraq.
New Zealand i No isi liklik long krosim Fiji.
Despela i bin kamap klia long taim em i sapotim strongpela toktok High Commissioner blongen i bin sutim agensim interim Gavman long Suva na tu, em i sukruim ken tambu long ol pilai wantaem Fiji.
New Zealand High Commissioner long Fiji, Tia Barrett, i tok samting pipal bai i kirap nongut longen em long ol Fiji pipal i bin planim despela coup ino kamap yet long ai blong kot.
Em i tok tu olsem bikpela samting tru em ino stret long wari longen em long em i nogat democratic system long Fiji long go longen na autim tingting na laik blong pipal long wanem samting oli laikim.
Phil Goff, i tok em i sapotim strong Mr.
George Speight tasol i bin wokim plan long coup em i bin kamap.
Long dispela taim New Zealand i tok em bai skruim tambu long ol pilai wantaem Fiji igo long yiar bihaen.
Palimen blong Northern Marianas ibin tok orait long wanpela tingting blong askim Treasuri dipatmen blong America long bekim dinau moni blong en inap long 3-million-na 2-hundret-tausen dolla.
Dispela dinau ibin kamap taim oli bin wokim wanpela hul wara long Tinian ailan long Northern Marianas yet long 1990 na 1997.
Palimen ibin painim heve long baget moni blong em olsem na emi askim America long halivim em.
Dispela tok orait tu ibin painim olsem ol pipol blong island ibin givim ples blong ol igo long America long iusim olsem ples blong putim ol war samting blong em long taim blong namba tu bikpela pait, oa second wold war.
Treasuri depatmen blong America ibin kamapim tingting olsem namba wan de blong mun Septemba olsem emi de oli mas stretim dispela dinau moni na ikam inap nau oli no bin bekim dispela dinau yet.
Olsem na dipatmen igat rait long kotim ol.
Tasol ol loya blong island ibin tok, wanem kain tingting blong bringim ol igo long kot, bai bagarapim tru ekonomi blong dispela ailan.
Ol sekuriti fos blong Philippines i stap redi nau, pastaim long bikpela protes bai kamap long olgeta hap blong kantri, blong soim koros igo long President Joseph Estrada.
Oli kotim pinis Estrada na em bai go long kot long mun bihain bihain ol toktok oli sutim long em olsem, em ibin stap insait long ol korapsen pasin.
Manila long lukautim ron blong ol kar na trak na tu blong arrestim ol pipol ilaik kamapim trabel.
Komanda blong Manila city polis, ibin tok ol samting i kamap orait tede, i tru sevenpela ol universiti em oli stap klostu long ples blong President, ibin pasim ol skul blong ol olsem blong abrusim ol trabel, sapos oli kamap.
Ol sinia oa bikpela helt wokman na meri blong Solomon Island klostu bai bung long biktaun Honiara, blong stap insait long wanpela national Helt Konfrens em bai igo inap long wanpela wik.
Man igo pas long rereim konfrens, George Clay, ibin tok dispela konfrens bai lukluk long ol samting na ol heve Helt Dipatmen na Medical Sevis iwok long bungim nau, na tu lukluk long wanem kain rot oli mas bihainim long stretim ol.
Solomon Island Broadcasting Commission ibin tok, ol arapela samting ol bai toktok long en em long wei blong karim gut ol nesanal helt sevis igo long pipal, na tu dispela wari we ol haus sik long ol provins i sot nogut tru.
Clay i tok ol arapela samting olsem long ol helt long ol provins em oli laik bruk lusim Solomon Islands tu bai oli toktok long en long dispela konfrens.
Ami bilong Israel ibin tokaut olsem wanpela soldia ibin dai na narapela tupela ibin kisim bagarap taim sampela lain ibin bomim wanpela militeri patrol arere long rot, kolostu long boda wantaim Lebanon long Sande.
Israel ibin kisim na sidaun long ol nau.
Bihain long dispela bom-pairap, Israel ibin pei-bek na usim ol woa-balus bilong bomim na hamarim long peles long southern Lebanon.
Dispela em i nambawan taim ken Israel i kamapim pait long dispela hap, bihain long em ibin kisim bek ol soldia bilong en long dispela rijon long mun Mei.
Long Solomon Islands, wanpela long tupela man em oli ting i bin kukim opis bilong Malaita Eagle Force lida, i dai pinis bihain long oli bin arestim em.
Polis i tok oli bin arestim dispela tupela man long Auki, bik taun bilong Malaita Provins long wiken, na bihain oli karim tupela igo long Honiara we wanpela long tupela, husat i bin kisim bikpela bagarap, i bin dai.
Oli karim pinis bodi bilong en igo long mog long Honiara we ol bai putim long balus igo bek long Malaita.
Asistan Komisina bilong Polis Operesin, Wilfred Akao, i tok wok bilong painim na arestim ol lain i bin kukim haus i gohet gut, tasol em ino laik toktok moa long dai bilong dispela man.
Indonesia Foren Minista Alwi Shihab i wok long traim long kamapim bel isi wantem Singapore bihain long taim President Abdurrahman Wahid i bin sutim ol stongpela toktok agensim dispela kantri.
Mr Wahid i bin sutim tok long Singapore sinia minista Lee Kuan Yew olsem, em ino save laikim ol Malays na i save laik kisim tasol profit i kam long ol poro kantri bilong en.
President i bin stap long Singapore long Sarere bilong stap long longpela miting bilong Association of South East Asian Nations.
Em i tok em i bin belhat long Mr Lee long wanem em ino bin laikim tingting long bringim East Timor na Papua New Guinea igo insait long ASEAN, na tu em i bin belhat long Mr Lee long wanem em i bin tok, klostu nau na Mr Wahid kbai pinis long wok bilong president.
Indonesia Foren Minista Alwi Shihab ino laik bai dispela belhat bilong Mr Wahid i kamap bikpela samting tumas.
Em i tok wokbung namel long dispela tupela kantri, em tupela i stap klostu tru long wanpela narapela, i no nap bagarap bihainim dispela belhat Mr Wahid i bin sutim long Lew Kuan Yew.
Spika bilong Indonesia House of Representatives, Akbar Tanjung, i bin sutim tok long Wahid bihainim ol toktok em i sutim long Singapore bikman na i tok, bai gutpela sapos president ino bin tromoi ol dispela strongpela toktok long wanem Indonesia na Singapore i laikim wanpela narapela long wokbung.
Ol Indonesia provilsan otoriti i karim pinis sikispela East Timor pipal em oli bin sasim ol long kilim tripela U-N wokman long West Timor long mun Septemba, igo long Jakarta bilong sanap long kot.
Antara nius ajensi i tok oli bin putim ol dispela man long wanpela balus lusim Kupang taun long West Timor.
Ol ofisal bilong East Nusateng-gara provinsal polis na prosekuta ofis i bin wokabaut wantaim ol dispela man.
Antara nius i tok makim wanpela provinsal mausman long tok olsem, dispela sikispela man bai sanap long North Jakarta distrik kot, tasol em ino kolim de bilong kot.
Planti handret militia i bin karim ol taraipela naip na go burukim ofis bilong United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees long Atambua taun long mun Septemba, na oli kilim wanpela American sitijen, wanpela Croatia man na wanpela man bilong Ethiopia.
Wanpela bung-tingting bilong UN Security Council i bin tok, oli mas rausim gan bilong ol dispela militia na brukim ol grup bilong ol.
Em i bin tok tu olsem, oli mas arestim ol dispela man na putim ol long kot.
Wanpela kompensesen seremony i kamap pinis long polis het-kuata, long Honiara, kapital blong solomon Islands.
Dispela seremoni i bin kamap namel long ol lain i bin kamapim dai blong wanpela man oli ting i bin putim paia long wanpela buildain, long Fride blong wik igo pinis long Honiara.
Dispela man i bin dai taim em i bin stap long rum-gat long Rove prison, long Honiara.
Oli ting dispela man i bin statim paia long three-storey Placemakers building.
Assistant Police Commissioner, Wilfred Akao i tok, man hia i bin dai, i bin wanpela long ol pipal em ol kamanda blong joint paramilitary Malaita Eagle Force operation, i bringim ol ikam long Auki.
Taim oli bin stap long Rove Prison, wanpel grup blong ol man i bin brukim hap blong haus kalabus na go insait na sutim dispela man wantaim gan.
Dispela man i bin dai long hospital.
Mr Akao i tok, em ino nap long toktok moa long wanem samting ibin kamap long ol narapela oli bin bringim ol ikam long Auki, nogut em i kamapim moa bel-koros long en.
Nauru Darekta bilong Sport, Paul Coffa, i risain pinis long wok bilong em.
Bihain long sikispela yar long dispela wok, Mr Coffa nau bai kisimw ok olsem Eksekutif Darekta bilong 2001 World Weightlifting Championships em Nauru bai lukautim long mun Oktoba.
Mr Coffa i tok em bai gat planti wok tumas taim em i statim wok bilong em long lukautim sempionsip, bikpela wok we oli mas wokim wanpela nupela sports complex na athletes village.
Em i tok dispela wok bai noken larim em inap taim bilong ol narapela samting.
Wanpela maus-man blong tim, Tryuge Lund, i tok ol prais blong metal long wold maket, bai halivim tingting sapos wanpela mining projek aninit long solwara long Cook Islands iken igo het oa nogat.
Cook Islands Herald nius-pepa i tok makim Mr Lund long tok olsem, em i bilip namba-wan wok blong mine aninit long solwara bai kamap long Cook Islands.
Ol wok painim aut i soim olsem, Cook Islands igat planti manganese i stap aninit long solwara.
Dispela lain blong Norway bai bungim ol politikal na bisnis lida long painim aut tingting long dispela mining projek.
Ol public servant i bin go strike long wik igo pinis long wanpela koros long 16-dola danger allowance, em oli bin tok, oli mas kisim bihainim wanpela agrimen wantaim gavman.
Tasol, Prime Minister, Mannaseh Sogovare, i bin pasim long noken givim igo long ol, longwanem, em i tok, em ino bin stret long ol imas kisim dispela moni.
General Secretary blong Solomon Islands Public Employees Union, Clement Waiwori, i tok, ol wokman-meri i wok long bek long wok, tasol oli tokim em long imas toktok wantaim Gavman long dispela ol heve blong ol.
Mr Waiwori i tok, olketa lain i bin agrim olsem, oli mas holim toktok insait long narapela tripela dei blong stretim heve blong allowance moni, sapos nogat, ol public servant bai lusim ol wok blong ol ken long Fride.
America Vice President Al Gore i askim pipal blong America long sapotim em long kisim eleksan risalt blong Florida igo long kot.
Florida eleksan risalt i soim Republican Candideit George W Bush i winim despela State.
Bush i stat long redi long kisim wok olsem niupela President blong America, Mr.
Gore i bin kamap long nesanal televissan we em i bin askim long oli mas wokim gut ken wok long kandim gut olgeta vot blong President long Florida State.
WEST PAPUA HUMAN RAIT HETMAN I WARI!
Hetman bilong West Papua Institute for Human Rights i wok long tok lukaut olsem, ating trabal bai kamap sapos indipendens muvmen i makim anivesari bilong 1961 declaration of independence.
John Lumbiak i tok olsem, spesal Indonesian Armed Forces i givim pinis ol samting bilong pait long sampela stronghet indipendens paitman.
Em i tok dispela stronghet grup i stap samting olsem 50 kilomita longwe long Jayapura na klostu long boda wantem Papua New Guinea.
Mr Rumbiak i tok dispela grup i laikim indipendens hariap na ino laikim tumas tingting bilong Presidium Council husat i laik go isi isi moa bilong kisim indipendens.
Na em i tok, dispela grup i redi long pait wantem Indonesia sekuriti fos bilong pulim tingting bilong intanesanal komuniti.
Em i sutim tok long Indonesia militari olsem, em i wok long halvim dispela grup olsem bai trabal i kamap na oli ken putim martial law - oa militari i ken kam in na usim bikpela pawa bilong lukautim ples.
Peace Monitoring Kaunsel long Solomon Islands i tok, em i nogat pepa blong soim olsem, ol tupela rebel grup i bin givim bek ol gan oli bin usim long pait namel long ol.
Insait long Peace Agrimen oli bin sainim long Townsville long sikipela wik igo pinis, oli bin tok oraet long givim bek ol dispela gan.
Kaunsil i tok, ating ol rebel blong Malaita Eagle Force na Isatabu Freedom Movement blong Guadalcanal i givim bek pinis sampela long ol gan long ol kamanda blong ol, Kaunsil ino gat record oa pepa blong soim olsem oli bin mekim tru dispela.
Tasol, wanpela mausman blong I-F-M, Henry Tobani i tok, ol olpela militant long East Guadalcanal bai givim bek ol gan igo long han blong International Peace Monitors insait long wanpela seremoni bai oli holim tumora.
Em i tok tu olsem, ol militant long west Guadalcanal bai givim bek ol gan igo long Peace Monitors long wik bihain.
25 krismas blong kantri taim emi bin tokaut long independent.
Portugal ibin igo aut lusim dispela territori.
Indonesia ibin lukautim East Timor inap taim ol pipol blong en ibin vout na soim bikpela laik blong ol l ong independent long las-yar--long dispela referendum em United Nations ibin rereim.
Presiden bilong Fiji, Ratu Josefa Iloilo, i bin askim ol loia long givim em sampela edvais, bihain long sampela lain ibin askim em long rausim tripela sinia jas bilong Hai Kot.
Insait long wanpela pas oli salim igo long President, ol lain bilong human rait i bin askim long rausim ol dispela jas.
Solisita Jeneral, Nainendra Nand i tok, i tru olsem ol i wok long lukluk long dispela askim bilong Presiden long givim em edvais, tasol em ino bin laik givimaut moa toktok long en.
Reverend Akuila Yabaki, i bin komplen long wei ol dispela jas ibin mekim wok bilong ol, we ol ibin pasim palamen na long edvais bilong ol long ol i mas soim marimari long ol rebel ibin kamapim ku long kantri.
Na ol Indonesia provilsan otoriti i karim pinis sikispela East Timor pipal em oli bin sasim ol long kilim tripela U-N wokman long West Timor long mun Septemba, igo long Jakarta bilong sanap long kot.

Polis bilong Indonesia i arestim pinis foapela memba bilong West Papuan Praesidium.
Oli arestim na sasim sekretri jeneral Toha Mohammed Al Hamid, long wokim ol kriminal pasin bilong bagarapim kantri.
Ol tripela narapela oli arestim em long President bilong kaunsel, Chief Theys Eluay, John Mambor na Don Flassy.
Tingting bilong Indonesia polis long arestim ol dispela pipal, i kamap tupela de tasol pastaim long taim oli makim anivesari bilong indipendens declaration em ol traditional chiefs i bin mekim 39 yar i go pinis.
Clemens Runaweri, mausman bilong Praesidium, i tok dispela pasin bilong polis long arestim ol dispela bikman bilong Presidium, i wanpela pasin tasol bilong mekim ol West Papuan i koros na kamapim trabal.
Em i tok Indonesia i poret na i laik bagarapim ol selebresin bilong makim indipendens anivesari.
Palimen blong Israel i stat long toktok long wanpela bill na askim long pasim dispela 120-seat blong palimen na holim kuik elekesen.
Sikipela-ten wan memba blong palimen imas tok orait long ol na oli mas toktok long ol long tupela taim, pastaim long oli ken kamap loa.
Igat tok lukaut igo aut pinis long ol kantri blong Melanesia olsem oli nap bungim ol bikpela raun win oa saiklon long dispela taim Ol saveman oa scientist long National Institute blong Water na Atmospheric Research long New Zealand ibin tok ol kantri namel long Papua New Guinea na New Caledonia bai inap kisim bikpela bagarap tru.

Indonesia gavman na ol rebel bilong Aceh Provins em oli laik bruk lusim kantri, i wanbel pinis long statim ken ol toktok bilong kamapim peace oa gutpela sindaun.
Ol toktok bai gohet long Europe long mun bihain.
Foren Minista bilong Indonesia, Alwi Shihab, i tok gavman i bin tokaut long laik bilong en long toktok wantaim ol Aceh rebel em oli makim Free Aceh Movement insait long ol narapela kamtri, long namba-3 na namba-4 de bilong mun Disemba.
Long mun Jun oli bin statim wanpela truce oa tok-orait bilong noken pait pastaim inap long tripela mun, na maski dispela tok-orait ino bin pasim ol trabal tru long dispela strong Muslim provins, oli bin sukuruim igo long narapela tripela mun ken stat long Septemba.
Maski dispela truce i stap, Indonesia gavman na GAM i bin stap strong yet long wanem samting oli laikim.
GAM i strong yet long nambawan bikpela samting tru em i laikim - dispela em long indipendens bilong Aceh provins we i gat planti kain risoses.
Indonesia gavman i tok em bai noken harim tok long indipendens bilong Aceh, we GAM i bin wok long pait stat long 1970s yet.
Gavman i promis tasol long givim ol otonomi -- rait bilong lukautim ol yet tasol oli mas stap hap yet bilong Indonesia.
Namba bilong ol pipol ibin idai long ol haiwara na graunbruk long Sumatra ailan bilong Indonesia, nau igo antap long wan-handred.
60) pipol, em planti long ol ibin idai bihain long graun i bruk na ikam karamapim ol.
34) ol narapela pipal i lus yet insait long West Sumatra provins em bungim bikpela heve tru.
Insait long Aceh long North bilong Sumatra, we haiwara bihainim bikpela ren iwok long igo daun nau, oli painim bodi bilong wanpela-ten-faiv pipol.
13) ol narapela i lus yet, na insait long Jambi provins ol ibin painim bodi bilong tupela pipol na wanpela i lus yet.
Wanpela bikpela samting ibin kamap insait long pis-wok long Solomon Islands, we nambawan lain bilong ol pait-grup ibin givim-bek ol samting bilong pait.
Ol ovasis pis monita ibin wok long lukluk-istap taim ol dispela paitman ibin givim-bek ol dispela samting bilong pait, insait long Riko Distrik bilong Guadalcanal em Isatabu Freedom Movement ibin kontrolim, stat long taim pait ibin kamap namel long pipol bilong Guadalcanal na Malaita.
Mr Merrifield i tok, ol i wok long plen long wokim moa seremoni bilong givim-bek ol samting bilong pait insait long ol dispela dei ikam.
Bai ol i putim ol dispela gan na samting bilong pait ol i kisim long ol paitman insait long ol strongpela bokis.
Ol ibin salim pinis sampela long ol dispela bokis igat samting bilong pait igo pastaim long sampela peles ol ibin makim long Guadalcanal na Malaita.
25 bilong Australia na 14 bilong New Zealand.
Polis Komisina bilong Solomon Islands, Morton Siriheti, i tok, em ino tru olsem polis ibin kilim wanpela man long Rove Prison oa kalabus long Sande.
Sampela olpela memba bilong Malaita Eagle Force ibin holim-pasim dispela tupela man long Auki na salim ol igo long Honiara, we ol ibin kisim tupela igo long Rove Prison.
Mr Sirheti i tok, i tru olsem polis bai inap askim long ol i bringim ol pipol em ol i ting ibin wokim ol rong, igo long polis.
Tasol, dispela tupela saspek bilong faia long Honiara ino bin stap long han bilong polis oa long rumgad bilong polis.
Em i tok, sampela man ibin wokabaut igo insait long Rove Prison na ol ibin sutim na kilim dispela man.
Qantas, bai peim 9-Billion Dola insait long dispela tenpela yar bihain long kisim 31 nupela balus.
Qantas bai baim planti long ol dispela balus ikam long Airbus Industries bilong France.
Qantas i wok long usim ol nau, na ol i ting olsem nambawan long ol dispela nupela balus bai stat wok long yar-2002.
Samting olsem 8-pela pipol ibin dai long southern Philipines, taim ol gavman soldia ibin pait wantaim wanpela lain man ibin karamapim pes bilong ol na ibin kidnepim meri bilong wanpela bisnisman.
Zamboanga del Sur Provins na ibin pulim em igo insait long wanpela spid-bot, em dispela geng ibin usim bilong ronawei igo long wanpela ailan.
Dispela geng ibin sut-nabaut long gan long ol viles pipol taim ol ibin ronawei igo long ol bot, na ol ibin kilim wanpela militia-paitman na tripela sivilien.
Ol polis na soldia ibin ronim ol dispela geng memba, na ol ibin kilim foapela long ol long solwara na kisim-bek tupela long ol spid-bot bilong ol.
Ol narapela geng-memba--husat i holim-pasim Mrs Tiu--ibin ronawei long tudak na kisim em igo wantaim ol.
Hetman bilong United Nations insait long East Timor itok, dispela teritori iken kamap indpendent long yar bihain, tasol em bai laikim yet halvim bilong United Nations na halvim moni bihain.
Sergio Vieira de Mello itok, bihain long United Nation ibin igo insait na lukautim dispela teritori, bihain long ol milisa isave sapotim Indonesia ibin bagarapim olgeta samting 12-pela mun igo pinis, ol samting ibin wok long kamap gut na rere long kisim indpendens.
Em ibin tokim wanpela bung bilong United Nations Security Council olsem, i luk olsem ol bai holim wanpela jeneral eleksan ating sampela taim namel long yar bihain, bilong makim wanpela esembli bilong raitim kamap wanpela nupela mama lo.
Veieira de Mello itok, wanpela trensisanel kebinet ol ibin girapim long mun Julai bai stat raitim ol loa bilong putim nem bilong ol politikal pati long rejista buk dispela wik oa long wik bihain.
Em itok, UNTAET oa United Nations Transitional Authority bilong East Timor iken inap long givim pawa igo long wanpela gavman em pipal yet bai elektim yar 2001.
Friday emi annivesari, em de oli bin tokaut long Independent long 1961.
Wanpela taim ken, Australia i askim long ol i stap bel isi insait long West Papua.
Gavman lida long Senate, Robert Hill, ibin tokim Palamen olsem, olgeta grup i mas yusim ol gutpela wei bilong toktok na stretim ol heve bilong ol.
Foran Afeas Dipatmen i givim aut toksave long ol pipal bilong Australia long holim bek trip bilong ol igo long Irian Jaya igo nap oli kisim moa toksave long en.
Australia i tok, em i mekim ol laspela wok bilong nupela halivim oa Aid wantaim Indonesia.
Indonesia i mas wok bung long dispela tripela yar Aid Program long em i kamap gut.
Dispela progrem bai wok long halivim ol salens bilong politik na ekonomi bilong Indonesia.
Em bai lukluk gut long wok bilong gavman na halivim ol pipal long komiuniti husat i laikim halivim long sidaun bilong ol.
Downer i tok, dispela Aid Program bai i kamap na wok gut tru sapos i gat gutpela na strongpela sapot ikam long Indonesia.
Dispela em i rot bilong kamapim wanpela wokbung wantaim na rispek long wanpela narapela.

Union i tok, Australia i ken givim ol soldia ol taraipela samting bilong pait olsem Termninator Two, tasol sapos ol kako sip ino sapotim ol dispela soldia long kaikai, ol bai dai pastaim long oli ken sutim birua bilong ol.
Ekting Nesanal Sekretri bilong Union, Paddy Crumlin, i tok America i save gat strongpela bilip long ol wok blong ol bikpela kako sip na ol boskru blong en, tasol gavaman blong John Howard i wok long haitim het blong em long wesan na ino laik luksave long wok blong ol.
Kos blong kamapim wok blong ol sip raun long nambis blong Australia inap long 40-milian dola.
Emi tok, oli nap rereim 40-bilian dola blong difens, tasol oli nonap painim 40-milian dola blong ol kako sip.
Crumlin i tok dispela emi rabis wok politik tru em bai noken halvim pipal.
Em i tok sapos oli gat bikpela tingting long strongim difens, oli mas tingting strong tu long Australian shipping.
Insait long nius bilong pilai soka.
Anda 17 tim bilong Australia ibin kikim 30 oa tripela-ten gol taim ol ibin wilwilim Amerikan Samoa insait long wanpela kulaifaim gem bilong Wol Kap insait long Samoa.
Tim bilong Amerikan Samoa ino bin kikim wanpela gol.
Terry Smith ibin kikim eitpela gol bilong Joeys bilong Australia.
Dispela sko ken.
Australia 30 gol na Amerikan Samoa, Nil.
Ol toktok namel long ol minista bilong Australia na Indonesia, em ol ibin pasim bipo, bai kamap insait long Canberra tete.
Niusman Graeme Dobell i ripot olsem Australia i wok long wet yet long lukim hamas minista bilong Indonesia bai stap long dispela miting long Palamen Haus.
Ol koros na tingting-nogut namel long tupela kantri ibin mekim Indonesia i pasim ol dispela toktok long mun Oktoba.
Indonesia bai stap long dispela miting.
Wanpela guria, strong blong en namel long 6.
Richter Scale, i bin kamap ken long Papua New Guinea, tasol i nogat ripot yet sapos ol samting na pipol i kisim bagarap long en.
Geological Survey Organisation bilong Australia it ok, depsela guria i bin kamap samting olsem 70 kilomita long not-is bilong Rabaul long East New Britain Provins.
A-F-P nius ajensi i tok makim ol ofisal long Rabual long tok olsem, oli kisim sampela ripot long graun i bruk.
Long mun igo pinis, tripela bikpela guria i bin kamap long despela hap yet.
Wanpela seismologist i tok, despela guria nau tasol i liklik tumas, olsem na bai oli noken givim tok lukaut long pipol long lukaut long tsunami oa tidal wave.
Jastis Minista biong Australia, Amanda Vanstone, i tok em i hamamas long Australia polis long wanem em i mekim gutpela wok bilong painim aut na rasuim ol drag ikam long ol narapela kantri.
Polis bilong Holland i bin painim aut wanpela hait bisnis bilong salim ol drag na rausim planti ol amphetimine, cannabis na planti kes moni.
Oli bilip olsem planti long ol despela drag ol i bin laik salim igo long Belgium, Australia na Britain.
Senator Vanstone i tok oli givim aut pinis sampela warant oa long ol polis long painim aut ol hait bisnis long drag.
Em i tok ol hait samting Australia polis i bin bungim i bikpela samting long halavim polis bilong Holland long pasim despela hait pasin bilong salim drag na moni igo-kam.
New Zealand Foren Minista i tok New Caledonia i abrusim pinis ol ol heve na trabal em i wok long gohet nau long sampela narapela Pacific ailan kantri.
Mr Goff i go pas long wanpela deligesin em i gat 14 memba long en, em i raun nau long Pacific bilong luksave long ol samting i wok long kamap.
Em i tok bikpela astingting bilong dispela raun bilong grup bilong em, em long strongim ol wokbung namel long New Zealand na New caledonia.
Bihain long em i bin bungim ol kain heve na trabal long 1980s, ol lain i laikim indipendens na ol lain ino laikim indipendens, i bin sainim pinis wanpela agrimen oli kolim Matignon Accords wantem French Gavman.
Dispela Matignon Accords i bin rereim rot bilong bikpela otonomi.
New Zealand deligesin nau i raun long Vanuatu, Tonga na Niue.
Praim Minista blong New Zealand, Helen Clark, ino wanbel wantem wari blong Australia long wei New Zealand gavaman i ronim difens blong en, na i tok em ino laikim narapela kantri long tokim em long wanem samting em i mas mekim.
Ms Clark i tok i gat sampela lain yet i stap long New Zealand em i save laikim tok yesa tasol long Australia.
Emi tok Australia na New Zealand tupela independent kantri, na ino olsem wokbung bilong tupela i olsem namel long liklik brata na bikpela brata.
Canberra dispela wik, i tok ol defens wok blong New Zealand i narakain tru long Australia long planti samting na sampela taim Australia i save kirap nogut long wanem samting New Zealand i nogat.
Dispela pepa blong Australia ibin tok olsem New Zealand i bilif em ino nidim ol gutpela efos na nevi.
Australia ino wanbel longdispela tingting na em bai sori sapos New Zealand ino tingting long em i mas igat yet sampela strongpela efos na nevi blong em.
Brisbane na Honiara, stat long Desemba 13 igo inap long Jenueri 17 long yar bihain.
Krismas na Niu Yar.
Mr Zoleveke i tok, dispela balus bai kirap-lusim Brisbane bilong go long Honiara long olgeta Trinde moning na kam bek long sem dei.
Em i tok olsem, i tru dispela ron bilong balus ino kamap long gutpela dei long wik, tasol dispela em i wanpela dei tasol we Qantas iken halivim Solomon Airlines long en wantaim ron bilong balus.
Ol ofisel blong helt long Palau i bin toksave kwik long ol turis igo long kantri long noken wari, bihain long kamap blong sik dengue fever.
Bikpela helt ofisa blong Palau, Celeb Otto, i bin tok ol turis em oli go lukluk raun long Palau i noken wari long kisim dispela sik.
Palau i bin painim aut olsem 28 pipol i kisim dispela sik dengue fever em moskito i save kamapim stat yet long mun Julai.
Septemba na stat blong dispela mun, Dokta Otto i bin tok ol trabel blong dispela sik nau i luk olsem i wok long go daun.
Em i tok ol hotel na ol narapela kampani em oli save lukautim ol turis, i wok long wuas gut long noken larim ol natnat i karim dispela sik igo bikpela.
Ol sivel eviesin eksiden investigeta bilong France i tok, long pinis bilong dispela mun, bai ol i tokaut long risal bilong wok-painim bilong ol long wanpela helikopta ibin kres long wik igo pinis long New Caledonia na kilim sevenpela pipol.
Sif investigeta Nicolas Rallo i tok, dispela ripot i bihainim ol toktok na evidens em ol investigeta ibin kisim.
Dispela helikopta bilong maining kampani ibin kres long Novemba 28 long ol mauden long bikpela Noumea ailan.
Ol ibin salim wanpela bisnisman bilong Amerika igo long kalabus inap long 20 yar bihain long wanpela kot bilong Russia ibin painim olsem em ibin mekim ol spai-wok.
Loya bilong Edmond Pope i tok, Pope ibin save em bai go long kalabus na i redi long dai long wanpela kalabus kemp long Siberia.
Gavaman blong Solomon Island i hamamas long ol nupela tingting insait long tred agrimen bilong Spearhead Group, we em bai lukim ol samting igo insait nating na nogat takis, na tu we em bai salim ol samting igo long narapela Melanesian kantri na i nogat takis.
Dispela i bin bihainim wanpela miting blong ol tred ofisel ikam long foapela Melanesian Spearhead Group, olsem long Papua New Guinea, Fiji, Vanuatu na Solomon Islands long Port Moresby.
Hetman blong delegaisen blong Solomon Islands, Heinz Vaekesa, i bin tok dispela tingting i blong larim ol samting ol MSG memba kantri i kamapim iken ikam insait nating na nogat takis long ol.
Ol ofisel i bin tok orait olsem Papua New Guinea na Fiji bai stat bihainim dispela sistem long yar 2003, na Vanuatu na Fiji bai stat bihainim em long yar 2005.
TOKTOK NAMEL LONG AUSTRALIA NA INDONESIA I GOHET LONG CANBERRA.
Ol miting i wok long gohet nau long Canberra namel long Australia na Indonesia.
Insait long ol dispela miting, Australia i wok long tokaut klia long ol bikpela na nambwan samting tupela kantri i gat oa i wok wantem long ol.
Faifpela Gavman Minista bilong Indonesia nau i stap long Australia Paliment Haus insai tlong miting oli kolim, Ministerial Forum, em oli no bin nap long gohet long ol tripela taim bipo long wanem sampela heve i save kamap namel long tupela kantri.
Pastaim long miting, Australia Foren Minista, Alexander Downer, i bin tokim Paliment olsem, oli mas traim na stretim ol belheve wantem Indonesia em trabal long East Timor i bin kamapim.
Em i tok Australia i gat ol wankain wari long sekuriti na divelopmen wok wantem Indonesia insait long dispela rijen.
Territorial integrity oa rait bilong Indonesia long stap olsem wanpela kantri em yet, wantaim ol teritori bilong em, em Australia i respekt na sapotim - sanap strong bilong en na respekt long rait bilong pipal bilong en - em i bikpela samting insait long wokbung namel long tupela kantri.
Mr Downer i tok Australia i laik kirapim wanpela nupela difens wokbung wantem Indonesia, bilong larim tupela kantri i wokbung long ol sekuriti bilong rijen.
Em i tok wokabaut bilong Indonesia ikam long democracy bai min wokbung namel long tupela kantri bai kamap gut na i stap long longpela taim bihain nau winim taim bipo.
Australia Foren Minista i tok insait long dispela yar igo pinis, ol tred wok namel long tupela kantri i bin go antap long 8-pesen na moni oli gat insait long dispela tred wokbung i napims 5-point-3 bilian dola.
FRAIDE DISPELA WIK BAI KAMAP WANPELA BIKPELA DE LONG SOLOMONS PEACE.
Fraide dispela wik ating bai nap kamap wanpela bikpela de tru long peace process bilong Solomon Islands.
Niusman Sean Dorney i ripot olsem, ol komanda bilong militia grup em i bin tekova long ol wok bilong lukautim Honiara faifpela mun igo pinis - em long Malaita Eagle Force - oli wok long hope ol bai bungim wantaim gan bilong ol sapota, bihainim tok orait bilong givim bek ol samting bilong pait.
Komiti bilong M-E-F oli kolim, Demilitarisation Committee, i askim pinis ol wanwan memba bilong en em oli holim yet ol gan, long givim ol dispela gan bek long ol komanda tumora.
Bai oli bungim wantaim ol dispela gan long armoury oa ples bilong ol samting bilong pait long polis hetkuota long Rove, klostu long Honiara, redi bilong karim igo long Auki, biktaun bilong Malaita Provins.
Aninit long tok orait oli bin sainim long Townsville, oli kolim, Townsville Peace Agreement, International Peace Monitoring tim bai mas inspektim ol dispela samting bilong pait pastaim long oli putim insait long ol containers oa ol taraipela bokis na karim igo long Auki.
Taim oli bin makim bilong ol militia i givim bek ol gan, oli bin surukim ken wan wik igo pinis na bai pinis olgeta nau long Tunde.
Siaman bilong Peace Monitoring, Sir Peter Kenilorea, i askim ol man husat i wok long holim gan yet long usim dispela taim namel long nau na Tunde, long givim ol bek.
Em i tok komuniti i stat wari long wanem planti man em oli go dring na spak i wok long holim yet ol gan.
Vietnam ibin tokim Amerika long wuas long ol kondrak wokmanmeri bilong Vietnam insait long Amerikan Samoa.
Long pinis bilong mun igo pinis, elevenpela Vietnam kondrak wokmanmeri ibin pait wantaim ol lokal wokmanmeri long wanpela kolos fektori em wanpela kampani bilong Korea i papa long en.
Wanpela meri bilong Vietnam, krismas bilong em 21 yar, ibin lusim wanpela aie bilong em insait long dispela pait.
Sampela wokmanmeri bilong Vietnam ibin sutim tok long papa bilong dispela kampani long statim dispela pait, taim em ibin larim ol lokal wokmanmeri bilong em long paitim ol bihain long ol ibin igat belheve wantaim kampani.
Le Van Bang, long wok wwantaim Stet Dipatmen na Labour Dipatmen bilong Amerika long lukim olsem ol i wuas long rait bilong ol dispela wokmanmeri na lukim olsem ol i sef.
Vietnam ibin salim wanpela delegesin tu long painimaut wanem samting ibin kamap.
Long dispela taim, igat 246 kondrak wokmanmeri bilong Vietnam i save wok long dispela fektori em wanpela kampani bilong Korea i papa long en.
Insait long West Papua, samting olsem tripela pipol dai pinis long ol pait ikam long lain i laikim independen, taim oli kirapim pait long wanpela polis stesin.
Mark Bowling i ripot olsem dispela pait ibin kamap klostu long biktaun Jayapura, em ol skul-sumatin yet ibin mekim taim oli iusim ol samting blong pait blong ples.
15-kilomita longwe long Jayapura.
Ol sumatin i blong Womena, wanpela taun istap long hailens blong provins.
Polis i tok oli bin putim paia pastaim long tupela stua na bihain igo insait long polis stesin na brukim hed blong wanpela ofisa wantaim tamiok.
Pait blong ol ibin kamap wanpela wik bihain long polis ibin askim olsem oli mas pulim daun olgeta independent flag blong ol long olgeta hap blong provins.
Dispela tingting ibin mekim ol lain igat bikpela tingting long independens i koros tru.
Oli arestim pinis wan-handret pipol em oli ting istap insait long dispela pait.
INDONESIA-AUSTRALIA MITING I TRAIM KAMAPIM GUT WOKBUNG.
Australia na Indonesia i pinis nau ministirial miting bilong tupela long Canberra.
Long dispela miting, tupela kantri i bin tok orait long tingting bilong kirapim wanpela nupela grup em bai oli kolim long, Western Pacific Forum.
Niusman Graeme Dobell i ripot olsem, tupela kantri i bin tok dispela miting, em i bin kisim tupela de, i bin wanpela gutpela samting tru bilong kamapim gut wokbung bilong tupela.
Indonesia i tok dispela grup Western Pacific Forum, bai bringim em yet long sanap bung wantem Australia, East Timor, Papua New Guinea, New Zealand na Philippines.
Foren Minista bilong Indonesia, Alwi Shihab, i laik lukautim nambawan miting bilong dispela nupela forum bilong sikispela kantri.
Em i tok grup ia ino bilong kamapim tasol moni oa stretim politik, nogat.
Tasol em bai makim tu kalsa na sosal wokbung bilong ol dispela kantri.
Foren Minista bilong Australia, Alexander Downer, i bin endorse oa halvim aidia bilong Indonesia long kirapim Western Pacific Forum.
Mr Downer i bin tok insait long nambawan tri mun bilong yar bihain, em bai gutpela sapos oli suwim dispela aidia i gohet moa, long wanem em i wanpela constructive oa gutprla aidia bilong kirapim gutpela wokbung.
AUSTRALIA BAI APIM WOK BLONG PIS-KEEPING LONG SOLOMONS.
Australia Praim Minista, John Howard, i soim tingting pinis olsem, Australia bai mekim peace-keeping wok blong en long Solomon Islands, igo bikpela moa.
Mr Howard i tok, em i bin wanpela long ol samting Gavman i bin tingting long en taim em i bin wokim kamap Defence White Paper blong em.
Em i tok, em i wanpela tu long ol as-tingting long strongim wok blong ami.
Tasol em i tok, em ino lukim Australia olsem wanpela polisman blong rijon.
President blong Philippine, Joseph Estrada, ino laik toktok long ol strongpela toktok oli sutim long em taim em i kamap long kot long namba wan de, blong bekim ol sas long korapsen.
Taim oli bin askim em long nupela evidens agensim em, Mr Eastrada i bin tokim ol niusman olsem, em bai larim ol loia blong em i toktok.
Proseksan i bin kolim Estrada stilman, na bos blong ol stil-man long Fode, long stat blong kot keis blong em.
Sapos kot i painim em i rong, bai oli rausim em long wok blong em.
Oli sutim tok long em tu long igat wanpela hait bank akaunt blong haitim moni blong em long en.
Environment lobby group, Greenpeace i tok welkam long tingting long refomim despela Nuclear Free Tasman Flotilla, faivpela yiar bihaen long ol campeign blongen agensim ol French Atomic Test long Mururoa Atoll.
Greenpeace i tok em bai i givim sip blongen, TIAMA igo long protest long kain long mekim dispela Australia-Pacific region i kamap nuclear region.
Em i tok gutpela example long despela em long ol sip i wok long karim plutonium fuel i kam long Europe blong go long Japoan, i save ron igo insaet stret long ol Exclusive Economic Zones blong sampela Pasifik ailn kantri.
OL PIKININI BILONG SOLOMONS BAI NOKEN KISIM TOI GAN PRESENTNogat pikinini bilong Solomon Islands bai kisim wanpela toi-gan present dispela Krismas.
Niusman Sean Dorney i ripot olsem, aninit long Townsville Peace Agreement, em i holim bek ol pait namel long tupela militia grup long kantri, Paliment long Honiara i bin oraitim wanpela loa em i tambu long salim ol kain kain toi-gan.
Dispela loa, oli kolim Firearms and Ammunition Amentment Bill i tambu long wokim, salim, bringim, holim na usim ol toi-gan long olgeta hap bilong Solomons.
Solomon Islands Polis Minista, William Haomae, i bin tokim Paliment olsem, dispela loa i tambu long ol air guns, air rifles, air pistols na ol toi.
Em i tok olsem long taim bilong crisis oa pait, sampela yut i bin usim ol dispela toi-gan bilong mekim pipal i poret na bihain oli wokim ol kriminal pasin.
Dorney i tok, wok bilong bungim na rausim ol gan stret, narapela samting em Townsville Peace Agreement i toktok long en, nau i kamap orait liklik.
Andrew Nori, mausman bilong Malaita Eagle Force i tok, 90-pesent long ol samting bilong pait em ol M-E-F militant i bin holim, nau oli givim pinis igo long ol komanda oa igo bek long polis.
Taim oli givim long ol militan long givim bek ol gan bai pinis long wik bihain.
International Peace Monitoring Team em Australia i go pas long en, i wok long wuas long dispela wok bilong kisim bek ol gan.
Gavman blong New Zealand i tingting long stat long larim tasol 200 pipal blong Tonga, igo insait long kantri long wan wan yar.
Dispela tingting, em Foren Minista blong New Zealand Phil Goff i bin tokaut long en, bai mekim Tonga i wankain olsem Cook Islands, Niue na Tokolau, we pipal i fri long go insait long New Zealand, na Samoa, we oli putim mak long hamas Samoa pipal iken igo lukluk raun long New Zealand.
Mr Goff i tok, ino gat mak oli putim long namba blong pipal blong Tonga igo insait long kantri.
Igat 31-tausen ol pipal blong Tonga i stap pinis long New Zealand.
Nau yet, Mr Goff i tok, ating New Zealand bai mekim strongpela toktok long Indonesia, bihainim ol wosip blong en i bin bung klostu long West Papua, na dispela i kamapim poret olsem, bai oli usim ami blong pasim ol pro-indipendens lain.
Mr Goff i tok, New Zealand i wok long wuas gut long Indonesia.
Faivpela polis-man blong Indonesia wantaim tu wanpela bikman bipo blong polis long East Timor, ino laik bekim ol askim blong wanpela tim blong United Nations, long dispela politikal trabel long yiar igo pinis.
Dispela tim blong United Nations nau i stap long Jakarta blongtoktok wantaim dispela faivpela pipal, wantaim tu olpela provinsal polis bos Brigadier-General Timbul Silaen na 17 ol narapela pipal.
U-N i laik toktok wantaimol long dispela trabel na pasin blong kilim dai blong pipal, em ol militia i save sapotim Indonesia i bin mekim bipo na bihain long vot blong indipendens long 30 de blong mun Ogas.
United Nations i bin hope long stat askim ol dispela man olsem ol witnes aste long ofis blong Attorney General, tasol ino gat wanpela long ol i bin kamap.
Ol prosecutor blong East timor, husat i bin go long Jkarta blong stat long questionim ol suspect long ol pait em i bin kamap long yiar igo pinis, i wok long hope bai ol key suspect na witness husat ino bin kamap asde bai oli askim ol long ol samting, bai i kamap tede.
Ginny Stein i ripot olsem namel long ol pipal em oli no bin kamap asde, em long olpela bos blong polis long East Timor, na tripela senior polis ofisa husat i bin wok long security long taim pastaem long oli bin holim abllot blong independence.
Nem blong olpela bos blong polis long Timor, Timbul Silaen na Liquisa District chief, Adios Salova i stap long list olsem ol suspect.
Ofis blong Attorney General blong Indonesia, na publik bai i noken stap lukim.
Nainpela memba blong UN Transitional Authoreity long East Timor i bin go long Jakarta blong questonim ol witness na suspect.
Despela laen i questionim pinis moa long wan-handret-na-fity pipal long East Timor.
Bihaen long wei, na weit i nap long foapela hawa, asde, lida blong despelalaen, Oyvind Olsem i bin tok em bai i putim aut ken request igo long Attorney-General long em i ken questoinim yet ol witnes na suspect husat i wok long stap long Indonesia long dispela taim.
Oli bin pasim ol samting inap long wan minit long Pearl Habour neval beis long Hawaii tede, blong makim 59 krismas bihain long taim Siapan i bin bomim dispela ples.
The surprise attack on Pearl Harbor and other military bases, lasted two hours with the Japanese sinking or heavily damaging 21 ships, destroying or damaging 320 aircraft and killing 24-hundred people.
Pait Japan ibin kamapim long Pearl Habour na arapela ol militari beis, ibin igo inap long tupela aua, na long en Siapan ibin bagarapim tupela-ten-wan sip na mekim ol igo daun long solowara, bagarapim 320 wo-balus na kilim dai 2-tausen 4-hundret pipol.
Papua New Guinea Paliament igo malolo pinis inap long mun Julai long yar bihain.
Em i malolo bihain long em i bin pass oa oraitim Gavman bajet na wanpela reform bill -- oa wanpela loa bilong kamapim sampela senis long kain politik bilong kantri.
Niusman Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem, ating dispela loa bai pasim kain heve we ol memba i save kalap-kalap nambaut long ol pati na mekim gavman i save senis nambaut planti taim tu, na i save mekim wok bilong ronim kantri i hat.
P-N-G Oposisan na sampela gavman memba em oli bin bruk lusim gavman, oli bin traim long pasim dispela loa, na tu long blokim bajet.
Tasol Oposisan na dispela lain gavman memba i bin gat koros namel long ol yet ken, na bihain Oposisan i bin wanbel nau long sapotim loa.
Olsem nau na planti memba tru i bin vot halvim loa.
Planti pipal i hamamas long lukim dispela loa i kamap na oli tok, em i makim stat bilong nupela kain politik long Papua New Guinea em bai halvim stability long gavman -- oa bai halvim gavman long noken bruk bruk na seksek nambaut.
Tasol Paliment nau i malolo inap long sikispela mun, bilong abrusim narapela pasin long PNG politik em dispela nupela loa bai noken pasim -- na dispela em long no-confidence votes -- oa vot-nogat-bilip em planti i save usim bilong pulim pawa bilong ronim gavman.
Paliment bai statim ol miting bilong en ken long mun Julai, tasol oli nap singautim em bek long sidaun bilong oraitim wanem kain agrimen i kamap long bihain-taim bilong Bougainville.
Polis long West Papua, i bin sut long gan igo antap long West Papua, province blong Indonesia, we ol trabal i wok long kamap, tu oli bin holim kalabus sampela sumatin i nap long sampela hawa bihaen long ol separatist i bin usim ol bikpela bus naif, akis na bonara long kamapim pait igo long wanpela plis stesin.
Tupela polis ofisa na wanpela praivet security gad i bin indai, long ol despela pait autsaet long capital, Jayapura.
Bos blong polis long jayapura, i tok tripela long ol separatist i bin indai tu, taim polis i bin pait bek, wanpela long taim pait i bin kamap stret na tupela i bin dai long taim oli bin go painim ol.
John Rumbiak, husat igo pas long Institute for Human Rights Study and Advocacy long jayapura, i tok polis i bin reidim sampela dormitory klostu long university.
Em i tok oli bin sut long gan antap long kilaut, taim ol ofisa i bin brukim building blong go insaet.
Oli bin kisim klostu wan-handret Papua sumatn igo long sampela polis stesin blong toktok wantaem ol.
Lida blong Cook Islands Party, Sir Geoffrey Henry i tok em i wok long lukluk igo long wanem samting na oli bin rausim Speaer blong Cooks Parliament, Ngereteina Puna.
Sir geoffrey i bin tok longen olsem em bikpela wari, na em bai oli nap kisim igo long kot long givim ruling blongen longen.
Em i toktok long oli bin rausim speaker olsem em i kamapim bikpela heve oa nem nongut long mama-loa blong Cook islands.
Sir geoffrey i tok long mun August, Opposition i bin wanbel wantaem gavman long bung wantaem ol narapela long askim long wanpela sanis long mama-loa blong stretim despela heve, we em bai i mekim Speaker long em yet i putim resignatioon blongen.

AMERICA SUPRIM KOT BAI STRETIM TINGTING LONG VOT!
Suprim Kot bilong America i stat harim pinis ol kainkain tingting na toktok insait long wanpela kot kes em inap makim husat bai kamap president bilong kantri.
Ol loia bilong Republican George W Bush na bilong Democrat Al Gore, i wok long sakim tok bilong wanpela narapela sapos wok bilong kandim ol vot long han insait long Florida i stat ken oa nogat.
Nainpela memba bilong dispela bikpela kot tru bilong America i bin kam bung wantem na paitim toktok igo-kam inap long 90 minit.
Dispela em i nambatu taim Suprim Kot i bung insait long elevenpela de, bilong harim ol toktok bihainim eleksan bilong makim president.
Suprim Kot i kam bung ken bihain long taim Suprim Kot bilong Florida State i bin tok long Fraide olsem, oli mas stat ken long kandim gut long han, ol planti tausen vot em pipal i bin makim long president eleksan long namba-7-de bilong mun Novemba.
Tasol, bikpela kot tru bilong kantri, em long United States Suprim Kot, i bin vot 5-4 long blokim tingting bilong Florida Suprim Kot long gohet long kandim gut ol vot, long Sarere, bilong larim em i glasim gut na stretim tingting long en.
Solomon Islands husat igat liklik ekonomi.
Solomon Islands Trade Union Muvmen em i wanpela long ol strongpela union-grup insait long ol Pasifik ailan.
OL BIKMANMERI IGO PLANIM IONATANA LONG TUVALU.
Gavman bilong Tuvalu i bin satarim wanpela balus bilong Air Fiji bilong karim ol bikmanmeri igo long Funafuti, biktaun bilong Tuvalu, bilong stap long seremoni bilong planim dai bodi bilong Praim Minista, Ionatana Ionatana.
Niusman Sean Dorney i ripot olsem, pipal bilong Tuvalu, wanpela liklik ailan kantri tru long Pacific, i bin wok long karai sori long Praim Minista bilong ol, stat yet long taim em i bin pundaun nating na idai pinis insait long wanpela bung long Fraide nait igo pinis.
Ol lida bilong planti kantri raun long wol i bin salim tok sori bilong ol igo long Tuvalu pipal, bihainim dai bilong Praim Minista husat i bin lidim kantri inap long 20 mun tasol.
Namel long ol lida husat bai stap long State Funeral tede em long Deputy Praim Minista bilong Fiji, Ratu Epeli Nailatikau, na planti long ol Embeseda na Hai Komisina husat i save stap long Suva.
Ol bai go long Tuvalu antap long wanpela balus bilong Air Fiji.
Mr Ionatana i bin stap insait long wanpela bung wantem bilong Air Fiji long Fraide nait, bilong makim nambawan yar bilong wok bilong dispela balus kampani long Tuvalua, taim em i pundaun na idai pinis.
Deputy Praim Minista, bilong Tuvalu, Lagitupu Tuilimu, nau i kamap Ekting Praim Minista.
Fiji militari i givim pinis pipal bilong Vutia vilis long Rewa provins, sampela spesal pas Fiji bilong larim ol i go painim pis long solwara raun long Nukulau Island.
George Speight na ol sapota bilong en i stap kalabus.
Niusmeri Ofa Kaukimoce i ripot olsem, ami i mekim dispela pasin long wanem pipal bilong dispela ples i save sutim tok long ami na tok em i save pasim ol long go raun long solwara bilong tumbuna bilong ol.
Planti pipal, wantem ol pipal bilong dispela vilis, i save laik go painim pis long Nukulau ailand tasol ami ino larim ol tumas long go, long wanem ku lida George Speight na ol narapela peren bilong en i stap kalabus long hap.
Pipal bilong ples i tok olsem, solwara long dispela hap i bilong tumbuna bilong ol na em i ples we oli save painim pis, na tambu bilong ami i bagarapim dispela pinis long wanem oli no save kisim planti pis tumas nau bilong salim long maket.
Tasol, long miting bilong en wantem pipal bilong ples, ami i bin tokim pipal olsem, oli rereim pinis sampela kain wei bilong stretim dispela heve.
Ami i tambu yet long pipal long noken go long dispela eria bilong painim pis, na tok, oli mas tingting moa long sekuriti wok dispela taim.

Ol soldia bilong New Zealand i bin stap insait long sampela pait wantem ol militia husat i save sapotim Indonesia.
