Greens Party bilong New Zealand ino hamamas long lukim ken New Zealand gavman i givim ol samting bilong wokim klin wara bilong ol tarangu pipal bilong Tonga, na ino laik fosim Tonga Gavman yet long halvim ol dispela pipal.
New Zealand memba bilong Paliment, Keith Locke, i tok em bai gutpela moa sapos oli bin usim dispela 40-tausen dola oli bin lusim long baim ol simen tangwara, bilong ol femili raun long ples bilong tromoi pipia long Popua, long ol narapela human rait projek.
Em i tok Tonga Gavman bai laik lukim pipol i stap long dispela rabis ples, na ino long drai graun em ol lain oli save kolim nobles i papa long en.
Em i tok ol dispela nobles ino laik givim ol drai graun long tarangu i sidaun long en.
Mr Locke i tok rabis ples we ol dispela pipal i stap long en, i pulap long ol kain kain posin na em ino gutpela long larim pipal i sidaun klostu long en.
Foren Minista bilong New Zealand, Phil Goff, i tok tingting bilong kantri bilong em i op tasol long wanpela tingting bilong kirapim nupela sanap bung oli kolim, West Pacific Forum, em bai karamapim Australia na Indonesia.
Indonesia na Australia i tok pinis olsem ol bai gohet long tingting bilong kirapim wanpela nupela forum, na bikpela astingting bilong en em long kamapim gut wokbung namel long ol kantri long dispela rijen.
Ol narapela kantri husat bai stap insait tu long dispela forum em long East Timor, Papua New Guinea na ating Philippines.
Mr Goff i tok, taim em i go raun long Tonga, em i bin painim aut olsem, ating ol narakain tingting bai kamap long bikpela eria tumas dispela nupela forum bai karamapim, tasol em bai toktok wantaim Australia Foren Minista Alexander Downer long dispela, dispela wik.

Difens Minista bilong Indonesia, Mohammad Mahfud, i tok ol prosekuta long West Papua Provins bai stretim tingting long wanem samting bai kamap faivpela independens lida em ol i bin pulim kalabusim.
Em i tok, President Wahid i laik bai oli larim ol dispela lida igo fri bihainim gutpela tingting politik, tasol polis i bilip olsem dispela lain i bin kamapim trabel bilong bagarapim gavman na oli laik bai oli mas sanap long kot.
Long wik igo pinis, President Wahid i bin tok, ating i gutpela long em i toktok wantaim ol dispela independens lida na maski long gohetlong pait, na emi tok tu olsem tingting bilong holim-kalabusim ol dispela pipal ating ino gutpela.
Theys Eluai, hetman bilong pro-independens Papuan Presidium i wanpela long dispela faivpela pipol ol i bin pulim-kalabusim taim ol sekuriti fos bilong Indonesia i bin wok long traim pasim ol trabel long Jayapura.
Oli wok long holim kalabusim ol dispela pipal insait long provinsal polis hetkota long Jayapura, na oli sasim ol long treason oa oli kamapim trabal bilong bagarapim kantri.
163 PIPAL BILONG NARAPELA KANTRI I DAI LONG SOLWARA BILONG AUSTRALIA.
Long Australia, ol otoriti i ting wan-handret-na-63 pipal bilong narapela kantri i bin dai long solwara, taim oli traim long brukim loa na kam insait long kantri.
Niusmeri Louise Yaxley i ripot olsem Immigration Minister, Philip Ruddock, i tok ol dispela pipal i bin kam long ol kantri long Middle East.
Oli ting foapela pipal ino dai na wanpela sip bilong Japan i bin kisim ol.
Mr Ruddock i givim oda pinis bai oli mas glasim solwara bilong painim sapos sampela long ol dispela pipal i stap laif yet.
Em i tok Cyclone Sam i bin kamapim bikpela bagarap long solwara taim wanpela sip bilong Indonesia i bin traim long karim hait ol dispela pipal ikam insait long Australia.
Mr Ruddock i tok man bilong Indonesia husat i save wokim dispela hait-wok, i lusim pinis Indonesia long wanem em i poret nogut oli kilim em bilong bekim dai bilong ol dispela pipal.
Tasol Mr Ruddock ino nap tok klia, hau nius long dai bilong ol i bin go bek long Indonesia.

AMNESTY I LAIKIM OL PIKININI LONG LUSIM DITENSAN SENTA!
Human rait grup - Amnesty International i askim Australia Gavman long lusim nau ol pikinini em oli stap long ol ditensan senta, pastaim long Krismas.
Dispela human rait grup i tok oli wok long holim moa long 200 pikinini insait long ol Australian ditensan senta em planti long ol i stap longwe tru long ol taun na ples.
Georgie Costello bilong Amnesty International i tok, ol yangpela i wok long bungim bikpela heve insait long ol dispela senta, taim Islamic Ramadan klostu i pinis na Krismas i kamap.
Georgie Costello i tok, dispela i min, oli stap olsem kalabus logn ol dispela senta.
DOWNER IGO KAMAP LONG VANUATU!
Foren Minista bilong Australia, Alexander Downer, i kamap pinis long Vanuatu, insait long nambatu hap long wanpela lukluk raun bilong em igo long foapela kantri long Pacific.
Niusman Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem, Mr Downer bai go raun tu long tupela hap long rijen we ol pait na trabal i wok long kamap long en -- em long Solomon Islands na Bougainville.
Mr Downer i bin kamap long Port Vila, we ol singsing grup i bin bungim em long balus.
Em bai miting wantaim Praim Minista Barak Sope bilong toktok long ol samting i wok long kamap long rijen, na bai statim wanpela projek bilong strongim legal system bilong Vanuatu -- projek em Australia i bin givim moni bilong en.
Dispela yar i bin wanpela nogut yar long Pacific -- wanpela ku i bin kamap long Fiji, na narapela ku na ol pait i bin wok long kamap long Solomon Islands.
Tasol Mr Downer i tok ol dispela trabal i bin mekim ol kantri long rijen i kirap sampela gutpela na bikpela samting -- bikpela lain bilong rijen yet, em long Pacific Islands Forum, nau i klia long wanem samting em i ken mekim taim ol kain trabal olsem i kamap bihain, i tru oli no traim yet dispela nupela wok Forum bai mekim bihain.
Mak blong ol samting Fiji i baim ibin igo antap long yar igo pinislong 160-milian dola, winim mak bilong 1998.
Toktok ikam long Bureau of Statistics i tok olsem, mak blong ol samting Fiji i baim ibin moa long 578-milian dola.
Mak blong kos oa prais blong ol samting kantri i baim long 1999 ibin 1-poin-8 milian dola, na dispela ibin igo antap long 24-pesen winim mak bilong 1998.
Wan-handret-na-70 milian dola long dispela moni oli bin baim balus long en.

Em i bin mekim giaman pasin, karim ol giaman pepa na i bin usim nem bilong narapela man taim em igo long bank.
Wong i tok em i bin bungim hatpela taim na i bin laikim tumas moni, na em i bin lusim Fiji igo long Kiribati we em i laik giaman long kisim moni, na bihain em i laik go bek long Hong Kong na tilim dispela moni namel long ol pren bilong em.
Em i tok oli bin givim em nem bilong wanpela man husat i save givim ol giaman paspot na sampela trupela travellers cheques em ating sampela lain i bin stilim.
Taim em i salim Wong igo kalabus, Chief Justice Robin Millhouse i bin tok em i bin rereim gut tru bikpela plen bilong wokim sampela giaman pasin.
Ol ofisa bilong Coastwatch ibin painim ol dispela bot-pipol aste long wanpela ailan i stap namel long Dampier na Port Hedlands.
Mr Ruddock i tok, ol i bilip olsem tripela pipol i wok long lus.
Em i tok olsem, ol pipol ol ibin painim pinis, i tok olsem tripela pipol ibin lusim ailan long swim igo long ol narapela ailan i stap kolostu long traim painim sampela wara bilong dring.
Tasol, ol ino bin lukim ol bihain.

Lain femili memba na meri bilong em i wok long tok olsem emi ino ronawe lusim kantri.
Jastis Minista bilong Fiji, Alipate Qetaki, i laik bai oli mas investigate oa galasim wok bilong Jastis Anthony Gates, Jas bilong Lautoka.
Jastis Minista i askim long dispela bihain long em i rausim wanpela aplikesin bilong gavman long wanpela Stay Order long konstitusen.

Wanpela sugar milling kampani tasol blong Fiji, i bungim heve long moni, bihain long oli bin givim oda long em long gohet long memeim sugar oli bin katim long displea yiar.
Gavman i papa long dispela Fiji Sugar Corporation.
Maus-man blong kampani, Hafis Khan i bin tok, tingting blong wanpela long ol han blong bisnis long givim oda long corporation long gohet long memeim sugar igo lusim namba 31 dei blong December, bai inap kamapim heve.
Mr Khan i bin tok, ating bai oli nap lusim 635-tausen dola long wanpela wik, longwanem, oli bin givim oda long dipela fopela mill, long tok oraet long kisim ol sugar cane, em ino gutpela tumas.
Fiji i bin bungim ol kain heve blong politik na trabel blong moni long stat blong dispela yiar, taim ku i bin kamap long kantri.
Dispela ku i bin pasim wok blong katim sugar cane, tasol ino bin kamapim displea heve blong nau.
Mr Khan i bin tok, dispela bisnis, em i stap pinis inap lon 120 yiar, imas tok oraet long sanis, olsem em iken nap gohet mekim wok blong em.

Vice President blong Indonesia, Megawati Sukarnoputri i lusim pinis Jakarta, blong mekim tripela dei lukluk raun long ol provinces blong Aceh na North Maluku.

Ino long taim igo pinis Paliment i bin oraitim wanpela nupela loa oli kolim - integrity of political parties and candidates loa.
Mr Baing i tokim ol niusman meri olsem em bai toktok wantaim ol narapela pati lida, wantaim tu Sir Michael Somare husat oli bin rausim tu long wok olsem Minista bilong Foren Afes na Bougainville Afes, pastaim long em i salensim dispela loa long kot.

Wanpela maus-man bilong Polis long Jayapura i tok, ol sekuriti fos nau i wok long painim dispela tupela man.
Long stat blong dispela wik, President blong Indonesia, Abdurrahman Wahid i bin promis long pasim West Papua i bruk lusim Indonesia.
Em i bin promis long larim rait blong pipal i tokaut long tingting blong ol, tasol em i bin tok, em bai no nap larim pait long kamap long province oa larim province i bruk lusim Indonesia.
AMERICA I GALASIM KAVA!
Kava, kain dring bilong Pacific pipol, i wok long mekim ol polis long Hawaii na ol narapela hap bilong America i wari.
Planti pipol moa i laik dring Kava na polis long America i wari sapos em i orait long ol man i dringim long draivim kar long rot.
Insait long California, wanpela jas bilong San Mateo County i bin rausim wanpela kot kes we wanpela man i bin dringim 23 kap Kava, pastaim long em i draivim kar.
Polis i bin pasim em long rot bihain long kar bilong em i ron karangi nambaut na oli sasim em long draivim kar taim em i spak long wanpela drag.
Tasol jas i bin rausim kot kes bilong em.
Jas i bin tok ino bin gat evidence oa i nogat sampela samting i stap em i soim stret olsem, man ia i bin spak long Kava.
Long stat bilong dispela yar oli bin rausim tu wankain kot kes olsem, agensim wanpela man bilong San Bruno husat i save dring Kava, long wanem kot i tok, oli nogat gutpela save long wok bilong Kava.
Kava ino tambu aninit long loa bilong Hawaii, tasol long wanem planti Kava ba i wok long kirap, ol polis i tok oli wok long wari planti long ol draiva husat i save dring Kava na draivim kar.
President bilong America, Bill Clinton, i tok lida bilong Israel na lida bilong and Palestine i kamap klostu long taim we oli ken sainim wanpela peace agrimen bilong Middle East.
Dispela toktok bilong em i kamap maski oli pasim ken wanpela miting em oli bin rereim long kamap long Egypt namel long Israel Praim Minista Ehud Barak na Palestinian lida, Yasser Arafat.
Mr Clinton i tok Mr Barak i wanbel pinis long wanpela tingting bilong America, bilong stretim ol belkros wantaim Palestine.
Tasol ol ofisal bilong Egypt i tok Mr Barak nau i tok em bai noken bungim Mr Arafat na President blong Egypt, Hosni Mubarak.
Ol niusman i tok, dispela trabal we miting bao noken gohet ken, i bagarapim ken ol sans bilong pinisim ol pait em i kamap bikpela ken long Middle East.
Gavana blong American Samoa ibin tokaut long en.
AUSTRALIA NA NEW ZEALAND INAP LUKAUTIM OL REFUJI OA?
Oli askim pinis Australia na New Zealand long lukautim ol Fiji Indian refuji long sotpela taim pastaim.
Bikpela Hindu Sios grup long New Zealand, Sanatan Dharan, i tok em i wok long halvim long rerem ol samting bilong ol Fijian Indian, tasol ol heve nau i wok long kamap bikpela.
Mausman, Babu Gyan Singh i tok, igat planti ol Fijian Indian pipol i nogat ples bilong silip, na em i tok oli ken lukautim ol dispela pipol pastaim long Australia na New Zealand i go nap oli bringim bek pasin demokrasi long Fiji.
Wanpela bikpela raonwin na ren i bagarapim pinis ol haus blong moa long 500-tausen pipal long Sri Lanka, na nau em i kamap pinis long southern kos blong India.
Tasol ol otoroti i tok despela cyclone i wok long go isi nau.
Ol strong blong win em i bin stap antap long 150 kilomita long wan wan awa taim cyclone i bin stap ong Indian Ocean, tasol nau em i stap daon long nain-pela-ten kilomita long wan awa taim cyclone i lusim bin Tamil Nadu state.
Oli muvim planti tausan pipal igo long ol cyclone senta oa oli kisim ol aut long ol eria i stap daon taim cyclone i kamap.
Wanpela-ten-tu pipal i bin dai na planti ol arapela moa i bin kisim bagarap long bodi blong ol, taim despela cyclone i hamamarim Tamil Nadu na ol narapela distrik long mun igo pinis.
Wanpela cyclone long yiar igo pinis i bin bagarapim nogut tru Orissa state bilong India, na kilim dai ten-tausan pipal na bagarapim wan-milian haus blong ol, na kilim 370 bulmakau.
Long Australia, Civil Aviation Safety Authority i givim oda long Ansett long wokim moa sefti sek long ol balus blongen.
Otoriti i tokim Ansett long sekim gut ken ol balus inap oli pinisim wanpela wok-painim-aut bilong glasim wei blong inspektim ol balus.
Taim bilong Krismas i bin mekim na Ansett ino bin sekim ol balus bilong en.
Gabriella Rossitto i ripot olsem, oli bin holim wanpela miting long Melbourne blong painim aut blong wanem na Ansette ino bin wokim sefti inspeksan long sikispela long ol Boeing 767 jet balus blongen.
Oli bin tokim Ansett long noken larim ol balus i kirap lusim graon na despela i bin pasim ol pipal i laik holide, i wet wet i stap long longpela taim, pastaem long Krismas taim.

Long 1994, gavman i bin baem faiv-tausen-500 katon mekerel tin pis i kam long Thailand blong givim long pipal taim volkeno i pairap long Rabaul na bagarapim ples na ol haus blong ol.
Tasol, kain stori olsem i save kamap oltaim long PNG, ol despela tin pis i bin kamap na stap olgeta i nap nau long Port Moresby.

NIUE I TOKIM AMERICAN MEDIKAL SKUL, LUKAUT!
Premia bilong Niue i tokim pinis ol darekta bilong wanpela medikal skul bilong America long kantri olsem, gavman bai rausim ol sapos oli no pinisim ol pait-kros namel long ol yet.
Premia Sani Lakatani i tok em bin givim oda pinis long ol ofisal bilong Lord Liverpool University long ailan, pastaim long em i go lukluk raun long Fiji.
Em i tok moa long 12 mun i lus pinis bihain long gavman bilong em i bin givim tok orait long dispela medikal skul, long lisim olpela Niue Hotel.
Em i tok ikam inap nau ol papa bilong dispela skul i wok long pait-kros yet namel long ol yet.
Premia Lakatani i tok em i laik givim narapela sans long ol edministreta bilong skul long mekim wok gut, sapos nogat oli mas go aut lusim kantri.
Na em i tok, sampela samting i kamap pinis em i soim olsem, skul i harim pinis tok bilong em.
Offis blong Envairomen blong Papua New Guinea na Conservation ibin kamapim sampela loa em bai oli iusim blong sapotim wanpela loa em nau tasol palimen ibin kamapim.
Ol dispela toktok ibin kamap blong bekim sampela wari em sampela ol envairomen grup ibin kamapim long ino bin gat gutpela loa istap long mekim wok blong em.
Ol Indonesia boskru long tripela sip i kamap pinis long kot long Darwin, long Northern territory blong Australia, bihain long oli sasim ol long bringim hait pipal blong narapela kantri i kam long Australia.
Long wik pastaim long Krismas, ol Australia Customs ofisa i bin holim-kalabus tenpela man long Ashmore Reef eria, klostu long northwest kos blong Australia.
Ol despela sip i bin wok long karim samting olsem 160 pipal blong ol narapela kantri.

Kot i bin tokim despela tenpela man long wet long rumgat, na long mun February ol bai sanap ken long kot.

Dispela tupela ofisa i tok olsem, PNG Cabinet i save long dispela pasin bilong ol, na ino mekim wanpela samting bilong pasim ol na lukautim nesanal sekuriti.

Oli ting oli bin pasim ken ol dispela toktok, long wanem, long ol senis i bin kamap insait long Papua New Guinea cabinet.

Wanpela lain blong Gavman bai igo long Bougainville long stat blong mun January, long stap insait long ol toktok.
Papua New Guinea Red Cross i askim pipal long soim respekt long wok blongen, bihaen long ol kriminal i bin paitim wokmeri blongen tupela taim nau long despela yiar.
Ol man i karim gan ibin stilim ol samting blong ko-odineta blong Blood trensfusen sevis, Rosemary Munaga, taim em i bin kamap blong stat wok long Port Moresby Blood bank.

Ripot ikam long Papua New Guinea i tok oli arestim pinis wanpela ofisa bilong imigresin ofis na sasim em long paulim ol paspot.
Ripot i tok, oli bin larim em i baim beil na oli lusim em igo na oli tok em bai kamap long kot tede.
Praim Minista Sir Mekere Morauta i bin tok aste olsem, oli mas klinim aut ol paul pasin insait long Foren Afes dipatment, wantaim tu ol paul pasin long imigresin na paspot.
Ripot i tok, ol dispela kalabusman ibin usim ol rop ol i wokim long rais-bek long ronawei long kalabus taim ol gad i wok long senis.
Komisina Serupi i tok, prison sevis i wok kolostu wantaim ol polis, lokal lida na ol arapela memba bilong pablik long traim holim-pasim ken ol dispela kalabusman ibin ronawei.

America i bin tokaut long bikpela wari long ol tingting blong Russia long salim ol samting blong pait igo long Iran.
Em i tok, dispela i nap long kamapim heve long interest blong America long Middle East.
Wanpela maus-man blong State Department long Washington i tok, gavman i wari long ol ripot ikam long Russia, em bai salim ol roket-bom, submarines na ol narapela samting blong pait igo long Iran.
Dispela ol toktok i bin kamap bihain tasol long Russia na Iran i bin tok oraet long wok bung blong militari, insait long wanpela miting long Tehran.
Aste, Defence Minister blong Russia, Igor Sergeyev i bin tok long Tehran olsem, Russia bai luk save long ol international agrimen na tingting blong salim ol samting blong pait bai no nap bagarap, narapela kantri.

Kufuor ibin winim John Atta Mills, man usait i vais president long nau, insait long vot long Tunde.
Emi kisim ples bilong Jerry Rawlings, olpela biknem military manusait ibin wok long go pas long ol wok politic bilong Ghana insait long dispela 20 yar igo pinis.

AUSTRALIA REPUBLICAN MOVEMENT I TOK, MAMA LOA I KEN LARIM SENIS.

Digital televisen brotkas i bin stat long Australia tede.
Tasol niusmeri Belinda Sommer i ripot olsem, liklik lain pipol tasol bai nap long lukim digital piksa long televisen bilong ol.
Digital televisen piksa bai klia moa olsem piksa yumi save lukim long haus piksa, na toktok long en tu bai klia moa yet.
Bilong kisim digital televisen piksa, pipol i mas baim wanpela liklik bokis oli kolim set-top box.
Tasol ol dispela set-top box bai noken kamap long ol stua inap long pinis bilong mun Jenuari.

Planti tausen pipol bilong Australia i bin sanap lainim ol rot long Sydney bilong lukluk long wanpela parade oli kolim - parade of Nations.
Dispela parade i hap long ol selebresin bilong makim 100 krismas bilong federation oa bung-wantaim bilong Australia.
100 yar igo pinis, sikispela British koloni em oli bin stap long Australia, oli bin kam bung wantaim bilong kirapim wanpela kantri tasol em yumi kolim nau long - Commonwealth of Australia.
Niusmeri Jo Mazzocchi i ripot olsem, Australia Difens Fos i bin pulap long nambawan seksan bilong parade.
Oli bin honarim ol sevis man na meri husat i bin pait makim Australia long ol kain kain woa.
Ol pipol i sanap long ol kain kain ples bilong lukluk long parade.

Iran na America inap long planti yar, pastaim long tupela i ken statim gutpela wokbung ken.
Mr Khatami i bin tok olsem taim oli askim em - blong wanem na em ino bungim President Bill Clinton billng America taim em igo lukluk raun long New York bilong toktok insait long United Nations.

Em i bin promis tu long klinim aut ol pasin bilong pait na kilim man.

Amanda Morgan ripot olsem, ol wok binis bilong tourist iwok long kamap bigpela hariap tru insait long Australia.

Oli ting olsem one million ol pasinjia bai igo ikam long Sydney International terminal long mun December na mak bilong ol pipol igo ikam insait yet long kantri tu ibin igo antap, bigpela tru long taim bilong olympic games.

Canada i halvim tingting blong bringim bek 1997 Constitution blong Fiji, em oli bin rausim bihain long ku long mun May.
Foren Minista John Manley i tok, gavman blong em i bin wok long lukluk long ol samting i bin wok long kamap long Fiji, na tingting blong kot ino long taim igo pinis, olsem, dispela 1997 Constitution i stap oraet yet.

Tasol, niusmeri Ofa Kaukimoce i ripot olsem ikam long Suva olsem, prosekuta i bin askim Hai Kot long noken gohet pastaim long dispela kes.

Tu, Hai Kot i bin rausim tingting bilong Mr Temo ino long taim igo pinis, we em i bin laikim prosekusan opis long tokaut long nem bilong ol 114 witnes agensim Speight.

Cook Islands Cabinet i tok em i tru wanpela kampani bilong South Australia, oli kolim Rock Lobster, i laik investim klostu 60 milian dola long projek, na baim tu 25 ol long-line fishing bot na wokim wanpela fish fektri long kantri.
Minista bilong Marine Resources, Robert Woonton, i tok dispela projek inap long tanim ol marine resources -- oa ol samting long solwara bilong Cook Islands -- i kamap bikpela bisnis moa winim turis bisnis.
Em i tokim Cook Islands Nius olsem, sampela memba bilong Cabinet i sapotim dispela projek, tasol oli bihainim gut pinis olgeta rot bilong glasim projek na sekim gut wok bilong Rock Lobster Company.
Em i tok kampani ino askim gavman long givim sampela moni bilong dispela projek.
Deputy Police Commissioner bilong Solomon Islands i tok em i wari long lukim olsem, oli bin rikrutim planti militia long lukautim wok bilong kisim bek ol samting bilong pait.
Aninit long Townsville Peace Agreement, oli bin rikrutim oa kisimwan-handret memba bilong tupela militia grup long lukautim wok bilong kisim bek ol gan, na halvim wok bilong lukautim loa na oda.
Tasol, Deputy Commissioner John Homelo i bin tokim Solomon Island Broadcasting Corporation olsem, oli bin rikrutim planti moa militia winim dispela wan-handret oli kolim long en pastaim.
Em i tok oli wok long glasim gut ol spesal konstabel long Honiara, na tu ol IFM memba em oli bin rikrutim ol long Tetere long Guadalcanal.

Peter Gibson bilong Authority itok, oli tambuim pastaim Yanda Airline em i save istap insait long Singleton, long taim Civil Aviation Authority i painim aut moa long wanpela birua long Tunde igo pinis.
Civil Aviation Safety Authority i tok Yanda i nogat ol gutpela samting bilong mekim wok, i nogat ol klia toksave long wok bilongen, i nogat ol treining na em i nogat ol gutpela man na meri bilong wok.

East Timor bihainim eleksen blong independens long 1999, igo bek pinis, samting olsem wan hundret-tausen i stap yet.
Nius-meri Ginny Stein i ripot olsem, foapela bisop nau tasol ipinisim miting blong ol long Dili, we oli bin tok oli mas bringim gut ol dispela refugi, em oli stap yet long ol kem em ol militia kontrolim long West Timor.

Dispela sik i kamap long mit bilong bulmakau.
Sinia Food Polisi Ofisa blong Australia Consummer Association, Rebbeca Smith, i bin tok ol pipol imas toktok wantaim ol kampani i kamapim ol dispela mit na ino ol kampani i salim ol, long kisim bek moni blong ol.
Wanpela kampani bilong America i bin usim solwara klostu long Kiribati long Pacific, long sutim wanpela setalait roket igo antap long kilaut.
Oli bin sutim dispela setalait igo antap ikam long wanpela taraipela bet long solwara oli kolim, Sea Launch, em i bin hanga long intanesanal solwara klostu long Kiritimati ailan bilong Kiribati.
Ol papa bilong dispela setalait i tok, setalait ia bai save transmit oa brotkas long ol progrem bilong kain redio stesin oli kolim - digital audio radio programming igo stret long ol kar, haus na ol liklik redio ol man i save karim nambaut wantaim ol.
Ol man antap long Sea Launch i tok dispela setalait i wanpela long tupela em wanpela kampani bilong America oli kolim, XM Satellite Radio Inc, insait long Washington, i laik putim antap long kilaut bai save go raun long wold.
Husat pipol raun long wold i kamap memba bilong dispela redio stesin bai ken kisim dispela nais, klia brotkas ikam long dispela redio stesin antap long setalait long kilaut.
Narapela nogut ripot ken long Australia labor maket i mekim na ol nupela toktok i kamap olsem, ating ol bai katim interest rate.

Nau tasol ANZ Bank i tokaut long ripot bilong ol wok-painim olsem em i save wokim olgeta mun.
Oli painim olsem, ol wok long internet i daun long 13-na-hap-pesen long mun Desemba.

Em i tok sapos Court of Appeals i pilim yet olsem i gutpela long oli tokim Paliment long holim miting, oraet ol bai tingting long dessolve oa pasim paliment na holim nupela eleksan.
Court of Appeal i wok long harim apil blong Gavman agensim tingtingblong Judge Anthony Gates blong High Court olsem, kirap bilong interim Gavman ino stret aninit long mama-loa.

Aninit long progrem bilong Interim Praim Minista Laisenia Qarase, Fiji bai i redi long pipal i holim eleksan pastaem long mun May 2002.

Wanpela wok-painim bilong Papua New Guinea National Research Institute i soim olsem, ol kain kriminal pasin.
PNG, oli winim moa ol kain pasin olsem long Australia na Fiji.
PNG Praim Minista Sir Mekere Morauta i bin tokaut long ripot bilong dispela survey oa wok-painim long wiken.
Praim Minista i tok ol dispela kain kriminal pasin i save bagarapim wanwan namel long 50 pipol bilong Papua New Guinea.
Em i tok ol kriminal pasin i save go raun na raun na ino save stop, na sampela as bilong en em long unemployment oa man i nogat wok, poverty oa sindaun tarangu nogat moni, na hevi we mak bilong edukesin oa save bilong planti ino bikpela.
Em i tok ol skuata setalmen insait long ol ples olsem Port Moresby oli kamap gutpela ples bilong kamapim ol kriminal.
Sir Mekere i tok ripot bilong dispela wok-painim i tok olsem, moa long 50-pesen long ol nogut kriminal pasin tru em oli save kamap long Papua New Guinea, oli save kamap long Port Moresby.
Ol rekot bilong polis i soim olsem, klostu olgeta kriminal i save stap long ol skuata setalmen.

Ol pipol nau i bungim dispela heve ibin wok long planti arapela ol fektori blong wokim ol kolos.

Oli tok ol ais bol em oli pundaon wantaim ren i bin luk olsem ol golf bol na oli bin bagarapim stret ol apal diwai.

Oli wok long rehearse oa prektis nau insait long New Caledonia, pastaim long oli kam long Sydney we ol bai lusim tupela wik long rekodim wanpela albam sampela taim dispela mun.

Tok orait bilong American gavman long larim tupela bikpela Intanet kampani i bung wantaim, nau i kliarim laspela banis tupela i bin wok long bungim, na i opim rot long tupela long kirapim nambawan bikpela media empire tru long America.
Taim dispela tupela kampani, America Online na Time Warner i kam bung wantaim, mak bilong moni tupela igat bai nap long 190-billion Australian dola.
Tok orait bilong Federal Communications Commission bilong America long tupela kampani i bung wantaim, i larim tupela long pinisim wanpela deal oa tok-orait em tupela i bin toksave long en wanpela yar igo pinis.
Long taim bilong toksave, oli bin tok, dispela sanap bung bai kos 295 Billion dola.
Dispela nupela bisnis, bai oli kolim AOL-Time Warner, i kirapim bikpela Internet provider tru bilong America em ol biknem kampani olsem CNN, HBO, na Warner Brothers bai papa long en.
Wanpela American research kampani i skelim olsem, kandim bilong ol pipol husat bai save usim Internet insait long Asia-Pacific rijen bai abrusim namba long America insait long faifpela yar.
Jupiter Research i tok mak bilong ol pipol i save usim Internet long America bai pundaun lusim 36 pesen tede, igo long samting olsem 24 pesen long 2005.
Em i tok Asia-Pacific rijen bai sanap makim samting olsem one-third long olgeta pipol long wold.
Em i tok ol lida kampani long Internet long nau, i mas sanap bung na go insait long ol nupela maket.
Ol Opposition party blong Bangladesh i tok pinis long askim long pipal i holim stop-wok long olgeta hap blong kantri sapos Gavman ino rausim wanpela security law em i wok long pulim planti toktok kros.
Opposition i laikim bai oli rausim Public Safety Law, em oli bin raitim kamap na mekim i kamap law long January 2000.
Despela law i larim tu ol authority long kirapim ol special kot bai i harim kwik ol kotcase blong pipal, em oli sasim ol long kain crime olsem extortion na kidnapping.
Opposition i wok long tok ol authoruty i wok long usim despela law agensim ol Opposition.
Em i tok tu olsem Gavman ino bihaenim stret pasin long pipal i bihaenim ol law em i wok long wansaid tasol, long wanem oli no save sasim ol spaota blongen, aninit long despela law.

Planti-tausen sapota bilong Presiden Wahid ibin promis long bung na igo long kapital, bihain long ol ibin harim olsem ol birua bilong em ibin rediim ol protes-bung, long kamap long wankain taim Palamen i holim narapela miting bilong en.

Chechnya i bin idai tu wantaim ol soljia bilong Russia.

Polis bilong Indonesia i wok long gohet yet long traim bruk igo insait long wanpela strongpela siment huas em i stap aninit long haus bilong pikinini man bilong olpela president Suharto.
Boi ia i wok long ronawe na hait long polis.
Ol forensic polis wantaim ol jekhama na dril i bin lusim dispela tupela de igo pinis long traim brukhaus naigo insait long despela bunker oa bikpela hul tambolo long haus bilong en.
Polis i ting despela biliane bisnisman, Tommy Hutomo Mandala Putra, iwok long hait istap aninit long graun.

Suharto na ol lain pikinini bilong en.

Fiji i givim pinis ol tingting bilong en yet long wanem kain senis em i laik lukim long wei ol United Nations peacekeeping fos i save mekim wok bilong ol, wantaim tu wanem samting bai kamap long ol man i kilim ol U-N soldia.
Permanent Representative bilong Fiji long United Nations, Amraiya Naidu, i bin tokim UN Security Council olsem, Fiji i save tingting planti long ol man em i save lusim insait long ol UN peacekeeping wok, we ikam inap nau, namba i kisim pinis 37.
Em i tok, em ino hamamas long dispela namba husat i save dai aninit long tok orait bilong peacekeeping wok, na em i bikpela samting sapos oli mekim tupela sait long woa i luksave long rong bilong ol taim oli kilim ol UN wokman.

INDONESIA FISHERMAN IGO KALABUS LONG DARWIN.
Wanpela kot long Darwin i salim pinis wanpela fisherman bilong Indonesia inap long tupela yar-sikispela mun long wanem em i bin halvim ol wok bilong traim bringim 47 illegal immigrants ikam insait long Australia.
47 illegal immigrants into Australia.
Lorelei Fong Lim i ripot olsem, Darwin kot i bin salim Justus Bolang long bringim sampela illegal immigrants ikam insait long Australia.
Australia long mun Septemba long yar igo pinis.
Tupela narapela man i bin traim long bringim hait tu 101 illegal immigrants ikam long Australia long mun Septemba, na tripela narapela i bin mekim wankain trabal long mun Oktoba wantaim 94 illegal immigrants.
Taim em i salim ol dispela man igo long kalabus, Justice Dean Mildren i bin tokaut long wari bilongem long lukim olsem, dispela pasin bilong ol Indonesian fishermen long bringim hait ol pipol ikam insait i wok long kamap planti taim tumas nau.

OLI RAUISIM KEN HAND BLONG MR.
Franis doctor oa surgeon husat i bin halivim New Zilan Man, Clint Hallam, long kisim first hand transplant oa em i bin sumapim narapela han igo long han blong Mr.
Professor Jean-Michel Dubernard, husat i bin bosim despela namba-wan operation long putim bek han long Mr.
Hallam, long Lyon long september, 1998, i tok oli bin hatim-ov despela han ken i soim olsem, despela transplant ino bin wok, oa em i fail.
Long wanpela interview wantaem Le Progre daily Niuspepa, em i tok long Mr.
Hallam long ino bihaenim tok blong kisim marasin samting olsem oli bin tokim em long wokim.
Tasol em i tok, tru despela operation ino bin kamap gut, tasol em i hamamas olsem, oli bin larim em long wokim wol-first hand operation.
Hallam ino bin tok save long ol doctor, pastaem long namba-wan operation, olsem em i bin lusim right han blongem long accident, taim em i bin kalabus long fraud oa mekim ol giaman na stil pasin.

Wanpela pasindia sip i wok long karim ol refugi pipal, i bin igo daun aninit long solwara klostu long Jalolo, insait long North Maluku, Province blong Indonesia.
Antara nius-agensi i tok, dispela pasindia sip i bin lusim basis blong Bastiong, long Ternate Island long Sarere blong igo long Galela, long Halmahera Island, taim em i bin bungim taim nogut na go daun aninit long solwara.
80 pipal em ol refugi husat ibin rona-wei lusim Galela bihainim ol pait namel long ol Muslim na Christian, i bin stap antap long dispela pasindia sip.
Oli bin wok long go bek long ples blong ol.

PNG I MAS MEKIM MOA BILONG WINIM BEK OL INVESTA!
Wanpela long ol biknem economist oa saveman long wokmoni insait long Pacific rijen i tok Papua New Guinea i mas mekim moa bilong winim bek bilip bilong ol investa oa ol bisnis pipol.

Em i tokim wanpela anti-corruption investigation long Melbourne olsem.
Christine Ahern i ripot olsem Waugh i tok, em i bin lusim tu-aua-na-30-minit long wanpela miting wantaim spesal investigeta bilong ACB na ol investigeta bilong intanesanal kriket kaiunsel.
Em i tok, miting i bin gutpela na em i hamamas long wei ol toktok i bin go.
Oli bin singautim Waugh long sidaun long ai bilong investigeta bilong bekim sampela tokwin olsem, em i bin kisim 36-tausen dola gris-moni ikam long Indian beting man, Mukesh Gupta, olsem bai em i givim dispela man ol kain toksave long wanpela kriket pilai long 1993.
Tasol Waught i bin tokim ol investigeta olsem, em ino bin bungim Gupta.

Ripot i tok sikispela pipol i dai pinis long Aceh provins blong Indonesia, we trabel i wok long kamap.

Man husat i bin premier bipo blong Niue, Frank Lui, i tok, em i tru sampela pipal long island i bin askim em long sanap ken long elekson blong Legislative Assembly.

Planti handret pipal husat i save stap long ol vilis long said blong Merapai volcano long indonesia, nau i stat long gobek long ples blong ol bihaen long lusim tupela nait long ol shelter long-we long volcano.

Niupela Defence minista blong Australia, Peter Reith i bin tokim pinis ol bikman blong Defence long noken givim aut nius igo longol laen blong Nius.

Graeme dobell i ripot olsem Mr.
Reith i putim stongpela rul olsem taim em i bin wok long toktok igo long ol lida blong Australia defence.
Peter Reith i bin tokim ol senior ofisa na public servant olsem Defence department ino nap wok olsem em narakain na narapela long gavman.
Niupela Defence minista i tok em bai i harim tok blong ol narapela long halivim em long wok tasol em bai i noken larim ol i ting em isi man long usim em nating.
Na em i tok Cabinet i wok long wari long sampela laen i save givim aut ol important defence infomesin igo long ol nius laen.
Em i tok Gavman ino nap wok gut wantaem Defence department sapos em ino nap haitim ol top secret blong gavman na kantri.
Wanpela sip oli ting i wok long karim ol gan, nau i wok long ron igo long Fiji.
Ofa Kaukimoce i ripot ikam long Suva olsem, Interpol Operations, i toksave pinis long ol otorati blong Fiji olsem, dispela kago sip i bin lusim Australia moa long wanpela wik igo pinis.
Oli tokim pinis ol otorati blong Fiji olsem, ating dispela kago sip bai igo pastaim long Tuvalu, pastaim long em igo kamap long Fiji.
Oli tok, ol pepa blong kago sip i soim olsem, em i wok long karim ol spesel masin blong ol wok blong painim oel.
Tasol wanpela sekuriti wok armi i bin wokim i painim aut olsem, ol oel kampani long kantri i bin tok, oli no bin oda long ol dispela samting.
Oli toksave pinis long armi long dispela samting na ol soldia i tok, dispela pasin i kain pasin long kago sip i bringim ol samting blong pait, i wankain olsem dispela i bin kamap pastaim long ku long 1987.
Oli wok long gohet yet long lukluk blong painim ol fisherman na sumatin husat i wok long lus yet, bihaen long sip blong ol na wanpel Submarine blong America i bin bam.
Insaet long despela birua, sip blong ol fisherman na sumatin i bin go daon long solwara.
Ol kandere blong ol fisherman na sumatin blong Japan igo kamap pinis long Hawaii blong kisim infomesin long ol wanlaen blong ol.
Oli wok long holim nau wanpela inquiri o wok painim-aut igo long despela birua.
Ol navi sip na balus i wok long gohet long lukluk blong painim nainpela pipal husat i wok long lus yet long despela fishing research ship blong Japan.
Tenpela minute bihaen long despela birua ibin kamap, sip ibin go daon long solwara.
Sekretari blong State i bin toksori long dispela birua i bin kamap na tok long ol ripot olsem ol boskru blong submarine ino bin wokim wanpela samting kwik long halivim pipal long sip, olsem ino trupela tok.
Nesanal Sekuriti Edvaisa bilong America i tok oli no painim yet wanpela samting bilong soim klia olsem, nevi sabmarin em i bin bamim wanpela bot bilong Japan long Fraide ino bin bihainim ol stretpela rul bilong wok.
Insait long wanpela toktok long American ABC televisen, Ms Rice i bin tok ol bai mekim wanpela wok bilong painim aut gut wanem samting tru i bin kamapim dispela birua.
Dispela sabmarin i bin bamim dispela fishing bot taim em i bin wok long mekim treining bilong en long kam aut kwik long solwara long taim nogut.
Fishing bot bilong Japan ia i bin gat 35 pasindia insait long en, na taim sabmarin i bamim em, em i bin go daun long solwara na ikam inap nau, nainpela long ol pasindia i lus yet.
Tupela-ten-sikis pipol i bin orait tasol na oli bin pulim ol ikam aut long solwara.
Defens Minista bilong Australia Peter Reith igo istap long East Timor nau long nambawan lukluk-raun bilong em long ol samting iwok long kamap insait dispela olpela provins bilong Indonesia.

AUSTRALIA GAVMAN I BUNGIM PLANTI TOKTOK LONG SENISIM POLISI.
Australia conservative koalisen gavman i bungim planti toktok long senisim ol polisi bilong en, long wei em i save lukim One Nation pati.
Koalisen gavman i bungim ol dispela toktok long senis bihainim eleksan long Western Australia we One Nation i bin kamap gut.
One Nation i bin winim bikpela namba tru long vot long dispela eleksan - na dispela i bin halvim oposisen Labor Party long winim eleksan na holim gavman.
One Nation i bin tokim ol pipol i vot long en long putim Liberal-National Party koalisen, em i ronim gavman dispela taim, las, aninit long kain vot pasin oli kolim vote preference transfer system - wanpela pasin em i halvim Labor Party long win.
Praim Minista John Howard na gavman bilong em i statim pinis wanpela kempein long suwim ol pipol long votim ol bek.
Insait long Cook Islands, oli askim Hai Kot long galasim gut ken wanpela tinting bilong pati em i ronim gavman long rausim Spika bilong Paliment long yar igo pinis, na painim aut sapos dispela pasin i bin stret aninit long loa.
Ol ripot long Cook Islands niuspepa i tok, Jastis David Williams bilong Hai Kot i ting em bai tokaut long tingting bilong em long dispela samting insait long dispela tupela wik bihain, sapos tingting bilong rausim Spika Ngereteina Puna i bin stret long konstitusen.
Oli bin rausim Mr Puna long namba 30 de bilong mun Novemba long yar igo pinis, insait long wanpela narakain vot em ino luk stret tumas.
Jastis Williams ino laik bekim kwik wanpela askim bilong Oposisen long givim givim tingting bilong em long dispela samting nau tasol.
Man husat i bin premia bipo blong Niue, Frank Lui, i tok, em i tru sampela pipal long ailan i askim em long sanap ken long elekson blong Legislative Assembly.
Mr Lui, nau wanpela bisnis-man, i bin lus long elekson tupela yar igo pinis na em i tok em i wok long tingting strong long sanap ken long elekson.
Em i tok, em bai toktok wantaim famili blong em pastaim long mekim tru wanpela tingting long dispela.
Mr Lui i bin premia blong Nuie stat long 1993 bihainim dai blong Sir Robert Rex.

Ami na polis ino tokaut long wanem samting tru i stap long kontena, tasol ami i ting oli mas noken sidaun nating na ino mekim wanpela samting long ol ripot olsem, sampela lain i wok long karim hait ol samting bilong pait igo insait long kantri.
Olsem na ami i putim pinis moa soldia long ol biris raun long kantri.
Pacific nius ejensi i ripot olsem ol soldia bai galasim olgeta sip em oli go insait long Fiji.

Tasol taim ami i askim ol oil kampani long kantri saposoli save long dispela, em i painim aut olsem oli no bin odarim sampela samting olsem.
Ripot i tok, oli toksave gut pinis long ami long dispela hevi.
Ol soldia i tok, pastaim long 1987 ku, wankain samting olsem i bin kamap we sampela lain i bin karim hait sampela kontena igo insait long Fiji.

Dispela ripot i tok sampela biknem blong Tonga i bin stap insait long dispela hait wok.
Tasol Tonga i tok, dispela ripot ino tru olgeta.
Eseta Fusitua, mausmeri blong Tonga gavaman, i bin tok dispela ripot em niusman blong New Zealand, Mike Reid i bin raitim, i bin kamapim toktok long praivet laif blong ol memba blong palimen na Royal famili.
Em i tok em ino nap mekim wanpela samting long ofisel wok blong em long wanem ol praivet samting ino samting blong gavaman long wari long en.
Tasol Ms Fusitua i bin tok em i koros stret long pasin ol lain nius blong narapela kantri i mekim long Tonga.
Wanpela lain liklik bot i redi long sel igo long Tasman Sea long Australia, bilong bungim tupela sip bilong Britain em oli save karim ol nuclear waste - oa nuklia posin em oli save usim bilong wokim plutonium ikam long Japan na France.
Mausmeri bilong liklik lain bot husat bai protes, Pia Mancia, i tok ol kapten bilong ol dispela bot i gat strongpela tingting long mekim peaceful protest.
Em i tok ol dispela liklik bot i makim sampela kantri, wantaim tu Australia na New Zealand na tu ol Pacific ailan, France, Poland na Holland, wantaim planti moa em oli wok long rikrut long ol ikam.

Java ailan long Indonesia.
Ol ibin kisim-aut foapela-ten bodi blong ol pipol idai pinis long wanpela ples blong main istap long sait blong ol mauden long Lebak viles.

Ripot i kamap long dispela nupela pait bihain tasol long taim ol rebel ofisal i bin lusim Aceh bilong go stap long wanpela miting wantaim ol Indonesia ofisal long Switzerland.

Ol rebel bilong Aceh i bin wok long pait stat yet long 1970s, halvim laik bilong ol bai dispela provins i kamap wanpela indipendent Islamic kantri.
OL dispela pait bilong indipendens i mekim na moa long wan-tausen pipol i bin idai long yar igo pinis.

Ol nius ripot i tok despela birua i bin kamap long taim bikpela ren i bin wok long pundaon.
Despela giaman pait tupela helikopta-balus i bin wok long stap insaet longen, em i narapela yet long ol wok long lukluk blong painim nainpela pipal em oli wok long lus, long wanpela fishing bot blong Japan, em wanpela submarine blong America i bin bamim, taim em i kam antap long solwara klostu long hawaii long Fraide.

Oli bin statim dispela nupela wok long yiar igo pinis.

Ol heal ofisel blong Papua New Guinea i tok long painim aut long ol pairap i bin kamap long ol haus, husat i bin usim kerosene lamp oa stove.
Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem, 17 pipal i bin kisim bikpela bagarap long bodi blong ol long northern taun blong Madang.
Na oli givim tok lukaut pinis long ol pipal blong Madang district Insait long planti eria blong Papua New Guinea, planti ol haus ino electricity na mains gas saplai, na ol pipal i save usim kerosene long lamp na stoveInsait long sampela dei igo pinis, sampela long ol dispela lamp na stove i wok long pairap taim oli laitim, na statim paia long haus.

Bikpela trabal em ino bin save kamap bifo long haus-kalabus long Brazil, nau i pinis.

15) kalabusman i bin dai na foapela gad na tripela kalabusman na wanpela yangpela boi, krismas blong em foapela yar, ibin kisim bagarap.

Australia i bin winim Papua New Guinea taim em i bin kikim sikispela gol na Papua New Guinea i nogat, insait long soka qualifier pilai long Cook Islands.

Insait long ol narapela soka, Samoa i bin winim Tong, wantaim tripela gol, na Vanuatu i bin winim Cook Islands.

Final bai kamap long Fraide.

PNG CONUSL GENERAL I BELHAT LONG OL KARASIN PAIRAP.
Foapela pipol i dai pinis na samting olsem 30 narapela i kisim bagarap long ol dispela pairap, em i kamap long wanem karasin oli yusim long lam bilong ol i bin igat bensin long en.
Leba Dipatment bilong Papua New Guinea i bin givim oda bai oli mas pasim ol BP depo na petrol stesin long Madang, bihain long oli painim aut olsem BP i bin bringim dispela karasin ikam long Australia.
Balus i bin karim sikispela long ol pipol husat i bin bagarapim nogut tru long ol dispela birua, ikam long Brisbane, we ol dokta i tok oli kamap orait liklik bihain long oli givim ol marasin.
PNG Consul General Henry Koiaie i tok jastis i mas kamap.
Papua New Guinea Consul General i tok em i kros long ol birua long kerosin lamp i wok long pairap na givim bagarap long laif blong pipal long kantri na tok longen olsem em rong na slek-pasin blong ol fuel kampany na despela i kamap.
Foapela pipal idai pinis na samting olsem tripela-ten ol arapela i kisim bagarap taim kerosin lamp blong ol i bin pairap, long wanem kerosin em oli bin baem i bin mix wantaem bensin oa petrol.
Papua New Guinea Kabour department i tokim pinis BP oil kampany blong pasim ol petrol-stesin blong ol na ol autlet blong ol long salim pterol na kerson long Madang bihaen long oli bin painim olsem ol despela keroain i bin kam long BP long Australia.
Sikispela long pipal em paia i bin kamap na kukim bodi blong ol na oli sik nongut tru, balus i bin karim ol ikam daon long Brisbane hausik, we ol doctor i tok oli wok long kamap gut long marasin nau.
PNG Consul General, Henry Koiaie i tok oli mas investigate long despela birua na kisim ol laen i stap insaet long despela asua igo long kot.

Inogat wanpela balus i ron igo nau long Nauru na Kiribati bihain long Australia ibin tambuim balus bilong Air Nauru, em gavman i papa long en, long em noken flai.
Air Nauru i save ronim wanpela Boeing 737 balus namel long Nauru na Kiribati, na dispela em i wanpela balus-sevis tasol em i ron namel long tupela kantri.
Em i save flai igo tu long Sydney, Melbourne na Brisbane insait long Australia, na tu long New Caledonia, Fiji, Federated States of Micronesia na Philippines.

AUSTRALIA I TOK, PLUTONIUM KAKO BAI SEF TASOL.

Dipatment i tok oli bihainim pinis sef wei blong muvim ol nuklia samting raun long wold stat yet long 1960s, na oli kisim pinis toksve olsem, oli bihainim gut international standards blong safety na sekuriti blong muvim dispela samting, na tu, oli gat pinis ol rot blong stretim heve, sapos heve i kamap.
Em i tok, oli tokim pinis tu Australia gavman olsem, ol nuklia kampani husat i muvim ol dispela samting, i gat pinis ol plen blong mekim wanem samting, sapos bagarap i kamap.

NAMBAWAN LAIN EAST TIMOR REFUJI IGO BEK LONG PLES!
Klostu 500 East Timor pipol i bin go bek long ples blong ol bihain long lusim 18 mun long Indonesia West Timor.
Dispela i makim nambawan bikpela lain blong go bek dispela yar, insait long wanpela progrem blong United Nations.
Niusmeri Ginny Stein i ripot ikam long Dili olse, oli rereim pinis nambatu ron blong ol pipol husat ino bin gat spes long sip.
Dispela nambawan ron blong sip i bin pulap nogut tru.
Dispela United Nations sip i bin go kamap long nambawan haba blong Dili tede long moning.
Antap tu long dispela sip i bin igat wanpela lain Timor soldia husat i bin risain long Indonesia ami.
Ol dispela pipol i tokaut long bikpela hamamas tru blong ol long go bek long ples, bihain long go lusim 18 mun insait long ol rabis na doti refuji kem long West Timor.
Oli makim liklik grup tasol long planti tausen moa yet em oli stap bek long ol kem, tasol United Nations i tok, wokabaut blongol dispela pipol igo bek long East Timr tede, i bin kamap gut.

Mr Gusmao i bin pinis tasol long toktok igo long pipol dispela taim insait long Dili.

Australia i rausim pinis tambu i bin putim long Air Nauru bihain long em i bin kisim promis olsem, em bai stretim ol heve blong em.
Air Nauru i gat wanpela Boeing 737 em isave ron lusim Nauru na Kiribati, na em i wanpela balus kampani tasol long ron namel long dispela tupela kantri.
Em i save ron tu igo long Sydney, Melbourne na Brisbane long Australia, wantaim New Caledonia, Fiji, Federated State blong Micronesia, Palau na Philippines.
Australia Civil Aviation Safety Authoriti i bin tok, oli bin pasim ron blong Air Nauru long namba 24 dei blong mun February, long wanem, em i bin gat heve wantaim ol woka, electricity na communication i bin bruk-daun long Nauru international airport.
Oli bin rausim tambu long em, bihain long Civil Aviation Safety Authoriti i bin tokim em blong stretim ol dispela samting.
Em i bin kisim promis long Nauru olsem, oli bin stretim pinis ol dispela heve long ples balus.
Deputy praim minista bilong Australia, John Anderson ibin sutim tok long wanpela wok traim bilong wanpela International scientist long clonim or mixim wara bilong ol man na meri em ol inonap long karim pikiinini longen long kamapim ol pikinini i luk wankaim olsem ol despela manmeri i givim wara bilong ol longen.
Wanpela lain reseacher bai bihainim despela plen bilong ol insait long sampela wik ikam na ol itok- igat sampela pipol i soim laik pinis- em sampela bilong ol i bilong Australia long larim ol kisim wara bilong ol na kamapim ol pikinini.
Anderson itok- em inolaikim tru despela pasin bilong kamapim ol pikinini long despela pasin na emi bilip olsem ol pipol bilong Australia bai wanbel wantaim em.

Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem, Port Moresby i kamap namba wan gen wantaim bikpela moa namba long ol nupela lain i kisim Hiv-Aids.
HIV i wok long kamap bikpela hariap tru, stat yet long taim oli ibin painim long namba wan taim tru, long leit 80s.
Ripot em Helth Dipatmen ibin autim ino long taim igo pinis, wea i karamapim tripela mun long klostu pinis blong yiar 2000, i soim olsem, dispela sik i wok long kamap bikpela hariap tru, winim ol wok go het blong traim stopim dispela sik.
Igat nau Tri-Tausen-Foa-Handred-na-Tupela-Ten-Eit pipol husat igat pinis HIV, Wan-Tausen-Wan-Handred-na-Faivpela-Ten-Tri igat sik AIDS, na ikam inap nau, Tu-Handred-na-Foapela-Ten-Tu pipol ibin dai pinis long dispela sik nogut.
Klostu samting olsem seventi-pesen long ol nupela kandim, ol ibin painim long Port Moresby, tasol, kandim tu ibin go antap tru long olgeta Hailens Provins.
Igat bikpela wari nau, olsem, nain-pesen long dispela sik i karamapim sik i kalap long mama igo long pikinini, na dispela emi bikpela namba tru insait long Asia Pacific Rijin.
Wanpela samting i gutpela moa long dispela, em, kandim blong ol pamuk lain i sanap tasol long eit-pesen, wea i soim olsem, ol pamuk lain i save iusim moa kondom.
Indonesia, sapos ol trabal i bagarapim uniti blong kantri, oa ol provins i gohet long toktok long indipendens.
Long wanpela toktok blong em igo long ol soldia long wanpela treining beis long West Java, General Sutarto i bin tok militari inap gohet tasol long wok blong en long lukautim sekuriti wok insait long kantri, sapos ol trabal i winim strong blong polis.
Long taim blong President Suharto bipo, polis fos i bin wanpela han blong militari.
Tasol, stat long taim oli bin rausim Suharto long 1998, ami i bin wok long traim larim wok blong sekuriti insait long kantri long han blong polis, i tru em ino bin tokaut stret olsem, em bai noken mekim tu dispela wok.
Long wik i pinis, top sekuriti minista blong gavman i bin tok lukaut olsem, Indonesia i bungim ol kain heve em inap long burukim kantri.
Agrikalsa Minista blong New Zealand, Jim Sutton ibin tokaut long ol tingting oa loa blong stopim kain sik, oli kolim foot and mouth disease long kalap nambaut long ol enimal long kantri.
Mr Sutton ibin tokim Radio New Zealand olsem, stat long nau, bai oli glasim olgeta kain beg i kamap long kantri wantaim x-ray masin na tu ol dok ol i trenim pinis, long smelim ol blong painim dispela sik.
Em i tok long ol dispela plen olsem blong taitim na strongim gut sekuriti wok, na tu, em i tok, ol dispela loa bai i save stap oltaim, bihainim heve i kamap long dispela sik em i wok long kamap long ol enimal long hap blong Europe.

Ol atoreti insait long Papua Niugini ibin tok-lukaut ken long ol pipol, long lukaut gut kerosin ol ibin miksim wantaim bensin na salim long not eria bilong kantri.
Ol kerosin ibin pairap na kamapim sampela moa bagarap long pipol, bihain long sampela long ol dispela kain birua ibin kamap long mun igo pinis.
Foapela pipol ibin dai na samting olsem 40 ibin kisim bagarap taim ol kerosin ibin pairap na kukim bodi bilong pipol, raun long Madang Provins long mun igo pinis.
Ol kerosin lam na kerosin stov bilong ol ibin pairap taim ol ibin wok long laitim ol.

Ol tambu agensim Fiji bai stap yet.

Ol laen blong Oil kampany, B-P Australia i wok long gohet long lukluk long ol ples oa vilis antap long mauden long Papua New Guinea blong painim na kisim bek ol rong-mix kerosin.
Foapela pipal i dai pinis na 43 i bin kisim bagarap bihaen long kerosin em i bin mix wantaem petrol i bin pairap na kuiim ol long ol longwe vilis antap long north coast blong PNG long despela mun igo pinis.
BP Gneral manager long PNG Peter Diexman i tok toklukaut long last mun long pipal long despela rong-mix-kerosin bai oli noken usim, ino bin kamap long ol longwe ples, em blong go akmap long ol, i nap wokobaut tupela wik.

European Union i bin holim wanpela mergency miting bihaen long despela sik long Foot and Mouth disease, oli bin painim long France.
Michael Brissenden i ripot olsem em namba-wan case long oli painim long mainland Europe.
Oli wok long poret na wei long despela sik i kamap long Europe, tasol nau, wari blong ol i kamap tru tru, long wanem oli tokaut stret pinis sikispela cattle oa kaw long wanpela farm long Mayene long northwestern France, oli bin testim ol na oli bin kamap positive oa i gat despela sik.
Ol despela cattle i bin stap klostu long farm husat i bin save kisim ol sheep blongen i kam long United Kingdom long mun February.
Oli kilim indai pinis olgeta sheep, na nau em klia despela sip i kalap pinis na nau oli wari olsem long ol despela de i kam bai oli painim sampela moa farm i gat despela sik.
Italy i tokaut pinis long em redi tu long wuas long despela foot and mouth disease bihaen long ol ofisa i bin painim foot and mouth anti-bodies long ol bulumakau, long soim olsem ol despela animal i bin expose long despela sik.
Long UK, oli bin painim pinis faivpela niupela case ken na nau em i gat pinis 188 i gat despela sik.

Tasol Sean Dorney i ripot olsem Council i laikim Interim Gavman, em Court of appeal i bin tok longen, em nongut gavman ao illegal aninit long 1997 constitution, i mas mekim wok olsem caretaker gavman yet igo inap long oli holim ol election.
Great Council of chiefs ino bin laik tokaut long wanem ol recommendation oa tingting em i bai i tokim President longen, taim em i bin pinisim miting blongen long nait.
Great Council of Chiefs i wanbel long bikpela decision Court of appeal i bin tokaut longen pinis, na em bai i noken toktok moa long rausim 1997 constitution.
Em i wanbel long oli mas pinisim laif blong Parliament na ol electioon i mas kamap hariap long wanem taim oli makim aninit long pawa blong despela mama-loa oa constitution.

Wanpela toktok em U-S Pacific Fleet long headkwata blongen long Pearl Harbour i bin givim aut i tok em bai i kisim samting olsem sikispela mun long kisim aut despela bot aninit long 610-metre solwara na em bai i kostim 80-million dola.
Nainpela pipal, em foapela long ol ol high skul sumatin, oli ting i bin indai bihaen long submarine, USS Greeneville i bin bamim despela sip taim em i bin laik go antap long solwara.
Ol Deep sea robot wantaem Camera ino bin painim bodi blong pipal aninit long solwara we despela sip i stap longen, tasol ol kandare oa famili blong ol pipal i dai i tok long askim strong long oli mas pulim winisim aut despela sip long solwara.
Wanpela court of inquiry igo long wanem action captain na boskru blong submarine i bin wokim nau i stap long namba-tu wik blongen.
Oli rausim pinis tupela sumatin long wanpela bikpela skul long Papua New Guinea bihain long oli bin bringim gan igat katres long en igo long skul.
Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem, dispela asua i bin kamapim wari long ol papa-mama, polis na ol autoriti blong edukesin.
Oli bin singautim ol polis igo long Korobosea International School long Port Moresby, we oli bin painim gan long tupela gred sikis sumatin.
Oli no save hau tupela i bin kisim dispela gan oa wanem as na oli bringim gan igo long skul.
Tasol dispela trabel i soim wankain pasin i bin kamap long skul long America.
Skul Bod i rausim pinis dispela tupela sumatin na polis i wok long traim long painim aut hau oli bin kisim dispela gan.
Polis i tok, bai oli sasim tupela.
Planti pipal i wok long kisim nating ol gan long Port Moresby, na planti long ol i stap long han blong ol kriminel, tasol bikpela namba blong pipal nau i wok long baim ol long usim agensim ol kriminal.
Tasol dispela pasin long kisim gan igo long skul, ino save kamap bipo, na dispela nau i kamapim bikpela wari namel long komuniti long Port Moresby.
Wanpela olpela komanda blong Papua New Guinea Difens Fos i tok ol tingting blong kamapim senis long fos, ino gutpela tingting tumas.
Ted Diro, husat i memba blong paliment nau, i bin nambawan komanda blong PNG Difens Fos.
PNG Cabinet i tok orait pinis long statim wanpela rifom progrem em igat long en wanpela tinting blong daunim namba blong ol memba blong en lusim 4-tausen igo daun long tu-tausen.
Mr Diro i tok taim em i tru sampela hap long dispela tingting i gutpela, tasol tingting ia i blong daunim namba na ino blong wokim gut Difens Fos bai kamap gut na i mekim stret kain wok Papua New Guinea i laikim.
Papua New Guinea Gavman i saspen pinis long ekting bos blong Tourism Promotion Authority blong kantri.
Gavman i bin saspen long Richard Kassman taim oli wetim wanpela wok-painim em i wok long painim aut moa long ol toktok olsem, ol kain paul wok i bin kamap long Authority.
Tourism Minista Samson Napo i tok em i wari long ol tokwin olsem ol paul wok i bagarapim pinis ol moni ikam long wanpela bajet em Authority Board ino oraitim yet.
Minista i tok em bai tokaut long wanpela investigation oa wok-painim sampela taim dispela wik, na Mr Kassman bai stap yet long saspensen inap long taim dispela wok-painim i givim ripot blong en.
Gavman redio stesin bilong Samoa itok- parlimen bilong Samoa bai bung tumora bilong makim wanpela niupela gavman.
15) ol independent memba bilong parlimen ino hamamas long despela, long wanem ol itok, oli girapim pinis wanpela coalition gavman wantaim Samoa National Development Party bilong lain opposition, em Tupua Tamasese Efi igo pas longen.
Stet redio itok- Head of State, Malietoa Tanumafili ibin askim long parlimen long holim meeting - bihain long oli tokaut pinis long election result.
India i putim berek long Australia kriket.
Long nius blong kriket.
Australia i bin wok long winim olgeta kriket Test.
Nogat narapela tim i bin nap long winim em.
Tasol nau, India i bin nap long winim Australia long ol Test blong tupela long Calcutta, long India yet.
India i putim berek pinis long longpela win blong Australia taim em i winim dispela tim long 171 runs.
Jim Maxwell i ripot olsem, India i bin boulim aut Australia taim sko blong ol i bin 212 tasol.
Dispela 212 i sot tru long 384 runs em oli bin laik kisim blong winim dispela Test.
Gavana blong Guam, Carl Gutierrez, igo bek pinis long Guam bihainim foapela de lukluk raun long Cairns, Australia.
Raun blong em ia i bin wanpela economic mission -- raun blong lukluk na toktok long ol wok bisnis.
Taim em i stap long Australia em i bin bungim ol lokal ofisal, lukim ol skul blong skulim save long lukautim ol turis na ronim ol hotel, insait long Taft University.
Lukluk blong em long dispela i blong painim aut wanem kain rot i stap blong halvim Guam.
Tingting blong bihain taim i olsem, Guam i ken kamap sista siti blong Cairns.
Kapten blong Japanese fishing bot Ehime Maru, em wanpela sabmarin blong America i bin bamim na mekim igo daun long solwara long mun i pinis, i bin tokim wok-painim blong American nevi long hau bot blong em i bin bagarap.
Kapten Hisao Ohnishi i bin tokim dispela wok-painim olsem, em ino bin gat taim long tromoi ol life raft oa gumi, tasol solwara i bin karim em lusim bot, taim sabmarin i bamim bot blong em long namba 9 de blong mun Febriaru, long Hawaii.
Kapten Ohnishi i tok em i trip na lukluk tasol taim bot blong em, Ehime Maru, i go daun long solwara bihain long samting olsem 5 minitna olgeta tenpela life raft oa gumi blong swim i bin bruk lusim bot na sut ikam bek antap long solwara.
Em i tok dispela i bin halvim ol pipol husat i stap laif nau.
Nainpela long ol 35 pipol husat i bin stap long bot, wantaim foapela sumatin, i lus yet stat taim blong birua long Februari 9, na oli ting oli mas dai pinis.
Sabmarin blong American nevi, nem blong en Greeneville, i bin igat 16 sivilian visita insait long en taim dispela birua i kamap.
Wanpela nevi investigeta i bin tok, ating dispela birua i bin kamap long wanem planti man tumas i bin stap long kontrol rum long dispela taim na oli pasim wok blong ronim sabmarin.
President blong Fiji, Ratu Josefa Iloilo, i tok nambawan bikpela wok blong caretaker gavman em long rereim wanpela nupela eleksan blong bringim dispela kantri igo bek long demokrasi.
Ratu Josefa aste i bin tokaut long dispela caretaker gavman em olpela praim minista Laisenia Qarase bai go pas long en.
Ratu Josefa i makim ken dispela gavman bihainim resignesin blong Ratu Tevita Momoedonu, man husat i bin holim caretaker praim minista wok inap tasol long wanpela de.
Em i bin tokim pinis President long dissolve oa pasim paliment redi long eleksan.
Ratu Josefa i tok em i bilip olsem, nambawan bikpela wok oli mas mekim nau em long go bek long pipol blong mekim nupela eleksan.
Em i tok dispela bai wanpela wei tasol blong stretim ol paul tngting namel long ol pati.
Em i tok dispela bai larim husat i laik kamap memba blong paliment blong go bek long pipol blong kisim rait blong kamap memba.
Ol dispela senis senis long gavman, i bihainim tingting blong Fiji Court of Appeal olsem, interim gavman i bin illegal -- oa i rongpela gavman aninit long loa long ronim kantri.
Na long ol narapela nius, Australia Foren Minista Alexander Downer i tok em bai wet na lukim wanem samting i kamap nau.
Mr Downer i tok em i hamamas long lukim olsem, President Iloilo i promis pinis long kamapim bek demokrasi aninit long 1997 konstitusen, tasol em i tok dispela wok bai slow - oa bai go isi isi.
Em i tok ol tambu Australia i gat agensim Fiji bai stap pastaim.
Ol toktok bai gohet tede moning blong pinisim wanpela trabal long hetkuota blong Papua New Guinea Difens Fos we sampela soldia i bin kisim ol gan na lokim ol yet insait.
Niusman Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem ol dispela soldia i lokim ol yet insait long hetkuota wantaim ol gan oli bin stilim long armoury oa ples blong putim ol samting blong pait long bareks.
Ol soldia i bin tokim ol sinia ofisa olsem, oli mekim dispela pasin bihain long oli harim olsem Australia bai salim ol soldia blong en igo long Papua New Guinea blong lukautim loa na oda, taim ol senis i kamap long PNG Difens Fos.
Insait long ol dispela senis, ol bai katim namba blong fos lusim 4-tausen igo daun long 2-tausen.
Ol sinis difens fos ofisa nau i wok long stretim toktok wantaim ol dispela soldia, blong traim na kolim bel blong ol bai oli givim bek ol samting blong pait na ol ki blong armoury.
Oli no bin ting yet bai kain trabal olsem i kamap bihainim ol toktok long katim daun fos.
Ol kain kain tokwin i wok long go raun long Port Moresby nau stat long taim toktok i kam aut long difens rifom long wik i pinis.
PNGDF Chief of Staff, Colonel David Takendu, i tok Gavman ino bin toktok wantaim Fos long ol rifom, olsem na nius long en i kamapim bikpela bel heve na belkros namel long ol memba.
Praim Minista blong Samoa, Tuilaepa Sailele, i tok Head of State i makim em pinis blong kamap nupela praim minista.
Dispela pasin blong Head of State i pulim bikpela toktok ikam long ol lida blong oposisen, husat i tok em i wanpela pasin nogut.
A-F-P nius ejensi i tok makim Tuilaepa long tok olsem Head of State i bin givim wanpela worent blong makim nupela praim minista, pastaim long paliment i sidaun nambawan taim tede bihainim eleksan long Mas namba-tu de.
Bipo, oli save elektim praim minista long secret ballot we ol 49 memba blong Fono oa Legislative Assembly, i save votim em, bihainim ol kain kain kempein na gris tok em i save kisim planti wik.
Tasol dispela taim, Tuilaepa i tok Head of State i makim em pinis olsem praim minista, bihain long em i bin soim olsem, Human Rights Protection Party blong em, em i ronim kantri, i holim 28 seats, we em i min em i klia olsem, em i holim majority oa planti seats moa.
A-F-P i tok aninit long wanpela senis i kamap long ol rul blong paliment oli kolim - standing orders em Human Rights Protection Party i bin kamapim, Head of State i ken makim tasol wanpela praim minista sapos em i kisim sapot blong planti memba blong Fono.
Solomon Islands palamen i bin redi long holim miting blong en aste, tasol oli sukurim taim ken inap long narapela wik.
Nesanel redio, SIBC, i tok makim gavman long tok olsem, dispela long wanem baset ino redi, na tu ol palamen memba ino bin kamap long Honiara.
Baset i bikpela samting, na astingting blong en em long givim paua long gavman aninit long loa, long ronim kantri bihain long taim oli makim em long mun June long yar igo pinis.
Oli ting paliment bai toktok tu long wanpela loa em bai givim amnesty oa marimari long ol lain combatants - pipol i save paitim wanpela narapela bipo.
Dispela emi wanpela long ol samting gavman i mas mekim aninit Townsville Peace Agreement.
World Weightlifting Championships bilong dispela yar, em oli bin laik holim long Nauru, nau oli muvim pinis igo long Guam.
Long 1998, ol i bin makim Guam long hostim dispela sempionsip.
Tasol, Oceania Weightlifting Presiden, Paul Coffa, i tok, sampela lain i bin autim tingting-wari na oli tok olsem, ol ino ting Nauru igat inap gutpela peles na gutpela samting bilong hostim gut dispela bikpela sempionsip.
Mr Coffa i tok olsem, bihain long ol i bin toktok wantaim International Weightlifting Federation na Guam National Olympic Committee, ol i bin kamapim tingting bilong muvim dispela sempionsip igo long Guam.
Sempionsip bai kamap long mun Oktoba.
Supreme Court long Canada i salim pinis tripela China man, husat oli bin konviktim oa salim ol long kalabus long bringim-hait 190 pipal long Canada long wanpela olpela na brukbruk sip long mun August 1999, i kalabus inap long foapela yiar.
Oli no bin kisim tokorait long bringim ol dispela pipal igo long Canada.
British Columbia Supreme Court Justice Sunni Stromberg-Stein i givim ruling olsem dispela tripela China man, YU HUA LI, HONG LING LIN na WEI QUING LIN, ol blong Fujian province, bai i stap kalabus inap long tupela yiar na tupela mun, tru oli bin stap kalabus pinis i nap long 19 mun.
Jas i bin tok, dispela taim oli givim long oli stap long kalabus bai i stopim husat pipal i wok long mekim dispela kain pasin long bringim-hait pipal, na tu, bai stopim ol narapela long wokim wankain pasin.
Long pinis blong mun Februeri, oli bin painim Li, Lin na Lin ibin rong long rediim na halivim long wok blong bringim moa long tenpela pipal igo insait long Canada na oli no bin gat ol pepa olsem passport na ol visa long travel oa wokabaut.
Gavman nius sevis bilong China i tok, foapela bom-pairap em ibin bagarapim ol haus bilong pipol insait long Shijiazhuang siti long northern China, em i wok na pasin-nogut bilong wanpela evil doer oa man-nogut.
China News Service i tok, ol dispela bom ibin pairap long kapital bilong Hebei provins, na ibin kilim na givim bagarap long planti pipol.
Xinhua niusagensi i ripot aste olsem 18 pipol ibin dai long dispela bom-pairap na dispela namba bilong pipol i dai pinis, ino senis inap long kolostu 24 haua.
Information Centre for Human Rights and Democracy long Hong Kong i tok, samting olsem 200 pipol ibin dai long dispela bom-pairap.
Ol tok-promis blong nupela Presiden na Praim minista long holim ol demokratik eleksin, i mekim Fiji long holim hope bai ol heve long politiks na sidaun blong pipal i nap pinis long planti mun, em ku long yiar igo pinis i bin kamapim, bai i pinis na pinis olgeta.
Sarere Niuspepa blong Fiji, Post, i ripot long ol selebresen, em oli laik holim blong strongim ken gutpela sidaun namel long ol Indian na Fijian kommuniti.
Presiden na Praim minista i bin stap long wanpela prea-miting long Suva.
Ol narakain tingting long politiks na ekonomi, namel long ol asples Fijian na bikpela lain Indian pipal, ibin halivim kirapim tingting long ku i bin kamap long mun Mei, em i bin rausim nambawan gavman long Fiji em wanpela Indian ibin go pas longen.

Indonesia i putim moa long tu-tausen soldia long wuas long bikpela Arun gas field long Aceh, bai Exxon Mobil i ken statim ken oil na gas operation blongen.
Planti trabal na pait i wok long kamap long Aceh provins long dispela taim.
Kodineting Minista blong Politiks, Sosel na Sekuriti Affairs, Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono i tok, oli bin tokim em olsem oli putim nautripela battalion na wanpela cavalry long wok long hap.
Wanwan Indonesian ami battalion i save gat samting olsem 650 soldia i stap long en.
Exxon Mobil i bin klosim operesen oa wok blong en long ol gas na oil field long stat blong dispela mun, long wanem ol independensrebel i bin laik kamapim trabal, olsem na oli bin poret na klosim operesen.
Dispela gas na oil field i save exportim liquified natural gas igo long ol market long Japan na South Korea, na em bikpela wok we Indonesia i save i kisim bikpela moni moa longen i kam long ol arapela kantri.
Yudhoyono i tok, oli wok long ofa long ol wokman long wokobaut wantaim ol soldia igo-kam, namel long ples blong wok na ol setelmen bilong ol.
Ol result nau i stat long kam in long despela Australia by-election long Ryan long Brisbane i soim olsem Australian Labor party i wok long go-pas.
Louise Willis i ripot olsem wanpela hawa igo insaet long kandim ol vot, ol fugure i soim eleven-percent two-party prefered swing igo long Labor long despela seat, em bifo oli bin lukim olsem wanpela safe seat blong Liberal party.
Oli klosim pinis poll oa vot long federal by-election long Queensland.
Ol vota long dispela seat long Ryan long Brisbane, ibin vot tede long huast man oa meri bai i kisim ples blong olpela Liberal M-P na olpela Defens Minista, John Moore.
Louise Willis i ripot olsem oli lukim dispela poll olsem test long kain leadership style blong Praim Minista John Howard na Federal Labor lida Kim BeazleyOl risalt long ol polling booth bai i kamap insait long liklik taim tasol nau.
Ol polling blong kisim tingting blong pipal i wok long soim olsem Labor long nambawan taim tru insait long 50 yar, bai i winim dispela by-election.
Maski wanem risal i kamap, dispela poll bai i soim-aut hau plantiAustralia pipal bai vot long Federal eleksin bilong Australia em bai i kamap long pinis blong dispela yiar.
Papua New Guinea Gavman i mekim disisen pinis long noken gohet wantaem ol senis oa rifom long Defens Fos bilong kantri.
Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem dispela disisen i kamap bihainim protes em ol soldia wantaim gan i bin holim long Defens hetkwata long Port Moresby long dispela tripela de igo pinis.
Insait long wanpela toktok em oli bin givim aut, Praim Minista Sir Mekere Morauta i tok, ol senis oa rifom em Commonwealth Eminent Persons group ibin toktok long wokim, bai i noken kamap.
Ol dispela senis oa rifom, i gat longen, plen bilong katim namba blong ol soldia long 50 pesen.
Dispela tasol i bin kamapim dispela protest long Murray Bareks we samting olsem 100 soldia ibin stilim ol gan long armoury oa ples blong ami long storim ol gan na banisim ol yet long ol kwata bilong ol.
Nau long dispela taim oli wok long stap yet.
Sir Mekere i tok, em i save long wari blong ol soldia na tru em bikpela samting long wokim ol senis long Defens Fos, tasol sapos em i gat ol heve olsem trabal i ken kamap longen, em bai i noken larim ol heve na trabal i kamap long ol dispela sanis oli laik wokim.
Ripot i tok olsem, spika bilong Indonesia Palamen ibin kamapim tingting olsem Presiden Abdurrahman Wahid i mas mekim ceremonial wok tasol olsem head of state na larim vais presiden bilong em i ronim kantri.
Megawati Sukarnoputri, orait dispela iken halivim long pinisim ol heve bilong politik i wok long kamap nau long kantri.
Em i tok olsem, ol strongpela toktok na tingting em i wok long kamapim nau bilong rausim Presiden, iken brukim-nabaut pipol na kamapim bikpela heve, maski sapos em i kamap aninit long loa, na dispela iken kamapim pait-koros namel long pipol na kamapim dai bilong planti pipol.
Presiden Wahid i wok long sakim planti strongpela toktok ikam long ol birua bilong em long em i mas pinis-wok na larim Megawati i kamap lida, bihain long Indonesia palamen ibin korosim em long nambawan dei bilong mun Februeri.
Palamen ibin korosim Presiden Wahid, bihain long ol ibin sutim tok long em long stap insait long tupela financial scandal oa rong-pasin we sampela lain ibin paulim moni.
Wanpela lapun man bilong Japan, em ol i tok olsem, ibin kamapim-bikpela video games bisnis bilong Sega, na bihain lukim ol narapela birua games olsem Sony na Nintendo, i winim ol, i dai pinis long Japan.
Isao Okawa, na krismas bilong em ibin 74 yar taim em ibin dai.
Wanpela mausman bilong kampani i tok, Mr Okawa, husat i presiden na siaman bilong dispela video game kampani, ibin dai long sik bilong heart oa leva long wanpela hausik long Tokyo.
Sega i tok, em bai pinis long wokim Dreamcast console, tasol bai go het long wokim ol gems bilong Sony PlayStation 2 na Game Boy Advancebilong Nintendo, na ol i ting olsem bai kampani i lusim moa long 368 Million Dola insait long fiscal year em i pinis long namba 31 de bilong mun Mas.
Human Rights grup, Amensty International itok, ol pasin bilong hangamapim na kilim nambaut, pulim kalapusim nating na givim pen na bagarapim sidaun bilong ol pipol, i wok long gohet yet insait long Indonesia, na gavman ino mekim sampela samting hariap bilong kamapim ol senis.
Amensty iwok long tingting long bringim despela heve bilong bagarapim siduan na ino luksave long raits bilong ol pipol insait long Indonesia, igo long meeting bilong United Ntaions Human Rights Commission long Geneva long Mande.
Amensty itok, pasin bilong bagarapim sidaun bilong ol pipol i nogut tru insait long Aceh na Irian Jaya, we ol lain i sapotim indipendens long hap i bin kamapim ol trabel.
Amesnty bai askim Commission long salim wanpela lain bilong mekim ol wok painim igo insait long despela ol pasin nogut bilong kilim ol pipol na ba bagarapim sidaun bilong ol pipol igo insait long despela tupela distrik.
Despela grup iwok long toktokt tu long Commission bilong girapim wanpela intanesanel penal kot, bilong sasim ol despela lain oli sutim tok long ol long bagarapim sidaun biong ol pipol insait long East Timor, pastaim long emi kisim indipendens.
Quarantine na Inspection Service bilong Australia iwok long tingting yet long sapos em iken tokorait long oli rausim ol kago antap long wanpela sip bilong Korea, em iwok long igo sua nau long wanpela sipbris bilong Queensland.
Ol lain i save wok long sipbris ibin toksave long despela lain, bihain long oli painim aut olsem, igat ol hap pipia bilong mit, grain oa wheat na ol hap graun i pas nambaut long ol steel oa aen, em despela sip, Kensho, i karim.
David Finlayson bilong Australia na Quarantin Inspection Service itok, oli wok long holim yet ol kago insait long quarantin igo inap long taim oli kamap wantaim tingting long sapos oli mas klinimgut ol despela pipia oa long sipbris.
Nau yet, oli rausim pinis ol masin bilong wok long ol fam em oli usim ol pinis antap long wanpela sip bilong Britain, em ibin go sua long sipbris bilong Melbourne.
Oli wok long poret nogut ol despela masin ol mas usim pinis long ol hap graun long Britain we despela sik nogut bilong enimal oli kolim, foot-and-mouth disease i kamap bikpela long en.
Quarantin na klinim ol gut pastaim.
Praim minista bilong Australia, John Howrd i tok, gavman bai ino nap mekim wanpela samting long despela tingting bilong ol lida bilong ol kantri i save kamapim oil long daunim mak bilong oil oli save kamapim.
Prais bilong petrol bai go antap bihain long OPEC i bin tokorait long daunim mak bilong oil oli save kamapim long 1 milian barel blong wanwan de.
Howard i tok maski prais bilong oil igo antap oa ikam daun oltaim, prais bai ikam daun long wan na haf sent long wanwan lita.
Tasol tasim em i autim tingting wari long despela tingting bilong OPEC, Mr.
Howard i tok em ino nap senisim tingting bilong OPEC.
Em i tok emi ting ol OPEC yet bai kisim heve long dispela tingting blong en.
Praim minista itok em ino nap pasim OPEC na lida bilong oposisen Kim Beazly bai ino nap mekim wanpela samting longen tu.
Australia PM i wari long bikpela wok tumas oli givim long PNG Gavman.
Praim Minista blong Australia, John Howard, i bin tokaut olsem, em i wari long lukim ol taraipela wok oli laikim Papua New Guinea Gavman i kamapim long Difens Fos blong en.
Mr Howard i tok em i toktok pinis wantaim Sir Mekere long dispela heve, na i tokim Sir Mekere olsem, PNG Gavman i ken yusim General Michael Jeffery blong Australia long halvim em i kamapim rifom long militari.
Mr Howard i tok Australia bai lukim wanem kain trabal sampela lain i laik kamapim agensim konstitusenel otoriti blong PNG Gavman, olsem bikpela samting nogut.
Em i tok em i save i gat ol kain kain heve i stap insait long dispela difens rifom progrem, na i tok Australia i ofa pinis long dispela.
Tasol em i tok dispela halvim blong Australia bai kamap long kain wei we em bai mas respektim soveriegnty na independence blong Papua New Guinea.
Liberal i daunim liklik mak blong Labour vot long Ryan bai-eleksan.
Mak blong vot em Australia Labor Party i bin wok long go pas long en insait long Ryan bai-eleksan long Queensland, nau i go daun liklik, tasol pipol bai mas wet sampela de pastaim long save tru long husat i winim eleksan.
Kendidet blong Australia Labour Party long dispela bai-eleksan, Leonie Short, nau i go pas tasol nau long 299 winim Liberal Party kendidet, Bob Tucker.
Ol ofisa blong Electoral Commission i kandim ppinis samting olsem 2-tausen-7-handret long olgeta 9-handret-na-50-tausen vot pipol i bin putim bipo na bihain long taim blong vot i bin stat.
Long kain sistem oli kolim two-party preferrence, Labor i gat 50-point-tu pesent blong vot, taim Liberals i holim 49-point-8 pesent.

Mir bai buruk na pundaun igo insait long South Pacific long samting olsem 0620 UTC tede, Fraide, 15 yar na wan mun bihain long taim Soviet Union i bin sutim em igo antap long skai.
Russia misin kontrol i bin statim laspela countdown, na nau i gat 24 aua tasol nau i stap.
Em i tok Mir nau i kamap long taim we oli no nap tanim bek oa stopim taim em i pundaun na i paia long skai.
