Oli kilim pinis samting olsem tenpela pipol insait long ol nupela pait ken long Kalimantan provins blong Indonesia, we planti handret pipol i dai pinis insait long ol pait namel long ol lain wanpisin long mun i pinis.
Antara nius blong Indonesia i tok ol pait namel long ol asples Dayaks na pipol blong Madura husat igo sidaun long Kalimantan, i bin kirap ken klostu long Kuala Kapuas taun.
Oli no klia wanem samting i bin statim pait ken.
Antara i tok ol bikpela belheve na bel-kros i stap yet long planti hap klostu long taun, na sampela pipol i go kukim ol haus.
Central Kalimantan i bin hap wanpela hap we ol bikpela pait stret namel long ol lain wanpisin i bin kamap long mun i pinis, we planti handret pipol i bin idai, planti long ol ol Madurese - husat ino blong Kalimantan - em ol asples, ol Dayaks, i bin go raun kilim ol.
Ol dispela pait i mekim na planti tausen i bin kirap na ronawe lusim Kalimantan.
Fiji gavman, em pipol ino bin elektim, inap pulim gut win liklik nau long wanem wanpela UN komiti oli kolim United Nations Committee on the Elimination of Racial Discrimination, i givim kantri moa taim blong bekim sampela toktok oli sutim long en long bagarapim pipol.
Dispela i min caretaker gavman blong Praim Minista Laisenia Qarase bai gat moa taim blong bekim ol toktok oli sutim long en olsem, wanpela plen oli laik bihainim blong lukautim gut tasol ol asples Fijian na ol Rotuman, i wanpela nogut tingting em oli kolim long Tok Ingilis long - racist document.
Sampela non-government organisations long Fiji i bin ripotim dispela plen igo long United Nations komiti, we oli tok em i apim tasol nem blong wanpela lain pipol blong kantri olsem superior oa nambawan lain pipol winim ol narapela, na i daunim ol narapela pipol olsem ol pipia tasol.
As long en long dispela na oli bin singautim Fiji gavman long sanap long aie blong dispela komiti long hetkuota blong en long Geneva.

President blong America, George W.
Bush, i tok America i sanap halvim UN Secretary General Kofi Annan long holim dispela wok nambatu taim.

Kofi Annan, husat igat sikispela-ten-tri krismas, i tok em bai putim nem blong holim sekret general wok long narapela faifpela yar, taim taim blong en i pinis long 31 de blong mun Disemba.
Sampela Asian diplomet i tok, husat man bai holim dispela wok nau i mas kam long Asia, long wanem Mr Annan na man husat i bin holim wok pastaim long em, Boutros Boutros-Ghali, blong Egyptian, tupela i kam long African grup.
Ripot i tok tupela pipal i dai pinis na narapela tupela-ten-foa i bin kisim bagarap taim wanpela strongpela guria, strong blongen i 6.
Richter Sacle, i bin sekim Hiroshima siti na ol hap klostulongen long Japan.
Jiji Press nius ejensi i tok wanpela meri krismas blong en 75 long Hiroshima, em i stap 600 kilomita igo long West blong Tokyo, i bin indai taim haus blongem i bruk na kam daon antap longem.
Em i tok wanpela meri, krismas blongem 58 i bin indai tu long Ehime, long Shikoku ailan, seven handret kilomita igo long west blong Tokyo.
Despela nius ejensi i tok tupela pipal i bin kisim bikpela bagarap na narapela tupela-ten-tu namel long tupela hai skul sumatin i bin kisim ol liklik bagarap.

18) lokal ofisa, long givim ol pepa igo long ol maigrant long kam long Australia olsem ol sumatin.

Wanpela nuklia sip em i bin karim posin samting oli kolim plutonium, na i bin ron ikam long Europe abrisim Australia na South Pacific insait long nainpela wik, nau i wok long rausim ol dispela plutonium kako blong en long Japan.
Niusman Peter Martin i tok, oli ting kako blong dispela sip i gat long en inap plutonium blong wokim 20 nuklia samting blong pait.
Tri-handret pipol blong Japan husat, i bung blong protes agensim dispela sip, nem blong en Pacific Teal, i bin go bungim em, tasol tri-handret polisman tu i bin stap.
Taim ol nuklia woka i stat rausim ol bokis plutonium-uranium-oxide fuel, ol polisman blong Britain, em oli bilas long riot unifom, i bin sanap antap long sip na lukluk, wanpela i bin wok long pilai musik long begpaip.
Long ron blong dispela sip, Pacific Teal, ikam insait long Tasman solwara, em i bin traim abirisim ol sel bot em sampela pipol blong Australia na New Zealand i bin yusim blong protes agensim em.
Dispela kako plutonium-uranium-oxide fuel igo bek long Japan, bihain long oli bin wokim i kamap nupela ken long Europe.
Bai oli yusim dispela fuel wantaim ol uranium insait long ol nuklia paua stesin.
Tasol, i nogat tok orait i kam yet long ol lokal otoriti blong yusim dispela fuel.

Sir Fredrick, krismas blong em i winim 70, i bin wok longpela taim long gavman.

Wanpela academic oa univesiti tisa bilong New Zealand i tok, politikal na ekonomik developmen long Niue insait long Pacific, ino soim wanpela long ol gutpela samting i kamap long foran polisi bilong New Zealand.
Dispela man, Professor John Henderson, hetman bilong Dipatmen bilong political science long Cantebury Universiti i tok, ating, samting ol i kolim re-integration em i wanpela samting tasol i stap bilong halivim Niue long taim bihain.
Niue ibin wok long lukautim em yet aninit long free association wantaim New Zealand, stat long 1974 ikam inap nau, na namba bilong ol pipol long kantri i lusim 5000 na go daun nau long 1750.
Niue igat wanpela legislative assembly em igat 20 memba long en na i save kisim bikpela halivim tru ikam long New Zealand, winim ol arapela kantri insait long Pacific.
Dokta Henderson ibin tokim Radio New Zealand International olsem, Niue i wok long kamap olsem wanpela kantri em ino inap long sanap na lukautim em yet.
Em i tok, gavman bilong Niue nau i bungim wanpela bikpela heve long katim-daun pablik sevis, long wanem planti pipol long ailan i save wok long gavman, na ibin tok tu olsem, turis bisnis tasol ibin gro liklik insait long private sector.
Oli bin tokim gavman bilong Solomon Islands long mekim sampela wok na samting nau bilong pasim ekonomi i bruk-daun.
Nesenel redio i tok, lain oli kolim Civil Society Group i bin mekim dispela salim dispela toktok igo long Praim Minista Manasseh Sogavare.
Dispela grup i bin tok, long dispela taim, we oli stap insait long pis wok, oli laikim ol paitman long givim bek ol gan na samting bilong pait na rediim ol toktok bilong bel-isi pasin i kamap namel long ol birua grup long kantri.
Tasol, dispela grup i poret tu, long wanem sapos ekonomi i bruk-daun, orait ol toktok na wok bilong bringim pis bai inap bruk-daun tu.
Em i bin autim tingting-wari olsem, sapos oli larim ekonomi i bruk-daun, orait sidaun bilong pipol bai bagarap na dispela bai kamapim heve long ol pis wok, na taim heve i kamap long pis wok em bai inap brukim-nabaut ol pipol insait long kantri.
Gavman bilong Vanuatu ibin putim-kamap wanpela bill insait long palamen bilong wuas long wok bilong export oa salim kava long ol arapela kantri.
Em i mekim dispela samting, bihain long mak bilong kava ol i save salim long narapela kantri ibin go daun long dispela tupela yar igo pinis.
Ol ino tokaut yet long wanem ol samting i stap insait long dispela bill, tasol Pacific nius ejensi, PACNEWS, i tok, value bilong kava export ibin pudaun lusim 22 milian dola long 1998 na go daun long3 milian dola tasol long yar igo pinis.
Wanpela man i save export long kava, Charles Longwuah, i tok, quality bilong kava bilong Vanuatu i bin go daun long wanem politik na wantok sistem i wok long go insait long kava bisnis.
Em i tok, wanpela eksampol em long wanpela bikpela buyer bilong Pacific kava insait long Germany ibin stop long baim 200 tonnes long ol kava ikam long ol long wanwan yar.
Dispela buyer bilong Germany em i wanpela pharmaceutical firm oa kampani bilong wokim marasin.
000 tonnes long ol kava long olgeta yar, tasol i luk olsem dispela namba bai go daun long 800 tonnes long dispela yar.
Sampela pipal i bin ronawei pinis lusim wanpela immigration detention centre long Sydney.
Ofis blong Australia Immigration Minister, Phillip Ruddock i tok, 14 pipal i bin ronawei long Villawood detention centre, aste.
Oli bilip, dispela grup, wantaim tu sampela pikinini, i bin ronawei long wanpela construction zone long centre long southwest blong Sydney.
Ol ripot i tok olsem, ol immigration ofisel, i bin igo lukluk pinis long ol haus blong sampela pipal husat i bin go lukim ol wan-tok blong ol long dispela centre.
Ol sapota blong lida blong wanpela Chinese lotu grup i tok, oli gat strongpela bilip olsem kot long Guam bai lusim dispela lida taim em igo long distrik kot long wik bihain.
Man husat i bin kirapim kain lotu oli kolim Zhonggong muvment, Zhang Hongbao, i bin kamap long Guam wantaim wanpela giaman visa long Jenuari long yar igo pinis.
Long mun Septemba, oli bin rausim aplikesin blong em long kisim political asylum na oli kalabusim em i stap.
Ol sapota blong em i tok, Mr Zhang i gat gutpela loia tim, olsem loia blong O.
Simpson, Robert Shapiro, na i tok, Guam i nogat gutpela as long holime m i stap.
Wanpela skul blong ol Indian long Fiji, bai i nap pas bihaen long ol asples Fijia-papa-graon i bin go insaet na askim long traipela moni blong ol niupela lease.
Prinsipal blong skul, Nitya Nadan, i tok samting olsem faiv-pela-ten papa-graon i bin kamap long skul klostu long Nadi, na askim long 70-tausan Australia dola antap long ol moni em skul i bin peim pinis long lease.
Oli tok ol i bin mekim ol sumatin i kirap lusim ol klasrum na oli wok long sindaon aninit long ol diwai taim ol skul otoroti i toktok wantaem ol papa-graon em oli bin wok long koros i stap.
Ol papa-graon i bin larim despela skul long op tede, tasol oli tok lukaut long pasim skul sapos oli no peim ol despela moni oli askim longen, pastaem long 27 de blong mun bihaen.
Australia Gavman i stat pinis long mekim ol samting i bin promis long ol Democrats long en, blong daunim mak blong greenhouse gas emissions.
Jane Calvert i ripot olsem, oli bin fosim gavman long wanbel long putim wanpela progrem oli kolim - Greenhouse Gas Abatement Program, em bai kostim 400 milian dola, blong larim Democrats i halvim em long kamapim GST.
Tede long moning, insait long wanpela konfrens blong lukluk long samting oli kolim - sustainable power - gavman i bin makim 26 milian dola olsem nambawan hap long moni igo long Australian EcoGeneration Association na Origen Energy Power LimitedEnvironment Minist, Senator Rober Hill, i tok tupela kampani bai kamapim ol cogeneration plants long ol hap blong kantri.
Cogeneration em i wanpela wok we oli save kamapim wantaim heat oa hat olsem hat blong paia, na paua.
Dispela kain wei i save kamapim paua tasol ino save sipetim aut tumas bikpela greenhouse gas, em i save bagarapim envairomen, olsem ol olpela wei blong kamapim paua.
Narapela faifpela pipol i bin dai ken long ol pait namel long ol laen wan-pisin long Indonesia Borneo.
Long wankain taim oli bin lusim igo faivpela pipal husat oli ting i bin stap insaet long ol pait bipo em sampela pipal tu i bin indai longen.
Sampela taim bihaen bai oli kamap long kot.
Wanpela tokman blong ami i tokim pinis AFP nius agensi olsem long Tunde moning, oli bin kilim indai foapela Madurese maigrant taim oli wok long go bek long ples long Saka Mangkahati vilis long bik moning tru.
Despela tokman i tok pastaem long despela, oli bin karim ol despela eitpela pipol i dai pinis igo long South Kalimantan provins em i stap klostu, tasol oli bin traim long go bek long ol ples blong ol blong kisim sampela long ol kago-samting blong ol.
Long dispela taim, Kupuas districk polis i bin lusim igo fri faivpela Dayak laen-wanpisin, em polis i bin holim ol bihaenim ol pait oli bin stap insaet longen long mun igo pinis, we samting olsem faiv-handret pipal, planti tru long ol ol Madurese setla i bin dai longen.
Tasol, Polis i tokim AFP olsem tru, oli larim ol igo fri nau tasol ol kot kes blong ol i stap yet na bai oli mas go bek long kot long sampela taim bihaen.
Faivpela lida blong East Timor husat i no laikim despela ples long kisim indipendens, i go kamap pinis long Dili blong stap long ol peace toktok wantaem U-N edministresin na ol local politisen.
Dispela bai nambawan wokobaut blong ol despela politisen, husat i save sapotim Indonesia gavman, long go bek long East Timor, bihaen long em i bin bruk lusim Indonesia long 1999.
Ol despela lida i blong ol militia gang husat i bin kamapim bikpela bagarap long ol samting long East Timor.
U-N chief ov staff, Nagalingam Parameswaran, i tok em bikpela samting long ol despela peace toktok i kamap long bihaen-taim blong niupela kantri.
Em i tok sapos oli no holim ol despela peace toktok, bihaen-taim blong East Timor bai bungim ol heve gavman na kantri i no nap wok gut.
Long wokobaut blong ol, oli ting despela faivpela lida bai bungim Xanana Gusmao, husat oli ting bai kamap nambawan President, tu bai oli holim toktok wantaem hetman blong U-N misin, Sergio Vieira de Mello.
Long Solomon Islands, oli bin makim pinis wanpela nupela Bishop blong Gizo.
Dispela patar, Christoper Cardone, nau em i priest blong Nila, long Shortlands.

Tripela pipal i bin kilim ol yet wantaim wanpela bom oli bin pairap klostu long roadblock blong Israel ami, arasait long Kalkiliya vilis long West Bank.
Israel public redio i tok, dispela pairap blong bom i bin kamapim bagarap tu long fopela yangpela pipal em oli kisim ol pinis igo long hospital long Israel.
Polis i banisim pinis eria pait i bin kamap long en, long territori blong Israel klostu long West Bank.
Redio i tok, polis i wok long lukluk long bodi blong man husat i bin karim bom olsem bai oli ken save sapos em i bin karim narapela bom.
Pipal blong Vanuatu bai wet inap narapela sikispela de pastaem long save sapos ol bai gat niupela Gavman o nogat.
Sean Dorney i ripot olsem, President ino bin oraetim tingting blong Praim Minista Barak Sope, long pinisim Paliament.
Olsem na wanpela vot-nogat bilip long Mr.
Sope bai kamap long Paliament long Tunde long wik bihaen.
Tede long apinun, taim Vanuatu Paliament i bin open miting ken long Port Vila, Opposition i bin gat tupela-ten-nain memba taim Gavman i bin gat tasol tupela-ten-foa.
Namba blong Gavman i pundaon bihaen long Foren Minista Serge Vohor na ol memba blong Union of Moderate Pati blongem i bin lusim gavman aste long bung wantaem Opposition.
Praim Minista Sope, aste yet i bin save olsem em lusim pinis majoriti sapot, olsem na em i bin tokaut long askim President, Father John Bani long pinisim paliament bai oli ken holim niupela eleksan long kantri, tasol President i tok nogat long askim blongem.
Nau ol memba blong Paliament bai i stretim tingting long kirapim wanpela niupela Gavman blong Vanuatu, ol yet.
Oli putim pinis mosen igo long Paliament, tasol aninit long mama-loa, ol bai no nap vot long mosen inap long sevenpela de i lus pinis.
Long Tunde long wik bihain, Paliament bai vot long mosen, na sapos laen blong Opposition i ken holim yet namba em igat nau, Vanuatu bai gat niupela Praim Minista na niupela gavman long wik bihain.
President Abdurrahman Wahid blong Indonesia i bin sanap long aie blong paliment long Jakarta, na em i tok, ol toktok oli sutim long em long mekim ol korap pasin, ino tru.
Em i bin go sanap long aie blong paliment bihain long oli bin censure oa tok em i mas pinis olsem president long mun i pinis, bihainim ol tokwin olsem, em i bin stap insait long wanpela korap pasin we tu-milian dola i bin lus.
Insait long wanpela pepa em i bin raitim na narapela man i bin ritim makim em, Preident Wahid i bin tokaut ken olsem, em ino bin kisim dispela moni, na i tok, ol toktok oli sutim long em ino tru.
Em i sakim tu ol toktok insait long censure mosen ol memba blong paliment i bin muvim agensim em, na i tok, dispela pasin ino stret aninit long konstitusen.
Paliament nau i gat wanpela mun blong toktok long wanem samting oli mas mekim nau.
Cook Islands Gavman i tokaut pinis long sampela wei long bihaenim long wok blong pinisim ol heve long wok blong shipping long kanatri.
Namba-tu oa deputi Praim minista Norman George i tok independent otoroti bai kamapim loa long tripela shipping kampany tasol i ken holim laisons long operate igo long ol narapela kantri.
Oli no wokim yet ol despela niupela laisens long wok.
Long ol sip em bai save wok insaet tasol long kantri, gavman bai i kamapim loa em bai lukautim wok blong treding, na wuas long ol kain paul wok em oli ken bagarapim shipping bisnis long kantri.
George i tok despela em namba-wan rot long stopim kain heve na kros namel long kost blong ol kago long Rarotonga na ol ailan longwe moa long Raratonga.
Lange i tok, Howard gavman bai no nap winim eleksen bihainim GST.
Man husat i bin kamapim Goods and Services Tax oa GST long New Zealand i skelim olsem, Australia Federal Coalition Government i nogat gutpela sans long winim ken eleksan.
Australia Federal eleksen bai kamap sampela taim dispela yar.
Olpela praim minista blong New Zealand, David Lange husat nau i lukluk raun long Australia, i tok tingting blong Howard Gavman long kamapim G-S-T, i pulap long planti hasua long politik.

Bai oli yusim dispela blong lanim French tokples long skul.
Long seremoni blong givim ol dispela samting long Suva, Embeseda i bin tok ken olsem, France bai givim halvim long ol skul i skulim tokples French.
Embeseda i tok tu olsem, em i bikpela samting long kamapim wokbung namel long ol Pacific ailan husat i save tok Ingilis na ol narapela ailan i save tok French.
Ol holim pinis wanpela funeral service bilong wanpela olpela sinia pablic servant na bignem lida- Sir Fredrick Osifelo insait long bigtaun Honiara tete.
Bungim wangpela wantaim mak bilong olgeta yar em sir Fredirick ibin mekim em inap long 41 yar olgeta.
Em ibin wok olsem sinia secrtary bilong social service commission, commioner of lands na survey we em ibin holim despela wok igo inap long emi retire long pablic servis long 1974.
Ol bin makim speaker bilong legislative assembly na bihain em ibin kamap siaman bilong public service commission igo inap long independence.
Ol ibin gibim em mak or knighthood long 1977- na emi namba namba man bilong solomon ailen long kisim knighthood.
Independens lida bilong East Timor Xanana Gusmao ibin pinis wok olsem hetman bilong palamen bilong East Timor.
Mr Gusmao i tok, em ibin pinis-wok long Nesenel Kaunsil long protes long ol koros i wok long kamap namel long ol yet insait long Nesenel Kaunsil.
Mr Gusmao ibin risain ino longtaim bihain long wanpela debate em igat bikpela koros i kamap long en insait long Nesenel Kaunsil long wok-politik i kamap nau long East Timor, taim em i muv igo kolostu long full independence.
Em i tok, em i pilim olsem ol wok em i mekim bilong pinisim ol koros na narakain tingting insait long Kaunsil, ino karim kaikai, long wanem ol memba bilong Kaunsil inogat laik long larim ol nupela toktok i kamap.
Ol vota bilong East Timor bai elektim wanpela Constituent Assembly insait long nambawan demokratik eleksin bilong dispela territori long namba 30 de bilong mun Ogas, na dispela Assembli bai igat 90 dei long rediim na oraitim wanpela constitution oa mama-loa.
Mr Gusmao ibin komplen tu long ol toktok em ol olpela guerilla oa paitman bilong Falintin ibin sutim long em, we ol ibin tok olsem em ino demokratik.
Ol ibin rausim pinis dispela Falintin pait grup na i wok long tanim em i kamap wanpela defens fos nau.
Chief Justis blong Samoa i salim wanpela yangpela boi, krismas blongem twelve igo kalabus i nap long tupela yiar long sas long reip.
Despela boi, em yangpela boi tru long kot i kalabusim em long reip long Samoa.
Lawya blongem i bin traim hat long paitim toktok bai kot i noken kalabusim em long wanem krismas blongem liklik tru.
Em namba-wan taim tu long em i wokim kain trabal olsem na famili blongem i bin wokim pinis pasin tumbuna long ples blong pinisim kros wantaem famili blong yangpela gel, husat yangpela boi ia i bin reipim.
Krismas blong dispela gel i wanpela-ten-tri.
Chief justice i luksave long ol toktok, olsem boi ia em yangpela pikinini yet.
Deputi Praim Minista bilong Papua Niugini i tok olsem, ol bikpela kraim i wok long kamapim heve long 50 pesen long ol pipol bilong kantri, na planti long ol kriminal i save stap insait na raun long Port Moresby na ol arapela bikpela taun long kantri.
Em i tok, stat long 1996 igo inap long 1998, moa long 230 murders oa kraim bilong kilim narapela man oa meri ibin kamap insait long Port Moresby, em igat samting olsem tri-handred-tausen pipol i stap long en.
Ibin igat moa long 800 serious sex crimes ibin kamap tu long hap, moa long 300 crimes we ol kriminal ibin usim ol gan na planti-tausen robberies oa stil-pasin ibin kamap.
Deputi Polis Komisina bilong PNG Sam Inguba ibin tokim dispela konfrens tu olsem, ol ino bin kirap-nogut long narapela kraisis ibin kamap long kantri, wankain olsem dispela ibin kamap long 1997, we ami ibin soim bel-koros bilong en na daunim gavman.
Em ino bin toktok stret long trabel ibin kamap ino longtaim igo pinis namel long sampela soldia na PNG gavman long plen bilong katim defens fos, tasol em i tok, trabel em ibin kamap long 1997 ibin soim eksampol long dispela kain heve bai kamap ken.

Ol pipol bilong Vanuatu bai wet inap long narapela wik long painimaut sapos ol igat wanpela nupela gavman.
Niusman Sean Dorney i ripot olsem Presiden ino bin laik bihainim wanpela askim ikam long Praim Minista Barak Sope long pinisim Palamen.

Praim Minista Sope ibin save olsem em ibin lusim majority sapot na ibin tokaut olsem em bai askim Presiden, Father John Bani, long pinisim palamen na singaut long nupela eleksin i kamap.
Tasol, Presiden ino bin laik bihainim dispela askim bilong em, na lusim disisen bilong fomim wanpela nupela gavman i stap long han bilong ol memba bilong Palamen.
Ol ibin putim-kamap wanpela motion of no confidence insait long Palamen, tasol aninit long mama-loa em i mas stap long palamen inap long sevenpela dei oa moa, long ol iken toktok long en.
Yasser Arafat i tok, ol Palestine pipol bai go het long pait igo inap long taim fleg bilong Palestine i flai antap long Jerusalem.
Mr Arafat i tok, Jerusalem bai kamap olsem kapital bilong wanpelaPalestinian state long taim bihain, na i tok, ol Palestine pipol bai go het wantaim fos na strongpela tingting igo inap long taim ol i kisim Jerusalem na kirapim wanpela state oa kantri bilong ol yet.
Em ibin mekim dispela toktok long wankain taim Presiden George W Bush bilong America ibin tok, em i wari tru long ol trabel i wok long kamap bikpela long Middle East.
Mr Bush i tok, dispela pasin bilong kamapim bel-koros na trabel ibin go het longpela taim tumas.
Em i tok, America bai kirapim bel bilong tupela sait wantaim, Israel na Palestine, long tupela i mas pinisim ol dispela trabel na givim safety na security long ol sivilien long tupela sait.

Wanpela human rights grup i tok, ol tingting-nogut na koros namel long ol pait grup long Solomon Islands i wok long go het, long wanem inogat wok i kamap bilong investigetim ol bagarap na heve ibin kamap long human rights na laif bilong pipol insait long kantri.

Amnesty i tok, ol emergency loa ibin pasim pipol long toksave long ol bagarap ibin kamap long human rights.
Kampani i ronim nupela chicken hatchery long Solomon Islands i hope olsem dispela projek bai halivim long daunim prais bilong kakaruk insait long kantri na kamapim gut saplai bilong kakaruk, long taim bihain.
Ol i save karim ol fertilised eggs bilong dispela hatchery long balus ikam long Nadi na igo long Honiara long wanwan wik na ol i save lukautim ol inap long 21 dei pastaim long ol eggs i buruk na liklik kakaruk i kamap.

Polis i bin igo insait long haus blong olpela Yugoslav President, Slobodan Milosevic long Belgrade, tasol em ino klia sapos oli bin holim kalabusim em.
Pasin polis i bin wokim, i bin statim gun pait we wanpela ofisa na wanpela photographer i bin kisim bagarap long en, taim planti handred pipal i bin bung raun long haus blong Milosevic long Belgrade.
Beta news agency i bin ripot pastaim olsem, oli wok long holim ol toktok nau blong mekim Mr Milosevic i givim em yet long han blong ol ofisel.
Polis i bin go insait long haus blong Mr Milosevic sampela hawa pastaim long taim America i bin makim long Belgrade i mas stat long wok bung wantaim United Nations War Crimes Court long The Hague, oa sapos nogat, bai oli no ken kisim planti million dola long halivim.

Australia - olsem na em ino bin nap igo istap long despela vot.

Australia Treasurer, Peter Costello itok, pudaun blong Australian dola ino soim olsem, ekonomoni blong kantri igo nogut.
Strong blong mak blong dola i bin pudaun igo long 48-point-five US cents, na oli ting dispela bai pudaun moa yet insait long ol dei ikam.
Em i bin mekim lain blong Opposition i askim Gavman long mekim sampela samting long en olsem em bai igo antap ken.

Indonesia i tok no-laikim pinis wanpela sivil kot-kes long America agensim Indonesia armi general, bagarapim pipal long East Timor.
Lain blong Human rights i bin kotim, Lieutenant General Johnny Lumintang.
Jakarta i tok, wanpela inquiri Indonesia i bin wokim, i bin soim olsem em ino bin wokim dispela rong na i tok, em kot-kes i brukim international conventions, em i tok, dispela kot kes i mas kamap yet insait long kantri we oli tok, dispela trabel i bin kamap long en.
Ministry i tok, dispela kot kes i kamap long district court blong America, long Washington olsem blong bagarapim naim blong Indonesia.
Indonesia i bin long tok no-laik long ol toktok long sasim planti sinia militari ofisa, em oli bin sutim tok long ol halivim ol pait na trabel i bin kamap long East Timor bihain long em i bin vot long kisim independence.
Gavman blong Japan i givim halivim long moa long 300-tausen dola igo long Bishop Epalle Community High School long Honiara, kapital blong Solomon Islands.

Mr Imaya i tok, em i hope dispela halivim bai halivim long givim gutpela skul long ol pikinini na training infrastructure long Community High School.
China bel kaskas longen.
Strongpela wok was ibin banisim despela lida long ples balus long Chiang Kai Shek usait ibin winim wanpela nobel peace prais.
Em ibin ron long wanpela balus bilong China ibin ikam olsem long India.
Pablic service commission bilong Fiji itok em bai bihainim rul bilong lo bilong rausim ol member bilong parliment bilong olpela labour coalition gavman em ol iwok long istap yet insait long ol haus bilong gavman.
Commission ibin makim tete- em laspela de bilong ol fopela memba wantaim tu- co-deputy praim minista- Adi Kuini na Doctor Tupeni Baba long lusim ol despela haus igo aut.

Tasol Doctor Baba itok- commission inogat pawa bilong rausim ol.
Oli tok lukaut pinis long praim minista bilong Solomon ailen- Manesseh Sogavare- long inoken apim mak bilong bringim ol samting igo insait long kantri- em takis bilong ol istap namel long 50 na 100 percent longen.
Despela tok luksaut ibin istap insait long wanpela open letter ikam long civil society grup igo long Mr.
Sogavare- na ol itok- kantri bai lusim moni inap long eit million dolla.
Despela grup ibin tok hamamas long oda bilong praim minista ino long taim igo pinis long daunoim takis long ol samting oli bringim igo insait long kantri- na bilip olsem ol ofisa bilong finance ministry ilaik painim aut moa long sait bilong ol na sait bilong presure grup.
Dispela grup i tok olsem, moa long wan-tausen-700 pipol i stap nau long death row na i wok long wetim dai-taim bilong ol.
Long stat bilong dispela mun, Presiden Arroyo, ibin rausim mekim-save bilong tupela man em ol ibin givim death penalty long tupela, tasol em ibin tok olsem, em i samting bilong Congress long rausim dispela mekim-save oa larim i stap.
Lain Human Rights and Equal Opportunities Commission long dispela wik bai givimaut ol nupela guidelines oa rul long wanem kain pasin na samting ol employers na ol arapela wokmanmeri i mekim, em Komisin i lukim olsem em i daunim ol meri igat bel.
Komisin i soim-aut klia olsem ol meri igat bel na ol i save wok, i wok long bungim ol kainkain heve yet insait long Australia.
Qantas, ibin tok olsem, bai ol i rausim sampela moa wokmanmeri long traim abirisim ol heve em kampani i wok long bungim long moni long dispela taim.
Em ibin tokaut pinis olsem bai pinisim wan-tausen-500 wokmanmeri long ol wok bilong ol, long traim-daunim ol kos bilong ronim kampani na mekim kampani i ron gut moa na kamapim win-moni.
Ol sekuriti fos bilong Indonesia ibin sutim-idai wanpela independens rebel insait long ol nupela pait i kamap long Aceh Provins bilong Indonesia.
Polis i tok, ol ibin sutim-idai dispela rebel, taim ol ibin wok long hait na kamapim pait long wanpela militeri patrol insait long North Aceh.
Ol ibin makim North Aceh olsem wanpela security zone we nogat trabel i mas kamap long en, stat long mun Mas, bihain long wanpela agrimen ol ibin kamapim namel long ol mausman bilong gavman na Free Tasol, ol trabel i wok long kamap yet.

Gavman bilong Northern Territory bilong Australia i tok, moni bilong gavman em ol ibin putim long Arafura Gems em i wanpela gutpela invesmen.
26 kantri ibin soim laik pinis long stap long dispela gems, em bai kamap long Darwin long mun Mei.
East Timor, Singapore, Hong Kong, Papua Niugini na Saut Afrika bai stap tu long dispela gems.
Em i tok, Arafura Gems i save apim nem bilong Northern Territory na dispela i soim olsem igat gutpela risen i stap long gavman i putim moni long dispela Gems.
Insait long federal parlimen bilong Australia- namba bilong ol lain memba long sait bilong opposition bai igo antap-taim oli swerim in candicadet usiat ibin winim Ryan by-election insait long Queensalnd.

Gavman long Belgrade i tok oli arestim pinis olpela president blong Yugoslav, Slobodan Milosevic.
Bihainim ol bikpela wok em oli lusim tupela nait long mekim, i luk olsem Slobodan Milosevic i bungim taim nau we em bai pinis olketa.
Pastaim tasol long foa kilok tede long moning, pipol i bin harim faifpela pairap blong gan insait long kompaun, na liklik taim bihain long dispela longpela kar blong gavman i kam aut long ol geit blong kompaun.
Ol bung toktok i bin wok long gohet long nait na sampela ripot i tok president blong kantri nau, Vojislav Kostunica, i bin go tu long dispela haus.
Taim ol gavman ofisal i go toktok wantaim em, Milosevic i bin tok lukaut long kilim em yet olsem bai em i noken larim ol i arestim em, tasol gavman nau i tok oli arestim em pinis na oli lukim longpela lain kar em i bin lusim kompaun, i go insait long haus kalabus.
Oli ting em bai gohet long sakim tok taim em i sanap long kot.

Mr Downer i bin tok pinis tu long en wantaim American Embeseda long Canberra.
China, long wanem samting tru i bin kamap, na i promis olsem, ol bai larim ol dispela kru long go lukim kwik American konsula ofis.
Australia i bin nap long mekim gutpela wok tru blong salim ol samting igo long ol narapela kantri dispela taim.
Dispela i makim nambawan gutpela wok olsem bihain long 21 yar.
Tred Minista Mark Vaile, i tok mak blong exports -- ol samting kantri i save salim -- i bin go antap long 25 pesent long yar igo pinis, long wanem value oa strong blong dola i bin daun na prais blong ol samting i bin strong.
Dispela i gutpela winim sikis pesent blong ol faifpela yar bipo.
Taim em i tokaut long samtingn oli kolim Annual Trade statement, Mr Vaile i bin tok mak blong exports i bin go antap bikpela long yar 2000, tasol long wanem ekonomi blong America i bin go slou tumas, prais blong ol samting ino strong.
Mr Vaile i tok ol samting Australia i bin salim long ol Asian kantri i bin go antap long 34 pesent long yar igo pinis -- ol samting igo long China i bin go antap long 47 pesent -- Singapore long 45 pesent, na South Korea 43 pesent.
Tred Minista i tok bikpela samting blong wokim dispela yar em long kirapim ol nupela toktok long World Trade Organisation.

Dispela submarine i bin igo kamap long bris blong Sasebo aste, bihain long em i bin lusim Hawaii.

Lain Oposisen long Vanuatu i wok long traim kisim wanpela kot oda blong fosim Spika i singautim Paliment ikam miting.
Oposisen i wokim dispela bihain long Spika i bin pasim miting blong Paliment tede, pastaim long oli paitim toktok long vot nogat bilip agensim Praim Minista Barak Sope.
Sean Dorney i ripot olsem, Spika i bin tok em ino nap larim Paliment i lukluk long nogat bilip mosen long wanem em wanpela kot kes i kamap pinis long en tu.
Spika i tok, tingting blong Mr Sope long kotim bikpela lain memba blong paliment, i min olsem oli no nap toktok long dispela mosen long paliment.
Mr Sope i tok olsem em bai kotim olgeta 27 memba husat i bin sainim dispela mosen blong nogat bilip long em long baim em tu-milian Australian dola, long wanem insait long ol toktok long mosen oli bin tok em i gat ol wokbung wantaim ol intanesanal kriminal.
Bos blong Vanuatu Trading Post, Mark Neil-Jones, i tok Oposisen em yet bai go long kot.
Oposisen i bin karim tingting blong Spika igo long kot.
Mr Neil-Jones i tok, oli bin winim dispela kes.

Dispela pasin blong China i mekim na ol belheve namel long tupela kantri i go bikpela moa.
Wanpela diplomet blong America husat i bin bungim ol tupela-ten-foa boskru long Tunde apinun i tok oli stap gut tasol, tasol em ino tokaut klia long wanem taim tru bai oli lusim ol.
Ol Chinese ofisal i bin strong long tok olsem, America i mas save olsem dispela heve i kamap long hasua blong en yet na i tok, moa beta America i stat long stretim heve wantaim wanpela tok sori na i tok America i mas stop long mekim ol spai wok klostu long ol eria blong China.
Toktok blong ol Chinese ofisal i kamap taim moa wari i kamap long wanem samting nau bai kamap long dispela spai balus blong America insait long China.
Chinese President President Jiang Zemin i bin sutim tok long America long kamapmim dispela birua na America i sutim tok long China long burukim loa na go insait long balus blong en.
Balus ia, wanpela reconnaissance oa spai balus em i bin pulap long ol kain kain masin blong mekim spai wok, i bin bam wantaim wanpela jet faita balus blong China na long wanem em i bagarap, em i bin sidaun hariap tru long dispela Chinese ailan oli kolim Hainan.
Ol Chinese jet balus i bin bungim dispels spai balus blong America antap long intanesanel solwara.
America i bin askim long holim namba tu miting wantaim 24 kru memba blong wanpela spai balus blong America.
Dispela balus i stap pas long island blong South China bihain long em i bin bam wantaim wanpela jet blaus blong China.

Lain Oposisen long Vanuatu i wok long traim kisim wanpela kot oda blong fosim Spika i singautim Paliment ikam miting.

Dispela tingting i bin kamap bihain wanpela miting aste long Canberra wantaim Fiji Interim Foreign Minister, Kaliopate Tavola.
Foreign Minister blong Australia, Alexander Downer i bin tokim Mr Tavola olsem Australia bai hamamas long givim wan-million Fiji Dola blong em long holim elekson.
Em i tok, em bai givim sapot tu long Fiji sivil society blong halivim long toksave long ol pipal olsem bai oli ken klia gut na stap insait long ol wok blong kamapim pasin blong domocrasi.
Australia bai statim wanpela kempen bilong toktok wantaim ol arapela kantri long traim na winim sapot bilong ol long ol i kamapim senis long komiti sistem bilong United Nations.
Federal gavman bilong Australia i bilip olsem sikispela komiti bilong United Nations em ol i save galasim ol wei olgeta kantri i save bihainim ol human rights agrimen, i save wansait tumas long ol non government Em i laik bai ol i mas elektim wanpela Australia man oa meri long bikpela Human Raits Komisin bilong United Nations, na bai holim ol miting bilong en insait long New York long winim sapot bilong ol arapela kantri em ol i laikim senis i kamap long komiti sistem bilong United Nations.
Foran Minista bilong Australia Alexander Downer i tok, igat sapot i stap pinis namel long ol arapela kantri long senisim dispela komiti sistem.
Ol bai kamapim moa toktok insait long Torres Strait long with bihain bilong toktok long wanpela tingting bilong ol papa graun long kisim moa kontrol long ol fishing insait long ol solwara namel long Papua New Guinea na Australia.
Justin Kerr ripot olsem- ol heve or toktok bilong fisdhing rights insait long Torres Strait ibin wok long kamap long ples klia- bihain long ol lida bilong ples ibin wok long toktok strong long ol bigpela fishing bisnis long lusim despela hap na larim despela bisnis long han bilong ol papa grraun.

President blong America, George W.
Bush, i tok em i sori long wanem wanpela pailot blong China i lus yet bihain long faita jet blong em i bin bam wantaim wanpela American spai balus long nambis blong China yet.
Dispela birua i kamapim pinis ol belheve namel long tupela kantri.
Mr Bush i tok em i sori dispela Chinese pailot i lus yet na i salim tok sori blong em igo long femili blong en.
Dispela tok sori i kamap bihain long taim China i bin wok long tokim America long tok sori long kamapim dispela birua.
Ol gavman ofisal i bin tok Bush bai noken tok sori.
Bush i bin wok long strong tu long toktok blong em olsem, China i mas lusim olgeta 24 American militari man meri husat i bin stap long spai balus, em i bin bagarap bihainim birua na igo sidaun long wanpela Chinese ailan long Sande.
President Bush i bin tok bai gutpela sapos China i larim dispela birua i bagarap wokbung blong en wantaim America.
Mausman blong White House, Joe Fleischer, i bin tok ol diplometik hatwok blong pinisim dispela heve nau i go bikpela na i tok ol dispela wok i gohet yet tasol oli wok long go isi isi long en blong noken kamapim moa belheve.
Bush long noken sapotim Kyoto Treaty, long global warming.

Mr George Bush i tok, Cook Islands bai protes na traim long mekim America long senisim tingting blong em.

Dr Mathias Sapuri, i tok, i nidim kuik moa dokta.

Indonesia polis i bin sut long gan igo antap long kilaut blong tok lukaut long ol Muslim geng husat i bin tromoe ston long wanpela kar em i karim tripela Kristian igo long haus kalabus.
Oli bin sasim dispela tripela Kristian long statim bikpela pait namel long tupela lain lotu, we planti handret pipol i bin idai, na blong mekim save long tripela, kot i tok oli mas hangamapim ol.
Bikpela lain Muslim, samting olsem tu-tausen, i bin bung na tromoe ol ston long kar em i karim dispela tripela man igo long haus kalabus.
Ol witnes oa pipol husat i lukim dispela trabal i tok, wanpela polisman i bin kisim bagarap taim wanpela ston i pas long em.
Ol lain Muslim i bin bruk na ronawe taim sekuriti fos i sut long gan antap long het blong ol blong tok lukaut long ol.
Dispela trabal i bin kamap bihain long Palu Distrik Kot insait long Palu taun long Central Sulawesi provins, i bin painim dispela tripela Kristian i guilty oa i rong long treinim 700 Kristian em oli bin paitim ol Muslim long mun Mei long yar igo pinis.
Insait long wanpela trabal, oli bin kilim 191 Muslim em oli bin wok long hait i stap long wanpela mosque oa haus lotu.
Planti handret moa i bin idai na sampela vilis i bagarap raun long taun, taim ol Muslim geng i peibek.
Ol pait namel long tupela lain lotu i bin muv igo long ol Maluku ailan, we planti tausen pipol i bin idai stat long taim pait namel long ol Kristian na Muslim i bin stat long mun Jenuari, 1999.
China i givim tokoraet long ol ofisa blong America Konsula long go-lukim ol boskru blong spai-balus blong America, em ol fighter jet blong China i bin mekim em i gopundaon long ples balus long South Hainan ailan.
Byrne i ripot i kam long China olsem oli lukim olsem nau tupela said wantaem i gohet long winim tingting blong wanpela narapela long ol wok blong ol blong stretim despela heve blong ol.
Ol Gavman ofisa long Beijing na Haikou, capital blong Hainan province, i ripot olsem namba-tu raon long ol toktok we ol ofisa blong i sindaon na miting wantaem despela tupela-ten-foa boksru bai i kamap sampela taim tede.
Em bai i kamap bihaenim ol toktok namel long ol gavman ofisa blong China na America long Washington na Beijing we oli bin wokhat long painm ol rot blong pinisim kros namel long tupela kantri.
President blong China, Jiang Zemin, nau i mekim lukluk raon igo long South America, tasol em i wok long askim yet long America i mas tok sori long despela heve em i bin kamap long last wiken, we wanpela balus blong China i bin bagarap na pailot longen i wok long lus, ating em i dai pinis.
Ol America i bin autim sampela toktok long autim belheve blong ol long despela birua, tasol oli wok long tok long wanem oli no wokim wanpela samting rong, em nogat need long ol long tok sori.

Ol toktok blong stretim bel koros namel long China na America long dispela asua blong spai balus, i wok long kamap gut.

UN Sekuriti Kaunsil imas holim kuik wanpela miting long wokim wanpela disisen em bai opim rot bilong ol arapela kantri i wuas tu long ol Palestine pipol.
Em i tok, Mr Sharon emi wanpela war criminal husat ino save wet long usim fos long kisim samting em i laikim na i laik daunim na pinisim pait bilong ol Palestine.
Ol Arab i koros long Mr Sharon long wok em ibin mekim olsem Defens Minista bilong Israel long 1982 taim ol soldia bilong Israel ibin pait igo insait long Lebanon.

The Hague long Holland, na tok olsem ol i wok long makim ol pipol bilong wanpela sait tasol long bringim ol igo long kot, na em i tok olsem, em ino sapotim tingting bilong muvim-aut olpela Presiden Slobodan Milosevic igo long narapela kantri long em i sanap long kot.
Mr Kostunica i tok, International Criminal Tribunal bilong olpela Yugoslavia i wok long painim na kotim tasol ol lida bilong Serbia, na dispela i soim olsem ol i wok long makim pipol bilong wanpela grup tasol long bringim ol igo long kot na jastis.
Em i tok, dispela eksampol long ol i laik mekim-save long wanpela grup tasol, em i risen long ol i mas noken bringim Mr Milosevic igo long The Ol ibin putim nem bilong Milosevic long ol war crimes ibin kamap long Kosovo long woa ibin kamap namel long 1998 na 1999.

Em i tok ol dispela astingting bai tokaut klia long blong wanem na kantri i mas gat difens fos na sapos kantri bai gat inap moni blong ronim dispela kain fos, na tu, oli mas skelim wanem kain fos bai stap em kantri i ken skelim bajet moni blong en.
Em i tok, olsem Konsitusen i tok, Gavman i mas igat wanpela fos em kantri i ken lukautim long moni, na em i ken kirap mekim wok bihainim laik blong pipol blong kantri yet.
Papua New Guinea Leadership tribunal bai tokaut long wanem kain mekimsave - em man nem bilongen igo bagarap pinis na deputy opposition lida- Peter Pepul long namba 19 de bilong mun April.
Tribunal i harim na save pinis long wanem sampela long ol mekimsave ikam long counsels na ibin sukurim wanpela moa pastaim long emi givim aut tingting bilongen.
Wanpela long ol bigpela mekimsave Pepul iken bungim em long ol iken rausim em long pablic offis.
Prosecution ibin tokim tribunal olsem pasin bilong corruption bihainim wantok system iwok long kamap bigpela tru long kantry - olsem kain mekimsave imas bigpela.
Ol ibin painim olsem Pepul i rong long faivpela ol samting oli sutim tok taim emi holim pablic offis.
Wanpela bilong ol asua bilongen- em long emi ibin makim brata bilongen- Moses Tawa olsem commissioner bilong public services.
Papua New Guinea National Excutive Council i tok oraet pinis long salim Papua New Guinea Banking Corporation.
Gavman bai salim 51 pesen share blong dispela bank, na moa yet long en sapos planti bisnis tru i gat laik long en na sapos executive i tok oraet long en.
Prime Minister Sir Mekere Morauta i bin tok, Privatisation Commission nau bai advertise blong salim bank na painim aut long ol bisnis husat i gat laik long baim dispela bank.
China na America i taitim bun na strongim tingting blong tupela yet wanwan taim tupela gohet long paitim toktok long trabal em i bin kamap long spai balus blong America insait long Chinese teritori.
Chinese Premia ino laik tok promis sapos ol bai lusim dispela balus long Hainan Island, taim President Geroge W Bush ino moa go isi long toktok blong en olsem bipo, taim em i sutim tok long China.
Niusman blong mipela long Washington, Michael Carey, i tok dispela strong pasin blong toktok ikam long tupela sait i kamap bihain tasol long China i bin larim ol 24 boskru blong spai balus i go bek long America.
Long wik bihain, ol ofisal blong tupela kantri wantaim bai bung blong stretim ol belheve em oli stap yet - na toktok tu long wanem samting nau bai kamap long dispela spai balus em China i holim i stap.
National Security Advisor blong White House, Condoleezza Rice i bin tok America ino tingting long go isi tumas long China.
Wanpela strongpela guria hamarim pinis wanpela eria blong Yunnan Province long southerwestern China, kilim sevenpela pipal na kamapim bagarap long planti ol narapela.
Dispela guria i bin bagarapim tu ol communication na ol pawa saplai.
Ol ofisa insait long siti blong Baoshan i tok, oli ting namba blong ol pipal i dai imas go antap moa, taim oli kisim ol ripot ikam long ol eria i stap longwei tru.
Oli tok, ol dispela girua na bagarap i bin kamap long ol haus i bin pudaun antap long ol pipal.
Emi tok dispela tambu ibin stopim tru gavaman blong Iraq long mekim wok blong em long lukautim gutpela laif na sidaun blong olgeta pipol blong em.
Ol otorati blong Australia i tok, em bai kisim moa long tupela wik blong pulim wanpela fishing bot blong narapela kantri i go long bris blong Fremantle, long Western Australia.
Oli bilip, dispela fishing bot i bin brukim loa na painim pis long ol solwara blong Australia.
Ol otorati blong defence blong Australia na South Africa i bin pulim kalabusim dispela fishing bot long solwara klostu 400 kilomita south long Cape Town.
Oli bilip dispela sip i bin brukim loa long painim pis insait long solwara blong Australia, klostu long Heard Island-McDonald Island grup long Southern Ocean.
Ol otorati blong Fisheries na Defence i bin wok long ronim dispela bot long moa long tu-tausen nautical miles long hap blong southern Ocean igo long klostu nambis blong South Africa.
Lain blong Opposition long Vanuatu bai kamapim namba tri askim long kot olsem pasin Spika i bin mekim i rong aninit long mama-lo.
Dispela i kamap, longwanem, aste nait, Chief Justice blong Vanuatu ino bin nap long mekim Spika i larim palaman i paitim toktok long dispela motion blong INO Gat Bilip long Prime Minister Barak Sope.
Chief Justice Vincent Lunabek i bin givim oda aste olsem, Palaman imas kivung long aste nait, tasol Spika, Paul Ren Tari i bin pasim pastaim kivung long namba tri taim.
Em i bin givim wan kain risan, na i bin tok, oli mas senisim toktok insait long dispela motion.
Dispela heve i bin kamap, longwanem, ol olpela coalition pati memba blong Mr Sope, i bin lusim em na jonim Oppositon.
Oli bin mekim strongpela toktok long ol kain wok blong em wantaim wanpela bisnis man blong narapela kantri.
Wok blong kandim olgeta man-meri-pikinini blong Samoa long 1996, wea ol ibin surikim gen bikos long heve blong moni, em nau bai oli holim long dispela yia, na moni blong dispela wok, em gavman blong Australia bai givim.
Pasifik Nius Ejensi, Pacnews i tok, sensus bai oli karim aut long pinis blong dispela yia, na wok blong trenim ol ofisa husat bai karim aut dispela wok, bai istat long dispela mun.
Ol Customs ofisa i bin painim ol ol desela pipal, tupela-ten-eit man, eitpela meri na sevenpela pikinini, oli bilif ol blong Midde East, wantaem tu foapela Indonesia boskru man long hap igo long north-east blong ailan long Trinde.
Wanpela Custom sip, i bin pulim despela Indonesia fishing bot, igo Ashmore islands asde, long wanem em ino bin gat fuel.
Ol otoroti nau i wok long karim ol despela pipal husat i laik, bai oli givim ol asylum, i kam long bikples we bai ol ken givim ol igo long Department blong Immigration na Multicultural Affairs.
Long dispela yiar, ol Customs ofisa i bin painim pinis tripela sip em i bin wok long ron i kam long Australia nambis na oli no kisim permit oa tokoraet pastaem long kam insaet.

Ol itok China i mekim isi long Cuba long bekim bek despela moni wantaim liklik win moni tasol.

Faifpela moa pipol i dai long Aceh provins vlong Indonesia taim ol rebel na ol gavman soldia i bin pait klostu long bikpela gas field long hap.
Long mun igo pinis, oli bin pasim dispela gas field long northern Aceh, bihain long Exxon-Mobil blong America i bin pasim pastaim ol wok long en, longwanem, bikpela pait i wok long kamap long dispela eria.
Em i namba wan taim oli bin pasim dispela gasfield na wanpela energy plant, i stap 25 kilomita longwei long en, stat long taim ol rebel blong Free Aceh Movement i bin statim pait long kisim independence, long 25 yiar igo pinis.

Olpela Praim Minista blong France, Michel Rocard, i askim pipol blong ol French teritori long Pacific long wokbung moa wantaim ol narapela Pacific kantri.

President bilong Egypt, Hosni Mubarak bai statim lukluk raun i go long ol kantri long Europe long Tunde.
Em bai go lukluk raun long Germany, Romania na Russia na bikpela has bilong despela lukluk raun em long traim kisim ol tingting halavim blong stretim ol bikpela heve i wok long i gohet nau insait long Middle East.
Mubarak, usait kantri bilong en i wok olsem namel-man insait long ol toktok em iwok long pas olgeta nau namel long Palestine na Israel, bai igo lukluk raun Berlin, Bucharest na Moscow.
Germany em i nambawan bisnis poroman bilong Egypt insait long Europe, tasol oli ting olsem ol toktok bilong en wantaim Chancellor Gerhard Schroeder long ol wok politik bai sut long en long ol bikpela tingting wari insait long Middle East.

Sampela man i bin tromoe wanpela hanbom long wanpela polis stesin long Northern Ireland.
Oli ting dispela trabal i hap long wok blong ol paramilitari blong kirapim pait.
Nogat man bin kisim bagarap long dispela trabal, long wanem dispela hanbom ino bin kisim stret polis stesin haus long ples oli kolim Londonderry.
Bom i bin bagarapim rot na tupela kar em oli bin sanapim long rot i stap.
Oli bin singautim ol bom saveman, polis i bin banisim dispela hap na oli tokim pipol long ol haus klostu long muv aut lusim haus blong ol.
Lain oli kolim - Real IRA, wanpela paramilitrai grup blong Northern Ireland, i bin wokim sampela wankain trabal olsem bipo long ol sekuriti fos stesin long dispela eria yet.

European Union na ol Pacific ailan kantri i bin wanbel long bihaen-taim blong ol halivim igo long ol Pasifik ailan.
Sean Dorney i ripot olsem despela niupela agreement blong ol wok blong halivim namel long ol European Union na wanpela-ten-foa ailan kantri blong Pasifik, bai i stap long ol wok bung namel long ol ailan kantr long region long economy na wok blong education.
European Union i bin toktok strong long oli mas daonim ol trade barrier oa kain takis long wok blong trade na strongim tingting blong kamapim wanpela single trade block long ol pasifik ailan.
Bihaen long tupela de miting long suva, namel long ol ofisal blong European Union na despela fouteen ailan kantri, tupela said wantaem nau i wanbel long oli mas gat wanpela Regional sapot plan na ol bikpela area we ol aid oa halivim i mas go longen long despela faivpela yiar i kam.
European Union i bin strongim tok long oli mas makim tupela top area blong halivim.
Na despela tupela area em long Economic Regional Integration em bai i karamapim kain wok olsem praivet sector development, namel lognen wok blong trade, investment na tourisim na Human Resources Develpment am bai i karamapim wok blong edikesin na training.
Aninit long despela Cocotonou Agreement, namel long E-U na ol yangpela kantri, bai i gat planti million dola i am long Euopean Union blong halivim ol yangpela kantri longen long ol wok blong ol.

Em i gat bikpela namba blong ol Chenchnya pipal long Turkey na em bikpela sapot long kantri long Chechen independens na kros long ol Gavman ofisa blong Turkey, long em ino laik sutim tok long Russia long ol polisi blongen long Chechnya.

Ol Fiji lawya bai i holim miting long Suva, tede nait long toktok long wanpela motion em bai oli putim igo long wanpela miting blong Law Society em bai i kamap sampela taim klostu.
Ripot i tok ol despela lawya ino hamamas long kros blongPresident blong loa Societi, Chen Bun Young we em i bin askim long Chief Justice Sir Timoci Tuivaga long em i mas pinis long wok blongem.

East Timor, bihain long independens vot long dispela territori long 1999.
Niusman Mark Bowling i ripot olsem Presiden Abdurrahman Wahid bilong Indonesia, em yet ibin autim wanpela decree oa oda bilong kirapim wanpela kot em bai igat paua long kotim na givim mekim-save long ol pipol i bin kamapim bikpela bagarap na heve long human rights long East Timor.
Ol i bilip olsem planti-handred pipol ibin dai long han bilong ol milisa paitman i sapotim Indonesia na kisim halivim ikam long Indonesia militeri.
Ol dispela milisa paitman ibin kamapim ol bikpela pait na trabel olsem long kilim pipol, reipim ol meri na bagarapim planti samting.
Planti handred-tausen pipol bilong East Timor ibin ronawei long ol haus na peles bilong ol, taim ol dispela pait na trabel ibin kamap.
Human Rights Komisina bilong United Nations bai sapotim trening bilong ol prosekuta na ol jas bilong dispela Tribunal.

Ofa kaukimoce i ripot olsem ino long taim igo pinis, despela army ofisa i bin tokaut long wanpela interview long local television olsem sevenpela pipal i bin stap insaet long ku i stap yet na polis ino kisim ol yet.

Polis long Fiji i wok long mekim investigesin-wok igo long tripela kilogram cocaine oa drug em ol bin painim insaet long wanpela bisket tin.
Despela drug oa cocaine, moni em oli ken kisim longen taim oli salim bai i trihandret-tausan Australia dola, na oi bilif i bin wok long go long Australia taim oli bn painim.
Despela i kamap bihaenim taripela kago long top grade heroi em oli bin painim tu long yiar igo pins.
Ofa kaukimoce i ripot i kam long Suva, olsem despela cocaine, em wanpela famili bi bin painim taim oli bin sindaon blong kaikai, em hap ong bikpela drug rackeet oli gat long kantri.
Wanpela fren blong despela faimli i bin givim ol despela tin bisket.
Nem blong famili husat i bin givim despela cocaine igo long polis, oli no tokaut longen.
Comisisoner savua i tok oli ting despela drug, oli bin laik salim i kam long Australia wantaem haivim blong ol overesas trafika.
Despela i soim olsem oli wok long usim Fiji olsem namel kantri oa transit point long drug trafficking.

Wanpela dingo - asples dok blong Australia - i kilim indai pinis wanpela yangpela boi, krismas blongem 9, long Fraser Island long Australia.
Dok i bin kaikaim tu yangpela brata blong em, krismas blong em seven, tasol em i bin oraet tasol.
Justin Kerr i ripot olsem tupela brata ia i bin wok long wokabaut klostu long Waddy Point Camping ground taim tupela dok oa dingo i bin stat long ronim ol bihaen long taim despela 9-yiar old, i bin traim ron na pundaon.
Yangpela brata i bin ron blong kisim halivim, na dok i bin kaikaim em tasol em i bin oraet.
Long despela taim nau, papa blong tupela boi i bin kamap pinis, tasol bikpela brata, 9-yiar old i bin dai pinis.
Long apinun tede, oli bin kilim tupela dingo.

Nagalingam Parameswaran, bai go wantaim em long West Timor.
Ol agensi bilong United Nations i bilip olsem, samting olsem 50-tausen pipol bilong East Timor i stap yet long ol refuji kemp long West Timor.
Ol milisa paitman i sapotim Indonesia, wantaim ol sapota bilong ol insait long Indonesia militeri, ibin kamapim ol pait na trabel na ol ibin mekim moa long 250-tausen refuji ibin ronawei long ol peles bilong ol long East Timor, bihain long East Timor ibin vot long kisim independens, long mun Ogas long 1999.

Bani i bin emkim despela toktok long wanpela workshop em oli bin holim long Port Vila.

Foren Minista blong Australia, Alexander Downer, i tok taim i kamap klostu nau we oli mas gat wanpela nupela Timor Gap Treaty.

Bernama niusejensi blong Malaysia i ripot olsem, Deputi Fainens Minista Shafie Mohd Salleh, i putim pinis wanpela bill oa loa long paliment, em i tok husat man oli painim i mekim dispela pasin inap kalabus inap long faifpela yar, na peim 1-point-3 milian dola.
Em i tok Minista i bin tokim paliment olsem, money laundering i nap long bagarapim fainensal sekta blong Malaysia na bai bagarapim ol wok blong gavman long tanim Kuala Lumpur i kamap wanpela rijenal fainens senta.
Niupela Malaysia loa ia, oli kolim Anti-Money Laundering Bill bai mekim dispela pasin i kamap wanpela nogut kriminal pasin tru.
Em bai kriminal pasin sapos man i putim moni em i kisim long salim ol drag, korapsen, kidnapping, stil pasin, people smuggling, gambling oa pilai lak, vice na giaman pasin.

Ol heve ibin wok long stat kamap bihain long ol balus kampani olsem kampani ibin pasim olgeta ol ron bilong balus bilong ol.
Despela ibin mekim na mak bilong ol toursit isave igo ikam long New Caledonia ikam olsem long Paris long olgeta yar ibin igo daun.
Long 1997- samting olsem 125 thousand ol isa isave istap rere long ol balus bilong ol tourist - tasol despela nau igo daun olgeta long 60-thousand.

Ombusman Commission blong Papua New Guinea bai painaut long ol toktok olsem, oli wok long usim moni blong Developmen fund, blong grisim tingting blong ol memba blong palaman long kalap igo long narapela paiti.
Planti long ol memba blong Palaman i wok long hariap long jonim bikpela pait insait long Gavman, na dispela i mekim em i nambawan pati igat bikpela memba long en insait long histori blong Papua New Guinea.

Em i tok, moni oli bin givim igo long ol memba em oli bin makim ol blong mekim ol i jonim pait blong Gavman.

National Kot blong Papua New Guinea i blokim pinis wanpela tingting blong rausim ol pawa blong Western Highlands Provincial Gavman.
Highlands, bipo long elekson i kamap long yiar bihain.
Gavman blong Papua New Guinea i bin saspendim pinis ol pawa blong Enga na Southern Highlands provincial Gavman, tasol National Kot nau i blokim tingting long ruasim pawa blong Gavman blong Western Highlands.
National Gavman i tok, dispela ol tingting blong saspendim pawa i hap long wanpela kempein long klinim up provincial gavman.
Tasol planti pipal i bilip olsem, em i hap tingting blong strongim pawa blong National gavman insait long Highlands rijon.

Mr Reith i tok Indonesia, East Timor, Solomon Islands na Papua New Guinea i wok long bungim ol bikpela heve iet.
Em i tok dispela i sanisim wok sekuriti blong Australia insait long rijon insait long dispela 20 yar ikam.
Australia bai igo pas long ol nupela teknologi mo long ol kantri blong Asia na Pacific.
Mr Reith i tok Australia ino ken stap isi nau long paitim boros na tok em i bikpela na strongpela insait long rijon.
Planti pipol tru bilong Australia i tok oli givim pinis moni oa taim long ol ovasis eid ejensi insait long dispela 12 mun i pinisDespela toktok istap insait long ripot bilong wanpela wok painim bilong eid ejensi bilong Australia gavman, AusAid na Australian Council for Overseas Aid.
Niusman Graeme Dobell i tok, despela wok painim i bilong skelim tingting bilong ol pipol ol i bin givim halvim long 1998 i kam inap nau.
Sampela pipol bilong Australia i tok, em i no gutpela long lukim mak bilong eid progrem i pundaun lusim 12 pesent igo daun long 9 pesent.
Halvim bilong ovasis eid i bin go antap long 1-pesent i kam long 85 pesent nau.
Foren Minista bilong Australia, Alexander Downer i tok bikpela hap bilong ol pipol bilong Australia i sapotim strong eid progrem bilong gavman, em i bin kos long 16-handret milian dola despela fainensal yar.
Australia i gat inap ol samting bilong halvim narapela.
Foren Afes mausman blong Leba Pati Oposisen long Australia, Laurie Brereton, i wok long miting nau wantaim ol biknem lida blong Indonesia long Jakarta, blong toksave long laik blong Leba Pati long wokim ol nupela wokbung namel long tupela kantri.
South East Asia niusmeri Ginny Stein, i tok Mr Brereton i tok, wokbung namel long Australia na Indonesia bai gohet long bungim ol kain kain heve.

Em i tok China na America i gat yet ol narakain tingting long dispela kain difens progrem oli kolim NMD, tasol i no mekim moa toktok long hau China i lukim lukluk raun blong em long hap.

Ol i tok, Labour Pati bilong Mr Chaudhry em i best organised political Ol i tok, dispela sapot, wantaim sapot bilong Mr Chaudhry long ol suga-ken eria bilong Fiji, i gutpela na halivim gut Labour Pati.
Ol dispela saveman i tok, Dokta Baba ino strongpela politisen.
Mr Qarase i save soim-aut politikal strong bilong em long ol pablik bung na miting, we em i save givim moni bilong ol kommuniti projek.
Ol ino save sapos Dokta Baba bai kisim wankain sapot long ol pipol, olsem ol ibin givim bipo long Mr Chaudhry.

Wanpela maus-man blong militari i tok, tupela man ino harim toktok blong polis long noken igo long Puncak Jaya rijon, i stap 500 kilomita, longwei long kapital blong province, Jayapura.
Laspela taim oli bin lukim tupela, em long namba 11-dei blong mun May, bipo tupela i bin lusim kapital blong igo long dispela eria.
Ol lokal vilis pipal na polis nau i wok long igo lukluk blong painim dispela tupela man.
Gavman blong America i koros long harim wanpela ripot olsem, ol Muslim rebel long Filipins i katim pinis nek blong wanpela American husat i stap namel long ol pipol oli bin pulim na haitim i stap long bus.
America i tok, ol dispela rebel i mas lusim ol dispela pipol oli kalabusim na maski long askim long wanpela samting bek.
Ol rebel blong wanpela Muslim grup oli kolim Abu Sayyaf i tok long wanpela redio brodkas insait long Manila olsem, oli kilim pinis Guillermo Sobrero, wanpela American blong California, husat i wanpela long tripela American i stap namel long ol hostis em ol rebel i holim ol i stap long Basilan Island.
American Embesi long Manila i tok America i lukim dispela trabal olsem hasua blong Abu Sayyaf grup, na i tok grup i mas lukautim gut olgeta pipol oli kalabusim i stap long ailan.
Em i tok tu olsem, Aby Sayyaf i mas lusim kwik ol dispela pipol na maski long askim long wanpela samting blong peim em bek.
Abu Sayyaf, grup em i save tok em i wanpela Islamic indipendens faita grup, i wok long kalabusim tupela narapela American na 25 Filipino.
Ol wokmanmeri long tin-pis fektori long American Samoa bai kisim moa pei, pastaim long pinis bilong dispela mun.
American Samoa, we i stap nau long 3 Dola-20 sents long wan haua, igo antap long 3 Dola-26 sents long kain moni bilong America.
2-poin-9 pesen, na bai ol i kisim nambawan hap bilong en long Oktoba 1 long dispela yar.
American Samoa, i nap long 2 Dola na 69 sents.
American Samoa, ibin tokaut long ol dispela pei i go antap.
Minista blong Immigration blong Australia, Philip Ruddock, i bin tok em i ting dispela wokabout blong em igo long ol kantri long South East Asia, bai halivim ol wok blong stopim dispela pasin we sampela pipol i save bringim hait ol pipol i kam long Australia.
Ruddock i tok dispela lukluk raun blong em igo long Indonesia, Thailand na Vietnam i hap long ol intanesanel kempein blong stretim dispela heve we ol sip i save karim hait pipol blong wanpela kantri igo long narapela.
Em i tok em ino ting dspela toktok blong em wantaim ol bai stopim dispela pasin, tasol em i bilip dispela bai mekim hat long dispela pasin i kamap ken.
President George W.
Bush blong America i bin tokaut ken long tingting blong em long noken bihainim agrimen oli kolim Kyoto Treaty em i toktok long ol senis i wok long kamap longol kain taim.
Dispela toktok blong Mr Bush i mekim ol lida blong Europe i belhat stret.

Ol otoriti long Vanuatu i taitim bun long halvim planti handret pipol em oli nogat kaikai na wara, bihain long taim wanpela mauden paia i pairap.
National Disaster Management Office i tok pairap blong mauden paia long Lopeivi ailan i bin karamapim Palma ailan em i stap klostu, wantaim sit blong paia, na i bagarapim ol gaden kaikai na posinim wara.
Wanpela mausman i tok, nogat ripot i kamap sapos sampela pipol i kisim bagarap.
000 pipol nau i nogat wara blong dring na ol gaden kaikai i stap aninit long sit blong paia.
Wanpela nevi sip blong Australia i karim pinis sampela wara blong dring igo long Palma, na narapela sip bai karim tu wara tumora, na bai go karim tu 100 hai skul sumatin na ol tisa i kam aut.
Wanpela tim blong gavman i go pinis blong painim aut sapos oli mas karim olgeta vilis pipol i kam aut.
Wanpela enviroment grup long New Zealand i tok, mak blong posin long ol samting aninit long solowara ino bikpela tumas.
Dispela ripot i kam aut tripela wik bihain long bikpela mak blong posin blong kilim ol rat i bin kapsait igo long solowara, klostu long wanpela bikpela eria em ol whale na dolphin i save go painim kaikai long en.
Moa long 18 tonne heve rat posin i bin kapsait igo long solowara long nambis blong South Island blong New Zealand tripela wik igo pinis taim wanpela trak i bin kapsait long haiwe.
Ples we posin i kapsait, oli kolim Kaikoura, i gat biknem long wol na pipol i save long en olsem ples we pipol i ken go lukim ol whales, dolphin na arapela ol enimal i kaikai long nambis olgeta taim.
Na i gat strongpela tambu i stap pinis long noken go painim ol samting long solowara, swim na daiv long dispela eria emposin i bin kapsait long en.
Japan, olsem, gavman bilong Japan bai promis long givim halivim, long wanpela miting bilong ol dona kantri na grup em bai kamap long dispela wik.
Mrs Tanaka na Hun Sen ibin holim ol toktok pastaim long wanpela intanesenel konfrens i kamap bilong toktok long Cambodia.
Dispela konfrens oli kolim namba 5 Consultative Group Meeting, bai op insait long Tokyo tete.
Em ibin tokim dispela lida bilong Cambodia olsem Japan i save gut long ol bikpela heve i kamap long Cambodia na em i hat long ol pipol bilong en.
Foran Minista bilong Japan ino bin tokaut long wanem kain halivim ol bai givim long Cambodia, tasol em i tok olsem, gavman bai lukluk long wanem kain halivim em i gutpela tru bilong Cambodia, insait long dispela miting bilong ol dona kantri.

Em i tok despela tokaut i kamapim nupela na strongim wanem samting i wok long kamap i nap sampela taim nau, long ol wok-pren namel long tupela kantri, taim Cook Islands i wok long gohet long kamapim nem blong en yet long wol.

Praim Minista blong Papua New Guinea i toktok nau long pasim olgeta poka masin long kantri.
Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem gavaman bai lusim bikpela takis moni tru sapos oli stopim ol poka pasin.
Emi tok em bai askim long holim wanpela spesel miting blong kabinet sampela taim long dispela mun long tokaut tru tingting blong em long pasim ol pika-masin.
Mak blong ol takis ikam long ol poka masin long Papua New Guinea isave bikpela tru winim ol arapela kantri long wold na gavaman bai inap lusim planti million dolla long takis long wan wan yar sapos oli tok orait na kamapim dispela tambu.

Praim Minista blong Bangladesh, Sheikh Hasina Wajed, i tokaut pinis long bikpela belhat blong em long ol bom pairap em oli kilim pinis 22 pipol na bagarapim narapela 100.
Bangladesh ino save lukim ol kain bom pairap olsem dispela bipo long 30 yar histori blong kantri.
Long toktok blong em insait long paliment, em lain oposisan ino laik stap long en, praim minista i askim pipol blong Bangladesh long go agensim ol lain i pairapim ol bom long Sarere, na i tok promis olsem, em bai kirapim ol strongpela wok agensim ol.

Wanpela elain blong Australia oli kolim, Virgin Blue, i tokaut pinis long nambawan ripot moni ripot blong en.

Ron namel long Sydney na Melbourne i wanpela bisi rot stret blong ol balus.
Virgin Blue i tok tingting blong en long stat go-kam namel long dispela tupela siti i bihainim gutpela moni ripot stat long taim em in bin statim wok tru long Australia long 31 de blong mun Augus long yar igo pinis.
Virgin Blue i tok em i ting em bai kisim moa long haf-a-milian dola profit long wok blong en namel long Jenuari na Mas 31, 2001.
Bikpewla bos blong Virgin Blue, Brett Godfrey, i tok dispela mak blong profit i gutpela tru, long wanem taim em i stat, ol kain kain heve i bin wok long kamap na tu bikpela resis tru i bin wok long kamap namel long olgeta elain blong Australia wantaim tu pundau long strong blong Australian dola na prais blong bensin i bin dia tumas.

Cook Islands Praim Minista i tok lukaut long lokal media!

Journalism Workshop we Dr Maoate i bin toktok long en, i wok long rereim ol niusman meri long gutpela pasin blong raitim ol nius ol samting i kamap long miting blong ol Forum Economic Minista em bai kamap long Rarotonga dispela wik.

Timor Gap Treaty kolostu bai pinis, na larim ol oel na gas projek, em bai kos planti-billion dola, long go het insait long Timor Sea.
Darwin long northern Australia.
Darwin tete, Bill Parker bilong Philips Petroleum ibin mekim sampela toktok em i soim olsem kolostu nau bai ol i sainim wanpela agrimen.

Em i tok, planti-million pipol long wold i wok long safa na bungim bikpela heve long ol taim-drai, haiwara na ol tait na long levol bilong solwara i wok long go antap, tasol Presiden George W Bush bilong America i ting olsem wanwan kantri i mekim samting long laik bilong ol yet bai inap pinisim dispela heve.
Australia bai givim klostu tri-million dola blong halivim ol pipal i bin bungim heve long trabel i bin kamap long Maluku, long Indonesia.
Hap blong dispela moni bai oli lusim long wan-tausen ton blong rice ikam long Australia, na bai kamap long Ambon long Sunday.
Dispela rice bai halivim blong givim kaikai long 45-tausen pipal inap long tupela mun.
Wan-million dola long dispela moni bai igo long World Health Organisation, blong lukautim pipal i bin lusim ol ples blong ol.
Foreign Minister blong Australia, Alexander Downer, i tok, taim dispela trabel i bin stat long Maluku long 1999, samting olsem fo-tausen pipal i bin dai na half million pipal i bin lusim ples blong ol.
Em i tok, Australia i givim moa long nain-million dola blong halivim Maluku long en, stat yet long 1999.
Man husat i makim Komanwelt blong Northern Marianas insait long America i tok em i hamamas long tingting blong komiti oli kolim - House Appropriations Committee, long apim mak blong moni em President Bush i laik givim, blong bekim moni Komanwelt i bin lusim long lukautim ol sitijen blong Palau, Marshall Islands na Federated States of Micronesia.
President Bush i bin givim 500-tausen dola blong bekim moni Marianas i bin lusim dispela wok.
Tingting blong House Appropriations Committee long apim mak blong dispela moni, i min Marianas nau bai kisim wan-kilian dola long 2002 moni-yar.

Australian Broadcasting Corporation oa ABC bai kirapim ken televisen sevis igo insait long Asia Pacific rijen.
Nesanel Gavman i tok em bai givim moni blong halvim A-B-C i kirapim wanpela intanesanel televisen sevis em bai gat planti kain kain gutpela progrem, wantaim tu nius na karent afeas.

Tok-orait bilong PNG kebinet em i wanpela long ol samting ol i mas winim pastaim, na Minista bilong Bougenvil Affairs Moi Avei ibin kisim dispela agrimen igo long wanpela spesol miting bilong Kebinet.
Taim ol i givim pinis tok-orait bilong dispela agrimen, orait bai tupela sait i sainim dispela agrimen long Bougenvil, ating long stat bilong mun bihain.
Dispela agrimen bai raitim-kamap ken ol plen bilong wokbung namel long PNG gavman na Bougenvil, na kirapim wanpela otonomas gavman long Bougenvil ailan.
Bougenvil insait long 15 yar.

Moa long wan-tausen 6-hundret pipol ibin dai pinis stat yet long 1996, taim ol paitman blong Maoist ibin kamapim pait long traim rausim King blong Nepal.

Polis long Indonesia i tok, samting olsem 100 haus ibin paia insait long ol pei-bek pait, namel ol Muslim na Kristen pipol, long Pomo distrik long Central Sulawesi, insait long Indonesia.
Wanpela sinia polis komisina i tok, insait long nambawan trabel, ol Kristen pipol ibin kukim-daun 88 haus bilong ol Muslim pipol insait long wanpela viles, na bihain, ol Muslim ibin kukim-daun 12-pela haus bilong ol Kristen pipol insait long narapela viles.
Ol i putim pinis moa long 300 polisman insait long dispela eria, na ol i kisim oda pinis bilong sutim ol pipol husat i wokim ol trabel.
Igat planti pait na trabel ibin kamap pinis insait long Poso taun long Poso Distrik, namel long ol Muslim na Kristen pipol, husat i karim ol samting bilong pait, stat long mun Epril long yar igo pinis ikam inap nau.
Samting olsem 13 pipol, we planti long ol em ol meri na pikinini, ibin dai insait long wanpela pait ol ibin kamapim long bik-moning long wanpela Muslim viles, kolostu long Poso taun, long Tunde igo pinis.

Chang Chun-hsiung, ibin askim China long soim olsem em i laik bihainim bel-isi pasin bilong Olympics na imas pinisim tingting bilong en bilong kamapim pait long Taiwan.

China i save lukim Taiwan olsem hap bilong territori bilong en.

Air Nauru i pas na ino nap ron.

Philippines na America.
Wanpela dei bihain long ol ibin pulim-kalabusim 100 sapota bilong Abu Sayyaf, militeri ibin promis long pulim-kalabusim moa sapota na ibin tok, ol i bilip olsem ol iken pasim dispela Abu Sayyaf grup.
Presiden Gloria Arroyo bilong Philippines ibin tokaut aste olsem, ol i laik daunim Abu Sayyaf grup long asples bilong ol yet, em long Basilan na Sul Island long sauten Philippines na Zamboanga siti em i stap kolostu.

Port Moresby i wok long gat pawa blackout long nau bihaen long ol papa graon i bin mekim ol pawa stesin long klos-daon.
Richard Dinnen i ripot olsem ol papa-graon i wok long demand long oli peim ol 70-million dola compensesin, long wanem PNG Electricity Commission i wok long usim graon na ol river blong ol.
Dinnen i ripot olsem pawa oa electricity long Port Moresby, i save kamap long hydro scheme arasaet long city, na oli bin wokim stret long graon blong ol Koiari pipal.
Asde long nait, oli bin mekim na oli klosim daon ol bikpela pawa stesin olsem na Port Moresby ino bin gat electricity saplai.
Electricity Commission nau i wok long usim ol liklik back-up diesel generator, bilong givim pawa long city tasol em ino inap, olsem na nau oli wok long skelim saplai, tasol bikpela area ino gat pawa splai i nap longpela taim.

Ol papa-graon i wok long belkat tu long wanem Gavman i laik salim oa praivetaisim Electricity Commission.

Mr Lakatani has conceded there were a number of major social and economic issues still presenting a challenge to the government.
These include Nuie still not having a national airline or successfully implementing unemployment benefits.
Niue has been able to achieve prosperity and progress, while its people are better educated than most of its Pacific neighbours.

Electricity blong Port Moresby ikam long hydro system em oli bin wokim long graun blong ol Koiari pipal, husat i wok long pusim Gavman blong Papua New Guinea long kompensesen moni.
Lokal memba blong Palaman blong ol, na Cabinet Minister, Moi Avei i bin toktok wantaim ol papa graun na winim tingting blong ol long sainim wanpela agrimen long kompensesen, em bai gavman i lukluk gut long en.
Mr Avei i tok, em i luksave long sampela bel koros blong ol Koiari pipal long oli lusim giraun blong ol na Gavman bai lukluk na tingting gut long dispela ol askim blong ol.

Long namba 21 dei blong July, pati i bin mekim tingting long noken stap insait long spesel miting blong national assembly.
Assembly i bin rausim Wahid, tupela dei bihain long em ino bin ronim gut kantri na senisim em wantaim Vice-President Megawati Sukarnoputri.

Edukesin Bod blong Japan i tok orait pinis bai ol ol skul i stat usim wanpela histori buk em planti kantri ino wanbel long en.
Japan Edukesin Bod i laik bai oli stat usim dispela buk blong halvim ol skul we ol sumatin ino stret tumas long het.
Em i nambawan taim oli oraitim dispela histori buk bai oli usim insait long ol pablik skul.
Planti kantri long Asia i sutim tok long dispela bukl long wanem oli tok em ino tokaut long ol pasin nogut blong Japan long taim blong woa.
Japan yet, oli kolim Society for History Textbook Reform, i bin raitim dispela buk.
Japan i save tingting planti tumas long bikpela sem na pen em i bin bungim long woa.
Planti pipol i sutim tok long dispela sosaiti na tok, em i wok long paulim nambaut trupela histori, we Japan i bin wokim planti pasin nogut tru insait long Asia, pastaim na insait long World War II, long ol buk blong en.
Japan gavman i bin oraitim dispela buk long mun April.
Em i bin tok dispela buk i stret blong usim insait long ol junia hai skul.
Japan i sakim tok blong ol Asian kantri, moa yet China na South Korea, long senisim ol toktok inait long buk.
Nauru i bagarapim pinis ol gutpela wok blong Free West Papua muvmen blong go kisim sampela moa sapot ikam long ol Pacific kantri.
Oli bin redi long toktok wantaim ken ol Pacific kantri insait long miting blong ol lida blong Pacific Islands Forum long Nauru long wik bihain.
Tasol niusman Sean Dorney i ripot olsem, Nauru i rausim pinis visas blong foapela West Papuan husat i bin redi long go long dispela Forum miting.
Long yar igo pinis, Nauru i bin opim rot blong West Papua Presidium Council igo insait long Forum, taim Nauru Gavman long dispela taim i bin tok orait long ol Council memba, long joinim Nauru deligesin igo long miting blong ol lida long Kiribati.
Bihainim dispela halvim blong Nauru, Forum i bin putim heve blong Irian Jaya insait long agenda blong en long nambawan taim tru.
Tasol, stat long las yar ikam inap nau, gavman i senis pinis long Nauru, na nupela President, Rene Harris, ino moa laik halvim ol West Papuan.
Mr Harris i tok planti kain kain West Papuan grup i wok long askim em long halvim na em ino laik bai ol pait-kros namel long ol West Papuan i kapsait igo insait long Forum.

Minista blong Foreign Affairs bai givim tasol nau wanpela spesal oda, em bai askim Mr Leney long lusim Marshall Islands kwik bihain long em i kisim paspot blong en, oa taim visa blong en i pinis dispela mun.
Mr Leney i bin wok long kempein antap long wanpela liklik ailan long Marshalls insait long dispela tripela mun igo pinis, olsem bai em i ken stap na lukim wok blong America long testim Missile Defence system blong en.
