Tasol President blong FLNKS, Roch Wamytan, i tok indipendens muvmen i mas gat man i makim em yet insait long Paris, olsem bai em i ken bihainim ol bikpela samting France i wokim long Nouma Accord.
Oli bin sainim dispela Noumea Accord long 1998, na long en i gat ol tingting olsem, France i mas givim moa na moa otonomi long New Caledonia, na dispela i mas karamapim ol wok blong muvim sampela pawa lusim French State igo long ol lokal otoriti na bihain oli ken kisim indiopendens bihain long 15 oa 20 yar.
Military blong Indonesia i tok em i reri long strongim wanpela tambu blong gaman long pasim dispela kako sip blong Norway wantaim mo long 400 pasindia, long ino ken igo insait long solowara blong kantri.
Tokman blong armed fos blong Indonesia, sapos sip ia i lusim Australia na sel igo long Indonesia, nevi bai stopim em.
Em i tok toktok blong Indonesia gaman i stap ples kilia, em bai ino larem ol pipol, husait ino kisim tok-orait long igo insait long kantri, long igo nating.
Methodist Sios blong Fiji i rausim pinis wanpela long ol bik-maus memba blong en, Constitutional Forum, wanpela NGO lain i strong long pasin demokrasi i mas kamap long kantri.
President blong Sios i tok ol i pinisim Reverend Yabaki longwanem em i stap insait long ol wok politik.
Reverend Yabaki long dispela taim istap insait long South Africa long wanpela bikpela kivung - Durban siti.
Papa kampani blong Norway sip Tampa, em i holim 460 tok em i wok long wet tasol nau blong lukim wanem samting Australia bai mekim long ol dispela pipol.
Jill Colgan i ripot olsem i kam long Oslo long Norway olsem, Willhelmson shipping kampani i tok kapten blong sip i bin salim wanpela ripot we em i tok, ol samting i stap isi long sip blong em tede nait.
Tasol, kampani i tok ol bai no nap lukautim ol dispela pipol inap long longpela taim tumas na Australia i mas tok orait long kisim ol dispela refuji.
Papa blong kampani, Will Willhelmson, i tok kapten i wok long gohet long sakim tok blong Australia gavman long lusim solwara blong kantri.
Long Fiji, namba blong ol pipol i bin vot long nambawan foapela de blong eleksen, i bin tambolo long haf blong olgeta pipol husat i bin putim nem long rol buk.
Ol eleksen ofisal i bin sidaun galasim gut ol namba em i bin kam aut dispela wik na tok, ating namba blong ol pipol bai vot bai bikpela moa liklik winim 90-pesent mak blong 1999.
Ol namba oli galasim pinis i soim olsem, samting olsem tu-handret-na19-tausen pipol i bin vot pinis taim oli pasim taim blong vot aste.
Eleksen bos, 47-pesent long ol nem i stap long rol buk.
Mr Rigomoto i tok ol namba oli tokaut long en long Tunde i karamapim olgeta vot olgeta pipol i bin putim, ino stretpela namba tru blong ol vot.
Tasol, em i tok ol Returning Officers i toksave olsem ol namba blong ol pipol i vot pinis i bikpela tru, moa yet insait long ol taun eria.
Ol papa blong dispela sip, Tampa, i tok maski wanem samting i kamap, dispela sip blong ol i no gutpela tumas long karim planti handret pasindia.

Stadi i soim olsem.
Wanpela nupela ripot i soim olsem, health blong ol Aboringines pipal na Torres Strait pipal, ino gut tru.
Australian Bureau blong Statistics na Institute of Health na Welfare, i bin wokim dispela studi na i soim olsem, bikpela namba tru blong ol Aborigines i wok long dei, laif blong ol i sotpela tumas na oli nap stap long haus sik winim ol white pipal.
Bikpela namba long ol i gohet long kisim sik diabetes, kidney ino wok na ol narapela kain kain sik.
Australia, laif blong ol Aboriginal man, igo inap tasol long 36 kristmas.

Man oli ting bai kamap nambawan president blong East Timor, Xanana Gusmao, i tok, ating bikpela Fretilin majority pipol i elektim long East Timor bai ino gutpela samting long kantri.
Oli ting dispela pati bai winim namel long 60 na 90 pesent long vot, taim risalt blong eleksen long Fonde igo pinis, blong makim nambawan Assembly blong East Timor, i kam aut long September 5.
Oli ting United Nations edministresin bai makim wanpela gavman i kam long Assembly em bai gat 88-seat.
Mr Gusmao i tok em ino nap toksave sapos wanpela pati tasol bai kontrolim asembly.
Tasol em i tok, sapos wanpela pati tasol i winim bikpela majority tru, ating em bai ino gutpela tumas, long wanem em bai pasim olgeta kain kain lain long wok wantaim insai tlong gavman.

Labour oa S-D-L blong interim Praim Minista Laisenia Qarase, i bin winim bikpela namba tru blong holim majoriti.
Tasol em i klia olsem, Mr.
Qarase i wok long go pas.
Em i gat foapela nupela gavman, maski sapos pati blong George Speight - em long Conservative Alliance, ino halvim em.
Tasol wok blong Mr Qarase ino isi.
Chaudhry i tok President, Ratu Josefa Iloilo, i mas kam insait na mekim sampela samting blong stretim hevi.
Aninit long Fiji Constitution, Fiji Labour i gat rait long holim sampela ministri wok long nupela gavman, maski sapos President i makim Mr.
Qarase i kamap Praim Minista.
Chaudhry i bin tok Labour ino stretim tingting yet sapos em bai kisim ol ofa blong ministri.
Central Kalimnatan Provins bilong Indonesia i bin raitim kamap wanpela niupela lo bilong larim planti tausan ol Madurese, em oli bin ronwe long ol paitkros namel long tupela lain wanpsin dispela yar, igo bek ken long Central Kalimantan.
Gavana bilong Provins, Madueres na ol asples Dayak i kam sidaun bung long gutpela bel-isi na pasin ken.
Moa long 500 pipol pipol i bin idai na 80-tausen migrant Madurese i bin ronwe igo nambaut long ol narapela provins bilong Indonesia.
Gavana Agani i tok dispela nupela loa bai tokaut klia long rait na tingting blong olgeta pipol blong provins, maski oli blong wanem lain wan pisin.
New Zealand Fainens Minista, Dr Michael Cullen, i tok, klostu nau ol bai tokaut long wanpela plen blong halvim Ansett Airlines husat i wok long bungim bikpela hevi long moni.
Tasol Dr Cullen ino tok klia blong wanem na em i gat dispela strongpela bilip ol samting bai orait tasol long Ansett.
Em i bin tok halvim tasol toktok blong Praim Minista Helen Clark olsem, wanpela plen blong halvim Ansett i stap.
Air New Zealand bai tokaut long long dispela 12 mun igo pinis long Fonde.
LOng dispela taim oli hope toksave bai kam aut long wanpela plen blong putim moa moni igo insait long Ansett.

Praim Minista bilong Malaysaia, Mahathir Mohamad, i bin toktok long despela ol rot bilong ol wok bisnis insait long wanpela miting bilongen wantaim Praim Minista bilong Thailand, Malaysia na Thailand i bin sainim ol tokorait insait long mun July em i givim oda long central bank bilong tupela long oli bihainim ol wankain rot long taim bilong baim na salim ol samting.
14) ol product bilong Malaysia long tupela-ten product bilong Thailand long blong dispela mun Septemba.
Australia Immigration Minister Philip Ruddock i tok ol asylum seekers i bin tok lukaut long paitim ol boskru blong wanpela Indonesian bot, taim dispela bot i bin traim long karim ol igo bek long Indonesia.
Mr Ruddock ino laik tok klia we ol bai bringim ol nupela pipol nau tasol oli putim antap long HMAS Manoora.
Secretary of State bilong America Japan, long America na Japan emi i bin pinisim World War Two.
Tupela lida i bin apim glas champagne insait long wanpela liklik bung long San Francisco.
Long toktok blong em insiat long despela bung, Foren Minista bilong JAPAN i tok, planti belheve i wok long kamap insait long Asia Pacific rijen, na moa beta ol kantri i was gut oltaim blong lukim olsem ol samting i stap orait na nogat trabal i kamap.
Foren minista bilong Japan i soim tingting sore long ol pipol bilong ol pipol usait ibin bungim heve insait long ol ol wokbung namel long Japan na America.
Em ibin makim despela toktok bilongen long wanpela protest ol pipol bilong Japan ibin kamapim bilong soim tingting inolaik bilong ol long military bilong America istap insait long Japan.
Okinaya Island we ol soljia bilong America ibin mekim planti ol pasin nogut igo long ol meri bilong Japan we despela ibin kamapim ol bigpela protest pinis insait long Japan.
Na nau yet, Singapore i tok em ino laik go insait long ol toktok long bihain-taim blong Ansett Airlines Singapore i tok olsem, maski Singapore Airlines i holim wan-kuota long olgeta Singapore deputy Praim Minista, Lee Hsien Loong, i tok Gavman blong em i gat strongpela bilip olsem, ol investmen blong en insait long Singapore Airlines bai stap gut tasol.
Mr Lee ino bin laik toktok long sapos Australia Gavman i mas halvim Ansett.

Na America insait long final bilong ol man tumora long moning, Australia taim.
In the worst massacre in Algeria for years, an armed group has killed 11 people and wounded eight in a port town near Oran in western Algeria.
Police say the victims were attacked in the town of Arzew during a Muslim funeral vigil at dusk and say the attackers - believed to be Islamic fundamentalists - were among those injured.
They say the attackers were dressed in combat uniform when they arrived at the funeral.
The killings were part of escalating violence across Algeria which has claimed 170 lives over three weeks.
